item.title: EXCLUSIVE - 'He didn't even want to re-commit': Married At First Sight's Telv Williams and Sarah Roza split BEFORE their vow renewal ceremony, according to the groom's mother
item.description: Married At First Sight's Telv Williams and Sarah Roza left fans swooning as they made a commitment to each other at their vow renewal ceremony.
item.content:encoded:
Married At First Sight's Telv Williams and Sarah Roza left fans swooning as they made a commitment to each other at their vow renewal ceremony.

But Daily Mail Australia can exclusively reveal that the couple's fairytale ending may have been completely staged for the cameras - as they had allegedly ALREADY split.

Telv's mother claimed this week that her son was encouraged by producers to take part in the ceremony, despite telling them the relationship was already over.

Scroll down for video 

Daily Mail Australia can exclusively reveal that Telv Williams and Sarah Roza's fairytale ending on MAFS may have been staged for the cameras - as they had allegedly ALREADY split

'They (producers) were coercing him into doing something which he basically didn't want and that was to do the re-commitment ceremony,' claimed Telv's mother, Tracey Bamblett Onus.

'He didn't even want to re-commit.'

Tracey, who was featured on the 'meet the parents' episode of MAFS, alleged her son was 'asked to stay' on Channel Nine's top-rated program. 

Telv's mother, Tracey Bamblett Onus, claimed that her son was encouraged by producers to take part in the ceremony, despite telling them the relationship was already over

'They asked him to stay because of the show,' she claimed.

Tracey believed that the purpose of this request was so that Telv could take part in the vow renewal ceremony.

Despite recent claims from a friend of Sarah's that they split on Valentine's Day, Telv's mother said they actually broke up in December.

And, according to Tracey, her son wanted to exit the 'experiment' even earlier.

'He wanted to leave the show in November,' she revealed, adding that Telv stayed in a separate apartment to his wife for a week during filming.

Good acting? Telv's mother claimed producers 'coerced' her son into the vow renewal ceremony with Sarah, even though he didn't want to take part

While filming her brief appearance on the show, Tracey admitted things were definitely strained between Telv and Sarah.

She claimed that Sarah needed to be consoled after becoming 'very, very upset'.

Tracey emphasised that she did like Sarah, but admitted her son was 'walking on eggshells' around her.

She explained that Telv didn't think he was going to be paired with a woman who was 'so demanding' in a relationship. 

Things were strained! Telv's mother Tracey appeared on Married At First Sight during a 'meet the family' episode. She remarked that Sarah seemed 'very, very upset' during filming

While Telv has remained tight-lipped about MAFS and the negative publicity he has attracted, his mother said he was coping well despite feeling 'used' by producers.

'I suppose his feeling... what's the word, when you feel pushed into things?' she said, before adding that the show has been a difficult experience for him.

'He's not very happy about the way it all happened (but) he takes things in his stride and doesn't like to dwell on them too much.' 

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Channel Nine for comment. 

Struggles: While Telv has remained tight-lipped about MAFS and the negative publicity he has attracted, his mother said he was coping well despite feeling 'used' by producers
item.dc:abstract: Married At First Sight's Telv Williams and Sarah Roza left fans swooning as they made a commitment to each other at their vow renewal ceremony. But Daily Mail Australia can exclusively reveal that the couple's fairytale ending may have been completely staged for the cameras - as they had allegedly ALREADY split. Telv's mother claimed this week that her son was encouraged by producers to take part in the ceremony, despite telling them the relationship was already over.
item.dc:creator: Joe Scrimshire
item.mi:shortTitle: EXCLUSIVE: MAFS' Telv and Sarah split BEFORE the vow renewal ceremony

item.title: Christina Aguilera as you've never seen her before: Dirrty singer removes ALL makeup and hair extensions for 'liberating' Paper cover
item.description: Christina Aguilera has always gone heavy on the makeup during her 20 year career in show business. But for the May cover of Paper magazine , the Genie In A Bottle hitmaker had on not one bit of paint.
item.content:encoded:
Christina Aguilera has always gone heavy on the makeup during her 20 year career in show business.

But for the May cover of Paper magazine, the Genie In A Bottle hitmaker had on not one bit of paint as she was seen in extreme closeup.

The siren, 37, was almost unrecognizable as she held a manicured hand up to her naked lips, flashing not a diamond ring but a band that said MOM on it. 

Is that really you? Glam queen Christina Aguilera was unrecognizable for the cover of Paper magazine as she went without makeup

 Touched: The cover line read Transformation and it's a good guess the inside photos by Zoey Grossman are more of the same

She loves to go overboard: The star seen here with fake eyelashes, purple lips and pink hair for Drage Race

The cover line read Transformation and inside the photos by Zoey Grossman showed more of the same, though in some frames she was heavily made up.

In the makeup-free shots, Aguilera interestingly has freckles which fans have not seen before as they are always covered up. 

The Stripped hitmaker also had her blonde hair worn naturally in one set up as little wisps surrounded her face.

'I've always been someone that obviously loves to experiment, loves theatrics, loves to create a storyline and play a character in a video or through stage,' the Dirrty singer told the magazine.

Clear skin: 'I've always been someone that obviously loves to experiment, loves theatrics, loves to create a storyline and play a character in a video or through stage,' she told the magazine

In profile: 'I'm a performer, that's who I am by nature. But I'm at the place, even musically, where it's a liberating feeling to be able to strip it all back and appreciate who you are and your raw beauty,' the looker added

'I'm a performer, that's who I am by nature. But I'm at the place, even musically, where it's a liberating feeling to be able to strip it all back and appreciate who you are and your raw beauty,' remarked the Lotus singer.

But she says she will be back to her heavily painted look very soon as she still loves makeup.

'I mean, I'm a girl that likes a beat face, let's not get it twisted,' she explained with a laugh. 

Plaid about you: Here the blonde bombshell held up her hands as she wore a Burberry top

In another set up, the Lady Marmalade singer had her hair in a short style with very short bangs, and again she had no makeup on.

The Beautiful singer's skin looked flawless.

Another setup saw her with curly short hair as she modeled a Burberry plaid shirt that fell off her shoulders.

Wet moment: And then there were plenty of shots where she was fully made up, but her makeup was messy as if she had been partying

Not shy: She also wore a see-through plastic raincoat that showed off her figure

A little disturbing: The performer had on red eye makeup and red lipstick with false eyelashes washing down her face

And then there were plenty of shots where she was fully made up, but her makeup was messy as if she had been partying or crying or both.

A dramatic set of pictures saw her with red eye makeup and red lipstick on as false eyelashes washed down her face.

The cover girl also wore a see-through plastic raincoat that showed off her figure.

Also in her interview, the Grammy favorite talked about growing up with abuse.

Two sides to Christina: Here the star licks a mirror making it appear as if she is kissing herself

Before the big kiss: Aguilera touched her lips as she wore a white jacket with buttons

The skinny sunglasses look: The on-trend musician rocket slender frames as she wore a plastic outfit and black/blue lipstick

'I watched my mom have to be submissive, watch her Ps and Qs or she's gonna get beat up,' said the star.

'You can either be, unfortunately, so damaged by it that you take a turn for the worse, or you can feel empowered by it and make choices to never go down that route.'

It taught her to understand that some women cannot get out. 'I hate when people say, "Why doesn't she just leave?" There's psychological damage and mental abuse that comes with being in a situation like that. A lot of people don't have the ability to vocalize it themselves or have the know-how to get out.'

They eyes have it: The Back To Basics singer had heavy purple eye shadow on here but very little lipstick

The beauty came to mega fame in the 1990s with pop rock hits. But she got her start in the Mickey Mouse Club alongside Britney Spears and Justin Timberlake.

After a comeback with The Voice, she has since taken things slower as she welcomed her second child Summer Rain, three (she already has Max Liron, 10), but was recently a guest judge on RuPaul's Drag Race.

And this year she has two movies coming out: Zoe, in which she plays a robots, and  Melissa McCarthy's comedy Life of the Party, in which she plays herself.

She said her dream would be to work with Will Ferrell.

Not what fans would expect: Heavy fake eyelashes on both her top and bottom lashes looked very 1960s as she made the most of a Fendi top

A new look for an icon: And these earrings that put a new twist on basic hoops added a ton of flair to her Twiggy look
item.dc:abstract: Christina Aguilera has always gone heavy on the makeup during her 20 year career in show business. But for the May cover of Paper magazine , the Genie In A Bottle hitmaker had on not one bit of paint as she was seen in extreme closeup. The siren, 37, was unrecognizable as she held a manicured hand up to her naked lips, flashing not a diamond ring but a band that said MOM on it.
item.dc:creator: Heidi Parker
item.mi:shortTitle: Christina Aguilera is unrecognizable with no makeup on

item.title: Anastacia suffers a disastrous wardrobe malfunction when her tiny dress reveals all during clumsy lift as she returns to the dance floor for the Italy's Strictly Come Dancing
item.description: The I'm Outta Love singer's attempt appeared to go less than smoothly, with her suffering a disastrous wardrobe malfunction during a particularly clumsy lift.
item.content:encoded:
She had an emotional exit from Strictly Come Dancing two years ago.

But Anastacia had a somewhat unsuccessful return to the floor as she took part in Italy's version of the hit show over the weekend in a Dancer for a Night segment, which sees celebrities compete for scores as a special one-off appearance.

Unfortunately, the I'm Outta Love singer's attempt appeared to go less than smoothly, with her suffering a disastrous wardrobe malfunction during a particularly clumsy lift.

Red alert! Anastacia returned to the dancefloor, taking part in Italy's version of Strictly over the weekend two years on from her UK appearance, but suffered a wardrobe malfunction

The musician, 49, was dressed in a tiny red and gold flapper dress for her salsa routine with show pro Maykel Fonts.

While she looked incredible in the minuscule costume, the flimsy fabric did little to conceal her modesty during one particularly daring lift.

As Maykel lifted the singer up and attempted to twirl her round, Anastacia flashed a little more than intended as her dress rode up to reveal her flesh-coloured tights and underwear.

For one night only: The I'm Outta Love singer took part in the 'Dancer for a night' segment, which sees celebrities compete for the judges scores as a special one-off appearance

Oops! Anastacia, 49, was dressed in a tiny red and gold flapper dress for her salsa routine with show pro Maykel Fonts, which did little to conceal her modesty 

The star put her all into the performance though, looking exhausted as she finished up the routine to applause. 

Anastacia gave a clue as to the daring nature of the routine as she shared a look at rehearsals on her Instagram page earlier in the week with the caption: 'Holy s**t this dance is fast.'

After her live performance, the singer was full of gratitude for her pro partner, writing on Instagram:

'Thank you @maykel_fonts all your hard work and a fun exciting routine. When learning to dance it takes a patient, kind, enthusiastic teacher.'

Giving it her all! While she looked incredibly in the minuscule costume, the flimsy fabric was not the best choice for the energetic salsa

Her leading man: As Maykel lifted the singer up and attempted to twirl her round, Anastacia flashed a little more than intended

'I felt you truly love helping others learn to dance. I wish the best for you and until we meet again my friend #italy #dance #salsa #record #time.'

The US musician was paired with Brendan Cole for the 2016 series of the UK's Strictly Come Dancing, where she was the sixth celeb to be voted off. 

Anastacia's appearance on the show was an emotional rollercoaster, after revealing she was taking part to boost her body confidence following two battles with breast cancer.

Cheeky! The fiery singer looked in her element as she got flirty with her hunky dance partner

Speedy! Anastacia gave a clue as to the daring nature of the routine as she shared a look at rehearsals on her Insta page earlier in the week with the caption: 'Holy s**t this dance is fast'

Not the best dress: After her live performance, the singer was full of gratitude for her pro partner, writing on Instagram: 'Thank you @maykel_fonts for a fun exciting routine'

Here we go again: The US musician was paired with Brendan Cole for the 2016 series of the UK's Strictly Come Dancing, where she was the sixth celeb to be voted off

In Week One, she was controversially pulled from the Dance-Off when she ripped her mastectomy scar tissue during rehearsals.

She struggled through her Saturday night performance, but said that a repeat performance would be too risky on the Sunday night, leading producers to pull the Dance-Off for the first time in the show's history.

The elimination therefore came down to the public vote and saw the couple with the lowest votes, Melvin Odoom and Janette Manrara, exit the competition. 

Round two: The star seemed to have the time of her life for her one-off appearance in Italy 

Come here you! The US star and her pro partner shared a warm embrace after their routine

Excited: Anastacia literally danced her way onto the stage, looking keen to get started

Wow factor: The star teamed her skimpy dress with gold strappy heels and glam curly locks
item.dc:abstract: She had an emotional exit from Strictly Come Dancing two years ago. But Anastacia had a somewhat unsuccessful return to the floor as she took part in Italy's version of the hit show over the weekend in a Dancer for a Night segment, which sees celebrities compete for scores as a special one-off appearance. Unfortunately, the I'm Outta Love singer's attempt appeared to go less than smoothly, with her suffering a disastrous wardrobe malfunction during a particularly clumsy lift.
item.dc:creator: Joanna Crawley
item.mi:shortTitle: Anastacia suffers a wardrobe malfunction on Dancing With The Stars

item.title: Saying 'I do'... again! Married At First Sight fan favourites John Robertson, 54, and Melissa Walsh, 53, 'plan to wed in a legally-binding ceremony'
item.description: They've already walked down the aisle once on Married At First Sight.
item.content:encoded:
They've already walked down the aisle on Married At First Sight.

And John Robertson, 54, and Melissa Walsh, 53, are now planning to officially marry in a legally-binding ceremony.

John told Woman's Day that the blonde journalist is the 'woman of (his) dreams.'

Scroll down for video 

Saying 'I do'... again! Married At First Sight fan favourites John Robertson, 54, and Melissa Walsh, 53, 'plan to wed in a legally-binding ceremony' 

A source added: 'Marriage was never really on the cards for John and Mel again, but after the show they've really started to consider the idea.'

The couple, who have both been married before, also have a particular destination in mind for their wedding.

'Their dream place would be the Mornington Peninsula,' said the insider.

'Their dream place would be the Mornington Peninsula': The couple, who have both been married before, also have a particular destination in mind for their wedding

Sweet: John and Melissa got 'married' on Channel Nine's social experiment, but it was not a legally-binding ceremony

John and Melissa got 'married' on Channel Nine's social experiment, but it was not a legally-binding ceremony.

Earlier this month, it was rumoured that John and Melissa had quietly split.

'John can't fail twice, so production pretty much told Mel to just smile and nod and enjoy the ride,' a source allegedly told New Idea.    

'Totally false': Earlier this month, New Idea reported that John and Melissa had split - however, she denied the claims as 'totally false'

'They get on well, but they are very different people.' 

Melissa denied the claims, however, telling Daily Mail Australia that New Idea's story was 'totally false'.

As their Married At First Sight journey came to an end, the couple renewed their vows and said they were happy together.

Smitten: As their Married At First Sight journey came to an end, the couple renewed their vows and said they were happy together
item.dc:abstract: They've already walked down the aisle once on Married At First Sight. And now fan-favourite couple John Robertson, 54, and Melissa Walsh, 53, are planning to officially marry in real life. John told Woman's Day that the blonde journalist is the 'woman of my dreams.'
item.dc:creator: Chloe-Lee Longhetti
item.mi:shortTitle: MAFS' John and Mel are set to officially tie the knot

item.title: 'She needs to rest her voice': Kylie Minogue CANCELS all upcoming interviews in Australia after Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his bizarre chat with the pop icon
item.description: The Daily Telegraph reported on Tuesday that Kylie Minogue has pulled out of all promotional interviews during her trip home to Australia this week.
item.content:encoded:
Kylie Minogue has cancelled all interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia.

The London-based pop sensation, 49, is set to arrive in the country this week to perform songs from her highly-anticipated new album, Golden.

But the songstress has opted out of all accompanying promotional interviews, citing illness as the cause for the last-minute cancellation.

Scroll down for video 

Cancelled: The Daily Telegraph reported on Tuesday that Kylie Minogue has pulled out of all promotional interviews during her trip home to Australia this week

On Thursday, Kylie is set to take the stage in Sydney for an invitation-only Nova Red Room concert.

A spokesperson told The Daily Telegraph on Tuesday: 'She (Kylie) has a throat infection and needs to rest her voice ahead of the performance'. 

The publication says 'all other commitments are believed to have been spiked until further notice'.

Awkward: The news comes less than 48 hours after journalist Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his interview with Kylie, which was broadcast on Sunday night's edition of 60 Minutes

The news comes less than 48 hours after journalist Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his interview with Kylie, which was broadcast on Sunday night's edition of 60 Minutes. 

Viewers branded the Channel Nine star's chat a 'trainwreck' and called for someone more 'professional' to take the helm.

During the chat Karl made Kylie visibly uncomfortable by describing her as 'hot 50-year-old' and asked if she could stop dating 'incredibly good-looking d**kheads'. 

Oh dear: Karl was slammed after he called a 'hot 50-year-old' and told her to stop dating 'd**kheads' in a bizarre interview

Viewers flocked to Twitter to blast the 'rubbish' interview and claimed Karl was using the chat to 'creep' on Kylie.

The Channel Nine personality concluded the interview by bringing out a birthday cake for Kylie and singing to her, in a nod to her 50th in May.

Coming up from behind her, the grinning host gestured at the camera crew and publicists to join in as he serenaded a squirming Kylie.

It's not believed that the poorly-received chat is related to the pop queen's decision to pull the pin on further interviews with Australian journalists.

Backlash: Viewers were less than impressed with Karl's onscreen antics, blasting the 'trainwreck' interview and calling for someone more 'professional' to take the helm
item.dc:abstract: Kylie Minogue has cancelled all interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia. The London-based pop sensation, 49, is set to arrive in the country this week to perform songs from her highly-anticipated new album, Golden. But the songstress has opted out of all accompanying promotional interviews, citing illness as the cause for the last-minute cancellation.

item.title: 'She'll visit during school holidays': Married At First Sight's Tracey Jewel is leaving her daughter Grace, 8, in Perth to start a new life with Sean Thomsen in Melbourne - as she insists 'it's NOT a rebound relationship'
item.description: Married At First Sight's Tracey Jewel, 35, reveals in Monday's New Idea, that she will move to Melbourne to be with new beau Sean Thomsen, 35, and states it's not a rebound relationship.
item.content:encoded:
She is moving to Melbourne to live with her new boyfriend Sean Thomsen.

And Married At First Sight's Tracey Jewel has revealed her eight-year-old daughter Grace will visit her 'on school holidays.'

In an interview with New Idea this week, the 35-year-old also insisted that her new relationship, following soon after her breakup with Dean Wells, 'isn't a rebound.'

New beginnings: MAFS' Tracey Jewel has revealed her eight-year-old daughter Grace will visit her 'on school holidays' after she moves from Perth to Melbourne to live with her boyfriend Sean Thomsen

'We are moving to Melbourne! When we move there, I want to focus on my writing and Sean's almost qualified as a personal trainer,' Tracey said on Monday.

Speaking about Grace, her child from a previous relationship, Tracey added: 'I'll travel to Perth regularly to see my daughter and she'll come here on school holidays.'

Tracey emphasised that her new romance 'isn't a rebound relationship'. Meanwhile, Sean described his girlfriend as 'the love of (his) life'.

New chapter: In an interview with New Idea, the 35-year-old also insisted her new relationship, following soon after her breakup with Dean Wells, 'isn't a rebound'

Despite Tracey revealing her daughter will not live with them full-time in Melbourne, she told Daily Mail Australia on Thursday that Grace and Sean have already bonded.

Tracey said that the pair get along 'like great mates' and enjoy playing board games.

She added: '(Grace) has been fine with this whole thing. I've been open and honest with her. It was my decision for her not to be filmed or part of it, but I certainly kept her in the loop about everything that's been happening.'

Motherhood: Speaking about Grace, her child from a previous relationship, Tracey added: 'I'll travel to Perth regularly to see my daughter and she'll come here on school holidays'

Tracey and Sean publicly debuted their romance last Tuesday, after she broke up with Dean during an emotional episode of Married At First Sight. 

Dean, 40, was previously caught up in a cheating scandal with another contestant on the show, Davina Rankin.

While Tracey initially decided to give Dean a second chance, she was unable to forgive him.

That was quick! Tracey and Sean publicly debuted their romance last Tuesday, after she broke up with Dean Wells (pictured) during an emotional episode of Married At First Sight 

Read more: The full story is featured in this week's New Idea magazine, on sale now
item.dc:abstract: She is moving to Melbourne to live with her new boyfriend Sean Thomsen. And Married At First Sight's Tracey Jewel has revealed her eight-year-old daughter Grace will visit her 'on school holidays'. In an interview with New Idea, the 35-year-old also insisted that her new relationship, following soon after her breakup with Dean Wells, 'isn't a rebound'.

item.title: Modern family! Joyful Jasmine Yarbrough joins Karl Stefanovic at his son's sports match after Today host's ex-wife 'called the police' during their commitment ceremony
item.description: Karl Stefanovic and Jasmine Yarbrough pledged their love to one another in an intimate commitment ceremony held earlier this month.
item.content:encoded:
Karl Stefanovic and Jasmine Yarbrough pledged their love to one another in an intimate commitment ceremony held earlier this month.

And the pair were the picture of domestic bliss on Sunday as they cheered on Karl's young son River at a sports match in Sydney.

Looking every inch the modern family, the couple's outing comes amid rumours Jasmine is expecting her first child with her Today show beau.

Modern family! Jasmine Yarbrough joined Karl Stefanovic as they cheered on his young son at a sports match in Sydney on Sunday

Domestic bliss! The pair showed their supportive for 11-year-old River as they strolled along the sidelines of the sports field 

Clearly in weekend mode, Karl cut a casual figure, blending in with other doting dads as he watched his 11-year-old son. 

Channel Nine's golden boy wore a loose-fitting grey shirt and a pale pink pair of shorts.

He covered up his famous visage with a pair of stylish sunglasses and his favourite faded Boston Red Sox ball cap.

Casual Karl: Clearly in weekend mode, Karl cut a casual figure, blending in with other doting dads as he watched his 11-year-old son River play AFL 

Low-key lovers: Fashionista Jasmine similarly opted for low-key ensemble as she draped her hands around her beau

A baby on the way? The couple's outing comes after rumours Jasmine is expecting her first child with Karl

Meanwhile, fashionista Jasmine similarly opted for a low-key ensemble.

The talented shoe designer wore a tan-coloured tank top and a pair of deliberately tattered jeans. 

She finished off her look with a pair of stylish slides from her own Mara and Mine label.  

Easy does it: With another child possibly on the way, it seems Karl may be in for many more years watching his children on the sports field

Lazy Sunday: Cosying up with Jasmine, Karl was seen slipping off his shoes and kicking back in the sunshine

With another child possibly on the way, it seems Karl may be in for many more years watching his offspring on the sports field.

And it appears he knows how to make the most of the parental duty, seen slipping off his shoes and kicking back in the sunshine.

The TV star and his blonde beauty were both beaming, happy and relaxed.

After the game finished the pair were later seen calling in at a cafe as they continued their blissfully lazy Sunday.

The look of love: In the wake of his Ubergate scandal, Karl appeared at ease as he enjoyed time with his ladylove 

Supportive future step-mum! Jasmine stepped out to cheer on young River at his weekend sports game 

It's a far cry from reports that Karl's ex-wife Cassandra Thorbun 'called the police after becoming concerned about her children' during the new couple's commitment ceremony.

Karl and Cassandra share three kids together, and New Idea reports that her call was sparked by 'concern' for her two youngest, Ava and River.

They were both with Karl on a designated weekend when he decided to exchange vows with Jasmine.

According to Woman's Day, the children were confused and upset after finding out about the commitment ceremony just three hours beforehand.

Karl and Cassandra's eldest child Jackson did not attend and is believed to be estranged from the Today show host. 

Pit stop: After the game finished the pair were later seen calling in at a cafe as they continued their blissfully lazy Sunday

Leaving it all behind: Karl appeared to be putting the drama of his Ubergate scandal behind him as he spent time with his family on Sunday
item.dc:abstract: Karl Stefanovic and Jasmine Yarbrough pledged their love to one another in an intimate commitment ceremony held earlier this month. And the pair were the picture of domestic bliss on Sunday as they cheered on Karl's young son River at a sports match in Sydney. Looking every inch the modern family, the couple's outing comes amid rumours Jasmine is expecting her first child with her Today show beau.

item.title: She has a new beau! Angelina Jolie is 'seeing a handsome, older-looking real estate agent'... and her ex Brad Pitt has been 'quietly dating too'
item.description: Angelina Jolie seems to have a new distraction in her life. The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress has been dating a real estate agent, according to a Monday report from ET.
item.content:encoded:
Angelina Jolie seems to have a new distraction in her life.

The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress has been dating a real estate agent, according to a Monday report from Entertainment Tonight.

It was added that her ex Brad Pitt - who she has yet to finalize her divorce from after a 2016 split - is also quietly dating around, but no hints were given to who the lucky ladies are.

New man in her life: Angelina Jolie has been dating a real estate agent, according to a Monday report from Entertainment Tonight. Seen in January

'Yes she is seeing someone,' a source told the site.

Jolie's real estate agent has been described as 'handsome' and 'older looking.' And it was also noted that he 'isn't a celebrity or high profile in any way.'

That rules out the men on Million Dollar Listing. 

It is likely that he is based in Los Angeles as that is where she spends most of her time to tend to the six children she shares with Pitt - Maddox, 16, Zahara, 13, Pax, 14, Shiloh, 11, and nine-year-old twins Knox and Vivienne.

On his own path: The source says that Pitt has also moved on, and any possibility of him getting back together with Jolie is highly unlikely. 'People talk about them reuniting, but it will never happen,' the source added; seen in January

The insider also noted that the relationship is 'not serious,' but 'just having another adult to spend time with has been helpful.' 

The ex files: The humanitarian is still in the process of finalizing her divorce from Brad Pitt; seen in 2015

Friends also like to see her happy for a change because 'Angie was in a very bad place after [her] split [from Brad].' 

The source says that Pitt has also moved on, and any possibility of him getting back together with Jolie is highly unlikely.

'People talk about them reuniting, but it will never happen,' the source added.

'Things between Brad and Angie really ended poorly, and while they've attempted therapy with the [six] children [they share], they can barely be in the same room together.' 

As far as Brad - who was married to Jennifer Aniston and was engaged to Gwyneth Paltrow, he is not dating any famous women.

'He's very private about who he’s seeing, but he does continue to casually date. The women he sees are not in the public eye,' it was noted.

"He has made changes in his life since the split. When they first split, he spent a lot of time at home and was often very down about what was going on. He was a homebody for many months, but in the last month or two, he’s been going out more. He enjoys going out to eat with close friends.'

He is seeing new ladies: 'He's very private about who he’s seeing, but he does continue to casually date. The women he sees are not in the public eye,' it was noted; with Jolie in 2014

 Despite this, another source close to the situation has insisted that Brad isn't looking to settle down again anytime soon.

The insider shared: "He is in no way ready to get serious with anyone. 'He invites his dates over to his house and never takes women out in public. While it's been a year and a half [after their split], it still feels too soon to him.'

Brad is focused on the welfare of his six children rather than his dating life for the time being.

The source added: 'Dating hasn't been a priority because Brad wants to spend more time with the children. He has been working on himself. Brad has been spending a lot of time learning to play guitar and hanging with musician friends." 

The clan: She tends to the six children she shares with Pitt - Maddox, 16, Zahara, 13, Pax, 14, Shiloh, 11, and nine-year-old twins Knox and Vivienne; seen in January

In the meantime, Jolie has been seen out often with her kids. On Monday the Mr And Mrs Smith actress was seen snacking on a salty pretzel as she spent quality time with two of her six kids, daughters Vivienne and Zahara, who opted for frozen desserts, on trendy Melrose Avenue in Los Angeles.   

He is used to being with famous women like Jennifer Aniston, seen here in 2004

And last week the Gia star gave a candid interview to InStyle.

She said the older she gets, the more she sees the resemblance between herself and her late mother, Marcheline Bertrand.

'I look in the mirror and I see that I look like my mother, and that warms me,' she told the website. 'I also see myself aging, and I love it because it means I'm alive—I'm living and getting older.

'Don't love having a random dark spot from a pregnancy, sure. I see my flaws. But what I see that I like isn't about a structure or an appearance. It's more that I see my family in my face. I see my age.'

Things have certainly changed for Angelina, who admitted to rebelliously using a sharpie to dye her hair as a teenager.

'I was a bit of a tomboy. And then I was a bit of a punk. Nowadays it's very popular to dye your hair blue, for example. In my day you bleached it and used a Sharpie.'

As a girl, Angelina says she was never one to play with makeup.

Flawless: The Maleficent actress is also the face of Guerlain; she donates her paycheck to charity as she is a humanitarian

But now, she enjoys watching her adopted daughter Zahara, 13, do just that with her friends.

'I buy a lot, especially for Z [Zahara]. She went through a period of trying different things, but she's pretty natural. I remember she had a girlfriend over one night, and they said they were going to do dress-up and did I have any makeup?'

'I gave them my makeup, but I wear one color red, and I have black eyeliner and mascara—I have the most boring makeup kit. And my daughter and I are different shades of brown. I now have a backup kit in case anybody wants to play 

In a series of black-and-white images accompanying the interview, Angelina dazzled with her trademark bold red lipstick as she showcased her many tattoos in a sleeveless white ensemble.

The humanitarian, who works with the UN, is still in the process of finalizing her divorce from Pitt.

The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress has been dating a real estate agent, according to a Monday report from Entertainment Tonight . It was added that her ex Brad Pitt - who she has yet to finalize her divorce from after a 2016 split - is also quietly dating around, but no hints were given to who the lucky ladies are.

item.title: Russell Crowe, 53, looks almost unrecognisable with a bushy grey beard and unruly hair as he reunites with his glamorous ex-wife Danielle for their son's basketball game
item.description: The Gladiator star, 53, cut a relaxed figure in a loose-fitting black polo shirt and shorts as he enjoyed a family day out
item.content:encoded:
As an actor, he is a master of disguise.

And Russell Crowe was hardly recognisable as he attended his son's basketball game with his ex-wife Danielle Spencer in Malabar, Sydney on Thursday.

The Gladiator star, 53, cut a relaxed figure in a loose-fitting black polo shirt and shorts as he enjoyed a family day out.

Russell Crowe, 53, looked almost unrecognisable with a bushy grey beard and unruly hair as he reunited with his glamorous ex-wife Danielle for their son's sports game in Sydney on Thursday

Looking very different from his early 2000s heyday, Russell shared a tender moment with his son at the sports game.

The Australian actor swapped his signature Hollywood style for a bushy grey beard and sunglasses as he blended in with the crowds.

He was also seen enjoying a friendly conversation with his ex-wife Danielle.

Later on, the L.A. Confidential star appeared rather windswept as he climbed into his luxury vehicle and drove away. 

Friendly exes: The Gladiator star, 53, cut a relaxed figure in a loose-fitting black polo shirt and shorts as he enjoyed a family day out

Family man: Looking very different from his early 2000s heyday, Russell shared a tender moment with his son at the sports game

Whoosh! The L.A. Confidential star appeared rather windswept as he climbed into his vehicle

Russell and Danielle - who share two children, Tennyson and Charles - reportedly finalised their divorce in the middle of last year.

The Sunday Telegraph claimed that Danielle walked away from the marriage with '$20million in the bank' and ownership of their $11million Rose Bay mansion.

The former couple had bought the Eastern Suburbs property in 2011, just months before separating after nine years of marriage.

Is that you? The Australian actor swapped his signature Hollywood style for a bushy grey beard

Still close: He was also seen sharing a friendly conversation with his ex-wife Danielle Spencer

Going solo: Russell and Danielle - who share two children, Tennyson and Charles - reportedly finalised their divorce in the middle of last year

Reports: The Sunday Telegraph claimed that Danielle walked away from the marriage with '$20million in the bank' and ownership of their $11million Rose Bay mansion

Russell is holding a 'divorce auction' next month, selling some of his most cherished possessions and Hollywood memorabilia.

The sale at Sotheby's will feature 223 items, including a chariot from the film Gladiator, and is listed as 'The Art of Divorce'.

Watches, art and jewellery belonging to his ex-wife will also be included in the sale on April 7th - the couple's wedding anniversary and Russell's 54th birthday.

Going, going, gone! Russell is holding a 'divorce auction' next month, selling some of his most cherished possessions and Hollywood memorabilia

Moving on: The sale at Sotheby's will feature 223 items, including a chariot from the film Gladiator, and is listed as 'The Art of Divorce'

Important date: Watches, art and jewellery belonging to his ex-wife will also be included in the sale on April 7th - the couple's wedding anniversary and Russell's 54th birthday

The Gladiator star, 53, cut a relaxed figure in a loose-fitting black polo shirt and shorts as he enjoyed a family day out. The Australian actor swapped his signature Hollywood style for a bushy grey beard and sunglasses as he blended in with the crowds. Looking very different from his early 2000s heyday, Russell also shared a tender moment with his son (inset) at the family sports game. Later, he enjoyed a friendly conversation with Danielle, who is the mother of his two children, before driving away in his luxury car.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE - 'They did have concerns': Married At First Sight producers were 'worried over Sarah Roza's emotional behaviour while filming the show'
item.description: Sarah Roza reportedly suffered terribly during filming, with a source claiming MAFS producers were worried about her emotional behaviour
item.content:encoded:
She won over Married At First Sight viewers with her bubbly, outspoken personality.

But Sarah Roza reportedly suffered terribly during filming, with a source claiming producers were worried about her emotional behaviour.

Speaking exclusively to Daily Mail Australia, a TV insider said there was some concern on set over how she was coping.

Claims: Sarah Roza (pictured) reportedly suffered terribly while filming Married At First Sight, with a source claiming producers were worried about her emotional behaviour

'They did have concerns about Sarah's emotional well being,' the source said.

Sarah - who spoken candidly about her past struggles, including being 'abandoned' by a former partner - apparently acted in a way that had the crew worried.

The insider, who acknowledged the fact they were not qualified to make any kind of medical diagnosis, would not provide details about Sarah's alleged behaviour.

'They did have concerns': Speaking exclusively to Daily Mail Australia, a TV insider said there was some worry on set over how Sarah was coping

On Monday, Daily Mail Australia spoke exclusively with Telv Williams' mother, Tracey Bamblett Onus, who said there were instances which raised questions for her.

Admitting she first thought that Sarah's overzealous sharing was just for the cameras, Tracey said it continued even after filming stopped.

She added that her son Telv 'felt concern for her' and wanted to part ways amicably.

Having appeared on a 'meet the parents' episode, Tracey said that the dinner was 'very uncomfortable', despite appearing cordial on-screen.

'Very, very upset': On Monday, Daily Mail Australia spoke exclusively with Telv Williams' mother, who said there were instances which raised questions for her

Tracey explained that Sarah got 'very, very upset' at one point and a family member tried to console her.

Speaking of Sarah and Telv's relationship, Tracey claimed that her son felt like he was walking on 'eggshells'.

'He didn't think the woman he was going to get was going to be so demanding,' she said. 'But he still wants to remain friends, he still wants to remain amicable.' 

Tracey also revealed that each MAFS couple was assigned a 'manager' and that their relationships were 'strictly monitored.'

Concern: Speaking of Sarah and Telv's relationship, Tracey Bamblett Onus claimed that her son felt like he was walking on 'eggshells'

Behind the scenes: Having appeared on a 'meet the parents' episode, Tracey said that the dinner was 'very uncomfortable', despite appearing cordial on-screen

item.title: 'People weren't too worried about using protection': Bachelor in Paradise stars didn't use condoms 'because everyone was told it was an STI-free zone'
item.description: Former Bachelor franchise stars jetted off to paradise to film the all-new spin-off series in Fiji late last year.
item.content:encoded:
Former Bachelor franchise stars jetted off to paradise to film the all-new spin-off series in Fiji late last year.

And some of the famed faces who have opted to give love a second chance on Bachelor In Paradise reportedly opted out of using protection when it came to having sex on the show.

Reported by NW on Monday, an on-set source claimed: 'Because everyone had been told it was an STI-free zone, people weren't too worried about using protection when it came to having sex.'

STI-free zone: Former Bachelor franchise stars jetted off to paradise to film the all-new spin-off series in Fiji late last year, and some of them reportedly opted out of protection when it came to having sex on the show

The publication further confirmed that each contestant was required to have a full screening for sexually transmitted diseases ahead of flying to the Fijian island for the series.

The cast members were only booked on flights once their clean results were submitted to the show from a doctor.

While the rooms were reportedly stocked full of condoms, some of the cast felt no need for their use given every cast member's STI-free status.

Frisky in Fiji! The publication further confirmed that each contestant was required to have a full screening for sexually transmitted diseases ahead of flying to the Fijian island for the series

Drama ensues! 'At one point, the girls started blowing up the condoms and playing with them as balloons on the lawns'

The source also stated: 'At one point, the girls started blowing up the condoms and playing with them as balloons on the lawns.'

And while drama ensues on the series with an upcoming proposal on the cards, rumours are also spiralling that a pregnancy announcement is set to hit screens too.

While Keira Maguire and Jarrod Woodgate are set to get hot and heavy on the show, the couple have attempted to keep their relationship under wraps following filming.

Incoming announcement: While drama ensues on the series with an upcoming proposal on the cards, rumours are also spiralling that a pregnancy announcement is set to hit screens too

Since wrapping up filming, the duo have been spotted pashing seaside and cosying up at the Portsea Polo.

In a recent interview on KIIS FM's The Kyle and Jackie O show, the controversial blonde villain hinted at their relationship status.

'I really like him, I think when I watched The Bachelorette I looked at him a different way to other people 'cause I know what happens and I know how it can be portrayed and twisted,' she said.

Keira added that she has never met such a 'genuine' person before.

Bachelor in Paradise returns to screens for more tears and drama on Channel 10 at 7:30 pm on Tuesday. 

Baby en route? While Keira Maguire and Jarrod Woodgate are set to get hot and heavy on the show, the couple have attempted to keep their relationship under wraps following filming

Let the drama roll: Bachelor in Paradise returns to screens for more tears and drama on Channel 10 at 7:30 pm on Tuesday

item.title: 'How big are yours?' Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield can't hide their shock as women with supersize breasts appear on This Morning
item.description: As This Morning presenters Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield are used to interviewing everyone from the prime minister to reality stars.
item.content:encoded:
As This Morning presenters, Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield are used to interviewing everyone from the prime minister to reality stars.

But the daytime TV pros were almost lost for words during Monday's show when Dolly, Mary and Lily appeared to talk about their supersize breast augmentation surgeries.

Phil and Holly couldn't hide their shock as the trio explained that they want to go even bigger.

Shock: Holly Willoughby was lost for words during Monday's show when Dolly, Mary and Lily appeared to talk about their supersize breast augmentation surgeries.

This Morning's guests revealed they have breasts between sizes 34M and 34OO after the use of 'expanders' which allows saline to be pumped into the boob without the use of surgery.

Holly didn't know where to look during the interview, admitting: 'I was worried I would look down automatically, and I don't want to do that because I think it's a bit rude but it's hard.'

'How do you imagine I feel?!' quipped Phil. During the chat with labour and delivery nurse Lily who has the biggest breasts ever, Phil explained that 'as a gentleman, I feel like I shouldn't ever ask this but tell me, how big are yours?' 

Record breaking: During the chat with labour and delivery nurse Lily who has the biggest breasts ever, Phil explained that 'as a gentleman, I feel like I shouldn't ever ask this but tell me, how big are yours?'

Awkward: Holly didn't know where to look during the interview, admitting: 'I was worried I would look down automatically, and I don't want to do that because I think it's a bit rude'

Holly was keen to know if the trio ever experienced backache while Phil was incredulous when Lily revealed her job as a nurse, asking:  

'On the labour ward, do you ever think it's walking around with two babies in front of you, its like a cradle.'

'No I feel comfortable with them,' insisted Lily before explaining it was possible for her to have a reduction if she wanted in the future.

Assets: Holly was keen to know if the trio ever experienced backache

Probing questions: Phil was incredulous when Lily revealed her job as a nurse, asking: 'On the labour ward, do you ever think it's walking around with two babies in front of you'

Want to go bigger: This Morning's guests revealed they have breasts between sizes 34M and 34OO after the use of 'expanders'

Viewers could barely contain themselves as the segment aired, taking to Twitter to marvel at Phil and Holly's professionalism.

'@Schofe is a legend! How the hell he kept eye contact with them women without looking down is a skill #ThisMorning,' tweeted one fan.  

'I'm just waiting for holly and Phil to start laughing uncontrollably in fact I'm hoping for it lol #thismorning,' agreed another.   

Fan reaction: Viewers could barely contain themselves as the segment aired, taking to Twitter to marvel at Phil and Holly's professionalism

Earlier in the show Holly became tearful during an emotional segment on male suicide.

The presenter was moved by a video montage which saw male celebrities including Peter Andre and Professor Green discuss their mental health issues.

Holly and co-presenter Phil introduced the video as part of the Project 84 campaign, which highlights the tragic statistic  that 84 men a week commit suicide.

Emotional: Earlier in the show Holly became tearful during an emotional segment on male suicide

Speaking out: The presenter was moved by a video montage which saw male celebrities including Peter Andre and Professor Green discuss their mental health issues

Lending their voices: Holly and co-presenter Phil introduced the video as part of the Project 84 campaign, which highlights the tragic statistic that 84 men a week commit suicide

This Morning invited Peter Andre, James Arthur and Professor Green to reveal their experiences with mental health, with This Morning regular Peter explaining:

'I was in a psychiatric hospital for two weeks in New York, I had 20 panic attacks a day.'

Singer James Arthur told viewers: 'I felt I had to be the best X Factor winner there ever was. The pressure was mounting on top of me.'

Professor Green said: 'I hadn't spoken to my dad in five years. I reached out to him just before Christmas. I talked about how I felt. I lost my temper, I couldn't respond rationally anymore.' 

Chic: Holly was dressed in a smart dusky pink coat as she headed outside for the segment on male suicide during Monday's show

Best foot forward: The presenter added cute heart-print heels to her Monday outfit

Holly was noticeably emotional at the end of the segment, choking up as she read out the next link.  

This Morning has partnered with male suicide prevention charity CALM for Project 84, which aims to start the conversation about men's mental health.

As a poignant reminder of the 84 lives tragically lost to suicide each week in the UK, Holly and Phillip unveiled 84 individual sculptures - each representing a real man who took his own life.

12 of the sculptures are positioned on the roof of the This Morning Studio and the remaining 72 are standing on the roof of the ITV Studios Tower, in a powerful art installation by US street artist Mark Jenkins.  

Campaign: This Morning has partnered with male suicide prevention charity CALM for Project 84, which aims to start the conversation about men's mental health

Powerful: As a poignant reminder of the 84 lives lost to suicide each week in the UK, Holly and Phillip unveiled 84 individual sculptures - each representing a real man who took his own life

Unveiling: 12 of the sculptures are positioned on the roof of the This Morning Studio and the remaining 72 are standing on the roof of the ITV Studios Tower

item.title: PICTURED: Troy, who? MAFS' Ashley Irvin confirms her relationship with millionaire Justin Fischer as the smitten pair enjoy a romantic dinner before spending the night together at his Rose Bay home
item.description: They have been at the centre of romance rumours for weeks.
item.content:encoded:
They have been at the centre of romance rumours for weeks. 

And it appears sparks really are flying between Ashley Irvin, 28, and Justin Fischer, 41, who were pictured enjoying a date this month.

The Married At First Sight millionaire picked up the slender blonde from the airport before treating her to a romantic dinner at Sydney's Park Hyatt.

Troy, who? After weeks of speculation, Ashley Irvin has confirmed her relationship with Justin Fischer after the pair were spotted on a romantic date in Sydney this month

The smitten pair then went back to his lavish Rose Bay apartment, where they spent the night together, before making their way to breakfast the morning after.

Flight attendant Ashley arrived in Sydney on a Friday night from Queensland and her strapping co-star was right on time to pick her up.

Hopping into his black BMW convertible, Ashley was seen already dressed and ready for their date.

The photos taken earlier in the month saw the reality star flaunt her enviable physique in a teal green form-fitting mini dress with black stiletto heels.

Her knight in shining armour! Arriving in Sydney on a Friday night Virgin flight from Queensland, strapping Justin was right on time to pick her up

Date ready! Hopping into his black BMW convertible, Ashley was seen already dressed and ready for their date

Dapper: The strapping father-of-two sported a perfectly ironed shirt and suit pants for the evening agenda 

Arriving with one suitcase and an overnight bag on her shoulder, chivalrous Justin was seen opening her door as she jumped inside.

The pair headed straight into the Sydney city for a romantic date at the Park Hyatt Hotel, where they were seen walking in hand-in-hand.

The strapping father-of-two sported a perfectly ironed shirt and suit pants for the evening agenda. 

Will he get a second date? Sitting by a window with glasses of wine, fans who were lucky enough to witness the date take place told OK! Magazine that the pair were definitely getting along really well

Going smoothly: 'They were flirty. They touched each other a lot,' reported the source to the publication

Keeping the romance alive: And the night didn't end there, with Ashley and Justin progressing to Sydney's Rock's to watch the sun set

Sitting by a window with glasses of wine, fans who were lucky enough to witness the date take place told OK! magazine that the pair were definitely getting along really well. 

'They were flirty. They touched each other a lot,' reported the source to the publication. 

And the night didn't end there, with Ashley and Justin progressing to Sydney's Rock's to watch the sun set.  

What a night to be alive! Getting close, Justin was photographed with his hands around her back while the blonde gazed out into the distance

Sparks flying? They've been rumoured to have been enjoying their own wife-swap love story over the past few weeks 

Getting their beauty sleep: With everything going to plan, the latest couple headed back to Justin's Rose Bay mansion where they spent the night together

Getting close, Justin was photographed with his hands around her back while the blonde gazed out into the distance.

With everything going to plan, the latest couple headed back to Justin's Rose Bay mansion where they spent the night together. 

The following morning saw the pair head to breakfast in the millionaire's Range Rover.

Out again! The following morning saw the pair head to breakfast in the millionaire's Range Rover

Happy days: Nourishing their bodies for the day ahead, Ashley was seen in a black tube top with form-fitting denim jeans and ditched her heels for black flats as she walked into the eatery smiling alongside Justin

Did Carly warn you Ash? However, it doesn't appear as though much has changed since his relationship with Carly Bowyer, with the former Married At First Sight husband seen on his phone during breakfast while Ashley patiently waited for his attention to return

Nourishing their bodies for the day ahead, Ashley was seen in a black tube top with form-fitting denim jeans and ditched her heels for black flats as she walked into the eatery smiling alongside Justin.  

However, it doesn't appear as though much has changed since his relationship with Carly Bowyer, with the former Married At First Sight husband seen on his phone during breakfast while Ashley patiently waited for his attention to return.

With the tennis enthusiast content with her meal, the ice-cream technician was seen walking out with his unfinished berry smoothie.

Smoothie to go! With the tennis enthusiast content with her meal, the ice-cream technician was seen walking out with his unfinished berry smoothie

It had to come to an end some day! And unfortunately, the pair's overnight of fun was destined to come to an end, with the Sydney-native returning back to the airport to drop his date off

And unfortunately, the pair's overnight of fun was destined to come to an end, with the Sydney-native returning back to the airport to drop his date off.  

After hours of fun, the pair's adventure came to an end with Justin taking Ashely back to the airport before leaning in for a kiss.   

Although the love-seekers are yet to confirm or deny their current relationship status, last week it was revealed that Justin's ex-wife Carly and Ashley's ex-husband Troy Delemege are currently in a serious relationship. 

What's so funny? It seemed as though the night had gone well, with Ashley laughing in the car before hopping out

Did he get the kiss? After hours of fun, the pair's adventure came to an end with Justin taking Ashely back to the airport before leaning in for a kiss

Longtime crush: During the reality show, Justin also expressed his desire for the busty Virgin Australia air hostess

During the reality show, Justin also expressed his desire for the busty Virgin Australia air hostess. 

'I'm more attracted to girl's like Ash,' he revealed after putting down his wife.

'I did say to the experts that I did like the blonde beach babe Aussie type girls.'

item.title: PICTURED - The other side of Paradise: Extraordinary photos reveal the small Fijian village of Namatakula just a 20-second drive from the luxury Mango Bay resort where Bachelor stars sip cocktails and enjoy casual hook-ups
item.description: For the singletons looking for love on Bachelor In Paradise, life at the four-star Mango Bay Resort in Fiji is all about sun, sand and hook-ups.
item.content:encoded:
For the singletons looking for love on Bachelor In Paradise, life at the four-star Mango Bay Resort in Fiji is all about sun, sand and hook-ups.

But if the D-list celebrities were to take a 20-second drive down the street, they would be confronted with an altogether different scene. 

The village of Namatakula is home to approximately 2,500 people, who lead far more humble lives than their Australian visitors.

How the other half lives: For the singletons looking for love on Bachelor In Paradise, life at the four-star Mango Bay Resort in Fiji is all about sun, sand and hook-ups

Different worlds: But if the D-list celebrities were to take a 20-second drive down the street, they would be confronted with an altogether different scene

Photos taken by Daily Mail Australia show streets lined with tin-roofed shacks and children earning extra money selling food.

While it's possible the producers employed villagers and supported local businesses, it is unlikely Bachelor viewers will ever see the other side of Paradise on-screen.

Instead, they will be treated to their twice-a-week dose of drama, dates, and romantic betrayals.

Close proximity: The village is located just a stone's throw from the glamorous reality TV set 

Local residents: The village of Namatakula, home to about 2,500 people, lead far more humble lives than their Australian visitors

Just visiting: Bachelor In Paradise stars are shown enjoying cocktails at the resort bar

Life in Namatakula: Photos show streets lined with tin-roofed shacks and children appearing to selling food to earn extra money

Community: While it's possible the producers employed villagers and supported local businesses, it is unlikely Bachelor viewers will ever see the other side of Paradise on-screen

Four-star destination: Bachelor In Paradise contestants Michael Turnbull (left) and Davey Lloyd (right) are pictured in the luxury Mango Bay Resort

Villagers: A boy is pictured sitting on a 'Hot Food' stand in Namatakula

In a statement to Daily Mail Australia on Tuesday, a rep from Warner Brothers said they received 'blessings' from local Chiefs to film the show.

'Before filming we engaged the two local village Chiefs, obtaining blessings to film on their land,' they said.

'In consultation with the Chiefs, we engaged villagers to work in various departments, employing 55 local Fijians full time.

The statement continued: 'During our ten week stay in Fiji, we utilised the services of over 50 Fijian companies and were in constant communication with each village on how we could assist each other.

'In addition to this, we supported the local villages by providing building materials, fabrics, homewares and stationary for the children.'

Bachelor In Paradise brings together previous contestants from The Bachelor and Bachelorette for a second chance at love.

The males and females alternate between positions of power: one week, it will be the boys handing out roses, the next week it will be the girls. 

Trade: A villager is pictured preparing food outdoors under a tin-roofed structure

Outdoor scenes: A rubbish-strewn beach in Namatakula is shown

Pristine: Mango Bay Resort looks positively picturesque in this aerial photograph

Inside look: Photographers who flew to Fiji to document Bachelor In Paradise's filming also captured striking images of Namatakula

Repeat performance: The Mango Bay Resort was also used for the filming of The Bachelorette finale last year

There is an uneven number of male and female contestants, which means if you are left empty-handed at a Rose Ceremony, you are sent home. 

One path to success on Bachelor In Paradise is to 'couple up' early in the series, meaning you will always have someone to give you a rose at the Rose Ceremonies.

However, this gameplan can be disrupted by 'intruders' who are thrown into the mix later on to shake things up. 

Return: The producers decided to return to Fiji to film Bachelor In Paradise

Exotic: The Mango Bay Resort is a four-star holiday destination, according to travel websites

Close: A sign for the Mango Bay Resort in Namatakula is pictured

 Picture series: Photographers captured the daily lives of the residents of Namatakula

Villagers are pictured below a sign reading '2017 Fiji Population and Housing Census'

Idyllic: The lush surroundings of the resort are featured prominently in Bachelor In Paradise

But if the D-list celebrities were to take a 20-second drive down the street, they would be confronted with an altogether different scene. The village of Namatakula is home to approximately 2,500 people, who lead far more humble lives than their Australian visitors.

item.title: Today's Georgie Gardner clutches a huge bouquet of flowers as she visits the Overtons after Peter's wife Jessica Rowe slammed Karl and Peter Stefanovic over Ubergate
item.description: Earlier this month, Jessica Rowe publicly slammed brothers Karl and Peter Stefanovic over their leaked Uber phone call about co-host Georgie Gardner.
item.content:encoded:
Earlier this month, Jessica Rowe publicly slammed brothers Karl and Peter Stefanovic over their leaked Uber phone call about co-host Georgie Gardner.

And it appears as though Today star Georgie is sending her thanks to Peter Overton's wife Jessica and her in-laws.

Seen in Sydney on Tuesday, the 46-year-old was photographed buying a large bouquet of flowers before visiting Georgie's sister-in-law Rebecca.

Scroll down for video  

Pays to be her friend! Following the Ubergate scandal, on Tuesday, Georgie Gardner was seen in Sydney gifting Peter Overton's sister Rebecca with a huge bouquet of flowers

A casually dressed Georgie was all smiles as she walked out of a local florist.

The mum-of-two sported a khaki coloured t-shirt and blue denim jeans and kept warm with a black blazer. 

Keeping comfortable, the stunner added white closed-toe shoes with a slight wedge heel. 

Giving her thanks: Dressed casually for the afternoon errand run, Georgie was all smiles as she walked out of the florist

Which to choose? Deciphering between a range of different floral arrangements, she appeared content with her final choice - flashing her pearly whites as she returned to her car

Stylish: The mum-of-two sported a khaki coloured t-shirt and blue denim jeans and kept warm with a black blazer

Georgie kept a low profile by accessorising with black sunglasses.

Deciphering between a range of different floral arrangements, she appeared content with her final choice - flashing her pearly whites as she returned to her car.

And it seems as though it pays to be a friend of Georgie, with the TV journalist also photographed carrying a brown present bag that went with the pink ribboned flowers. 

Georgie, is that you? Georgie kept a low profile by accessorising with black sunglasses

Special delivery! Seen in Sydney on Tuesday, the 46-year-old was photographed buying a large bouquet of flowers before heading off to visit the newsreader's sister, Dr Rebecca Overton

Lucky friend! And it seems as though it pays to be a friend of Georgie, with the TV journalist also photographed carrying a brown present bag that went with the pink ribboned flowers

The recipient of the arrangement was none other than colleague Peter Overton's sister, Rebecca. 

Also dressed down for the catch-up, the doctor wore a white lace top with slim-fitting black pants. 

Just last week, Peter's wife Jessica Rowe appeared on her show Studio Ten to slam brothers Peter and Karl Stefanovic for their thoughtless words regarding their colleague.  

Keeping her head held high: Just last week, Peter's wife Jessica Rowe appeared on her show Studio Ten to slam brothers Peter and Karl Stefanovic for their thoughtless words regarding their colleague

Friends: Also dressed down for the catch-up, Doctor Rebecca Overton wore a white lace top with slim-fitting black pants

Not so nice: According to New Idea last week, Karl was heard 'angrily' complaining about Lisa Wilkinson's replacement, Georgie, during a 'b*tchy' conversation with Peter while he was in the back of an Uber

'I suppose because Georgie's one of my dearest friends, no the phone call shouldn't have been recorded,' she said. 

'But I don't think these two [Karl and Peter] are victims. I think If you have nothing nice to say about someone, do it behind closed doors. Do not do it on speakerphone where people are listening.'

She added: 'Georgie is an incredible journalist, she is not neutral about anything, she's strong, she's committed, she's passionate. I'm sick of blokes saying negative things about women.'

Longtime friends: 'Georgie is an incredible journalist, she is not neutral about anything, she's strong, she's committed, she's passionate. I'm sick of blokes saying negative things about women,' defended Jessica following the audio leak 

According to New Idea last week, Karl was heard 'angrily' complaining about Lisa Wilkinson's replacement, Georgie, during a 'b*tchy' conversation with Peter while he was in the back of an Uber.

A source close to Karl's team told Daily Mail Australia follwoing the report that: 'Karl is heading to court over the leaked Uber tape'.

'The Nine frontman will issue legal proceedings against the global rider-share scheme.' 

Standing their ground: A source close to Karl's team told Daily Mail Australia follwoing the report that: 'Karl is heading to court over the leaked Uber tape'

item.title: Shock twist! MAFS' Davina Rankin reveals the REAL reason she called Tracey Jewel 'crazy' during THAT argument about her 'affair' with Dean Wells
item.description: She encountered an almighty showdown with co-star Tracey Jewel over her affair with Dean Wells. But Davina Rankin has insisted she had a valid reason for branding her MAFS co-star 'crazy'.
item.content:encoded:
She encountered an almighty final showdown with Married At First Sight co-star Tracey Jewel over her 'affair' with Dean Wells.

But Davina Rankin has insisted she had a valid reason for branding her co-star 'crazy' during the tiff and even says the ladies are 'fine' with each other now the dust has settled.

Talking to A Current Affair on Monday, the 26-year-old said: 'Tracey actually called me after she left Dean at the aisle of the last ceremony, and we're actually fine.'

Scroll down for video 

The truth: MAFS' Davina Rankin has revealed the REAL reason she branded Tracey Jewel 'crazy' during THAT argument about her affair with Dean Wells

Davina went on to explain that she and Tracey, 35, had in fact discussed the issues off-camera and put the whole thing to bed - which is why she felt blindsided by the sudden outburst at the group dinner.

This confusion led to Davina branding Tracey 'crazy' after she launched into a tirade.

In the same interview, Davina burst into tears while explaining how the public backlash to her actions affected her parents.

Having been accused of failing to show 'empathy' or 'remorse' after starting an affair behind her 'husband' Ryan Gallagher's back [with Dean], the aspiring bikini model sobbed as she admitted she felt 'so helpless' when her mother and father became upset over the online abuse directed at her.

'She's crazy!' Davina slammed Tracey during a heated confrontation about Tracey's ex Dean Wells on MAFS

Reasoning: Davina went on to explain that she and Tracey [pictured] had in fact discussed the issues off-camera and put the whole thing to bed - which is why she felt blindsided by the sudden outburst at the group dinner

Emotional: Davina proved he's not heartless as she broke down crying while explaining how the public backlash to her actions affected her parents

'My mum and dad were ropeable. Absolutely ropeable,' Davina said. 'I just felt really bad for them because's it's all on the internet. 

'And bless them, but they know nothing about the internet. They just want to get on there and say 'F**k you Susan, don't call my daughter a bitch!'.' 

'I just have to be like, 'Mum, Dad, you need to not comment, that's not how this works. If you comment, people are going to start attacking you.'

Not impressed? She also called her former love rival Tracey Jewel's new romance with Sean Thomsen 'f**king weird' 

Wiping away tears, the personal trainer added shakily: 'And so it was really hard watching them feel so helpless.' 

The Instagram model was branded a 'homewrecker' by MAFS fans after she began a secret relationship with 'alpha male' Dean Wells behind Ryan's back.

Davina also angered viewers when she refused to properly apologise to Dean's TV 'wife' Tracey Jewel for her actions, instead suggesting: 'What? I thought your boyfriend was hot... But he didn't want to be with you.'

Overwhelmed: The aspiring bikini model, 26, sobbed as she admitted she felt 'so helpless' when her mother and father became upset over the online abuse directed at her

Sad: 'My mum and dad were ropeable. Absolutely ropeable,' Davina said during an appearance on A Current Affair on Monday (pictured with her father Bob) 

Helpless' She became choked up and stopped, before continuing: 'I just felt really bad for them because's it's all on the internet'. Pictured with her mother Barb

Discussing the backlash, she said: 'Yeah, words still have litte weight. 'Screw the haters' - it's easy to say, you know, or 'Yeah, whatever,'. But they're pretty serious threats.

'It doesn't matter who you are, it's not nice to think that people hate you that much.'

Davina then took aim at her former love rival Tracey Jewel's new romance with MAFS star Sean Thomsen, branding it 'f**king weird'.

'I just find it so f**king weird. Like, I don't understand it,' she fumed.

'You don't understand compatible people?' asked reporter Alison Piotrowski.

Davina elaborated: 'Because they don't seem like were such a good match. Sean is so different to Dean.' 

Hmm: Davina then took aim at her former love rival Tracey Jewel's new romance with MAFS star Sean Thomsen, branding it 'f**king weird'

Sceptical: Rankin continued: 'I just don't understand it. Sean is so different to Dean'

Rankin also touched on her explosive showdown with Tracey at the reunion, claiming she was 'confused' by her anger as the pair had talked after the vow renewal ceremony. 

'Tracey actually called me as soon as she left Dean the aisle in the last ceremony, and that kind of stuff at so we had been fine,' she claimed.

'I was caught off guard. And that's why at the reunion because it's just like, and almost just sassy, like we haven't spoken. 

'I was confused. I was like 'I can't believe we're pretending'.'

Controversy!  Davina was criticised for being unkind to 'husband' Ryan Gallagher, and soon after received backlash for beginning a secret 'relationship' with co-star Dean Wells, who was 'married' to Tracey Jewel

item.title: 'They needed a bigger egg!' Married At First Sight's Ryan Gallagher poses completely NAKED for a magazine photoshoot as he barely covers his modesty with an Easter treat
item.description: Before his ill-fated appearance on Married At First Sight, Ryan Gallagher was a guest on Kyle and Jackie O's infamous 'Naked Dating' segment.
item.content:encoded:
Before his ill-fated appearance on Married At First Sight, Ryan Gallagher was a guest on Kyle and Jackie O's infamous 'Naked Dating' segment.

And the cheeky TV husband, 29, went back to his showbusiness roots on Monday by stripping off for an Easter-themed photoshoot with NW magazine.

The tattooed tradie, who hails from Maroubra, Sydney, even joked that the Easter egg used to conceal his modesty wasn't big enough and had to be replaced.

Scroll down for video 

'They needed a bigger egg!' Married At First Sight's Ryan Gallagher posed completely NAKED for an NW magazine photoshoot on Monday, barely covering his modesty with an Easter treat

In the photos, Ryan looks happy and confident while posing with nothing but a chocolate egg covering up his nether regions.

He revealed: '(The NW staffers) went to the supermarket to get a bigger egg! But I'm not shy, I never have been. You've got to be comfortable with nudity.'

In the accompanying interview, Ryan admitted he has received plenty of romance offers after being rejected by his on-screen wife Davina Rankin.

'I'm not shy, I never have been': In the photos, Ryan looks happy and confident while posing with nothing but a chocolate egg covering up his nether regions

'I don't count (the direct messages), there's a few there,' he said. 'I have had a few that say, "Marry me". I can't reply because one: I don't have the time, and two: I don't want to lead anyone on.' 

Speaking of his hopes for a new relationship, Ryan said: 'I hope to be with someone by next year, so I'm looking to find someone as soon as possible, fingers crossed.'

Ryan's Married At First Sight journey ended in humiliation and heartbreak after his 'wife' Davina Rankin began a secret 'affair' with Dean Wells.

'I have had a few that say, "Marry me"': In the accompanying interview, Ryan admitted he has received plenty of romance offers after being rejected by his on-screen wife Davina Rankin

Before appearing on the show, he made headlines for appearing on The Kyle and Jackie O Show's controversial Naked Dating segment.

Ryan didn't hesitate when asked to strip down for the radio segment, and proudly boasted that he was up for 'KFC and a root' with most ladies.

Married At First Sight returns to Channel Nine next year 

He's not shy! Before appearing on Married At First Sight, Ryan made headlines for appearing on The Kyle and Jackie O Show's controversial Naked Dating segment
