item.title: Kim Kardashian, 37, looks suspiciously flawless in new swimsuit photos after THAT epic Photoshop fail
item.description: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star came off more like an exotic brunette model than the TV personality her fans know so well as she modeled a black bathing suit.
item.content:encoded:
Kim Kardashian posted an image to Twitter on Monday where she looked nearly unrecognizable.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star came off more like an exotic brunette model than the TV personality her fans know so well as she modeled a black bathing suit. And her followers were not having any of it.

The looker, 37, was posing with her makeup artist Mario Dedivanovic as she plugged their new collaboration on KKW X MARIO eye shadows and lipstick.

Is that you Kimmy? Kim Kardashian posted an image to Twitter on Monday where she looked nearly unrecognizable

New and improved: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star came off more like an exotic brunette model than the TV personality her fans know so well as she modeled a bathing suit

The looker was posing with her makeup artist Mario Dedivanovic as she plugged their new collaboration on KKW X MARIO

This comes after the siren, 37, was criticized over the weekend for having an Instagram image so heavily Photoshopped that a car appeared to be squeezed together to look like a toy in a slender parking spit.

In the new images, Kim looks touched up to perfection on all levels.

Her hair looks very different - she suddenly has reddish highlights over her raven locks, and is fuller on top.

The beauty's face also looks distorted with her features more even than ever. Her eyes are bigger and the space from her eyes to her lips seems longer.

Her note: The star's caption read, '10 years ago when we met I never dreamed we would be launching our own products together! I'm so proud of this collection of our favorite eye shadows and lips! Stay tuned... KKW X MARIO'

And her neck appears stretched so it's longer, leaner. Plus, she overall looks tanner.

While Kim has an enviable figure thanks to daily workouts and the Atkins Diet, she looks even more slender here with a tiny waistline and slimmer arms.

Stars very often rely on Photoshop for advertisements because even though customers don't want to admit it, they want stars to look as good as can be - often beyond realistic expectations - to buy the product.

Having fun: One tweeted changed the photo to give Kim a very small head, and did the same with Mario

The feedback: Gail Gisehaltz said, 'That doesn't look entirely like Kim.' Myleeeza added, 'B*** when were these pics taken???? You look 27!!!!' while Emma The Wicked Witch Of Canada added, 'Neither of them look a day over 30 I am shoooook.' Coffee! then commented: 'Hot. Airbrushed, but hot!'

Kim no doubt feels the pressure to look her very best to sell her makeup line. And the pressure must be intense as her half-sister Kylie Jenner, 20, has made a fortune from her makeup line.

But fans were not pleased. One tweeted changed the photo to give Kim a very small head, and did the same with Mario. 

Gail Gisehaltz said, 'That doesn't look entirely like Kim.' Myleeeza added, 'B*** when were these pics taken???? You look 27!!!!' while Emma The Wicked Witch Of Canada added, 'Neither of them look a day over 30 I am shoooook.' Coffee! then commented: 'Hot. Airbrushed, but hot!'

And the timing is terrible as this weekend Kim was slammed for her Photoshop fail. The image was posted to Instagram on Saturday.  

Photo tricks! Kim suffered a Photoshop fail, on an image she posted to Instagram on Saturday which squashed a car in the background and bent the curb

As it was: The 37-year-old reality television star was mocked by followers, after changes were made to the original snap

What happened? Fans were quick to point out the errors

Fail! They replied pointing out the issue

Edited! Kim had cleared engaged in some photo fakery

Slimmed down: One follower pointed out the strange looking car in her version of the picture

The mother-of-three appeared to have lengthened her figure and slimmed her thighs, which affected the background.  She was wearing neoprene cycling shorts and flip-flops, teamed with a cropped top.  And oversized orange hoodie completed her outfit, and she added giant shades. 

Kim captioned: 'So ready to March today! ‪@AMarch4OurLives @EveryTown.'  

Eagle eyed fans were quick to point out the glaring errors in the picture. 

One said: 'The car in the back lol.' 

'Just me or did anyone else see the squashed car in the back. #photoshopped. Caught you,' another wrote. 

And then there is this: There was an uproar when this image surfaced of Kim's bottom looking unflattering, but she later said it was Photoshopped to look ugly. The photo agency said that was not true. Taken in April 2017

Another added: 'Thought that was a spaceship in the back.' 

Others were not fans of her wardrobe choices, with one writing: 'I love you... but it looks like you were in a hurry and left the house in your moms old blazer, some pedicure flip flops that were left by the front door, and your higher power Spanx. March right back in that closet girl and get yourself dressed.' 

It's not the first time the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has been at the centre of a photoshop scandal.

She had a piece of her arm missing from a snap she posted with BFF Jonathan Cheban. 

Given the elbow: It's not the first time the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has been at the centre of a photoshop scandal, she had part of her arm missing here in 2014

item.title: Immaculate contemporary features, an internal courtyard and a state-of-the art dining area perfect for entertaining! Inside Red Symons' $5 million five-bedroom villa that broke sales records in Melbourne's Fitzroy North
item.description: It's the five bedroom villa in Melbourne that was once the home of veteran TV personality Red Symons.
item.content:encoded:
It's the five bedroom villa in Melbourne that was once the home of veteran TV personality Red Symons. 

And as the property went under the hammer on Sunday, the impressive abode broke sales records in Fitzroy North, selling for a whopping $5 million. 

At the nail-biting auction - which attracted about 200 people - the Alfred Crescent property nabbed a sales price that was $400,000 over reserve. 

Immaculate contemporary features, an internal courtyard and a state-of-the art dining area perfect for entertaining! Inside Red Symons' $5 million five-bedroom villa that broke sales records in Melbourne's Fitzroy North

The record-smashing $5 million price tag is a far cry from what Red and his wife originally bought the place for in 1998, with the couple shelling out a relatively paltry $730,000.

Ideal for a large family, the expansive home features five bedrooms house in a sprawling villa.

The renovated property has plenty of space in its living and dining spaces as well as its welcoming outdoor area, which are all perfect for large-scale entertaining.  

Huge jump: The record-smashing $5 million price tag is a far cry from what Red and his wife originally bought the place for in 1998, with the couple shelling out a relatively paltry $730,000

Up to speed! The state-of-the art kitchen features Gaggenau appliances as well as stainless steel and granite bench tops

Sun-soaked: The expansive windows allow for a vast amount of natural light to effortlessly filter in

Huge windows allow for natural light to illuminate the interior and help its inhabitants make the most of the stunning surrounds.

Encompassing the homes are two courtyards rather than a backyard and a quaint internal courtyard offers a picturesque spot to unwind with a book or cup of tea.

Polished wooden floors feature throughout much of the home while carpet lines the bedrooms and lounge areas.  

Fancy a cup of tea? An adorable internal courtyard makes for a serene spot to relax or wind down with a book

Outdoors: Encompassing the home are courtyards which blend into the interior and are ideal for large-scale entertaining

Room to relax: The home has beautifully fused contemporary and period features for a gorgeous look

Expansive: Ideal for family living, the sprawling home is certainly not short on space

Modern living: The contemporary rooms feature plenty of space

The kitchen is state-of-the art and contains Gaggenau appliances which cater for any cooking  or food preparation need.

Stainless steel and granite bench tops also appear in the space,  adding an extra modern and sophisticated touch.

Throughout the expansive home, contemporary and period features fuse together seamlessly, retaining the history of the property while keeping up with modern styles.

Getting some shut eye: There are five bedrooms in the $5 million villa, including three double bedrooms

Sleeping on it! Each bedroom is modern and contains ample space and storage

Family style: Approximately 200 people attended the auction  before the winning bid was place at $5 million

Lots of room: Plenty of bedrooms make it easy to house all members of a family 

Within the house, there are five modern-style bedrooms - three of which are double bedrooms.

The master bedroom has mosaic-tiled ensuite and walk-in wardrobe - and all bedrooms have ample storage and space.

Elsewhere, there is a contemporary bathroom with excellent finishes and a serene home office for those who need a quiet spot to get some work done.

Up to scratch: There is a contemporary bathroom with excellent finishes include tiling in a pale green hue

Study spot: A serene home office for those who need a quiet spot to get some work done

Smashing records! At the nail-biting auction, the Alfred Crescent property nabbed a sales price that was $400,000 over reserve

And as the property went under the hammer on Sunday, the impressive abode broke sales records in Fitzroy North, selling for a whopping $5 million. At the nail-biting auction - which attracted about 200 people - the Alfred Crescent property nabbed a sales price that was $400,000 over reserve.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Heidi Klum the cougar strikes again! Supermodel, 44, confirms romance with rocker Tom Kaulitz, 28, with a romantic kiss
item.description: The mother-of-four, who is currently filming America's Got Talent, recently split from from Vito Schnabel, 31.
item.content:encoded:
Heidi Klum and Tokio Hotel guitarist Tom Kaulitz aren't hiding their love anymore.

The 44-year-old model and her new 28-year-old beau were seen packing on the PDA while Heidi was filming America's Got Talent on Sunday afternoon. 

The two cuddled up as Klum enjoyed a break with her crew.

Lip-locked! Heidi Klum and 28-year-old Tokio Hotel guitarist Tom Kaulitz aren't hiding their love anymore. The 44-year-old model and her new beau were seen packing on the PDA while Heidi was filming America's Got Talent on Sunday afternoon

No shame! The new couple were seen making out in front of Heidi's AGT crew

All smiles! The two couldn't keep their hands off each other 

Tom and Heidi were last spotted on March 14 leaving Delilah in West Hollywood. 

While there were no public displays of affection that night, the duo were seen hopping into the same vehicle. 

Up until 2017, the supermodel was linked to art curator Vito Schnabel. 

Honeymoon phase: Tom and Heidi were last spotted on March 14 leaving Delilah in West Hollywood. While there were no public displays of affection that night, the duo were seen hopping into the same vehicle

Red hot! Klum was dressed in sequin red shorts and a suit jacket for AGT on Sunday afternoon

Dressed in sequin red shorts and a suit jacket for AGT, Heidi crouched down to rest her aching feet that were in sky-high heels. 

As a sign of affection, Heidi sweetly grabbed the calf of her new man who was wearing a pair of cropped sweatpants, a green tee, and unlaced white tennis shoes. 

Tom is well known for his rocker look that includes a ponytail and gauged ears.

Taken! Just weeks ago, Klum told Ellen DeGeneres that she was 'very single and ready to mingle,' after dating Vito for three years. But that was obviously short lived

Confirmed! This is the first time that the couple have been romantic in public with one another

Taking a load off: As a sign of affection, Heidi sweetly grabbed the calf of her new man who was wearing a pair of cropped sweatpants, a green tee, and unlaced white tennis shoes

Beats to his own drum: Tom is well known for his rocker look that includes a ponytail and gauged ears

Just weeks ago, Klum told Ellen DeGeneres that she was 'very single and ready to mingle,' after dating Vito for three years. 

But that was obviously short lived. 

The Germany native is the mother to four children; Helene (who goes by the name Leni), 13, Henry, 12, Johan, 11, and Lou, eight. 

She shares her little ones with ex-husband Seal, 55, whom she was with from 2005 until 2014. 

Moving on: The mother-of-four recently split from from Vito Schnabel, 31. She shares her little ones with ex-husband Seal, 55, whom she was with from 2005 until 2014

item.title: No baby proofing here! New mom Kylie Jenner opens doors to her opulent living room featuring signed Basquiat print, $25k side table and roaring open fire
item.description: She might be just 20 years old, but Kylie Jenner knows exactly what she likes.
item.content:encoded:
She might be just 20 years old, but Kylie Jenner knows exactly what she likes.

And the new mother showed her stylish take on interior designer, as she gave fans a peek inside her newly decorated living room on Monday.

While the room was far from child-friendly - featuring a sharp-edged glass coffee table and an unprotected open roaring fire -  it was certainly impressive.

No baby proofing here! New mom Kylie Jenner opens doors to her opulent living room featuring signed Basquiat print, $25k side table and roaring open fire

Above the fireplace hung a signed Basquiat print of his artwork Hollywood Africans In front Of The Chinese Theater With Footprints Of Movie Stars.

Similar prints from the limited edition 1983 run of 60 are currently on sale for between $50,000 to $75,000.

The New Yorker son of Haiitain immigrants, Basquiat's work hangs in the world's top galleries, including Los Angeles' The Broad Musuem, where Kylie's sisters Kim and Kourtney Kardashian have both previously been pictured.

To the side of the fire under a round mirror stands a gold occasional table dripping with metallic bulges.

This piece is the Melting Brass Hallway Table by Zhipeng Tan, which retails for $25,000.

Watch out Stormi! The reality star will have to be careful to ensure her baby stays safe once she starts crawling

The room is furnished with soft white couches and carpeted in the same color, while a glass coffee table inlaid with floating pieces of gold leaf forms the centrepiece to the room.

On top sits a Taschen coffee table book by the photographer Bettina Rheims, which retails for $70. 

After buying her first property at just 17 - a $2.7million starter home in the same gated Calabasas community where Kim and Kourtney live, she conducted extensive renovations.

She sold this for $3.15million in July last year after moving to nearby Hidden Hills, to be close to her mother, Kris Jenner.

In May 2016 she had bought the first of her Hidden Hills properties, spending $6million on a 7,000-square-foot house, which she later put back on the market.

That August, she acquired her second mansion located right next door to the first for $4.5million, which in August last year she later sold for $5.4 million.

Room for Stormi? Yet while the room looks stylish and inviting, it surely won't be long before Kylie needs to babyproof 

Following the unbelievable success of her lucrative cosmetic business, her current main residence is a 13,200 square foot property which has eight bedrooms and 11 bathrooms.

She purchased the mansion in October 2016 for $12million.

This home is a long way from Kylie's first pad - where she allowed BFF Jordyn Woods's aspiring artist brother to graffiti an entire wall, and had rooms for her wigs and shoes.

Perhaps the mother-of-one has been taking advice from big sister Kourtney, whose passions include interior design.

Yet while the room looks stylish and inviting, it surely won't be long before Kylie needs to babyproof.

The make-up business owner welcomed her first child seven weeks ago, and Stormi Webster is quickly growing.  

The teenage years: After buying her first property at just 17 - a $2.7million starter home in the same gated Calabasas community where Kim and Kourtney live, she conducted extensive renovations; she is seen here in her old shoe closet

The first sitting room: Kylie's taste has evolved since she decorated this room two years ago

item.title: So it's really happening! Married At First Sight's Carly Bowyer and Troy Delmege look smitten as they pack up their belongings ahead of big move to Melbourne after just WEEKS of dating
item.description: They left Married At First Sight fans shocked with their unlikely whirlwind romance, declaring they will be moving in together after just weeks of dating.
item.content:encoded:
They left Married At First Sight fans shocked with their unlikely whirlwind romance, declaring they will be moving in together after just weeks of dating.

And Carly Bowyer and Troy Delmege proved they were being deadly serious about the outrageous claim as they were spotted packing up their belongings in Sydney on Saturday.

The beaming marketing assistant, 32, and IT manager, 35, looked as smitten as ever as they loaded Troy's things into their car on Saturday ahead of the gruelling 10-hour drive to Melbourne.

So it's really happening! Married At First Sight's Carly Bowyer and Troy Delmege looked smitten as they packed up their belongings ahead of the big move to Melbourne after just weeks of dating

The PDA-loving couple seemed to be in great spirits and were seen chatting and laughing away together as they packed up.

Dressing for the sun-soaked day, Carly showcased her gym-honed physique in a simple white henley vest.

Showing off her deep tan, she completed the look with a frayed denim midi skirt and tan leather sandals.

Sweeping her dark tresses into a sleek ponytail, the beaming reality star appeared to go make-up free for the relaxed outing. 

New horizons: The marketing assistant, 32, beamed as she helped load Troy's things into her car on Saturday ahead of the gruelling 10-hour drive to Melbourne

Having a whale of a time! The PDA-loving couple seemed to be in great spirits and were seen chatting and laughing away together as they packed up

Looking good: Dressing for the sun-soaked day, Carly showcased her gym-honed physique in a simple white henley vest

Troy, meanwhile, kept his look casual in a simple grey short-sleeved polo shirt and cream shorts teamed with flip flops.

The couple left fans shocked when last week they announced their decision to live together in Melbourne.  

'We're going to see how it goes living together but we're definitely on the same page,' Carly told Woman's Day.

 Natural beauty: Sweeping her dark tresses into a sleek ponytail, Carly appeared to go make-up free for the relaxed outing

Low-key look: Troy, meanwhile, kept his look casual in a simple grey short-sleeved polo shirt and cream shorts teamed with flip flops

Packed to the brim: Troy crammed several suitcases, tennis rackets and clothes into the boot of his car 

Just last week, Troy and Carly spoke about their family plans.

IT manager Troy admitted he would like to have six children, joking that 'twins run in (his) family'.

Carly told OK! magazine: 'Troy will be an amazing dad. But I'll be the mean bad-cop mum, and he'll be letting the kids run wild. I can just imagine it.' 

Big plans: The couple left fans shocked when last week they announced their decision to live together in Melbourne

The couple who live together... 'We're going to see how it goes living together but we're definitely on the same page,' Carly told Woman's Day

The marketing manager previously revealed to TV Week she doesn't want to wait much longer before she starts having babies.

'I don't want to be too old and still pumping out kids. Time is dwindling,' she said. 

The couple have certainly been moving fast with their relationship since it was unveiled a week ago on Married At First Sight. 

Whirlwind: The couple have certainly been moving fast with their relationship since it was unveiled a week ago on Married At First Sight

Frisky: After originally being paired with partners who deprived them of affection on the show, Troy and Carly certainly appear to be making up for lost time

PDA: The frisky twosome have been spotted indulging in sloppy smooches everywhere from public parks to couch of the Today Show

Struggling: Speaking with Nine Now on Friday, Carly confessed that Troy doesn't know when to 'come up for air' when they kiss

After originally being paired with partners who deprived them of affection on the show, Troy and Carly certainly appear to be making up for lost time.

The frisky twosome have been spotted indulging in sloppy smooches everywhere from public parks to couch of the Today Show.

Speaking with Nine Now on Friday, Carly confessed that Troy doesn't know when to 'come up for air' when they kiss.

'He doesn't know when to pull away. He just keeps going,' the oxygen-deprived beauty stated. 

Too much? 'He doesn't know when to pull away. He just keeps going,' the oxygen-deprived beauty stated

Moving on: Troy was previously coupled up with 28-year-old flight attendant Ashley Irvin on the show, who he brutally dumped at the vow renewal ceremony

The beaming marketing assistant, 32, and IT manager, 35, looked as smitten as ever as they loaded Troy's things into their car on Saturday ahead of the gruelling 10-hour drive to Melbourne.

item.title: The perks of being on reality TV! Married At First Sight's Davina Rankin gets a 'reduced rate' holiday at a luxury $1,330-a-night Byron Bay retreat
item.description: Married At First Sight's Davina Rankin appears to have used her celebrity profile to score herself a 'special rate' stay at an exclusive Byron Bay retreat.
item.content:encoded:
Married At First Sight's Davina Rankin appears to have used her celebrity profile to score herself a 'special rate' stay at an exclusive Byron Bay retreat. 

A Byron Bay Rentals spokesperson told Daily Mail Australia the 27-year-old 'social media influencer' was a repeat guest at the luxury Pavilion 2 at Broken Head and received a special rate.

For those paying full price, one night at the beachside destination can cost between $800 and $1330, depending on the time of year.

The perks of being on reality TV! Married At First Sight's Davina Rankin appears to have used her celebrity profile to score herself a 'special rate' stay at an exclusive Byron Bay retreat

Stunning: A Byron Bay Rentals spokesperson told Daily Mail Australia the 27-year-old 'social media influencer' was a repeat guest at the luxury Pavilion 2 at Broken Head and received a special rate

Davina was staying in the NSW tourist hotspot to celebrate her 27th birthday.

The former Zoo Weekly model, who became infamous for her 'affair' with Dean Wells on MAFS, shared several photos from her five-day stay to Instagram. She has over 340,000 followers, making her an in-demand 'influencer'.

Davina's friend Gillian - who herself has over 13,000 followers - also posted a number of envy-inducing snaps from the girls' trip. 

Luxury holiday: For those paying full price, one night at the beachside destination can cost between $800 and $1330, depending on the time of year 

#Spon! Davina, who became infamous for her 'affair' with Dean Wells on MAFS, shared several photos from her five-day stay to Instagram. She has over 340,000 followers, making her an in-demand 'influencer'

Beautiful: Pavilion 2 at Broken Head is a secluded property, nestled between the rainforest and the sea, located a few minutes away from Suffolk Park and a 10 minute drive from Byron Bay

Perfect: The beachfront retreat is a short stroll to the beach down a private walkway, and is perfect for guests looking to hit the surf

Pavilion 2 at Broken Head is a secluded property, nestled between the rainforest and the sea, located a few minutes away from Suffolk Park and a 10 minute drive from Byron Bay. 

The beachfront retreat is a short stroll to the beach down a private walkway, and is perfect for guests looking to hit the surf.

It features four spacious bedrooms and three bathrooms, and can accommodate up to 11 guests. 

The open plan living area combines indoor and outdoor spaces, with glass doors opening up to a deck looking over the beautiful private garden.

Incredible design: The open plan living area combines indoor and outdoor spaces, with glass doors opening up to a deck

Idyllic: The spacious deck looks out to the beautiful private garden, which boasts native Australian flora

Creature comforts: Guests can also enjoy some outdoor entertaining, with a stainless steel barbecue and a swimming pool among the amenities

This kitchen rules! Visitors to the resort can also show off their cooking skills in the kitchen, which is fitted with top of the range appliances 

Guests can also enjoy some outdoor entertaining, with a stainless steel barbecue and a swimming pool among the amenities. 

In fact, the idyllic pool is visible in some of Davina's sultry swimsuit snaps.

For those who prefer a more relaxing holiday, they can luxuriate in a semi-outdoor ensuite bathroom. 

 Restful: It features four spacious bedrooms and three bathrooms, and can accommodate up to 11 guests

Peaceful: Up to 11 guests can enjoy a relaxing stay at the luxurious Byron Bay property

Living it up: For those who prefer a more relaxing holiday, they can luxuriate in a semi-outdoor ensuite bathroom

Visitors to the resort can also show off their cooking skills in the kitchen, which is fitted with top of the range appliances. 

During their vacation, Davina and Gillian also enjoyed other activities Byron Bay had to offer, which were organised with local operations on the recommendation of the property's managers.

For example, they went horse riding on the beach and enjoyed a delicious fruit platter by the sea. 

Birthday treat! During their vacation, Davina and her friend Gillian also enjoyed other activities Byron Bay had to offer, which were organised with local operations on the recommendation of the property's managers

Girls' trip! For example, they went horse riding on the beach and enjoyed a delicious fruit platter by the sea

Unforgettable: Davina's latest Instagram snap shows her relaxing in a luxurious bath tub with flowers sprinkled on top

Best friends forever: Davina celebrated her 27th birthday in Byron Bay with her best friend and business partner Gillian

item.title: 'They didn't want to go too wild!' Bachelor in Paradise's Davey Lloyd claims producers enforced a drink limit and alcohol was 'watered down' while they filmed the show
item.description: Dubbed The Bachelorette's 'lovable larrkin' following his stint on Sam Frost's season in 2015, Davey Lloyd has been known to enjoy a party.
item.content:encoded:
Dubbed The Bachelorette's 'lovable larrkin' following his stint on Sam Frost's season in 2015, Davey Lloyd has been known to enjoy a party.

But according to the man himself, he was prevented from getting too loose in Fiji, claiming Bachelor In Paradise  producers put some rules in place.

Speaking to Nova 969's Fitzy and Wippa on Tuesday following his elimination, the 28-year-old alleged there were drink restrictions while he was on the island. 

'They didn't want to go too wild!' Bachelor in Paradise's Davey Lloyd (pictured) told Fitzy and Wippa on Tuesday that producers enforced a drink limit and alcohol was 'watered down' while they filmed the show

Questioned by Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald as to whether contestants could drink as much as he liked while in paradise, Davey responded: 'I think everyone else could. I was sort of limited to how much I could drink.'

The Sydney-based suitor added there was certain number of alcoholic beverages he was given the thumbs up to consume.

'They had a little strike rate. I could only have like three. Two every hour,' he explained.

'They had a little strike rate. I could only have like three' Davey claimed he could only have a certain amount of alcohol while in Fiji

Davey added that the same rules applied when he was on The Bachelorette and it wasn't because he got he got 'too lippy'.

'It was because it's sort of control, they didn't want to go too wild,' Davey divulged, adding: 'But I think alcohol over there is watered down a bit.'

Despite his claims, he admitted he did feel as though he had gotten a 'little tipsy' from the champagne after his date with co-star Leah Costa.  

Rules don't apply? In the interview, Davey added he believed it was only him who had his alcohol restricted (Pictured: Jake Ellis and Lisa Hyde)

Internationally, the US version of Bachelor in Paradise was marred in controversy when production was shut down after an incident on set.

DeMario Jackson and Corrine Olympios were involved in what was originally thought to be sexual misconduct during a drunken incident, however, after footage was reviewed, DeMario was cleared of any wrongdoing.

It's possible Australian producers were hoping to avoid a similar situation by keeping an eye on the contestants' alcohol consumption.

Daily Mail Australia has reached out to Network Ten for comment. 

'I think alcohol over there is watered down a bit' Davey also thought the drinks weren't as strong as they usually are

item.title: More like Richie STRONG! Bachelor hunk Strahan shows off bulging biceps and impressive six-pack abs after taking up competitive boxing following split with Alex Nation
item.description: The former Bachelor ramped up his fitness following his split with ex Alex Nation last year - even claiming a charity boxing tournament win in Perth last weekend.
item.content:encoded:
He ramped up his fitness following his split with ex Alex Nation last year - even claiming a charity boxing tournament win in Perth last weekend.

And hunky Bachelor star Richie Strahan showed off the impressive results when he went shirtless on Tuesday.  

The blonde lothario, 32, stood tall as he showed off his bulging biceps and impressive six-pack abs while wearing boxing wraps over his hands.

More like Richie STRONG! Bachelor hunk Strahan shows off bulging biceps and impressive six-pack abs after taking up competitive boxing following split with Alex Nation 

Richie failed to find lasting love on The Bachelor, breaking things off with 'winner' Alex Nation less than a year after the finale.

Following their split, Alex later announced she had began a same-sex relationship with her now-fiancee Maegan Luxa.

Setting hearts racing in the post, fans left compliments for the reality star in the comment section, including 'looking good', 'Wow! Shredded', 'ridiculously ripped' and 'Dammm you single?' 

He cheekily captioned the post: 'I’ll be smiling more now that chocolate is back on the menu. Yea yea cut your hair.' 

Fans debated in the comment as to whether they liked his current hairstyle, which is longer and more-unkept than his Bachelor look.

Eye Of The Tiger! Over the weekend Richie won a charity boxing match in Perth against Channel 7 identity Brett Novak

Over the weekend Richie won against Channel 7 identity Brett Novak at this year's Pro9PerthCorporate Rumble, which saw media and business identities compete in support of Breast Cancer WA. 

Last month he was seen keeping in top-top shape by ramping up his fitness regime.

A snap captioned 'Can't even smile', saw the 32-year-old showing off his biceps and greasy locks after getting 'smashed' at the gym.

'Can't even smile!' Last month he was seen keeping in top-top shape by ramping up his fitness regime

Richie posed for a photo at Perth gym Fierce Fitness Australia, alongside an instructor.

Sporting a sweat-stained grey Nike muscle tank and navy shorts, the rope access technician drew attention to his bulging biceps and greasy locks.

Despite making a thumbs up gesture for the camera, Richie cut a rather stern expression.

Changing style: The Perth Native has been showing off a new look of late, including his longer tresses

The Perth native captioned the image: 'Can't even smile Smashed' alongside the shocked face and tears of laughter emojis.

Earlier this month, Richie was spotted on what appeared to be a date with a mystery blonde in Sydney's Bondi. 

The sighting marked the first time the hunk has been linked to another woman, following his highly-publicised split with Alex Nation in August last year. 

Headlines: Alex, who Richie chose on the grand finale episode of 2016's The Bachelor, revealed she was in a same-sex relationship with Maegan Luxa in August last year 

Richie and his companion sat across from one another in a restaurant and seemed to enjoy a friendly conversation. 

The former Channel Ten personality came to headlines when it was revealed last August that Alex was dating her Frankston Bombers teammate Maegan Luxa. 

Alex's first same-sex relationship has progressed at lightning speed, with the couple announcing their engagement just two months ago.
item.dc:abstract: The former Bachelor ramped up his fitness following his split with ex Alex Nation last year - even claiming a charity boxing tournament win in Perth last weekend. And hunk Richie Strahan went shirtless on Tuesday to flaunt his muscular frame to his doting followers on Instagram. The blonde lothario, 32, stood tall as he showed off his bulging biceps and impressive six-pack abs while wearing boxing wraps over his hands.
item.dc:creator: Candice Jackson

item.title: EXCLUSIVE 'She wanted to do Bachelor In Paradise so she had to keep it quiet': Insider claims Tara Pavlovic hid her relationship with SECRET BOYFRIEND Ben Kelly so she could appear on TV
item.description: Tara Pavlovic is now the subject of her own love scandal, amid claims she was secretly dating her boyfriend Ben Kelly during filming.
item.content:encoded:
She sparked controversy on Bachelor In Paradise after revealing to her fellow cast-mates that Brett Moore had a girlfriend on the outside.

And in an ironic twist of fate, Tara Pavlovic has become the subject of her own love scandal, amid claims she was secretly dating her boyfriend Ben Kelly during filming.

'Brett isn't the only person there who had a partner on the outside- Tara did too!' a well-placed source claimed to Daily Mail Australia this week.

'Brett isn't the only person there who had a partner on the outside': Tara Pavlovic has become the subject of her own love scandal, amid claims she was secretly dating her boyfriend Ben Kelly during filming

'She wanted to do Bachelor In Paradise or The Bachelorette though so she had to keep it quiet,' claimed the insider.

The source believes: 'It was a bit rich of her to question Brett for having a girlfriend on the outside, since she was still dating Ben him during filming.'

According to the source, Tara and Ben were introduced to each other by Ben's sister Sian, who starred alongside Tara on The Bachelor last year. 

Intriguing! According to the source, Tara and Ben (R) were introduced to each other by Ben's sister Sian, who starred alongside Tara on The Bachelor last year

Oops! Ironically, Tara sparked controversy on Bachelor In Paradise after revealing to her fellow cast-mates that Brett Moore had a girlfriend on the outside.

'Tara and Ben had been chatting since she left the Bachelor mansion last year, and hooked up in Perth late last year when Tara came to visit,' the spy alleged.

'Once she started dating Ben, Tara and Sian would joke about how they are sisters now,' mused the source. 

Daily Mail Australia has reached out for comment. 

New flame? The spy alleged that Tara (L) and Ben (R) had been 'chatting since she left the Bachelor mansion last year, and hooked up in Perth late last year when Tara came to visit'

It's not the first time Tara has found herself in the midst of controversy. 

Last year, an insider told Daily Mail Australia that Tara had another secret boyfriend while she was filming The Bachelor. 

According to the source, the Queensland-based nanny was dating a recently-separated man named Dan who worked as a pilot for Emirates Airline at the time.  

Two peas in a pod! 'Once she started dating Ben, Tara and Sian would joke about how they are sisters now,' mused the source (Pictured L-R Tara Pavlovic, Sian Kelly) 

'Tara wore the letter D around her neck for about four weeks on the show,' the spy divulged.

Indeed, eagle-eyed fans would notice Tara wearing a gold D-shaped pendant necklace in several early episodes this season.

The chain, which also features an engraved rectangle charm, also appeared in several snaps uploaded to Tara's Instagram page in the weeks before she started filming the show. 

'Tara wore the letter D around her neck for about four weeks on the show': Last year, an insider told Daily Mail Australia that Tara had another secret boyfriend while she was filming The Bachelor

And in an ironic twist of fate, Tara Pavlovic has become the subject of her own love scandal, amid claims she was secretly dating her boyfriend Ben Kelly during filming. 'Brett isn't the only person there who had a partner on the outside- Tara did too!' a well-placed source claimed to Daily Mail Australia this week.

item.title: Jamie Oliver looks strained as he steps out in London with wife Jools and their two sons... amid recent business woes with failed Barbecoa steakhouse chain
item.description: The TV chef, 42, cut a tense figure as he ran errands with his family - amid claims he has failed to pay creditors almost £7 million, after his upmarket steak restaurant crashed into administration.
item.content:encoded:
He has faced numerous business woes of late - with his steakhouse chain Barbecoa collapsing shortly after he closed several branches of his famous Italian eatery.

And Jamie Oliver showed signs of strain on Saturday as he stepped out in London with his wife Jools and their two sons, Buddy Bear, seven, and River Rocket, 19 months.

The TV chef, 42, cut a tense figure as he ran errands with his family - amid claims he has failed to pay creditors almost £7 million, after his upmarket steak restaurant crashed into administration. 

Tense: Jamie Oliver showed signs of strain on Saturday as he stepped out in London with his wife Jools and their two sons - amid his business woes regarding failed steakhouse Barbecoa

Out and about: The TV chef, 42, was seen running errands with his wife Jools and their two sons, Buddy Bear, seven, and River Rocket, 19 months (above) 

Jamie looked somewhat glum as he embarked on a day of chores in the city, clad in a casual green raincoat and jeans. 

He was first seen heading to the local shop with his young son Buddy, sweetly clasped tightly onto the seven-year-old's hand as they picked up a few essentials.

Meanwhile his wife Jools, sporting a matching ensemble, was seen joining them later on with their youngest child River, born in August 2016, and his pram in tow. 

Casual: Jamie looked somewhat glum as he embarked on a day of chores with son Buddy (R), clad in a casual green raincoat and jeans

Quality time: He was first seen clasping tightly onto the seven-year-old's hand as they picked up a few essentials from their local shop

Clearly embarking on quality time as a family, both parents were spotted laden with bags of food as they reunited at their house nearby, and headed inside with the kids. 

The couple have been married for 17 years, and also share three daughters - Poppy, 16, Daisy, fourteen, and eight-year-old Petal.

However, Jamie looked somewhat strained as he headed out for the day - following the collapse of his restaurant Barbecoa.

Tucking in: He was spotted returning home with a bag of food in hand, no doubt to enjoy a feast with his brood

Tough time: Jamie looked somewhat strained as he headed out for the day - following the collapse of his upmarket steak restaurant Barbecoa, leading to the loss of 78 jobs

The flagship Piccadilly branch of his new steakhouse chain was forced to close last month, leading to the loss of 78 jobs. 

The TV chef has since been accused of failing to pay creditors, including small businesses, some £6.7million after the upmarket eatery crashed into administration. 

Daily Fish Supplies is waiting for £34,699, and Natoora, a fresh fruit and vegetable supplier, is trying to reclaim £34,613. 

Low-key: Meanwhile his wife Jools was seen joining them later on with their youngest child River, born in August 2016, and his pram in tow

Casual: Jools sported a matching green coat and jeans as she carried their youngest in her arms

Busy bees: The pair reunited nearby, and embarked on further chores together

Discussion: They were seen chatting intently as they continued with their day

Most of the money owed by Barbecoa is to HSBC as part of its overdraft facility, but unsecured creditors include small firms. 

Barbecoa was set up by Jamie and his friend, American barbecue expert Adam Perry Lang, in 2011.

The Essex-born personality relaunched the 300-seat Piccadilly branch of Barbecoa in February 2017 and its second London outlet at St Paul's remains open - but plans for a third outlet in Victoria are believed to have been scrapped. 

The blow comes after Jamie revealed he planned to close 12 of the 37 branches of Jamie's Italian after court documents revealed the chain had debts of £71.5m. 

Business woes: Last month Jamie was forced to close the Piccadilly branch of his new steakhouse chain - and has since been accused of failing to pay creditors some £6.7million

The TV chef, 42, cut a tense figure as he ran errands with his family - amid claims he has failed to pay creditors almost £7 million, after his upmarket steak restaurant crashed into administration.

item.title: REVEALED: 'I didn't think it was going to hurt this much!' Stan Walker struggles during painful first steps after undergoing stomach removal surgery in tell-all documentary
item.description: The former Australian Idol winner had his stomach removed after being diagnosed with a rare cancer-causing mutation. And Stan Walker's painful first steps after surgery have been revealed.
item.content:encoded:
He was forced to undergo stomach removal surgery last year after being diagnosed with the rare cancer-causing mutation, CDH1.

And former Australian Idol star Stan Walker's inspiring road to recovery has been showcased in his tell-all documentary 'Stan' - including his painful first steps after surgery. 

The morning after his operation, the recording artist winced in agony as he slowly walked the hospital corridor in his gown, claiming: 'I don't even know if I can go far.' 

Scroll down for video  

REVEALED: 'I didn't think it was going to hurt this much!' Stan Walker struggles during painful first steps after undergoing stomach removal surgery in tell-all documentary

The mutation Stan is believed to have inherited is the rare cancer-causing mutation known as CDH1, which has reportedly caused the deaths of more than 25 members of his family. 

The feature-length documentary aired onNew Zealand's ThreeNow on Sunday, but an Australian release date has yet to be confirmed.

The 27-year-old's mother April can be heard encouraging her son to push through the pain as she films his valiant effort less than 24 hours after his emotional surgery.  

'You've just got to do it so your body doesn't shut down, this is the whole reason why you're walking,' she can be heard saying as she outstretched her hand.

Stan braves the discomfort by taking deep breaths and holding his stomach with every small step, before leaning against a nearby wall to rest.

With a concerned face, he admitted: 'Man, I didn't think it was going to hurt this much.'

'You've just got to do it so your body doesn't shut down': The recording artist winced in agony as he slowly paced the hospital corridor in his gown, with his mother encouraging him with ever step

 'What if I can't sing again? This is my bread and butter': In a tearful trailer for the documentary, yet to be aired in Australia, he feared for his life and worried if he would walk or sing again

Earlier this month, Stan released a preview clip of his film, which covers the last nine months of his life and his battle with the serious illness.

Part of the trailer, shared to Instagram, showed the artist lying in a hospital bed and shedding tears ahead of his surgery.

'They're all expecting me to get up and walk around, but I'm scared,' he said.

The cameras are seen following the Choose You singer through his health scare, as he lay in bed pondering: 'What if I can't sing again? This is my bread and butter.' 

' What if there's a complication and I die?' On Tuesday, former Australian Idol winner Stan Walker released a preview clip of his upcoming documentary

His supportive mother features heavily in the documentary, and is seen expressing pain and sadness in the face of the ordeal. 

His mum spoke to the camera in the trailer: 'I'd rather I go before my children – any mother and any parent would.'

Stan goes on to say: 'It's been hard for my mum, she cries every day and she blames herself too.' 

Heart-breaking story: Wearing a hospital gown and hair net, Stan's mother is seen rubbing his back while an expression of pain and sadness is shown on both his and his mother's face

Staying strong: Stan goes on to say: 'it's been hard for my mum, she cries every day and she blames herself too'

At the end of the clip, his mother speaks candidly to the camera, sharing: 'I just have to block it out, stay strong, be with Stan and help him.'   

After much speculation surrounding his illness, he added: 'I bet half the people thinking I was on crack or whatever y'all were saying are feeling pretty dumb right now.'

Continuing, he wrote on Instagram: 'This is bigger than all the talkers talking. It's bigger than me. It's bigger than what's happened & is happening to me.'

'There is always someone worse off going through a lot worse. All I'm going to say is that I'm blessed to be alive and well.' 

Truth unveiled: At the end of the clip, his mother speaks candidly to the camera, sharing: 'I just have to block it out, stay strong, be with Stan and help him'

Family first: Referring to a native Maori language term for family, he added: 'God is good & I've been blessed with a back bone of whanaua and friends that go through the highs and the lowest of lows with me'
item.dc:abstract: The former Australian Idol winner was forced to undergo stomach removal surgery last year after being diagnosed with the rare cancer-causing mutation, CDH1. And Stan Walker's inspiring road to recovery has been showcased in his tell-all documentary 'Stan' - including his painful first steps after surgery. The morning after his operation, the recording artist winced in agony as he slowly walked the hospital corridor in his gown, claiming: 'I don't even know if I can go far.'

item.mi:shortTitle: Stan Walker struggles during painful first steps after surgery

item.title: 'What Photoshop fail?' Kim Kardashian defiantly reposts THAT squashy car photo... and blames a fan on the edit
item.description: You might think she is so used to looking at mirrors, she could never be caught out by one. But that is exactly what caused Kim's latest Photoshop fail, or so she claimed on Monday
item.content:encoded:
You might think she is so used to looking at mirrors, she could never be caught out by one.

But that is exactly what caused Kim Kardashian's latest Photoshop fail, or so she claimed on Monday.

The 37-year-old drew the scorn of many when she posted a photo on Instagram on Saturday, that was so heavily edited a car in the background had almost been crushed out of existence.

'What Photoshop fail?' Kim Kardashian defiantly reposted  THAT squashy car photo on Monday ... and blamed a fan on the edit

However on Monday the reality star defiantly reposted the image once again, with an explanation as to what had happened.

The KUWTK star gave her explanation to subscribers to her website in a post entitled 'What Photoshop fail?'.

'I’m seeing online and on news media outlets that I suffered a "Photoshop fail",' she scoffed. 'So ridiculous!'

'I reposted a picture on Instagram that a fan had already posted—I only added a filter to it.

Exhibit A: The 37-year-old claimed one of her fans had posted a mirror image pic, and that her crime was a cropping one

'It looks like the fan mirrored the photo, which is the reason the car looks like that.'

Indeed the mom-of-three posted what appeared to be the original pic, which was a mirror image duplicate.

Kim's digital crime was in fact a cropping one, as she failed to notice she had included some of the mirrored photo too, creating the bizarre 'crushed car' illusion that set the comments alight.

Out and about: Meanwhile husband Kanye West was spotted leaving Nobu in  Malibu with a pal

Chatty: The duo were in the midst of an animated conversation

'So, this is actually really funny to me!' she chortled in conclusion. 'Who would even Photoshop a car to look like that?! LOL'

Despite the innocent explanation, Kim still felt it necessary to switch off comments under her original post on Instagram. 

It's not the first time the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has been at the centre of a photoshop scandal.

She had a piece of her arm missing from a snap she posted with BFF Jonathan Cheban. 

Given the elbow: It's not the first time the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has been at the centre of a photoshop scandal, she had part of her arm missing in this pic she posted with BFF Jonathan Cheban

The 37-year-old drew the scorn of many when she posted a photo on Instagram on Saturday, that was so heavily edited a car in the background had almost been crushed out of existence.

item.title: 'You're poison': Today show star Steve Jacobs' 'aggressive behaviour' led wife Rosie to report him to Vanuatu police - as more details of their 'toxic marriage' emerge since the shock separation
item.description: The 'aggressive behaviour' of Today show weatherman Steve Jacobs resulted in his wife taking out an AVO against him earlier this year, court documents from Vanuatu have revealed.
item.content:encoded:
Steve Jacobs reportedly changed the passwords on his wife's phone, chased her up the street, stole her diary and was 'aggressive' during their toxic eight-year marriage, court documents claim.

New details of the relationship between the Today show weatherman and wife Rosie have continued to emerge in the week since the couple's split became public.

Daily Mail Australia last week revealed that Ms Jacobs had taken an AVO out against her estranged husband in January this year, months after they officially separated. 

Friends of the pair have told Woman's Day just how toxic things between Steve and Rosie got, while court documents relating to the AVO revealed she secretly videoed a dispute between them as they exchanged custody of their two daughters.

Scroll down for video 

The alleged 'aggressive behaviour' of Today show weatherman Steve Jacobs (pictured) is what resulted in his wife taking an AVO out against him, court documents have claimed

The Today show star (left) reportedly changed the passwords on his wife Rosie's (right) phone, chased her up the street, stole her diary and was 'aggressive' during their eight-year marriage

A close friend of the couple told the magazine Steve and Rosie had faced troubles in their marriage long before Ms Jacobs called it quits in late-2017. 

'These issues have been going on for the past two years,' a friend claimed to the magazine.

'He's changed passwords on her phone, stolen her diary and chased her down the street in Coogee. He controlled all the finances.' 

Rosie Jacobs, 39, filed for a Family Protection Order against her husband Steve at the Port Vila Magistrate Court in January. 

According to court documents seen by Woman's Day, Ms Jacobs told police she was forced to flee their Vanuatu home 'due to his (Steve's) aggressive behaviour'.

The interim AVO granted Ms Jacobs, a Channel Seven presenter, access to their two daughters and ordered Steve stay 100 metres away from her at all times. 

Daily Mail Australia understands Ms Jacobs waved some conditions of the AVO soon after and that the order it no longer remains in place.

Ms Jacobs is believed to have filmed a dispute between the pair as they exchanged care of their daughters last year, with Steve reportedly saying to her: 'You're poison'

Rosie (pictured) and Steve's separation became public last weekend, months after they split

Rosie (left) began dating highly-skilled soldier Dylan Nash (right) after she split from the Today show star

Today show weatherman Steve (left) was reportedly involved in an 'altercation' with Rosie's new lover Dylan Nash (right) at a Vanuatu gym, it can be revealed

A witness told Daily Mail Australia that Mr Nash was working out at the gym with a friend when Steve entered and an altercation ensued 

Rosie's decision to file for an AVO in Vanuatu came almost two years after she spoke to police at Bondi Junction about her options in April 2016.

A TIMELINE OF THE JACOBS' MARRIAGE:

1989: Steve Jacobs marries wife Alison

2007: Rosie meets Steve while working on the Today show

2009: Steve separates from first wife Alison

2010: Steve and Rosie marry in Bali

2011: The couple welcome their first daughter Isabella in May

2013: Francesca, Steve and Rosie's second daughter, is born in April

2016: The couple move to Vanuatu in a 'last ditch effort to save their marriage'

2018: Steve and Rosie separate after eight years of marriage 

Having long faced battles in their marriage, Steve and Rosie moved to Vanuatu with their two daughters in what was seen as a 'last ditch' effort at making things work.

Leaving his $400,000-a-year role with the Today show after 12 years, Steve continued on in a position with Weekend Today after he moved to Port Vila.

At the time, he tearfully told his long-time friend Karl Stefanovic the move was what he and his family needed.

'For the past 12 years, I haven't been able to wake up once with my wife, haven't been able to get the kids to daycare,' Steve said.

But friends last week revealed the pair's marriage continued to be unworkable and in late-2017 they split.

Ms Jacobs has since begun dating Canadian ex-commando Dylan Nash who she met through mutual friends in Vanuatu.

It is understood her current and former lovers were involved in an 'altercation' inside the packed Ultimate Fitness gym in Port Vila, Vanuatu, on February 24 this year.  

Police are reportedly aware of the altercation at the Ultimate Fitness Vanuatu gym (pictured) involving Mr Nash and Steve, but no official complaint was filed by either party

Rosie applied for a 'restraining ex parte temporary domestic protection order' against Steve at Port Vila Magistrates Court in January this year

A source told Daily Mail Australia that Rosie (pictured) 39, began dating Mr Nash in the months after she split from Steve, 51

A witness claimed Mr Nash was working out with a mate when Steve arrived and an altercation ensued.

'The gym was pretty busy and Dylan was standing there talking to someone when all of a sudden Stevie came up to him,' the witness told Daily Mail Australia.

'Dylan's well over six-foot and Stevie's obviously much smaller, but he went up to him and shouted something about moving in on his wife. 

'I think Dylan just replied saying he'd lost his wife long before he came on the scene.' 

An Ultimate Fitness employee confirmed the incident occurred at the gym but would not be drawn on further details.

'They are two good members, one happened to be doing his thing and the other was there as well and I can't really say more than that,' the employee told Daily Mail Australia on Wednesday.

'If you need to know more you'll have to talk to those guys. I can't really comment.'

Police are reportedly aware of the altercation, but no official complaint was filed by either party. 

Neither Steve, Rosie or Mr Nash responded to attempts for comment in recent days.  

The Jacobs' have put their four-bedroom home in Coogee (pictured) up for auction in April

The home has ocean views, a main bedroom with an ensuite, and a studio above the garage

The pair met on Today in 2007, where Steve was a star weatherman and Rosie one of the breakfast show's producers. 

In 2010, after Steve finalised his divorce to wife of two decades Alison, he and Rosie tied the knot in Bali.

The pair welcomed their first daughter Isabella in 2011 and their second Francesca in April 2013. 

The couple's family home in Coogee, in Sydney's eastern suburbs, was recently put up for sale. It is set to fetch north of $4million when it goes under the hammer.

The couple purchased the four-bedroom home in 2011 for $2.55million and had been renting it since moving to Vanuatu. 

Ballard Property Group Double Bay has listed the property for auction on April 7.

Steve and Rosie (pictured) married in 2010 and have two daughters, Isabella and Francesca

New details of the relationship between the Today show weatherman and wife Rosie have continued to emerge in the week since the couple's split became public. Daily Mail Australia last week revealed that Ms Jacobs had taken an AVO out against her estranged husband in January this year, months after they officially separated. Friends of the pair have claimed just how toxic things between Steve and Rosie got, revealing at one stage she reportedly videoed a dispute between them as they exchanged custody of their two daughters.

item.title: She has a type! Bachelor In Paradise star Brett Moore's 'secret girlfriend' is revealed as Stephanie Boulton who competed for Matty J's heart
item.description: It's the relationship drama that caused quite the controversy on Bachelor In Paradise.
item.content:encoded:
It's the relationship drama that caused quite the controversy on Bachelor In Paradise.

And while Brett Moore continued to deny he was in a relationship on Monday's episode, his social media feeds over the past few months have told a different story. 

The woman in question has been revealed as Stephanie Boulton, 24, who previously competed for Matty J's heart on The Bachelor.

Secret love: Brett Moore's 'secret girlfriend' has been revealed as Stephanie Boulton, 24, who previously competed for Matty J's heart on The Bachelor

A series of loved-up posts and photos of the smitten couple appear to confirm they are indeed together. despite Brett claiming 'they aren't Facebook official' and therefore technically not an item.

Taking to Instagram on Monday, the blonde beauty shared a photo of herself in a bikini kissing Brett.

Stephanie captioned the shot with a single red love heart. 

Love: Taking to Instagram earlier in the day, the blonde beauty shared a photo of herself in a bikini kissing Brett 

Remember me? Dating Matty J's Bachelor season alumni Stephanie Boulton, 24, for some time, it appears as though the pair made a pact to remain 'single' in a hope they'd create a beautiful love story in Fiji

Earlier in the month the safety administrator shared another photograph of herself with her love in bed. 

'You're every nice word I can think of,' she wrote.  

Speaking to Now To Love last week, co-star Florence Alexandra revealed that they had both been invited to appear on the reality spin-off. 

Loved up: 'You're every nice word I can think of,' captioned Stephanie 

Truth: 'Brett got the call to appear on the show and he said yes, then Stephanie got the call and said yes too,' she said

'Brett got the call to appear on the show and he said yes, then Stephanie got the call and said yes too,' she said.  

'They both agreed they weren't officially together and agreed to do it to see what happens,' she said. 

Bachelor in Paradise continues Tuesday at 7:30pm on Ten.  

Strategic? 'They both agreed they weren't officially together and agreed to do it to see what happens,' she said
item.dc:abstract: It's the relationship drama that caused quite the controversy on Bachelor In Paradise. And while Brett Moore continued to deny he was in a relationship on Monday's episode, his social media feeds over the past few months have told a different story. The woman in question has been revealed as Stephanie Boulton, 24, who previously competed for Matty J's heart on The Bachelor.

item.title: 'They wanted him to passionately kiss her': The Bachelor's Nick Cummins 'forced to redo stilted rose-giving scene THREE TIMES by bosses... as he struggles to show his affectionate side'
item.description: The former rugby player, 30, was reportedly forced to redo a scene where he handed his blonde companion a rose three times as bosses wanted him to 'passionately kiss' her at the end.
item.content:encoded:
He's used to being in the public eye as an affable television presenter and the star of several adverts.

But it seems Nick 'Honey Badger' Cummins is struggling to get comfortable showing off his amorous side in front of the cameras during his dates for The Bachelor.

The former rugby player, 30, was reportedly forced to redo a scene where he handed his blonde companion a rose three times as producers wanted him to 'passionately kiss' her at the end.

'They wanted him to passionately kiss her': The Bachelor's Nick Cummins was 'forced to redo a stilted rose-giving scene three times by bosses amid struggles to show his affectionate side'

Nick took his pretty companion to The Basin in Pittwater for a paddle-boarding session followed by a romantic picnic by the lagoon for his first date.

And while the pair seemed to be getting on well, Nick reportedly failed to impress when he held back from kissing his date. 

'It looked as if the producers wanted him to turn on the fireworks and passionately kiss the girl but he didn't, so they kept making him go in and out of the water where the rose was placed in a canister in the hopes that he might have a better reaction,' a source told The Goss.

The dozen crew members who were filming the moment had allegedly wanted the sportsman to show more affection - but reportedly only got a quick peck on the cheek.

Failed to deliver? Nick took his pretty companion to The Basin in Pittwater for a paddle-boarding session followed by a romantic picnic by the lagoon for his first date - but reportedly left producers frustrated with his refusal to smooch his date 

'The crew even backed away to give them some more space but in the end the kiss on the cheek lasted less than a second,' the insider claimed.

Daily Mail Australia has contacted a Channel 10 representative for comment.   

The former Wallaby has already filmed the first date, a themed shoot for a magazine and the first cocktail party in the first week of season six.

The insider claimed bosses had hired a security firm to try to protect the scenes from being snapped by paparazzi and leaked before they were shown on air - to no avail. 

Struggling? The dozen crew members who were filming the moment had allegedly wanted the sportsman to show more affection - but reportedly only got a quick peck on the cheek 

'As long as people keep paying for the behind-the-scenes snaps, we'll keep shooting,' a paparazzi told The Goss.  

According to insiders, Nick allegedly threatened to 'walk out of the reality show for good' after a dramatic makeover.

The source further added that producers demanded the former Wallabies star get rid of his 'porn star moustache and 'clean up his unconventional look to make his appearance more attractive.'

'There is still a fear that he just won't resonate with the majority of girls, so they are really banking on his sense of humour and down-to-earth demanour to win them over,' the source added.  

Man of the moment: 'The crew even backed away to give them some more space but in the end the kiss on the cheek lasted less than a second,' the insider claimed

item.title: Beyonce shocks shoppers as she fills up her trolley at discount store Target on a day out with daughter Blue Ivy... despite being worth $500 million
item.description: Despite her mass fortune, Beyonce proved she's still got an eye for a bargain as she was spotted wheeling her trolley around discount store Target in Los Angeles over the weekend.
item.content:encoded:
With an estimated net worth of $500 million, it's fair to say she's not short of cash. 

But, despite her mass fortune, Beyonce proved she's still got an eye for a bargain as she was spotted wheeling her trolley around discount store Target in Los Angeles over the weekend.

Joined by her daughter Blue Ivy, six, the singing sensation left unsuspecting shoppers in a state of shock when they noticed the mega-star perusing the shop with a trolley jam-packed with goods. 

Despite her $500 million fortune, Beyonce proved she's still got an eye for a bargain as she was spotted wheeling her trolley around discount store Target in Los Angeles over the weekend

Despite her very casual outing, the beauty still ensured she was the most stylish shopper of them all as she strolled around the store in a polka dot, cold-shoulder blouse, mom jeans and fluffy burgundy heels. 

Seemingly attempting to keep a low-profile, the star partly concealed her face beneath a pair of over-sized shades - though it seemed her sunglasses weren't fooling anyone as fans quickly snapped pictures of the star on their phones. 

'Bro im so freaking sad right now :((( my sister ran into beyonce at target up in LA,' one of her admirers bemoaned on Twitter.   

Joined by her daughter Blue Ivy, six, the star left unsuspecting shoppers in a state of shock when they noticed the mega-star perusing the shop with a trolley jam-packed with goods

'It’s not everyday you see @beyonce at target,' another shocked onlooker tweeted. 

Of course, it isn't the first time the superstar has been spotted splashing the cash at the budget store, as she was pictured perusing the aisles once again in December, when she was seemingly on the lookout for some Christmas bargains. 

The mother-of-three - whose husband Jay-Z has an estimated net worth of $900 million - was again in the company of her adorable daughter, though she was also joined by her mother Tina Knowles.

The humble outing came just over a week after Blue proved she knows a thing or two about the art world as she bid on very expensive pieces during the live auction for the second annual Wearable Art Gala at WACO Theatre Center in Los Angeles.

Not short of cash! Beyonce's husband Jay-Z has an estimated net worth of $900 million

Crazy in Love with those bargains! Beyonce was pictured perusing the aisles of Target once again in December, when she was seemingly on the lookout for some Christmas bargains

Girls' day out! Beyonce was again in the company of her adorable daughter, though she was also joined by her mother Tina Knowles 

The youngster was clearly having a great time in the front row of the show, waving around a bid card and bidding $19,000 on one piece.   

'Blue is out there bidding,' celebrity auctioneer Star Jones said with enthusiasm. 'You gonna do 19?' 

Holding a bidding card, Blue seemed overcome with joy as her parents laughed alongside the excited little girl. 

'Her mother and father have been talking about how you gather art and that is a big deal for African Americans,' Jones said. 

Bidding big! The humble shop came just over a week after Blue Ivy bid $19,000 on a piece of art at the second annual Wearable Art Gala at WACO Theatre Center

item.title: Sarah was originally paired with Troy, a $50,000 wedding, and wife-swappers caught in the act! Married At First Sight's most shocking secrets revealed
item.description: It's been one of the most controversial seasons yet of Married At First Sight, with scandals, tears and plenty of drama.
item.content:encoded:
It's been one of the most controversial seasons yet of Married At First Sight, with scandals, tears and plenty of drama. 

And now some of the show's most shocking secrets have been revealed. 

Busty redhead Sarah Roza - who confirmed her split with 'husband' Telv Williams - was originally paired with Troy Delmege, Woman's Day reports. 

Scroll down for video 

Sarah (pictured) was originally paired with Troy, a $50,000 wedding, and wife-swappers caught in the act! Married At First Sight's most shocking secrets revealed

Another shocking secret is that Ashley Irvin caught Carly Bowyer leaving her and Troy's apartment in the early hours of the morning.   

Meanwhile, Jo and Sean - who split on the show - had a wedding worth a whopping $50,000. 

On Saturday, Sarah finally confirmed persistent rumours that she and Telv Williams have split. 

Caught out! Another shocking secret is that Ashley Irvin caught Carly Bowyer leaving her and Troy's apartment in the early hours of the morning (Carly and Troy are seen together)

Case of the ex: Troy is pictured with 'ex-wife' Ashley Irvin

Sarah shared a selfie on Instagram and a lengthy post, hinting an unforgivable act was behind the breakup.   

'On the back of what has been such an extraordinary experience it is with great heartache, regret & sadness that Telv & I are no longer together,' she penned in the emotionally wrought post.

While she didn't reveal the cause behind the split, Sarah hinted there was more to the break up than meets the eye - admitting her 'innate standards' had been compromised.  

Pricey: Meanwhile, Jo and Sean - who split on the show - had a wedding worth a whopping $50,000

Done: On Saturday, Sarah finally confirmed persistent rumours that she and Telv Williams (seen) have split

'As you undoubtedly saw, my heart was completely committed to this before I even met my husband & it was absolutely set on fire once I did meet him,' Sarah explained.

The red-haired stunner wrote: 'Like all relationships, no one but the couple involved know exactly what goes on behind the smiles & the tears, so respecting the dignity of both Telv & myself I am wanting to be completely transparent with you; the dedicated, much loved & appreciated viewer.'   

Newly single Sarah went on to say that she was now taking solace in the comfort of her close ones as she recovered from her heartbreak. 

The reality star also seemingly took a swipe at her former 'husband' and appeared to be blaming him for the romance not working out.

Speaking up: Sarah shared a selfie on Instagram and a lengthy post, hinting an unforgivable act was behind the breakup

'I know that nobody is perfect yet I am at that stage in my life where the foundation of basic respect & support from my partner is crucial. As a woman I know what I truly deserve and I just can't allow my innate standards to be compromised,' Sarah elaborated. 

She continued and said she wished Telv 'only the absolute best'.

She added in part of the post: 'Whilst I didn’t find lasting love it has surprised me that I did in fact find something much more important; my inner strength.' 

Moving on: She continued and said she wished Telv 'only the absolute best'

item.title: Karl Stefanovic's 'exit strategy': Today host will be 'replaced by Ben Fordham in January 2019 after being phased out from the breakfast TV show'
item.description: Karl Stefanovic is breaking up with Today.
item.content:encoded:
Karl Stefanovic is breaking up with Today.

At least that's according to Woman's Day, which outlined the 43-year-old's alleged 'exit strategy' on Monday.

The magazine claimed Karl will be gradually phased out before being permanently replaced by fill-in host Ben Fordham next year.

'Exit strategy': A source reportedly told Woman's Day on Monday that Karl Stefanovic (left) will be permanently replaced by Ben Fordham (right) as host of the Today show next year

A source said: '(Nine management) plan to wheel Karl out as much as possible for 60 Minutes assignments, which will justify his absence from Today.

'Ben Fordham will fill in while he's gone, prepping him to take over in January 2019.'

Karl will reportedly 'disappear' in November and 'that will mark the end of Karl's 13 years as host of Today.'

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Nine for comment. 

Karl breaks up with Today: The magazine claimed Karl (left) will be gradually phased out before being replaced by fill-in host Ben Fordham in January 2019. Pictured with Georgie Gardner

In October, a network insider told The Saturday Telegraph that Karl had been 'begging' to leave Today.

It was claimed Karl felt 'like a hostage' in the role.

The source also alleged that Channel Nine is tipping Karl as a possible replacement for Tracy Grimshaw as host of A Current Affair.

New role? In October, a Nine insider told The Saturday Telegraph that Karl had been 'begging' to leave Today and was tipped as a replacement for Tracy Grimshaw on A Current Affair

Last March, New Idea magazine reported that Karl wanted to leave Today to be Nine's US bureau chief.

At the time, it was claimed the TV host wanted to be closer to his now-fiancée Jasmine Yarbrough.

However, the formerly LA-based shoe designer has since relocated to Sydney.  

Karl's Channel Nine contract is reportedly up for discussion in December. 

Relationship: Last March, New Idea reported that Karl wanted to leave Today to be Nine's US bureau chief and live closer to Jasmine Yarbrough. She has since relocated to Sydney

item.title: 'Who's the lucky 19-year-old?' The shocking sex texts MAFS' Dean Wells and Tracey Jewel exchanged after their breakup are revealed
item.description: The shocking sex texts between Married At First Sight's Dean Wells, 39, and Tracey Jewel, 35, exchanged after their breakup are revealed.
item.content:encoded:
It was revealed on last Wednesday's episode of Married At First Sight that 'ex-husband and wife' Dean Wells and Tracey Jewel had been sexting.

And in Monday's New Idea, the shocking sex texts that were exchanged after their breakup, and behind Tracey's new beau Sean Thomsen's back, have been revealed.

One scandalous message sent by the brunette to the 39-year-old lad on New Year's Eve, read: 'Who's going to be the lucky 19-year-old to bring in the new year with you lol.' 

Scroll down for video 

'Who's the lucky 19-year-old?' The shocking sex texts MAFS' Dean Wells, 39, and Tracey Jewel, 35, exchanged after their breakup are revealed

Dean looked keen to keep Tracey updated on his exploits as a single man, writing in one text message: 'F**k me. That got out of hand quickly.' 

He then added: 'Just partied with Andy last night and s**t got crazy. Only got home at like 4pm today.'

Dean also sent a screenshot of a picture of a woman to Tracey, claiming that he slept with her, while her boyfriend Sean was sitting in the corner watching.   

Scandalous: The text messages were sent behind Tracey's new beau Sean Thomsen's back

Meanwhile another  text message exchange sent on New Year's Eve saw relationship expert Tracey quizzing Dean: 'Who's going to be the lucky 19 year old to bring in the new year with you lol,' to which Dean responded with: 'Hmm good question.'

Meanwhile in an interview with Monday's New Idea, Tracey showed her remorse over the 'inappropriate' text messages, saying: 'It made it worse that Dean knew I was with Sean.'

Last Wednesday's episode of Married At First Sight revealed that Tracey, 35, had been sexting Dean behind her new boyfriend's back. 

Sexting: Last Wednesday's Married At First Sight, the truth was finally exposed as Dean revealed that Tracey had been sexting him behind new boyfriend Sean's back

The shocking revelation came out after Sean started accusing Dean of harassing and 'sexting' Tracey during the finale reunion.   

Dean called out Tracey for not telling Sean the truth of the situation, and also called her out for falsely claiming that she had told him to stop texting her.

'You don't know the full story,' Dean said to Sean, before turning his attention to Tracey.

'You sent me very inappropriate messages. You sent me pictures of you in your underwear!'

Drama: 'You don't know the full story,' Dean said to Sean, 35, who was accusing him of sending harassing messages to Tracey

Racy: 'You sent me very inappropriate messages,' revealed Dean. 'You sent me pictures of you in your underwear!'

'You sent me photos of you, in your bedroom, going "Sean's gonna love this outfit",' he continued as the rest of the MAFS cast looked on in shock.

Tracey tried to deflect and explain herself, but her explanation wasn't convincing.

'It wasn't my intention to bring it up in front of everyone and it's making me very uncomfortable,' she said awkwardly.  

Confrontation: 'If you had told me for one second "Don't send those messages" I would've stopped,' said Dean

'If you had told me for one second "don't send those messages" I would've stopped,' said Dean.

Tracey, unable to defend herself, just said: 'Well, we'll have to agree to disagree on that one.' 

The trio left things there, declining to go into the matter any further.  

Difference of opinions: Tracey, unable to defend herself, just said: 'Well, we'll have to agree to disagree on that one'

Read more: The full story is featured in this week's New Idea magazine, on sale now
