item.title: Heavily pregnant Miranda Kerr cradles her prominent baby bump as she steps out in a fun and flirty floral minidress for lunch with pals
item.description: The 34-year-old Australian model, married to Snapchat co-founder Evan Spiegel, looked radiant as she stepped out to dine with pals in Hollywood on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
She's excitedly preparing for the birth of her first baby with billionaire husband Evan Speigel, giving her seven-year-old son Flynn a younger sibling.

And Miranda Kerr looked radiant as she stepped out for lunch with pals in Hollywood on Sunday, showing off her prominent baby bump in a black floral minidress.

The 34-year-old Australian model wore a black coat over her daringly short number, which she teamed with a pair of box fresh white tennis shoes.

Baby! Heavily pregnant Miranda Kerr stepped out for lunch with pals in Hollywood on Sunday

Shielding her eyes from the Southern California sunshine with a pair of oversized cat eye sunglasses, the brunette beauty wore her brunette locks in shoulder-length curls, while she highlighted her natural good locks with a smudge of red lipstick.

The stunning beauty kept her accessories minimal, sporting a delicate pendant, while her a glittering diamond sparkler was worn on her ring finger.  

Miranda recently explained that her son Flynn, whom she shares with her ex-husband Orlando Bloom, was so eager to have a little brother or sister that he demanded to know if mother was pregnant only a day after she got married to Evan.

Bump: The 34-year-old model displays her prominent baby bump in a black floral minidress

Describing the situation last month on Jimmy Kimmel Live!, Miranda recalled: 'Evan and I had been together for a while, and [Flynn] was like, "When are we going to have a baby brother or sister?" We were like, "We've got to get married first."'

'The day after the wedding, he comes running in, and he's like, "Mommy, is it in there?" I was like, "Honey, give it a minute!"' 

Miranda and Snapchat co-founder Evan made their debut as a couple in June 2015 after first meeting at a Louis Vuitton dinner in New York City in 2014.

Black and white: The Australian beauty wore a black coat over her daringly short number, which she teamed with a pair of box fresh white tennis shoes

The couple tied the knot in an intimate backyard ceremony at Evan's home in the Brentwood area of Los Angeles in May 2017, in front of just 45 family and friends.

Despite their divorce, Miranda has maintained a friendly relationship with British actor Orlando, who is in an on-off romance with Katy Perry. 

The former flames were married in a romantic ceremony in July 2010, but announced that they were going their separate ways in 2013. 

Happily married: Miranda and Evan Spiegel tied the knot in an intimate backyard ceremony in May 2017, in front of just 45 family and friends. Pictured in November 2016

item.title: EXCLUSIVE 'They formed alliances to keep the money rolling in': Bachelor In Paradise insider reveals which contestants made secret 'cash-pacts' to keep each other on the show... as it emerges they get paid $600 a day to appears on program
item.description: Bachelor In Paradise was simply a convenient way to make a quick buck, an insider has claimed.
item.content:encoded:
It was supposed to be a reality dating show for lovelorn singles hoping to find new romance.  

But for a handful of contestants, Bachelor In Paradise was simply a convenient way to make a quick buck, an insider has claimed.

Speaking exclusively to Daily Mail Australia this week, a source revealed that contestants were paid $600 a day to stay on the show, prompting some cast-members to create secret plans off camera.

Cha-ching! For a handful of contestants, Bachelor In Paradise was simply a convenient way to make a quick buck, an insider has claimed

'They had agreements to keep each other on the show for money', the insider said. 

'People knew each other so they formed alliances to keep each other in longer to keep the cash rolling in.' 

Meanwhile, another spy told Daily Mail Australia: 'The girls partnered up with some of the boys before the show even started filming, making pacts to keep each other on the show'. 

Well that went well! According to several insiders, Florence Alexandra and Davey Lloyd formed an agreement before Davey was eliminated on Tuesday night's rose ceremony

'For half of the contestants, $600 is a massive pay-day. It's obvious why some of them were keen to stay in Paradise.'

According to several insiders, Florence Alexandra and Davey Lloyd formed an agreement before Davey was eliminated on Tuesday night's rose ceremony.

There were also reportedly pacts made between Jack Ellis and Megan Marx as well as between Michael Turnbull and Leah Costa. 

Oh dear! There was also reportedly a secret agreement made between Jack Ellis and Megan Marx

Something to tell us? Michael Turnbull and Leah Costa are also said to have enjoyed a secret pact

Despite these claims, Bachelor In Paradise host Osher Gunsberg has adamantly defended the intentions of contestants on the show. 

'[Bachelor franchise stars] come to that mansion and they want to find love. They're all genuinely there for the same thing and not all of them make it to the end. Not all of them stand on the beach in Thailand and say 'Hey, let's do this'', he told News Corp last week.

'Some of them get their hearts broken, and to be able to have the opportunity [on Bachelor In Paradise] to give these people what they came to us to find, is really great,' he said.  

Osher also assured fans that genuine love stories would be told on Bachelor In Paradise this season, explaining that: 'Through the process people really do fall in love and really powerfully so.' 

'Through the process people really do fall in love': Despite these claims, Bachelor In Paradise host Osher Gunsberg has adamantly defended the intentions of contestants on the show

Warner Bros has been approached for comment.
item.dc:abstract: It was supposed to be a reality dating show for lovelorn singles hoping to find new romance. But for a handful of contestants, Bachelor In Paradise was simply a convenient way to make a quick buck, an insider has claimed. Speaking exclusively to Daily Mail Australia this week, a source revealed that contestants were paid $600 a day to stay on the show, prompting some cast-members to create secret plans off camera.
item.dc:creator: Monique Friedlander
item.mi:shortTitle: Bachelor In Paradise insider reveals secret $600 'cash-pacts'

item.title: Was the 'secret girlfriend' storyline FAKED by producers? Bachelor In Paradise star Brett Moore reveals Stephanie was supposed to join him on the show 'before producers ripped up her contract after he arrived in Fiji'
item.description: He was sent packing from Bachelor In Paradise after his not-so-secret relationship with Stephanie Boulton was exposed.
item.content:encoded:
He was sent packing from Bachelor In Paradise after his not-so-secret relationship with Stephanie Boulton was exposed.

And taking to Instagram after Monday's episode, Brett Moore addressed the scandal.

In a lengthy post, Brett blamed the show's producers for making him look like a 's**t bloke' and insisted the original plan was for Stephanie to join him in Fiji.

Scroll down for video 

Brett Moore was kicked off Bachelor In Paradise on Monday after his not-so-secret relationship with Stephanie Boulton was exposed - but he claims there is another side to the story

Brett explained that he and Stephanie were both approached to appear on Bachelor In Paradise in the 'early days' of their relationship.

The idea was that they would film the series and allow their romance - which had already started back in Australia - to 'blossom' in front of the cameras.

However, things apparently went pear-shaped when Brett 'arrived on the island first' and Stephanie's contract was summarily 'ripped up' - making it 'look like (he) went on a dating show without her'.

Was it all a set-up? In a lengthy post, Brett blamed the show's producers for making him look like a 's**t bloke' and insisted the original plan was for Stephanie to join him in Fiji

The ensuing controversy over Brett's 'secret' girlfriend and what he was doing on a dating show for singletons was one of the main storylines in the first two episodes.

Bachelor fan favourite Tara Pavlovic was even dragged into the embarrassing situation after she was accused of 'covering' for Brett.

Brett explained: 'Imagine then airing it to Australia, portraying you as a s**t bloke and, as always, (TV execs) forever putting production over humanity.'

Scandal: Brett explained that he and Stephanie were both approached to appear on Bachelor In Paradise in the 'early days' of their relationship - but, for some reason, only he made it to Fiji

Insisting that he and Stephanie 'never changed (their) story about seeing each other in the lead up', Brett added that they 'couldn't wait to be reunited in Fiji'.

Brett appeared to have support from his Bachelor In Paradise co-stars after Monday's episode aired, with Megan Marx commenting below his post: 'Love you guys.'

Mackane Reid also wrote on Instagram: 'Big love to my brother from another mother. Sorry it turned out the way it did... Go to this great man's last post for the full story.' 

A Warner Bros. spokesperson said: 'Once it was confirmed during filming that Brett and Stephanie were actually dating, Stephanie was no longer eligible for the show.'

Happily ever after! Despite the controversy, Brett shared an Instagram Story post on Monday night thanking fans for their support and confirming he and Stephanie are still together

item.title: My 'hot mom' makeover! Blonde bombshell Kylie Jenner shares sultry snap while she focuses on 'getting her body back'
item.description: It seems that the 20-year-old is ready for a change after giving birth to her first child last month. The make-up mogul debuted brand-new bombshell blonde locks in a sexy Instagram on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
It seems that Kylie Jenner is ready for a change after giving birth to her first child last month.

The make-up mogul shared a seductive Instagram Monday - likely a throwback - where she also flaunted her voluptuous chest wearing just a robe.

The starlet reminisced about her blonde look at the same time it's said she's hard at work getting back her pre-pregnancy figure with an insider revealing she: 'wants to be a really hot young mom and is making sure that happens' toPeople Monday.

Heating things up! Kylie Jenner showed off a blonde look on Instagram Monday, as it's said the star is focused on getting back her old body, with a friend telling People she 'wants to be a really hot young mom and is making sure that happens'

Though the makeup mogul is already working on her body transformation, she appeared just as alluring as ever in her provocative bedroom Instagram.

In the photo the starlet let a hotel robe slip off her shoulders seductively to reveal her full chest.

She continued to tease in her caption, writing: 'I think i was meant to be blonde.'

Though Kylie's continued sex appeal is undeniable, insiders say that the beauty is 'already starting to work out,' and is 'focusing on getting her body back and also getting back to a comfortable weight aside from caring for Stormi.'

Woah mama! Though it's been less than two months since Kylie Jenner gave birth, the star (above while expecting) is 'focusing on getting her body back and also getting back to a comfortable weight aside from caring for Stormi'

Swim fan! Reminiscing about her pre-baby figure, the 20-year-old posted a flashback snap of herself in a very revealing bikini Monday on Instagram

They said the fans can look forward to the beauty 'flaunting her progress more and more' as time goes on.

The insider also admitted that the star: 'wasn't the most comfortable while pregnant.'

Even though the make-up mogul's worried about her body, there's been no shortage of sexy photos from the star since her daughter's birth February 1.

Reminiscing about her pre-baby figure, the California native posted a flashback snap of herself in a very revealing bikini Monday on Instagram.

Snapping back! Kylie Jenner is having no trouble getting back to her smoking pre-pregnancy figure, as evident by a Saturday Snapchat post

Kylie captioned the black and white image: 'summer goals #tb'. 

The day before Kylie showed off her fitness progress on Snapchat as she hiked up her sweatshirt to reveal enviably flat abs and a hint of her full bust covered in a grey sports bra. 

At the same time she's hard at working trimming down her body, the starlet is also making sure she and daughter Stormi are living in fine style.

The starlet gave Snapchat a peek inside her newly decorated living room on Monday, showing off her stylish take on interior designer.

No baby proofing here! New mom Kylie Jenner opens doors to her opulent living room featuring signed Basquiat print, $25k side table and roaring open fire

Watch out Stormi! The reality star will have to be careful to ensure her baby stays safe once she starts crawling

While the room was far from child-friendly - featuring a sharp-edged glass coffee table and an unprotected open roaring fire - it was certainly impressive.

Above the fireplace hung a signed Basquiat print of his artwork Hollywood Africans In front Of The Chinese Theater With Footprints Of Movie Stars.

Similar prints from the limited edition 1983 run of 60 are currently on sale for between $50,000 to $75,000.

To the side of the fire under a round mirror stands a gold occasional table dripping with metallic bulges

Proud mom: The makeup mogul gave birth to her firstborn, Stormi Webster, with rapper beau Travis Scott nearly two months ago 

This piece is the Melting Brass Hallway Table by Zhipeng Tan, which retails for $25,000.

The reality star has been extremely busy after giving birth to her firstborn, daughter Stormi Webster, nearly two months ago. 

On Tuesday, the 20-year-old relished some alone time with her rapper beau Travis Scott, as the pair grabbed an early morning juice in West Hollywood together. 

The couple have been dating for around 11 months, after first being romantically linked in April 2017, following a sighting at Coachella.

Proud parents: Kylie and Stormi's dad Travis Scott have been dating for around 11 months, after first being romantically linked in April 2017, following a sighting at Coachella

item.title: 'There was chemistry between us': Bachelor In Paradise contestant Jake Ellis says he felt a connection with his co-star Megan Marx when she was 'still with Tiffany Scanlon’ and he doesn't care if she's bisexual
item.description: The Gold Coast hunk admits he had a thing for the Perth-born beauty when she was still with her now ex-girlfriend, Tiffany Scanlon.
item.content:encoded:
They are rumoured to have found love after meeting on Bachelor in Paradise.

And now Jake Ellis has revealed he felt a connection with busty blonde Megan Marx long before they filmed the new spin-off series.

The Gold Coast hunk admits he had a thing for the Perth-born beauty when she was still with her now ex-girlfriend, Tiffany Scanlon.  

Scroll down for video

'There was chemistry between us': Bachelor In Paradise contestant Jake Ellis says he felt a connection with his co-star Megan Marx when she was 'still with Tiffany Scanlon’ and he doesn't care if she's bisexual 

Megan and Tiffany became the world's first same-sex Bachelor couple in 2016, but shortly thereafter announced their split in early 2017. 

The 31-year-old hunk explained to TV Week the pair met roughly one year ago at an 'event in Sydney' after their reality TV seasons had wrapped.

'She was still with Tiffany (Scanlon) then, but there was chemistry between us,' Jake told the publication. 

The former Bachelorette star revealed he discussed Megan's bisexuality with her during Bachelor In Paradise.

'That's a part of who she is and I appreciate and respect that. It didn't bother me,' the hunky reality TV star continued.

'That's a part of who she is and I appreciate and respect that:  The former Bachelorette star revealed he discussed Megan's bisexuality with her during Bachelor In Paradise

Furthermore Jake claims Megan's lesbian tryst with Elora Murger, which hit screens earlier this month, 'didn't complicate anything' for the handsome star.     

A new promo trailer for Bachelor In Paradise shows Megan sharing a passionate kiss with season five contestant Elora.

Steamy!  Furthermore Jake claims Megan's lesbian tryst with Elora Murger, which hit screens earlier this month, 'didn't complicate anything' for the handsome star

The pair are seen stripping down to tiny bikinis as they lock lips in the ocean, with a voice over of one of the girls gushing about her new conquest.

'She's absolutely gorgeous, she's definitely my type of girl,' one of the ladies gushes in the voiceover.

The pair are seen sitting and gazing at each other before enjoying a night dip where the steamy smooch takes place.

item.title: 'They knew we were a couple!' Stephanie Boulton SLAMS Bachelor In Paradise producers and accuse them of creating fake drama after boyfriend Brett Moore is sent home for after failing to receive a rose
item.description: Brett Moore's girlfriend Stephanie Boulton, SLAMS producers of Bachelor In Paradise, on Tuesday's Kyle and Jackie O radio show.
item.content:encoded:
Brett Moore blamed Bachelor In Paradise producers for making him look like a 's**t bloke' after his so-called 'secret relationship' was exposed on Monday's episode. 

And on Tuesday's Kyle and Jackie O Show, Brett's girlfriend Stephanie Boulton slammed the show, claiming they were both approached to appear as a couple.

The blonde beauty, who starred on Matty Johnson's season of The Bachelor last year, told KIIS FM: 'They already knew about me and Brett.'

'They knew we were a couple!' Stephanie Boulton slammed Bachelor In Paradise producers on Tuesday, accusing them of creating fake drama with Brett Moore's 'secret girlfriend' storyline

'I actually got the call first for Bachelor In Paradise, and I first said no, and they already knew about me and Brett,' Stephanie said.

'Later Brett texted me and said he just got a call for Bachelor In Paradise, and I was like, "Sorry? I just told them no because I'm with you",' she added.

'Then it turned out they were interested in him going on the show, so I texted back to (the producers) and said, "Hey, I spoke to Brett... I'm keen too. (So) we both got casted."'

Stephanie went on to explain the drama that ensued, saying: 'He went on the island and this whole thing blew up!' 

Details: 'I actually got the call first for Bachelor In Paradise, and I first said no, and they already knew about me and Brett,' Stephanie told The Kyle and Jackie O Show

A Warner Bros. spokesperson denied producers knew beforehand that Stephanie and Brett were a couple, telling Daily Mail: 'Once it was confirmed during filming that (they) were actually dating, Stephanie was no longer eligible for the show.'

The controversy over Brett's so-called 'secret' girlfriend and what he was doing on a dating show for singletons was one of the main storylines in the first two episodes.

Bachelor fan favourite Tara Pavlovic was even dragged into the embarrassing situation after she was accused of 'covering' for Brett.

Short debut: Brett was sent packing from Bachelor In Paradise on Monday, after failing to receive a rose 

Brett, 28, took to Instagram after Monday's episode to give his side of the story, blaming the show's producers for making him look like a 's**t bloke'.

Brett explained that he and Stephanie were both approached to appear on Bachelor In Paradise in the 'early days' of their relationship.

The idea was that they would film the series and allow their romance - which had already started back in Australia - to 'blossom' in front of the cameras.

However, things apparently went pear-shaped when Brett 'arrived on the island first' and Stephanie's contract was summarily 'ripped up' - making it 'look like (he) went on a dating show without her'. 

Vocal: The 28-year-old took to Instagram after Monday's episode, to give his side of the story, and blamed the show's producers for making him look like a 's**t bloke' 

Setting the record straight: Brett explained on Monday that he and Stephanie were both approached to appear on Bachelor In Paradise in the 'early days' of their relationship

item.title: When in Rio! Victoria's Secret model Izabel Goulart strips down to a sexy string bikini as she sunbathes in Brazil during a quick spring break
item.description: Izabel Goulart has become one of the top models in the business because she has incredible curves that make lingerie and bikinis look exceptional.
item.content:encoded:
Izabel Goulart has become one of the top models in the business because she has incredible curves that make lingerie and bikinis look exceptional.

And on Sunday the bombshell proved that she is only getting better in her thirties as she showed off her nearly six-foot frame in a black two piece while walking on the Copacabana beach in Rio de Janeiro, a massive seaside city in Brazil.

The Victoria's Secret vet, 33, showed off her cover girl smile as she let her hair down while getting her feet wet with friends. 

Scroll down for video 

Lovely lady: Stunning model Izabel Goulart modeled a sexy black string bikini as she walked on the Copacabana beach in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, on Sunday 

All the right curves: The bombshell proved that she is only getting better in her thirties as she showed off her nearly six-foot frame as she enjoyed the massive seaside city in Brazil

Izabel, who dates Kevin Trapp, wore a black bikini that had a triangle top and string bottoms that were tied on the sides and also showed off plenty of backside.

The catwalk princess also wore gold-rimmed sunglasses with yellow tinted lenses and had on small pieces of gold jewelry.

Her body looked very toned with lean legs and arms and her abs were shows. 

The star, who was born in Brazil, was discovered at age 14 and started modeling soon after in Sao Paulo. 

A 10: Izabel, who dates Kevin Trapp, wore a black bikini that had a triangle top and string bottoms that were tied on the sides and also showed off plenty of backside

Le look de IG: The catwalk princess also wore gold-rimmed sunglasses with yellow tinted lenses and had on small pieces of gold jewelry. Her body looked very toned with lean legs and arms and her abs were shows

A body to be proud of: The brunette looker made an impression in Europe at the fashion shows for Alberta Ferretti, Balenciaga, Bottega Veneta, Givenchy, Oscar de la Renta, Valentino, Chanel, and Dolce And Gabbana. In 2005, Goulart appeared on the covers of the April edition of Marie Claire France and, in December, Vogue Brazil

More background: In 2008, she replaced fellow Victoria's Secret Angel Alessandra Ambrosio as the face of A/X Armani Exchange. She also graced the cover of the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue in 2011

Here the Elle model is seen running up the shore

The brunette looker - who is of Italian and Portuguese descent - made an impression in Europe at the fashion shows for Alberta Ferretti, Balenciaga, Bottega Veneta, Givenchy, Oscar de la Renta, Valentino, Chanel, and Dolce And Gabbana. 

In 2005, Goulart appeared on the covers of the April edition of Marie Claire France and, in December, Vogue Brazil.

In 2005, she entered the fold of Victoria's Secret, walking in their famed fashion show and starred in every show until 2016. 

In 2008, she replaced fellow Victoria's Secret Angel Alessandra Ambrosio as the face of A/X Armani Exchange. 

She also graced the cover of the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue in 2011.

Her other big covers have been for Vogue, GQ, Marie Claire, Glamour and Elle.  

Izabel doesn't only model; she has also acted in movies as she appeared opposite The Rock, Alexandra Daddario, Kelly Rohrbach and Zac Efron in Baywatch.

Izabel told HeyUGuys of her reaction when she discovered she had bagged the role: 'I had so [many] butterflies in my stomach.

'All I wanted to do wanted to scream out loud, but I couldn't, because I was right about 10 to 15 minutes away from hitting a runway.'

She said she had to channel her joyous adrenaline amid receiving the great news, adding: 'It was very special - I walked that runway feeling very good.' 

Snack time: The stunning brunette stopped by a snack shop on the sand

Time to wash off the sand: After a day on the sand, she took some time to clean herself in an outdoor shower

All done: The looker appeared to be alone during her beach day as there was no sign of her beau Trapp

Posing with a fan? Here the Entourage actress was arm-in-arm with a handsome twentysomething man with several tattoos

Fresh drnk: Izabel enjoyed a fresh drink on the sand

The Victoria's Secret vet, 33, showed off her cover girl smile as she let her hair down while getting her feet wet with friends.

item.title: 'She's copied what Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively do!' Georgia Love trolls boyfriend Lee Elliott on his birthday by sharing a collage of romantic photos... and cropping him out of ALL of them
item.description: The Bachelorette's Georgia Love and boyfriend Lee Elliott often show their sense of humour on social media, using funny hashtags.
item.content:encoded:
The Bachelorette's Georgia Love and boyfriend Lee Elliott like to show their sense of humour on social media using funny (and often cringeworthy) hashtags.

And on Tuesday, Georgia took things to another level when she hilariously trolled the mechanical plumber on his 37th birthday. 

Sharing a collage of photos of the couple on Instagram, Georgia cropped Lee out of all of them.

'She's copied what Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively do!' Georgia Love trolls boyfriend Lee Elliott on his birthday by sharing a collage of romantic photos... and cropping him out of ALL of them 

It didn't take long for fans to point out which celebrity couple had inspired the post.

'Haha I see you've gone for the Ryan Reynolds to Blake Lively birthday type post!' one follower commented.

Another added: 'She's just copied what Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively do.'

'This is incredible! Hilarious!' read a similar comment.

Sweet: Georgia captioned the post, 'Happy birthday old mate! Life is simply better with you by my side, you deserve the very best day today and every day'

Georgia captioned the post: 'Happy birthday old mate! Life is simply better with you by my side, you deserve the very best day today and every day.'

She added several hashtags, including: 'You're not old, you're vintage' and 'Loving you is a piece of cake.'

Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively have previously made headlines for trolling each other on social media on their birthdays.

Following their lead? Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively (pictured) have previously made headlines for trolling one another on social media on their birthdays

Joke: Last year, Ryan shared a social media photo of himself and Blake - who was cropped out - alongside the caption: 'Happy birthday to my amazing wife'

'Happy birthday, baby': Blake later responded when it was his birthday, sharing a picture of Ryan with actor Ryan Gosling - but with her husband cropped out 

Last year, Ryan shared a social media photo of himself and Blake - who was cropped out - alongside the caption: 'Happy birthday to my amazing wife.'

Blake later responded when it was his birthday, sharing a picture of Ryan with actor Ryan Gosling - but with her husband cropped out.

'Happy birthday, baby,' she wrote. 

Going strong: Georgia and Lee fell in love on The Bachelorette in 2016
item.dc:abstract: The Bachelorette's Georgia Love and boyfriend Lee Elliott often show their sense of humour on social media, using funny hashtags. And on Tuesday, Georgia took things to another level when she hilariously trolled the plumber on his 37th birthday. Sharing a collage of snaps of the pair together on Instagram, Georgia cropped him out of all the images, with some fans comparing the post to something Hollywood stars, Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds, would do.

item.title: 'I knew something drastic had to happen': Married At First Sight's Alycia Galbraith recalls her emotional weight loss journey... as she launches her own body transformation program
item.description: Everybody has their demons - and for Alycia Galbraith, hers was her weight, which left her feeling anxious and embarrassed.
item.content:encoded:
Everybody has their demons - and for Alycia Galbraith, her weight left her feeling anxious and embarrassed.

Before taking part in Married At First Sight, she lost an incredible 42 kilograms and now she is dedicated to helping others.

After speaking candidly about her own emotional weight loss journey, Alycia took to  Instagram on Monday to announce she and business partner Naomi Turvey had launched their own body transformation program.

Scroll down for video 

'I knew something drastic had to happen': Married At First Sight's Alycia Galbraith has recalled her emotional weight loss journey as she launches her own body transformation program

Called 'Body Beautiful Transformation', the program is designed to help people overhaul their lifestyle and become more healthy.

'Our goal is to help as many of you as humanly possible to achieve your dreams in becoming your best self,' Alycia explained.

'I have gone through a massive transformation myself and understand just how hard it is to take that first step, let me hold your hand through this.'

Inspirational: Alycia (left) teamed up with Naomi Turvey (right) to launch a program called Body Beautiful Transformation

In an inspirational blog post shared last week, Alycia described how tough it was to overcome her own insecurities and change her lifestyle.

'There was a point in my life at the age of 22 when I reached a weight so large (my doctor said I was obese) that I knew something drastic had to happen,' she wrote.

Alycia explained that she made a choice to take control and start going to the gym after losing an initial 12kg from diet changes alone.

Body battles: In an inspirational blog post shared last week, Alycia described how tough it was to overcome her own insecurities and change her lifestyle

But the journey wasn't without its challenges, and Alycia admitted she struggled with attending the gym and feeling as though she didn't measure up to the fit and toned people around her.

Recalling one particularly difficult experience, she wrote: 'My anxiety was (at) an all-time high, and after maybe 20 minutes, I couldn’t deal with it any longer and retreated back into the change room.

'I would be so embarrassed that I was only at the gym for such a short amount of time that I'd pretend I had received an important phone call or similar so I could make a quick exit and the front desk staff wouldn't judge me.'

With a mission to help turn around the lives of people just like her, Alycia added that her perspective on going to the gym has now completely changed.

'The biggest change I've noticed is in my body language, I stand tall and proud, dripping with sweat and all,' she wrote, before adding: 'I couldn't be happier!'

'I couldn't be happier!' Alycia is enjoying her new life and wants to help people who have battled similar weight struggles
item.dc:abstract: Everybody has their demons - and for Alycia Galbraith, her weight left her feeling anxious and embarrassed. Before taking part in Married At First Sight, she lost an incredible 42 kilograms and now she is dedicated to helping others. After speaking candidly about her own emotional weight loss journey, Alycia took to Instagram on Monday to announce she and business partner Naomi Turvey had launched their own body transformation program.

item.title: 'Player got played!' Leah Costa takes a swipe at Davey Lloyd after the ladies' man is forced to make an early exit from Bachelor in Paradise
item.description: While she was brutally denied a kiss from The Bachelor's Matty 'J' Johnson last year, Leah Costa seemed to be better luck on the show's spin-off.
item.content:encoded:
While she was brutally denied a kiss from The Bachelor's Matty 'J' Johnson last year, Leah Costa seemed to be having better luck on the show's spin-off.

The former 'villain' became the first woman to lock lips on Bachelor in Paradise, sharing a smooch with Davey Lloyd before he regretted his decision and set his sights squarely on Florence Alexandra. 

But after the ladies' man failed to score a rose on Monday night's episode from either of them, Leah took to Instagram to take a swipe at her former date.

Scroll down for video 

'Player got played!' Leah Costa (pictured) took a swipe at Davey Lloyd on Instagram on Monday after the 'player' was forced to make an early exit from Bachelor in Paradise

Sharing a snap of herself with a humourless expression, Leah poked fun at Davey's abrupt departure from the tropical island.

'The face when Davey goes home and you know the truth behind it all,' the blonde beauty wrote.

Getting in another hit in the hashtag, Leah added: 'Player got played.' 

'Player got played': Leah seem too sad that Davey (pictured) was booted from the island

No spark? Leah and Davey were the first to share a kiss but their romance was short-lived

The first rose ceremony in Fiji was a dramatic affair with the fate of the players left in the women's hands. 

With seven roses to hand out and nine hopeful men, the two men not offered roses would be sent home from paradise. 

Failing to find a connection with Davey on their brief date, Leah bypassed the Sydney-based suitor and instead gave her rose to Mackane Reid.

Sticking around: Leah bypassed Davey at the rose ceremony and instead asked Mackane Reid (left) to stay

And although Florence showed keen interest for Davey early on, it appeared the Dutch stunner couldn't get over the fact he had chosen Leah for time alone instead of her.

She also had history with Georgia Love's former beau Jake Ellis and was torn over whether to pick him or Davey.

Florence ultimately chose to see if her already existing spark with Jake would turn into something more, which left Davey packing his bags.

Emotional: Florence Alexandra (pictured) had a tough decision regarding who to choose

Getting the boot! In the end, Flo gave Jake Ellis (left) her rose, meaning Davey (right) was forced to leave paradise

item.title: Stranger Things couple Natalia Dyer and Charlie Heaton pose separately on the red carpet at PaleyFest following split rumors
item.description: Dyer, who plays Nancy Wheeler on the show, wore a Delpozo dress with a white top with straps and a plunging top, with a seafoam green dress and off-white Christian Louboutin heels.
item.content:encoded:
They're one of young Hollywood's most adorable pairings - but have recently been hit with breakup rumors.

And curiously Charlie Heaton and Natalia Dyer decided to pose for photos separately at Sunday's PaleyFest event in Hollywood before sitting down to discuss their hit show Stranger Things. 

Dyer, who plays Nancy Wheeler on the show, wore a Delpozo dress with a white top with straps and a plunging front with a seafoam green skirt, and off-white Christian Louboutin heels. 

Scroll down for video 

On or off?: Stranger Things' Natalia Dyer and Charlie Heaton posed separately on the red carpet before the PaleyFest event on Sunday amid split rumors

Perfect pairing: Dyer, 21, and Heaton, 24, sat down for a chat about Netflix hit Stranger Things 

The 21-year-old Nashville native had her dark locks pulled back, with wisps of hair protruding and a light layer of makeup. 

Heaton, 24, wore a dark seaweed green suit with an untucked black button-down shirt, black boots with blue laces, and a watch.

The English actor, who plays Jonathan Byers on the show, had his dark locks parted in the middle.

The outing came after a source told Life & Style earlier this month: 'Charlie broke it off with Natalia. She’s heartbroken. She doesn’t know what went wrong.' 

But confusing matters even more the duo were spotted looking pretty happy and posing together at a Dior event on March 15 shortly after split reports emerged. 

Dyer recently revealed that she and her beau keep things light on the set of the show, as do most of her co-stars.

Professionals: The duo looked relaxed as they discussed the show despite it being reported earlier this month that they'd split 

Keeping it light: Dyer said she and Heaton 'goof off a lot' on the set of the show during filming

Winning formula: Dyer said that her character, Nancy Wheeler, and Heaton's Jonathan Byers, have a complementary effect on one another 

'He’s great. It’s a lot of fun, we goof off a lot,' she told US. 'The whole cast does. We’re all very close so we always have a great time on and off [set] ... sometimes it’s even hard to stop laughing, stop goofing off. It’s been really lovely!'

She said that the chemistry between her character and Heaton's is of the 'push-pull' variety, and that 'there’s some tension there,' as she thinks 'they probably fight a lot.'

She continued, 'They’ve both had this shared trauma. They’ve both gone through this experience together and I think that brings people closer.'

She said that the characters have had a complementary effect on each other since the show's inception.

'I think also what was kind of cool about Jonathan and Nancy, especially in season one, was that they brought out qualities in each other that maybe weren’t there without the other,' she said.

Lovebirds: The Netflix co-stars have been romantically linked since last year 

Ensemble: Actor Wil Wheaton moderated the panel, which included (L-R) Shawn Levy, Winona Ryder, Sean Astin, Paul Reiser, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Browmn, Caleb McLaughlin, Sadie Sink, Dyer and Heaton

item.title: From a $129 organic eye cream, to a $93 designer face mist and a $49 Dior lip balm: Elsa Pataky reveals her favourite beauty products
item.description: She's always glowing, whether on being dolled up on the red carpet or completely makeup free.
item.content:encoded:
She's always glowing, whether on being dolled up on the red carpet or completely makeup free.

And on Tuesday, Spanish actress Elsa Pataky revealed some of the beauty products she uses. 

The 41-year-old stunner took to Instagram to reveal she uses a $129 organic eye cream, a $93 designer face mist, and a $49 Dior lip balm, among other products. 

Scroll down for video 

From a $129 organic eye cream, to a $93 designer face mist and a $49 Dior lip balm: Elsa Pataky reveals her favourite beauty products

Elsa uses Eminence's Hibiscus Ultra Lift Eye Cream, which is 'formulated to instantly lift, firm and tighten,' according to the official Eminence website. 

The blonde uses Omorovicza's $93 Queen of Hungary Mist, which is rose-scented and hydrating, and what can be used as a toner. 

Mecca boasts about the product, saying: 'Purifying and hydrating, this toner was inspired by the Queen of Hungary Water, the world's first recorded perfume, formulated for Queen Elisabeth of Hungary in the 14th century.'

Flawless! She's always glowing, whether on being dolled up on the red carpet or completely makeup free

Fancy: Elsa uses Eminence's Hibiscus Ultra Lift Eye Cream, which is 'formulated to instantly lift, firm and tighten,' according to the official Eminence website

Go-to products: The blonde uses Omorovicza's $93 Queen of Hungary Mist (L), and Mario Badescu's $9 facial spray with aloe, herbs and rosewater (R)

Another facial spray is Mario Badescu's spray with aloe, herbs and rosewater, which retails at Mecca for $9. 

Elsa also uses sunscreen, and wears Peter Thomas Roth's SPF 30 moisturising lotion. 

The Fast and Furious star - who is married to Australian actor Chris Hemsworth - also wears Chanel and Nars makeup.

Elsa took to her Instagram story on Tuesday to share a shot of herself on set of her new Netflix series, Tidelands.  

The big brands: The Fast and Furious star - who is married to Australian actor Chris Hemsworth - also wears Chanel and Nars makeup

Clinical protection: Elsa also uses sunscreen, and wears Peter Thomas Roth's SPF 30 moisturising lotion

She can be seen in a trailer getting her hair and makeup done. 

'Let's start this new adventure,' she captioned the post. 

She revealed it was her first day on set.

The show is being in Australia, where Elsa is based with Chris and their three young children, daughter India Rose, five, and twin sons, Tristan and Sasha, four. 

Elsa will play the role of Adrielle Cuthbert in the ten-part series, which centres around a group of dangerous half-humans half-water sirens. 

New gig: Elsa is filming a new show for Netflix, called Tidelands

Natural beauty: Elsa meanwhile has previously said how she often scraps the makeup, and said her man prefers her without the face paint

Meanwhile, Chris previously revealed to Elle Magazine that Elsa uses La Mer moisturiser.   

The $665 Crème de la Mer moisturizer is said to be a go-to favourite among Hollywood stars including Kim Kardashian and Jennifer Lopez.   

'[Elsa] has La Mer moisturizer. She's always like, 'You gotta put this on.' As she begins to look younger and I look older, I'm starting to think she's got a point,' Chris joked about his stunning wife.  

Elsa meanwhile has previously said how she often scraps the makeup, and said her man prefers her without the face paint.   

'Like most men, (Chris) likes me with no makeup and in the moments you think you're not that glamorous,' she previously told WHO magazine.

'It's nice for someone to tell you because sometimes you forget.' 

Another fave: Chris previously revealed to Elle Magazine that Elsa uses La Mer moisturiser

And on Tuesday, Spanish actress Elsa Pataky revealed some of the beauty products she uses. item.title: 'It was hard not to take the pain myself': Gaz Beadle's girlfriend Emma McVey details her heartbreak over newborn son Chester's 'poor health' after he was rushed to hospital
item.description: Gaz Beadle's girlfriend Emma McVey has described her heartbreak over her three-month-old son Chester's recent poor health in an Instagram snap.
item.content:encoded:
Gaz Beadle's girlfriend Emma McVey has described her heartbreak over her three-month-old son Chester's recent poor health in an Instagram snap.

The model, 25, admitted that there was 'nothing worse' than seeing her newborn 'so poorly' - with her even stating that she wish she 'could take the pain herself.'

The stunning brunette also went on to describe her turmoil after a slew of doctors failed to take her and Gaz seriously, due to them being 'first time parents', before they eventually found an 'amazing paediatrician who listened.' 

'Nothing worse': Gaz Beadle's girlfriend Emma McVey, 25, has described her heartbreak over her three-month-old son Chester's recent poor health in an Instagram snap

Taking to Twitter, Emma penned: ' 'There’s been nothing worse than to see Chester so poorly and in pain from every feed, to the point I cried for him. Everyone sees a brave front but it has been the worst and hardest time of my life to not be able to take the pain myself. 

'Thanks to all the emergency doctors who brushed us off with colic, because it’s normal that he eventually started refusing feeds? It’s normal we had to take shifts sitting up through the night as he could only sleep sat upright on us? 

'It’s normal that he ended up in a curled up position that he couldn’t get out of? Blaming the fact we are ‘first time parents’. After 4 emergency visits we finally found an amazing paediatrician who listened, who checked and helped us.'

Heartbreak: The model admitted that there was 'nothing worse' than seeing her newborn 'so poorly' - with her even stating that she wish she 'could take the pain herself'

'Thanks to all the doctors who brushed us off': The brunette also went onto describe her turmoil after doctors failed to take her and Gaz seriously, due to them being 'first time parents'

Emma continued the lengthy caption: 'Cries and a real struggles, I will say every parent deserves a medal. I definitely couldn’t of got through the past week without the amazing help from grandparents, friends and a fab daddy that Chester has.

'A tablet a day dissolved and given to by a shringe for his stomach acid, cows milk intolerance and a thicking agent added to every feed we have a happy Chester, not 100% but he’s definitely on his way! 

'Nothing makes me smile more than seeing this face and hearing him giggle. I will take the sleepless nights as long as you’re happy little man,' she concluded.     

This comes after Emma showcased her incredible post-baby body in a sizzling bikini-clad Instagram snap shared, taken just two months after she gave birth.

The brunette beauty flaunted her incredibly taut midriff and tiny waist in a smouldering pink, green and white string bikini, which drew the eye to her amazing 28 pound weightloss after giving birth.

Wow factor: This comes after Emma showcased her incredible post-baby body in a sizzling bikini-clad Instagram snap shared, taken just two months after she gave birth

Emma put her ample cleavage on display in a fuschia pink top, which was trimmed with green and ivory stripes.

The model exuded sex appeal as she leaned back on a sun lounger, revealing her endless, toned legs in all their glory and her skimpy bikini bottoms.

Her brunette tresses were styled in loose waves while she opted for a touch of smoky eye make-up and a peachy blusher for her radiant spa look.

Later that day,  her hunky beau Gaz also shared a sweet snap of the family with their baby boy, as he prepared to ring in his landmark 30th birthday as a new father.

Cute: Later that day, her hunky beau Gaz Beadle also shared a sweet snap of the family with their baby boy, as he prepared to ring in his landmark 30th birthday as a new father

In the cute photo, a smiling Gaz leans into a fresh-faced Emma, who is clad in a khaki-green onesie.

The beauty is cradling their beautiful baby boy, who looked adorable in a white and navy babygro. 

Alluding to the many night feeds ahead, a whimsical Gaz wrote; 'Night before my bday having a mad 1... pre milk about 11 still be smashing the milk about 3am Infact probs 7 aswell....'.       

Back in late January, just 10 days after giving birth, Emma announced she had lost the baby weight thanks to healthy meals and snacks.

Wow: Back in late January, just 10 days after giving birth, Emma announced she had lost the baby weight thanks to healthy meals and snacks

She penned in the caption: 'I’m back to my original weight and shape in 10 days! I swapped from my energy and maintenance shakes to the fat loss ones the past 7 days so a huge thank you to herbalife... 

'This is one of the main reasons me and @gazgshore have decided to team up with them (don’t want him having a dad bod).  

'I gained a total of 28lbs which was a good amount of weight for me and Chester who was 6lbs2. You all had so many questions about the shakes I posted and had throughout my pregnancy so I’ve decided to start sharing my journey with you alongside my healthy meals and snacks!'

Toned; She wowed in this saucy underwear snap in which she flashed her ample bust 

Romance: Gaz and Emma's love story goes back to August 2016 when sparks first started flying and they have been going strong ever since

Emotional Gaz detailed how he was fighting back the tears in a heartfelt interview with OK! magazine following the birth of their son.

He told the publication: 'I was fighting back tears as it was happening and I was thinking to myself, don’t cry! I was turning away as it was happening. It’s the weirdest thing. It’s mad.'  

Gaz and Emma's love story goes back to August 2016 when sparks first started flying and they have been going strong ever since. 

Smitten: The couple's first baby Chester Raymond arrived in January

The model, 25, admitted that there was 'nothing worse' than seeing her newborn 'so poorly' - with her even stating that she wish she 'could take the pain herself.' The stunning brunette also went on to describe her turmoil after a slew of doctors failed to take her and Gaz seriously, due to them being 'first time parents', before they eventually found an 'amazing paediatrician who listened.'

item.title: Friends again? Married At First Sight's Nasser reunites with 'ex-wife' Gabrielle and co-star Justin at the Easter Show... as fans point out the glaring fail in his Instagram post
item.description: He's the flamboyant groom who failed to make his marriage work with his TV bride Gabrielle Bartlett on Married At First Sight.
item.content:encoded:
He failed to make his marriage work with his TV bride Gabrielle Bartlett on Married At First Sight.

And at first glance, fans believed all was well between Nasser Sultan, 50, and the blonde beauty after he shared a snap of himself alongside his ex and their co-star Justin Fischer at the Sydney Royal Easter Show, on Tuesday. 

However, followers of the social experiment reality show and its stars noticed a glaring fail in the well-moisturised Egyptian's Instagram post shared on Tuesday.

Scroll down for video 

Friends again? Married At First Sight's Nasser reunites with 'ex-wife' Gabrielle and co-star Justin at the Easter Show... as fans point out the glaring fail in his Instagram post 

Featured in the candid photo was Nasser with Gabrielle, Justin and an Easter Show staffer, with fan favourite Jo 'Foxy JoJo' McPharlin with Alycia Galbraith in the background.

In the caption the fitness instructor wrote: 'The Easter show has started thanks to ch9 and Kiss fm for having us #kissfm #chan9 #marriedatfirstsight #royaleastershow#mafs.'

One eagle-eyed fan pointed out the mistake in the caption of his recent post, saying: 'That must be a while back, cos @justin_mafs has been over here in NZ for a few days.'

Over! Nasser failed to make his marriage work with his TV bride Gabrielle Bartlett on Married At First Sight

He's not even here: One eagle-eyed fan pointed out the mistake in the caption of his recent post, saying: 'That must be a while back, cos @justin_mafs has been over here in NZ for a few days' (Justin and Nasser pictured)

According to the soft serve ice-cream entrepreneur's Instagram, he has been in Auckland two days staying at the upscale Cordis hotel.

While Nasser failed mention the photo was a 'throwback' to the MAFS cast outing last week, he told the observant fan: 'I want to get over there,' hinting a future travel plans to New Zealand. 

Followers were happy to see their favourites from the show spending time with each  other after filming, including one who commented: 'Great to see you all together.'

It's a throwback: According to the soft serve ice-cream entrepreneur's Instagram, he has been in Auckland two days staying at the upscale Cordis hotel and enjoying delicious meals

Shocking: Also upon closer inspection of the Nasser's Easter Show snap, the skincare enthusiast is seen wearing the same grey V-neck jumper he wore on when he entered Kyle And Jackie O's Haunted House at the Easter Show last week

Also upon closer inspection of the Nasser's Easter Show snap, the skincare enthusiast is seen wearing the same grey V-neck jumper he wore on when he entered Kyle And Jackie O's Haunted House at the Easter Show, last week.

He appeared on Jackie 'O' Henderson's Instagram Story, looking very terrified of the Easter Show novelty.

'F**king possessed,' he responded while his heart continued beating out of his chest.

'It's possessed I'm telling ya': Fans of the show will remember a similar meltdown he had upon arriving at 'ex-wife' Gabrielle's Northern Beaches homestay apartment after the slats of his bed frame broke

Fans of the show will remember a similar meltdown he had upon arriving at 'ex-wife' Gabrielle's Northern Beaches homestay apartment after the slats of his bed frame broke causing him to hurt his back.

'Where did this come from? Trash N Treasure? Side of the road? They bought this bed from where?' he wailed at Gabrielle.

Terrified: 'Where did this come from? Trash N Treasure? Side of the road? They bought this bed from where?' he wailed at Gabrielle

item.title: 'Bikini life in paradise': Brooke Shields, 52, stuns in a two-piece black swimsuit while enjoying tropical vacation
item.description: Brooke Shields is 'in vacation mode.' The 52-year-old actress shared some envy-worthy snaps of her tropical getaway, flaunting her sensational body in a black-and-white bikini.
item.content:encoded:
Brooke Shields has ditched her famous Calvins and is now 'in vacation mode.'

On Sunday, the 52-year-old actress shared some envy-worthy snaps of her tropical getaway, flaunting her sensational body in a black-and-white bikini.

In the photos, the mother-of-two put her best assets on display, posing on a set of wooden stairs that led to the picturesque beach.

Scroll down for video  

'Bikini life': Brooke Shields, 52, stuns in a two-piece black swimsuit as she poses on a set of wooden stairs during a tropical getaway 

She captioned the set of pictures: 'Bikini life in paradise,' accompanied by a palm tree emoji. 

The two-time Golden Globe nominee went au naturel, showing off her flawless skin and fresh vacation tan. 

She kept her accessories to a minimum, wearing a few bracelets around her wrist and she let her long brown hair down naturally. 

In an interview with Health magazine, the Vogue cover girl shared that she's learned to love her body, saying: 'I was always considered the athletic one, and that translated into big. I was the big one. Thankfully, so many more body types are accepted these days.' 

Au naturel: The mother-of-two looked relaxed and showed off her best assets in a set of Instagram photos 

She added that she often works out with a personal trainer and loves moves like, 'hanging upside down in inversion boots, doing hamstring pulls and sit-ups. I'm amazed at how great it feels on my back.'

Brooke also spilled that she lets herself indulge in her favorites treats, like ice cream or wine, every once in awhile so that she sets herself up for 'success.' And all her efforts seem to have paid off.  

In another snap posted on Thursday, the brunette beauty took a dip in a pool as she looked out on the ocean to appreciate the spectacular view.

The model and actress seems to be enjoying her break from reality, captioning the photo: 'Out of office and into vacation mode.' 

'Vacation mode': The model and actress enjoyed the stunning view as she took a quick dip in a pool 

In a fun video posted on Saturday, Brooke is seen enjoying an 'afternoon joyride' as the 6ft stunner jet skis on the pristine ocean water.

The Blue Lagoon actress was ready for the adventure, wearing a light blue printed rash guard under a dark blue life jacket.  

And it seems the vacation came at just the right time. The star has had an incredibly busy schedule lately - juggling four TV and film projects in the last year.   

Guest star: The busy entrepreneur recently reprised her stint as 'renowned actress and supermodel' River Fields on the CW's Jane the Virgin 

The author of six books recently reprised her guest stint as 'renowned actress and supermodel' River Fields in the March 16 episode of The CW's Jane the Virgin. 

The star is also the voice of 'a very bad dog' on the Adult Swim cartoon Mr. Pickles. The show's third season premiered on Cartoon Network last month. 

And even though she has an impressive 96 credits on her IMDB, the veteran actress still has to practice for upcoming gigs.

In a candid photo shared last week, Brooke was seen reading over a green script and 'running lines,' for an upcoming project.

'Running lines': Brooke, who has an impressive 96 credits on her IMDB, shared a photo last week of her reading over a script for one her upcoming projects

item.title: Catherine Zeta Jones and Michael Douglas cavort in the ocean as they take their children on spring break
item.description: Titling her picture 'Family' with a heart emoji, the collage featured shots of the couple and their children, 14-year-old Carys and 17-year-old Dylan.
item.content:encoded:
It's two decades since they first fell for one another.

But Catherine Zeta Jones and Michael Douglas are clearly still very much in love.

The couple just spent an early spring break in the Dominican Republic, with Catherine sharing pictures from their trip.

Catherine Zeta Jones and Michael Douglas cavort in the ocean as they take their children on spring break in Dominican Republic

Vacation time: The couple just spent an early spring break in the Dominican Republic, with Catherine sharing pictures from their trip

Titling her picture 'Family' with a heart emoji, the collage featured a shot of Catherine and Michael embracing in the ocean.

Another shot showed their children, 14-year-old Carys and 17-year-old Dylan, taking a dip.

Dylan also featured in a black and white image, sleeping on a boat, while Carys posed on a bench.

The Douglas kids: Another shot showed their children, 14-year-old Carys and 17-year-old Dylan, taking a dip

Documenting her holiday in the Caribbean nation's picturesque Punta Cana, the Welsh actress has shared the highlights of the trip with her Instagram followers.

The stunning island is known for its 32 kilometre stretch of beaches and luxurious, all-inclusive resorts. 

And Catherine, 48, certainly looks at ease amidst the luxurious surroundings. 

Nap time: Dylan also featured in a black and white image, sleeping on a boat

Catherine recently filmed the movie Cocaine Godmother - and credited the flick with reinvigorating her passion for her profession.

She said: 'I just loved turning up to work every day. And I have to say, that's not necessarily always the case. For a few years there, I lost my mojo in what this was about.

'I love being a mother, I love being a wife. I have a very nice career behind me. If I'm out and in it, I like to be really knee deep in it and invest the time, the energy and creativity and enjoy it.

'I wasn't seeing any scripts that would even come close to me feeling like that.'

Homeward bound: Catherine returned to New York as the trip came to an end on Sunday

Catherine also admitted to having a lot of 'insecurities' but she tries to teach her daughter to be strong and confident.

She told OK! magazine: 'I try to instil in my daughter, and in myself, a sense of strength and power, you stick by your word.

'But of course there are vulnerabilities. There are insecurities like every woman. I'm a working mother, I have all those insecurities.

'And I think that coming from where I came from in Wales, it takes a certain kind of resilience to be able to take the knocks and keep battling through.'

Two decades together: The couple met in 1998 and married two years later

Both of Catherine and 73-year-old Michael's children are keen to follow in their footsteps and the actress is proud they want to study their craft and follow their passion, rather than just be famous.

She said: 'They go to a very liberal arts school - they go off to summer camp or theatre camp.

'What I love more than anything is that they want to learn and they love the craft.

'They don't want to be famous.'
item.dc:abstract: It's two decades since they first fell for one another. But Catherine Zeta Jones and Michael Douglas are clearly still very much in love. The couple just spent an early spring break in the Dominican Republic, with Catherine sharing pictures from their trip.
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith
item.mi:shortTitle: Catherine Zeta Jones and Michael Douglas cavort in the ocean

item.title: Michael Buble's model wife Luisana confirms she is pregnant with couple's third child as she showcases her baby bump at red carpet event
item.description: There's been plenty of speculation that whether they have another baby on the way.
item.content:encoded:
Michael Buble and his model wife Luisana Lopilato have confirmed they are expecting their third child together. 

The couple addressed weeks of speculation as they appeared at the Juno Awards in Vancouver, Canada, on Saturday night, with Luisana, 30, debuting her baby bump as she hit the red carpet with the singer, 42. 

Buble reminded the audience that five years ago, when he hosted the Canadian music festival in Regina, she was expecting their first child. 

Three is the magic number: Michael Buble and his model wife Luisana Lopilato have confirmed they are expecting their third child together 

'Oops you did it again... my wife and I are pregnant with our number three!' Buble said as the audience cheered the revelation. 

It was reported last week that the couple are expecting a baby girl in around four months time, but the Canadian crooner didn't reveal the gender of the tot. 

The new baby will  be a third child for the singer and his wife, who also have four-year-old Noah and two-year-old Elias.

Their parenthood journey hasn't been easy, with the couple devastated when Noah was diagnosed with liver cancer back in 2016, but luckily the youngster was confirmed to be making a recovery towards the end of last year.

Happy news: The couple addressed weeks of speculation as they appeared at the Juno Awards in Vancouver, Canada, on Saturday night 

Bumping along: Luisana, 30, debuted her baby bump in a stunning plunging black gown as she hit the red carpet with the singer, 42

And now Michael - who took home the award for Adult Contemporary Album of the Year at the 2018 Juno Awards - said he will start enjoying life more.

He told Entertainment Tonight Canada: 'Emotionally, it's a roller coaster. I think life sort of teaches you these hard lessons sometimes.

'Part of that lesson is that it allowed me to really have perspective, and to really enjoy more than I ever have in my life.

'I enjoy the small things.' 

Oh baby: The couple looked delighted as they hit the red carpet at the music event, with Luisana placing a protective hand on her beautiful bump

Doting dad: Buble reminded the audience that five years ago, when he hosted the Canadian music festival in Regina, she was expecting their first child

Big brood: The new baby will be a third child for the 42-year-old singer and his wife, who also have four-year-old Noah and two-year-old Elias 

Noah was diagnosed with cancer in 2016 but the Haven't Met You Yet hitmaker has previously confirmed he has been 'progressing well' following his treatment.

Speaking previously, he said: 'We are so grateful to report that our son Noah has been progressing well during his treatment and the doctors are very optimistic about the future for our little boy.

'He has been brave throughout and we continue to be inspired by his courage. We thank God for the strength he has given all of us.' 

Proud parents: The new baby is thought to be a girl
item.dc:abstract: There's been plenty of speculation that whether they have another baby on the way. And Michael Buble confirmed that his actress wife Luisana Lopilato is indeed expecting, as he took to the stage at the Juno Awards on Saturday. The singer reminded the audience that five years ago, when he hosted the Canadian music festival in Regina, she was expecting their first child.
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith
item.mi:shortTitle: Michael Buble's model wife Luisana confirms she is pregnant

item.title: 'Mother Nature needs some time': Remorseful Kylie Minogue CANCELS Sydney show due to a debilitating illness... days after she was compared to a 'Dolly Parton tribute act'
item.description: Kylie Minogue has cancelled all interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia.
item.content:encoded:
Earlier this week, Kylie Minogue cancelled her upcoming interviews to 'rest her voice', but made no indication her scheduled performances were at risk.

But on Tuesday, the 49-year-old pop sensation cancelled her Nova Red Room performance in Sydney, confirming her loyal fan's mounting fears.

In a remorseful Twitter announcement, Kylie wrote: 'I have tried my best to get better in time but alas, Mother Nature needs some time to get me better.'

'Mother Nature needs some time': Remorseful Kylie Minogue CANCELS Sydney show due to a debilitating illness... days after she was compared to a 'Dolly Parton tribute act'

The 'Loco-motion' singer's tweet was shared in full alongside statements from Nova and tour promoter Liberator/BMG. 

'Hey #NovasRedRoom fans. I’m so sorry to have to let you know that I can’t make the Red Room show this week,' Kylie wrote.

'I have a throat infection and have been advised by my Doctor to rest... I’m so sorry. I’ll reschedule as soon as I can and I promise we’ll make up for it Xx.'

Sick of it! In a remorseful Twitter announcement, Kylie wrote: 'I have tried my best to get better in time but alas, Mother Nature needs some time to get me better'

Nova said: 'Although we know our winners and fans will be disappointed that they won’t be able to experience this special Nova’s Red Room, Kylie’s health is the main priority and we wish her well with her recovery.'

Liberator/BMG wrote: 'Liberator/BMG regret to advise that on doctor’s orders Kylie’s Nova Red Room performance, scheduled for this Thursday in Sydney, is unable to proceed.'   

Days earlier, shortly after an awkward one-on-one with embattled Nine star Karl Stefanovic, Kylie cancelled all remaining interviews for the duration of her trip.  

'We wish her well': Nova said: 'Although we know our winners and fans will be disappointed that they won’t be able to experience this special Nova’s Red Room, Kylie’s health is the main priority and we wish her well with her recovery'

She had previously cited illness, with Tuesday's statement confirming a throat infection was to blame. 

The fallout from her recent BBC performance - where some fans described her as a 'Dolly Parton tribute act' - had nothing to do with the cancellation. 

Likewise, the timing of the cancellation and Karl's heavily criticised conduct during their 60 Minutes interview on Sunday appears to be a coincidence. 

What did he do? Days earlier, shortly after an awkward one-on-one with embattled Nine star Karl Stefanovic, Kylie cancelled all remaining interviews for the duration of her trip

Viewers branded the Two Million Dollar Man's chat a 'trainwreck' and called for someone more 'professional' to take the helm.

While Nine could perhaps have found someone more 'professional,' they would not have been able to find someone more costly - Karl is their highest paid talent.

Ouch! The fallout from her recent BBC performance - where some fans described her as a 'Dolly Parton tribute act' - had nothing to do with the cancellation

During the chat, he made Kylie visibly uncomfortable, describing her as a 'hot 50-year-old' and suggesting she should stop dating 'incredibly good-looking d**kheads'.   

Despite the fact 50th birthdays are rarely greeted with excitement, Karl also made the odd decision to bring out a cake for Kylie's big milestone anyway.

This decision was in spite of the knowledge the songstress was born on the 28th of May.

Who has two thumbs and two million dollars a year? Likewise, the timing of the cancellation and Karl's heavily criticised 60 Minutes interview on Sunday appears to be a coincidence
item.dc:abstract: Kylie Minogue has cancelled all interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia. The London-based pop sensation, 49, is set to arrive in the country this week to perform songs from her highly-anticipated new album, Golden. But the songstress has opted out of all accompanying promotional interviews, citing illness as the cause for the last-minute cancellation.
item.dc:creator: Alex Michael
item.mi:shortTitle: Kylie Minogue CANCELS Sydney show due to a debilitating illness

item.title: Did Florence Alexandra photoshop her official Bachelor In Paradise picture? Reality glamazon looks VERY different in a glossy new Instagram snap
item.description: Bachelor In Paradise fans were left perplexed after Florence Alexandra, 28, shared a social media snap of herself looking decidedly different on Wednesday.
item.content:encoded:
She has one of the most recognisable faces on Australian television thanks to her central role on Bachelor In Paradise this year.

So it's no wonder fans were left perplexed after Florence Alexandra, 28, shared a social media snap of herself looking decidedly different on Tuesday.

In an image shared to her Instagram Story, Florence looked worlds away from a very similar photo that was uploaded to the Bachelor In Paradise website hours earlier.

What's going on here? Fans were left perplexed after Florence Alexandra, 28, shared a social media snap of herself looking decidedly different on Tuesday (pictured left: official photo, pictured right: Instagram photo)

While there are clear differences between the images- namely the different positioning of her right arm- there are also several subtle details including skin smoothness and brightness. 

In her Instagram snap, Florence's skin looks remarkably smooth and seems to emit a glossy sheen.

Natural creases on Florence's face are also minimised in her Instagram photo, thanks to prominent highlighting around her cheeks, forehead, nose and chin. 

Flawless! Florence is known for her impossibly perfect Instagram snaps and primped complexion 

Controversy: On Sunday night's episode, Florence went head-to-head with former flame Jake Ellis after she questioned his rumoured playboy past on the Gold Coast

On Sunday night's episode, Florence went head-to-head with former flame Jake Ellis after she questioned his rumoured playboy past on the Gold Coast.

Meanwhile, insiders have alleged that, behind the scenes, Florence well and truly 'exploded' over the incident.

Speaking to New Idea this week a source claimed that 'security were called in over her meltdown before she was forced to leave the show'.

Lovers' tiff? According to New Idea, the meltdown was triggered by Florence's previous romantic relationship with Jake (R)

'This is nothing like the Florence people have seen before,' the source revealed to the publication.

According to New Idea, the meltdown was triggered by Florence's previous romantic relationship with Jake.

'I think she thought they would just take-off where they left things, but that didn't go her way,' the insider explained to the magazine.

The publication claimed Florence's breakdown involved 'tears, name calling and even an incident involving security'. 

Claims: The publication claimed Florence's breakdown involved 'tears, name calling and even an incident involving security'

item.title: Busty Iskra Lawrence showcases her incredible curves and perky posterior in emerald green bikini during Miami breakaway
item.description: The striking British model highlighted her enviable curves in the skimpy two-piece as she luxuriated by her abode's dock.
item.content:encoded:
She's an advocate for body confidence and regularly takes to social media to share her empowered message to her plethora of followers.

And Iskra Lawrence, 27, was back to her figure-flaunting ways as she slipped into an eye-catching green bikini while holidaying in Miami Beach, Florida on Monday.

The striking British model highlighted her enviable curves in the skimpy two-piece as she luxuriated by her abode's dock.

Green with envy: Iskra Lawrence, 27, was back to her figure-flaunting ways as she slipped into an eye-catching green bikini while holidaying in Miami Beach, Florida on Monday

The blonde bombshell donned a pair of high-thigh cut bikini bottoms which highlighted her perky derriere and slender pins while she chatted with friends by the water.

Complementing her barely-there two-piece, Iskra left her golden locks loose in a half up, half down style which showcased her large gold hoop earrings.

She continued to accessorise her waterside ensemble with a matching gold necklace while playing football and showcasing a few stretches.  

Her sensational appearance comes after Iskra recently revealed that her own journey of self love was quite the tumultuous affair.

Figure-flaunting: The striking British model highlighted her enviable curves in the skimpy two-piece as she luxuriated by her abode's dock

Cheeky: The blonde bombshell donned a pair of high-thigh cut bikini bottoms which highlighted her perky derriere and slender pins 

Iskra, who is a size 14, also discussed being dropped from her agency after she was deemed'too big' led to her starving herself, as well as a serious case of body dysmorphia.

The beauty also confessed that the 'lack of nourishment' she was giving her body - a result of a number of fad diets - led to 'awful concentration and blurry eyesight.' 

 However, the blonde bombshell has detailed her journey to finally feel confident in her body as she opened up to Fabulous Digital. 

'It’s really detrimental to your mental and physical health doing any kind of extreme fad diet and abusing your body with exercise,' she claimed of trying to fit to modelling industry standards after her 36 inch hips were deemed not ideal at 16.     

Having fun: She continued to accessorise her waterside ensemble with a matching gold necklace while playing football and showcasing a few stretches

Iskra went on to overhaul her health and fitness regime to harmful effects: 'I started to control everything that I ate and became obsessed with calories and measuring myself' she revealed before adding: 'That led to body dysmorphia.'

Iskra, who is now mostly based Stateside due to her fledgling work load, revealed that she received the help she needed from her 'wonderful parents' - who helped her realise 'all the time she wasted trying to fit into something that she wasn't' and ushered her into the world of plus-size modelling. 

The career change completely changed her life and relationship with her body as she realised: 'I wanted to look after myself because I deserved better, that really became the catalyst for change. I changed that narrative in my life - and it didn’t happen overnight.'

Mane attraction: Complementing her barely-there two-piece, Iskra left her golden locks loose in a half up, half down style which showcased her large gold hoop earrings

And Iskra's self confidence is evident for all to see and on Tuesday she chose to flaunt her sensational hourglass physique as she stripped down to a tropical print bikini for a sexy Instagram snap.

Iskra is well-known in the industry for being an advocate of body confidence and embracing your body, whatever its size.

She has also refused to label herself as a plus-size model throughout her career, and has protested against the lack of diversity on the London Fashion Week catwalk.  

Honest: Iskra, who is a size 14, also discussed being dropped from her agency after she was deemed'too big' led to her starving herself, as well as a serious case of body dysmorphia
item.dc:abstract: She's an advocate for body confidence and regularly takes to social media to share her empowered message. And Iskra Lawrence, 27, was back to her figure-flaunting ways as she slipped into an eye-catching green bikini while holidaying in Miami Beach, Florida on Monday.
item.dc:creator: Lisa Mcloughlin
item.mi:shortTitle: Busty Iskra Lawrence showcases her incredible curves in Miami

item.title: Cringe alert! Married At First Sight stars shamelessly plug beauty freebies on social media after their stint on the reality show wraps up
item.description: They were some of the most recognisable reality TV faces while taking part in the latest season of Married At First Sight.
item.content:encoded:
They were some of the most recognisable reality TV faces while taking part in the latest season of Married At First Sight.

And now that the popular dating show has wrapped, it appears many of the 'brides' and 'grooms' are trying to make the most of their 15 minutes of fame.  

Taking to their Instagram accounts, the unlucky-in-love singletons shamelessly flaunted what appeared to be freebies. 

Cringe alert! Married At First Sight stars shamelessly plug beauty freebies on social media after their stint on the reality show wraps up

Troy Delmege's former 'wife'  Ashley Irvin couldn't resist uploading a shot of herself in the midst of a visit to a skin treatment clinic. 

The blonde flight attendant was all smiles as she posed in a moss green T-shirt and rocked peace signs with both hands.

'My first skin needling @laserclinics Carindale. My poor little beetroot face,' she wrote. 

'My poor little beetroot face': Ashley (top) took to Instagram to share a snap of herself  undergoing her first skin needling session

Patrick Miller, who was matched with Charlene Perera on the series, shared a bizarre video on Tuesday sporting a blue mouth guard and bright orange glasses. 

Tagging in Melbourne's Vogue Dental Studios, the 34-year-old looked be undergoing a teeth whitening treatment, with Dr. Deepan Duraisamy.

It's the same dentist that former MAFS stars Nick Furphy and Nadia Stamp  have utilised in the past - with Nick revealing in February he underwent a $25,000 teeth transformation.

All smiles: Patrick Miller (pictured) shared a bizarre video of himself getting what appeared to be a teeth whitening treatment 

'What am I getting done?' Telv (pictured) previously tagged the dentist in an Instagram Story of his own

It seemed to be the dentist of choice for current MAFS stars as well, with co-star Telv Williams previously uploading a snap at the same venue.

FIFO worker Telv shared a snap in similar orange glasses and tagged the same dentist and venue on his Instagram account.

'What am I getting done?' Telv captioned the snap at the time. 

Meanwhile, it's not just  beauty perks that MAFS stars receive.

A Byron Bay Rentals spokesperson confirming to Daily Mail Australia that this season's 'villain'  Davina Rankin received a special rate at the luxuryPavilion 2 at Broken Head thanks to her 'social media influencer' status.

Perks! Meanwhile, a Byron Bay Rentals spokesperson confirming to Daily Mail Australia that this season's 'villain' Davina Rankin received a special rate at the luxury Pavilion 2 at Broken Head thanks to her 'social media influencer' status

Taking to their Instagram accounts, the unlucky-in-love singletons shamelessly flaunted what appeared to be freebies.
