item.title: Kylie Minogue, 49, stuns in a red thigh-high split dress as she belts her classics at amFAR Hong Kong... after CANCELLING all upcoming interviews in Australia to 'rest her voice'
item.description: Kylie Minogue, 49, was seen belting her popular tunes while performing at the amfAR Gala Shaw Studios, Hong Kong on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She made the decision to cancel all her interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia to 'rest her voice.'

Yet Kylie Minogue was seen belting her popular tunes while performing at the amfAR Gala Shaw Studios, Hong Kong on Monday. 

The pop singer, 49, looked in her element on stage as she wowed in a bold red plunging dress with a sexy side split. 

Wow: Kylie Minogue, 49, was seen belting her popular tunes while performing at the amfAR Gala Shaw Studios, Hong Kong on Monday

All eyes were on Kylie as she took to the mic in the figure-skimming scarlet number. 

The number boasted a flirty red lace neckline before cinching in her tiny waist with belted detailing. 

The racy thigh-high split added a further dimension to the look as she strutted around on stage and performed some dance moves. 

Kylie completed the look with a slick of pink gloss on her pout and wore her blonde locks in effortless waves. 

Saucy: The pop singer looked in her element on stage as she wowed in a bold red plunging dress with a sexy side split

Red hot: All eyes were on Kylie as she took to the mic in the figure-skimming scarlet number

Babe: The number boasted a flirty red lace neckline before cinching in her tiny waist with belted detailing

Her striking performances comes after  cancelled all interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia.

The London-based pop sensation is set to arrive in the country this week to perform songs from her highly-anticipated new album, Golden.

But the songstress has opted out of all accompanying promotional interviews, citing illness as the cause for the last-minute cancellation.

Mane attraction: Kylie completed the look with a slick of pink gloss on her pout and wore her blonde locks in effortless waves

Happy: Kylie looked in her element as she strutted around on stage and performed some dance moves.

On Thursday, Kylie is set to take the stage in Sydney for an invitation-only Nova Red Room concert.

A spokesperson told The Daily Telegraph on Tuesday: 'She (Kylie) has a throat infection and needs to rest her voice ahead of the performance'. 

The publication says 'all other commitments are believed to have been spiked until further notice'.

Cancelled: The Daily Telegraph reported on Tuesday that Kylie has pulled out of all promotional interviews during her trip home to Australia this week

Awkward: The news comes less than 48 hours after journalist Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his interview with Kylie, which was broadcast on Sunday night's edition of 60 Minutes

The news comes less than 48 hours after journalist Karl Stefanovic was slammed for his interview with Kylie, which was broadcast on Sunday night's edition of 60 Minutes. 

Viewers branded the Channel Nine star's chat a 'trainwreck' and called for someone more 'professional' to take the helm.

During the chat Karl made Kylie visibly uncomfortable by describing her as 'hot 50-year-old' and asked if she could stop dating 'incredibly good-looking d**kheads'. 

Oh dear: Karl was slammed after he called a 'hot 50-year-old' and told her to stop dating 'd**kheads' in a bizarre interview

Viewers flocked to Twitter to blast the 'rubbish' interview and claimed Karl was using the chat to 'creep' on Kylie.

The Channel Nine personality concluded the interview by bringing out a birthday cake for Kylie and singing to her, in a nod to her 50th in May.

Coming up from behind her, the grinning host gestured at the camera crew and publicists to join in as he serenaded a squirming Kylie.

It's not believed that the poorly-received chat is related to the pop queen's decision to pull the pin on further interviews with Australian journalists.

Backlash: Viewers were less than impressed with Karl's onscreen antics, blasting the 'trainwreck' interview and calling for someone more 'professional' to take the helm
item.dc:abstract: She made the decision to cancel all her interviews during her upcoming trip home to Australia to 'rest her voice.' Yet Kylie Minogue was seen belting her popular tunes while performing at the amfAR Gala Shaw Studios, Hong Kong on Monday. The pop singer, 49, looked in her element on stage as she wowed in a bold red plunging dress with a sexy side split.

item.title: Birthday fun! Jodhi Meares celebrates turning 47 with friends in LA... as ex-husband James Packer continues his mental health battle in Boston rehab
item.description: She's the Australian stunner who found fame as a model and was once married to billionaire James Packer.
item.content:encoded:
She's the Australian stunner who found fame as a model and was once married to billionaire James Packer.

And over the weekend, Jodhi Meares appeared to still be living an enviable life as she celebrated turning 47 in Los Angeles alongside friends Nadia Farifax and James Maas.

Both Jodhi and James Maas took to Instagram to share happy snaps of the celebration, with the latter paying tribute to the model in a heartfelt post.

Birthday fun! Jodhi Meares celebrates turning 47 with friends in LA... as ex-husband James Packer continues his mental health battle in Boston rehab

Alongside a series of photos with the stunner, James Mass wrote: 'Happy Birthday to my one of a kind fellow weirdo and bestie.' 

He added: 'I am so blessed you came into my life and am able to call u family... You’ve taught me so much that I’m so thankful for and will always be my home base..... I truly am better for knowing you.... love you sis love you love you love you.' 

James Mass also posted a short clip of Jodhi, Nadia and another friend Adam Schroeder all enjoying a night out for the TV personality's special day.

Meanwhile, Jodhi took to her own Instagram account to share a snap with fashion blogger friend, captioning it: 'Birthday fun with this magical beauty @nadiafairfax  thank you for the best weekend!'

'I am so blessed you came into my life': Jodhi's friend James Maas (left) posted a series of snaps with the model as he paid tribute to his pal for her birthday

Selfie time! Nadia and James Maas were both along for the celebrations in Los Angeles

'Birthday fun with this magical beauty': Jodhi thanked her fashion blogger friend Nadia Fairfax for an enjoyable weekend

While Jodhi partied in Los Angeles, on the other side of the country was James Packer - who the brunette beauty was married to from 1999 to 2002.

Despite their divorce, the pair are known to have an amicable relationship.  

The casino mogul checked into a mental health facility in Boston last Thursday after sensationally stepping down as director of his gaming empire. 

Still close: Since their divorce, Jodhi and James have enjoyed an amicable relationship (Pictured: The pair attend a Sydney charity event together as  friends in 2015)

The Pavilion at Boston's McLean Hospital is an exclusive 11-bed facility which charges $5000-a-night for its 14-day program. 

The embattled billionaire has been known to battle anxiety and depression and has suffered a tough year, including a highly publicised relationship breakdown  with singer Mariah Carey

 'Mr Packer is suffering from mental health issues. At this time he intends to step back from all commitments,' a Packer spokesman previously said in an emailed statement. 

Health battle: James checked into a mental health facility in Boston last Thursday after sensationally stepping down as director of his gaming empire
item.dc:abstract: She's the Australian stunner who found fame as a model and was once married to billionaire James Packer. And over the weekend, Jodhi Meares appeared to still be living an enviable life as she celebrated turning 47 in Los Angeles alongside friends Nadia Farifax and James Maas. Both Jodhi and James Maas took to Instagram to share happy snaps of the celebration, with the latter paying tribute to the model in a heartfelt post.
item.dc:creator: Erin Doyle
item.mi:shortTitle: Jodhi Meares celebrates birthday in LA while James Packer is in rehab

item.title: 'She is just sour and a little brat': Bachelor In Paradise reject Davey Lloyd hits back at Leah Costa after his former date mocked his abrupt departure on the show
item.description: Bachelor In Paradise reject Davey Lloyd, 28, calls his former co-star Leah Costa, 25, 'sour' and a 'little brat'.
item.content:encoded:
Bachelor In Paradise reject Davey Lloyd had a few choice words for Leah Costa on Tuesday.

The 28-year-old, who abruptly departed the show the night prior, told Mamamia that his former co-star is 'sour' and a 'little brat'.

Leah, who shared a smooch with Davey before he moved onto Florence Alexandra, took a swipe at her former date in an Instagram post on Monday. 

Scroll down for video 

'She is just sour and a little brat': Bachelor In Paradise reject Davey Lloyd, 28, hit back at Leah Costa, 25, in an interview with Mamamia on Tuesday, after his former date mocked his abrupt departure on the show

'I think she is just sour. She just realised what was actually going on, that I was interested in Flo over her and regretted taking her on a date,' Davey told Mamamia.

'She knew it all though, we even had an argument about it where I told her if I had my chance again, I would've picked Flo,' the Sydney-based lad continued.

Davey went on to say that at the end of the day, Leah is 'just a little brat sometimes.'  

Reflection: Davey, who locked lips with Leah before moving onto co-star Florence Alexandra, told the site: 'I think she is just sour. She just realised what was actually going on, that I was interested in Flo over her and regretted taking her on a date' 

Following Davey's abrupt departure from Bachelor In Paradise on Monday night's episode, Leah, 25, took to her Instagram Story to take a swipe at her former date. 

Sharing a snap of herself with a humourless expression, the Melbourne socialite poked fun at Davey's inability to score a rose.

'The face when Davey goes home and you know the truth behind it all,' Leah wrote.

Getting in another hit in the hash-tag, she then wrote: 'Player got played'.

'Player got played!' Leah took a swipe at Davey via her Instagram Story on Monday, after the 'player' was forced to make an early exit from Bachelor In Paradise

'Player got played': Leah seem too sad that Davey was booted from the island

The first rose ceremony in Fiji was a dramatic affair with the fate of the players left in the women's hands. 

With seven roses to hand out and nine hopeful men, the two men not offered roses would be sent home from paradise. 

Failing to find a connection with Davey on their brief date, Leah bypassed the Sydney-based suitor and instead gave her rose to Mackane Reid.

No spark? Leah and Davey were the first to share a kiss but their romance was short-lived

And although Florence showed keen interest for Davey early on, it appeared the Dutch stunner couldn't get over the fact he had chosen Leah for time alone instead of her.

She also had history with Georgia Love's former beau Jake Ellis and was torn over whether to pick him or Davey.

Florence ultimately chose to see if her already existing spark with Jake would turn into something more, which left Davey packing his bags.

Sticking around: Leah bypassed Davey at the rose ceremony and instead asked Mackane Reid [pictured] to stay

Leah, who shared a smooch with Davey before he moved onto Florence Alexandra, took a swipe at her former date in an Instagram post on Monday.

item.title: Ready for her close-up! Bachelor In Paradise star Megan Marx gets a liquid nose job prior to filming reality show... as results of procedure are posted to Instagram
item.description: Bachelor In Paradise star Megan Marx, 29, debuts her new nose, after having filler injected into her cheekbones and lips.
item.content:encoded:
She proudly showed off her contoured cheekbones and plumped-up lips after a visit to a cosmetic clinic earlier this month.

But this isn't the first time Bachelor In Paradise star Megan Marx has dramatically altered her look.

A before-and-after snap, captured to Instagram in May last year, reveals the 29-year-old had filler injections in her nose.

Scroll down for video 

Ready for her close-up! Bachelor In Paradise star Megan Marx gets a liquid nose job prior to filming reality show... as results of procedure are posted to Instagram 

Otherwise known as a 'liquid nose job', the photo was shared to cosmetic clinic Medical Aesthetics Geraldton's Instagram page. 

A less invasive option to a surgical nose job, filler are injected along the bridge of the nose for a more streamline appearance.

Megan, who goes makeup-free in the photos, reveals a noticeable change in her side profile.

Subtle, but noticeable tweaks: A less invasive option to a surgical nose job, filler is injected along the bridge of the nose for a more streamline appearance 

The result: Megan, who goes makeup-free in the photos, draws attention to a noticeable change in her side profile 

The post reveals that the swimsuit model had the procedure done prior to filming spin-off Bachelor In Paradise.

Earlier this month, Megan proudly proudly unveiled her contoured visage and told Instagram fans that her decision to have cosmetic procedures was necessary as she approaches 30.

'...I really really needed some skin intervention! Thank you Maisie @star_cosmetic_medicine for my new cheekbones and lips and smooth AF face,' she captioned the photo.

Body of work: The swimsuit model proudly showed off her contoured cheekbones and plumped-up lips after a visit to a cosmetic clinic earlier this month 

'God knows nearing thirty that I can't keep this up myself!!!' Megan added. 

The cosmetic enhancements will clearly be evident when she makes her debut on spin-off Bachelor In Paradise.

Trailers for the Channel Ten dating series, show the ex-girlfriend of Tiffany Scanlon locking lips with Elora Murger, and getting close to former Bachelorette star Jake Ellis.   

Pucker up: The procedures were taken ahead of filming spin-off Bachelor In Paradise. A trailer for the series sees Megan locking lips with Elora Murger

But this isn't the first time Bachelor In Paradise star Megan Marx has dramatically altered her look. item.title: 'I hate this pic of me!' Keira Maguire hits out at Bachelor In Paradise promo photo... after confessing she had 'too much lip filler' before appearing on the reality show
item.description: She's no stranger to taking to social media to post endless snaps and videos of herself.
item.content:encoded:
She's no stranger to taking to social media to post endless snaps and videos of herself.

But it seems as though Keira Maguire is quite particular with what content she chooses to put on the world wide web.

Commenting on a recent image of herself on the Bachelor In Paradise's Instagram page, the 31-year-old revealed she didn't approve of the shot.

Scroll down for video  

'I hate this pic of me!' Keira Maguire hits out at Bachelor In Paradise promo photo... after confessing she had 'too much lip filler' before appearing on the reality show 

'I hate this pic of me,' she commented. 

The photo of Keira saw the reality villain flaunt her ample surgically enhanced cleavage in a pink cold-shoulder dress.

Cinched in at the waist, it featured ruffles and long sleeves. 

Serial Instagrammer: Keira's no stranger to taking to social media to post endless snaps and videos of herself

Her hair was out and styled into loose waves, while her makeup drew attention to her incredibly pump pout.

And it appeared as though some fans shared the same unimpressed views with Keira.

'Shes now just another plastic product created by the billion dollar cosmetics industry making muppets out of a young dumb impressionables brainwashed into thinking they NEED to fill their bodies with plastic and poison in order to look "beautiful" and feel better about themselves,' wrote one. 

However, others failed to see what Keira was unhappy with, calling her a queen. 

'Keira is honestly such a queen and changed heaps! She is so sweet,' commented another. 

Not one to shy away from confrontation and the truth, on Sunday the reality star confessed she may have over-filled her lips before appearing on the show.

'Maybe I had a bit too much' Not one to shy away from confrontation and the truth, on Sunday the reality star confessed she may have over-filled her lips before appearing on the show

'Maybe I had a bit too much lip filler before the show, you will see it,' she told the Sunday Telegraph. 

'I'm not going to deny it and I may have had some regrets about it when I see it, but what am I going to do?' 

Confessing to having had Botox, fillers as well as breast and nose augmentations, the star has previously confirmed she's spent more than $35,000 refining her looks with cosmetic surgery.

Before and after: Confessing to having had Botox, fillers as well as breast and nose augmentations, the star has previously confirmed she's spent more than $35,000 refining her looks with cosmetic surgery

item.title: 'Time to water them plants!': Ireland Baldwin showcases her curves in skimpy bathing suit as she gets soaked from garden hose
item.description: She's a saucy snap connoisseur. And Ireland Baldwin proved on trend as she posted a risque snap that left little to the imagination via Instagram on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She's a saucy snap connoisseur.

And Ireland Baldwin proved on trend as she posted a risque photo that left little to the imagination via Instagram on Monday.

The 22-year-old model showcased her enviable figure in a skimpy bathing suit as she captioned the pic: 'Time to water them plants!'

Getting soaked: Ireland Baldwin, 22, posted a risque snap that left little to the imagination via Instagram on Monday

Daring to impress, the natural beauty put her ample assets on center stage as the suit proved form fitting especially around the chest.

Her pert derriere was on full display as the snug suit cut high on her hips and the snap featured a rear view of her flawless figure.

She kept her trademark blonde tresses long and swept over one shoulder as they were soaked from the garden hose. 

Highlighting her natural good looks, the California native went virtually makeup free with just a dab of berry lipstick.  

Double trouble: Ireland also posted it on her Instagram story account

Ireland has shared several racy posts to her Instagram page; she has more than 386,000 followers. 

The stunner is the daughter of Alec Baldwin, 59, and his actress ex-wife Kim Basinger, 64.

The blonde beauty is also cousins with famous model Hailey Baldwin.

Strike a pose: Ireland shared another revealing pic last week

And despite breaking into the same industry, Ireland insisted there is no rivalry with her strikingly good looking cousin, according to an interview with Hollywood Life.

'Honestly, me and Hailey have such a different brand and look,' she explained.

'We just are interested in different things, and she’s absolutely stunning. When I see her in person — she’s still my little cousin. We still rag on each other and joke around and we’re family. That’s really how it is,' Ireland added.

 In the blood:The stunner is the daughter of Alec Baldwin, 59, and his actress ex-wife Kim Basinger, 64

item.title: Is that her secret? Bachelor in Paradise's Megan Marx is left with a VERY red face after undergoing painful-looking cosmelan face procedure ahead of her debut on the tropical island
item.description: She's set to shake things up when she arrives in Fiji in next week's episodes of Bachelor in Paradise.
item.content:encoded:
She's set to shake things up when she arrives in Fiji in next week's episodes of Bachelor in Paradise.

And it appears Megan Marx was making sure she looked her best while on the hunt for romance.

Images have emerged on Instagram showing the blonde bombshell's skin transformation as she underwent a Cosmelan treatment ahead of her stint in the series. 

Face value! Bachelor in Paradise's Megan Marx undergoes painful-looking cosmelan procedure ahead of her debut on the Fiji-based show

The post, uploaded by Medical Aesthetics Geraldton, featured a series of 'progress' photos which show Megan's face during various stages of the treatment .

Megan's skin appear red and tender in several early images before  the end result photos show the stunner looking fresh-faced and flawless.

The caption explained: 'As you can see there is a bit of down time-first 10 to 14 days being the most acute stage as far as redness, discomfort, swelling & peeling.'

Flawless: Before she arrived in Fiji, the blonde bombshell underwent a skin treatment

'After that the magic of cosmelan really starts to appear-reduction of large pigmentation patches & many other anti-ageing benefits such as tightening & brightening,' the caption continued.

However, Megan didn't just rely on a cosmelan treatment in order to obtain her stunning complexion.

'Prior to cosmelan Megs had a course of @factor_4 prp anti-ageing serum treatments,' the clinic added. 

Gorgeous! Megan Marx regularly flaunts her flawless complexion on social media

Steamy! Promos for Bachelor in Paradise show Megan locking lips with Elora Murger

Promo videos for Bachelor in Paradise hint that Megan's time in Fiji will be steamy,

She was seen locking lips with co-star  Elora Murger underneath a cascading waterfall and is rumoured to be embroiled in a romance with Jake Ellis.

Her reported fling with Jake could cause drama on the island, given Jake and Florence Alexandra have already admitted to having romantic history.

Trouble in paradise? Megan is rumoured to strike up a romance with Jake Ellis (right), who also has history with Florence Alexandra

item.title: 'Hope I don't get poisoned': MAFS' Troy Delmege cooks a stomach-churning dinner for Carly Bowyer... after being mocked by Woolworths for making mince and raw sauce without any pasta
item.description: Fans of Married At First Sight are well aware that Troy Delmege isn't the best cook.
item.content:encoded:
Fans of Married At First Sight are well aware that Troy Delmege isn't the best cook.

And this week, the series 'oddball' had another whirl in the kitchen, making new girlfriend Carly Bowyer a stomach-churning meal. 

It comes after Troy was mocked by Woolworths for making 'ex-wife,' Ashley Irvin a bizarre meal of mince and raw sauce on the show - without any pasta.

Scroll down for video

'Hope I don't get poisoned': MAFS' Troy Delmege cooks a stomach-churning dinner for Carly Bowyer...after being mocked by Woolworths for making mince and raw sauce without any pasta

Chef Troy! Carly took to her Instagram story to share video of Troy cooking, as she laughs and pokes fun at him

Carly took to her Instagram story to share video of Troy cooking as she laughs and pokes fun at him.   

'Here we go... let's hope I'm not poisoned tomorrow,' Carly said. 

Troy cooked apricot chicken with rice and green vegetables.  

He joked: 'Cooking A'La Troy...As succulent as you can get. Carly is one lucky girlfriend.'  

It remains unclear whose kitchen the pair are in, or if it is their new place, after they revealed they are moving in together. 

Finished product: Troy cooked apricot chicken with rice and green vegetables

Smitten: He joked: 'Cooking A'La Troy...As succulent as you can get. Carly is one lucky girlfriend'

In February, when Married At First Sight was still on-air, supermarket chain Woolworths took a not-so-subtle dig at Troy's ability to plate up decent pasta.

The 'Fresh Food People' took to their Instagram to share a sponsored post that showed a white bowl filled with nothing but mince - much like the pasta-less dish Troy served to Ashley on the show.  

Extra shade was thrown at the reality hopeful with the words: 'Pasta A' La Troy,' which was augmented with an 'OK' emoji.

They also captioned the image with a simple 'date night?' and a laughing face emoji.

The ribbing didn't end there with the retail giant even offering the method on how to construct correct bolognese.

Bringing the laughs: Supermarket chain Woolworths has taken a not-so-subtle dig at Married At First Sight star Troy Delmege's ability to plate up a decent pasta

Pasta optional: The retail giant even offered the method on how to construct correct bolognese

'How to *properly* make this pasta' they wrote. 'Step 1: add onion to fry pan. Step 2: Add mince and cook until brown. Step 3: Add pasta sauce whilst mince is in the frypan. Step 4: cook pasta (optional).'

The post was met with a flurry of guffaws with one follower chiming in with: 'Woolworths roasting Troy has made my Thursday morning so great.' 

Another offered: 'Still looks better than his and it's literally a plate of meat and sauce.'

Troy's dish left ex Ashley with a bad taste in her mouth.

Cooking with passion: He plated up a portion of cooked mince on which he dumped a jar of raw tomato sauce

He plated up a portion of cooked mince on which he dumped a jar of raw tomato sauce.

Working his magic in the kitchen, he called out to Ashley: 'I'm making mince! The best mince you've ever had in your life.' 

Troy also realised he'd forgotten to buy the fettuccine for the dish - prompting Ashley to state: 'You've literally forgotten the main ingredient.'

Troy replied laughing: 'It's honestly like I've had a mental block. Pasta A'La Troy.' 

When presented with the unappealing dish, Ashley declared: 'I can say I've never had a meal like this in my whole life.' 

Looking for a silver lining, Troy replied: 'I mean, it's not going to kill you,' to which Ashley quipped: 'I wish it would.' 

Down the hatch: Looking for a silver lining, Troy replied: 'I mean, it's not going to kill you,' to which Ashley quipped: 'I wish it would'

It comes after Troy was mocked by Woolworths for making 'ex-wife,' Ashley Irvin, a bizarre meal of mince and raw sauce on the show - without any pasta.

item.title: 'Things are really strained now': Claims Richard Wilkins 'is done' with co-star Karl Stefanovic and is 'counting down to the end of his time in the chair' after being wounded by Today host's b**chy Uber rant
item.description: He is said to be hurt and wounded after Karl Stefanovic's bombshell 'b**chy' Uber rant was revealed last week.
item.content:encoded:
He is said to be hurt after Karl Stefanovic's bombshell 'b**chy' Uber rant was revealed last week.

And according to Woman's Day magazine, entertainment reporter Richard Wilkins 'is done' with the Today show host, and is 'counting down to the end of his time in the chair'.

Once part of Karl's inner circle, the magazine reports that 'things are really strained now' between the pair. 

'Things are really strained now': Claims Richard Wilkins 'is done' with co-star Karl Stefanovic and is 'counting down to the end of his time in the chair' after being wounded by Today host's b**chy Uber rant 

'This time he's done - word is he's just doing his job and counting down to the end of Karl's time in the chair,' a source told the publication. 

Last week The Daily Telegraph reported that Richard was the most upset by the Today show host's 'b**chy' Uber rant.

The 63-year-old's close friend was overhead complaining to brother Peter Stefanovic of the entertainment journalist's reluctance to share work contacts. 

The Daily Telegraph claimed on Monday that Richard has been the most 'hurt by the sledge' and 'was noticeably subdued on this morning's program.'

While Richard is said to be the most affected by the explosive phone chat, they claim Karl's co-host Georgie Gardner has taken the diss in her stride, and responded with 'decorum and grace.'

Daily Mail Australia has reached out to Richard for comment.  

Going on a rant: According to reports, Karl was heard complaining to brother Peter, 36, of Richard's reluctance to share insider knowledge, and having 'kept all the entertainment contacts close to his chest'

According to New Idea, Karl was heard complaining to brother Peter, 36, of Richard's reluctance to share insider knowledge and having 'kept all the entertainment contacts close to his chest.'

The father-of-three was also allegedly overheard by the Uber driver accusing Georgie of 'sitting on the fence' and needing to 'step up' if she 'wanted to stay on the show.' 

Karl and Peter also allegedly spoke about Nine News and Current Affairs head honcho Darren Wick, Today's Mark Calvert and 60 Minutes' Kirsty Thomson during their chat, which took place when Peter was in an Uber and speaking to his brother Karl on loudspeaker.  

Explaining how he overheard the conversation, the Uber driver told New Idea: 'It was Pete and his wife Sylvia (Jeffreys) who jumped into my cab late one night. He called Karl and told him he was in a cab and that he was on speakerphone so they were all aware I was there and could hear everything.'

Diss: Karl was also allegedly overheard by the Uber driver accusing co-host Georgie Gardner, 46, of 'sitting on the fence' and needing to 'step up' if she 'wanted to stay on the show'

Following the explosive claims, Woman's Day reported that Nine executives went into damage control.

The publication reported on Monday: 'There were crisis meetings about it last week.' 

Karl and Peter have since offered their apologies in a statement published in The Sunday Telegraph. 

'We are sorry. I was angry with myself at first that I could be so stupid,' said Karl over the weekend, before adding that Georgie was 'the best thing to happen to the show in years.' 

Damage control: Karl and Peter [pictured] have since offered their apologies in a statement published in The Sunday Telegraph: 'We are sorry. I was angry with myself at first that I could be so stupid'
item.dc:abstract: He is said to be hurt and wounded after Karl Stefanovic's bombshell 'b**chy' Uber rant was revealed last week. And according to Woman's Day magazine, entertainment reporter Richard Wilkins is 'counting down to the end of the Today show host's time in the chair'. Once part of Karl's inner circle, the magazine reports that 'things are really strained now' between Richard and Karl.

item.title: Peter Andre as you've never seen him before! Squeaky clean star sports track marks as he transforms into tattooed and pierced heroin addict for gritty movie role
item.description: Peter Andre has proven his rising acting prowess by transforming into a heroin addict for his new short independent film, The Inheritance.
item.content:encoded:
He is known for his squeaky clean image, having soared to global prominence with his catchy pop hit, Mysterious Girl, in 1996. 

But Peter Andre has proven his rising acting prowess by transforming into a heroin addict for his new short independent film, The Inheritance.

Heavily tattooed with a slew of piercings and track marks on his arms, the singer, 45, proves to be a far cry from his usual look in intense new stills from the set in Los Angeles.  

Is that you, Peter? Andre, 45, has proven his rising acting prowess by transforming into a heroin addict for his new short independent film, The Inheritance

Clearly his new passion project, Peter seems to have given the role his all as he shocks in the new stills. 

Dressed in a grey vest and blue jeans, the British born-Australia raised star sports a series of dramatic inkings, as well as ear and lip piercings. 

Peter is also seen with spiky locks, which shows off the tattoo on the side of his face, and also has track marks on his arm.

Playing the troubled character of Harry, a suicidal heroin act, in other stills the father-of-four cuts a distressed figure while a bottle of whiskey is propped on the floor next to him.

Transformation: He is known for his squeaky clean image, (R) having soared to global prominence with his catchy pop hit, Mysterious Girl, in 1996

Unrecognisable: Heavily tattooed with a slew of piercings and track marks on his arms, the singer proves to be a far cry from his usual look in intense new stills from the set in Los Angeles

Looks the part: Dressed in a grey vest and blue jeans, the British born-Australia raised star sports a series of dramatic inkings, as well as ear and lip piercings

A romance in the new flick is also teased as Peter is joined by a stunning red-headed actress.

Speaking about the exciting new venture in his New! magazine column recently, Peter revealed: I had a great time filming in Los Angeles.

'I've got the acting bug. Although it can be full-on, I can honestly say shooting was an incredible experience. It was intense and very dark. I can't wait to see the edit.

'Becoming the character took months of preparing and thankfully it paid off. I'll be going back later in the year to film more.

'In fact, it looks like I'm going to be spending a lot more time in America, this year, so I'm lucky to have such, trusting wife and family,' he concluded. 

Role: Playing the troubled character of Harry, a suicidal heroin act, in other stills he can be seen cutting a distressed figure while a bottle of whiskey is propped on the floor next to him

Tat's cool: Peter is also seen with spiky locks, which shows off the tattoo on the side of his face

It has also been reported by The Sun that Hollyoaks and EastEnders star Jamie Lomas has been 'secretly tutoring him for the past six months.' 

'Pete hasn't been able to reveal too much about the movie script but the character is absolutely nothing like him.'

Peter is also lending his acting talents to a new flick The Underdog which has commenced production this month. 

Meanwhile, Peter's stunning other half Emily McDonagh has been looking after their children Millie and Theo back in England. 

Helping hand: It has also been reported that Hollyoaks and EastEnders star Jamie Lomas has been 'secretly tutoring him for the past six months'

Taking to her OK! column, she confessed: 'I only get a set number of annual leave days, so would rather use those when we can go away with the kids or spend quality time together.

'He's working 16-hour days out there, so we wouldn't get to spend any time together.'  

Meanwhile, it was recently revealed that Emily no longer approaches Peter in the bedroom, after discovering he was broody. 

Saucy: A romance in the new flick is also teased as Peter is joined by a stunning red-headed actress

'Becoming the character took months of preparing': Peter also spoke about the exciting new venture in his New! magazine column 

Speaking to OK!, the TV personality said of his desire for a fifth child: 'I don't need to say it now, she just knows. That's why she doesn't go anywhere near me in bed. She's like: "Stay over there".' 

Peter added: 'It's kind of weird, isn't it? Especially as I was like so "never again" as I was having seven espressos a day and still struggling!' 

Peter and Emily first met when her doctor father Ruaraidh treated the singer for kidney stones back in 2010, but they did not embark on romance until 2012.

Three years later, the lovebirds exchanged vows in a romantic ceremony at Mamhead House, in Exeter in July 2015.

The happy couple have since welcomed two children together - daughter Amelia, four, and son Theodore, one. 

'I only get a set number of annual leave': Meanwhile, Peter's stunning other half Emily McDonagh has been looking after their children Millie and Theo back in England

But Peter Andre has proven his rising acting prowess by transforming into a heroin addict for his new short independent film, The Inheritance. Heavily tattooed with a slew of piercings and track marks on his arms, the singer, 45, proves to be a far cry from his usual look in intense new stills from the set in Los Angeles.

item.title: 'This is nothing like the Flo people have seen before': Security 'called in over Florence Alexandra's MELTDOWN on Bachelor In Paradise before she was reportedly forced to leave the show'
item.description: This week insiders revealed Florence Alexandra 'exploded' over her hot and cold relationship with Jake on the spin-off series.
item.content:encoded:
Florence Alexandra got into a lovers tiff with Jake Ellis on Sunday night's Bachelor In Paradise premiere after she questioned his rumoured playboy past on the Gold Coast.

And this week insiders revealed that behind the scenes Florence Alexandra well and truly 'exploded' over the incident. 

A source told New Idea that 'security were called in over her meltdown before she was forced to leave the show'.

Scroll down for video  

'This is nothing like the Flo people have seen before': Security 'called in over Florence Alexander's MELTDOWN on Bachelor In Paradise before she was reportedly forced to leave the show' 

'This is nothing like the Florence people have seen before,' the source revealed to the publication. 

According to New Idea, the meltdown was triggered by Florence's previous romantic relationship with Jake. 

'I think she thought they would just take-off where they left things, but that didn't go her way,' the insider explained to the magazine. 

The publication claims Florence's breakdown involved 'tears, name calling and even an incident involving security'.

Not-so-sunny-disposition! The publication claims Florence's breakdown involved 'tears, name calling and even an incident involving security'

According to producers, Florence was ultimately sent packing after she didn't receive a rose.

These explosive claims come after the blonde beauty received a shock on Sunday night's premiere when she was warned to stay away from Jake.  

Florence was told not to trust Jake by Tara Pavlovic, who revealed he had a reputation on the Gold Coast as a 'ladies man'.

'I live on the Gold Coast and everyone has been there,' Tara told a stunned Florence.

'I live on the Gold Coast and everyone has been there!' Tara Pavlovic warned Florence Alexander about Jake Ellis on Sunday's Bachelor In Paradise premiere

She then said that so many people ask 'Have you got a Jake Ellis story?', implying that the handsome marketing manager had been around the block.

Speaking privately to the camera, Tara said: 'A lot of people I know, know Jake.'

She continued: 'He's a nice guy, happy to have a conversation with him. Would I date him? Absolutely not.' 

'Have you got a Jake Ellis story?' Tara said that many people on the Gold Coast have a 'story' about being with Jake, causing Florence to become concerned 

Florence later expressed her fears that the whispers were true, which caused her to get into a fight with Jake after she confronted him about it.

It seems that the Dutch stunner was right to be concerned, as shortly after the episode aired The Bachelor's Jen Hawke took to Instagram to remind fans that she has her very own Jake Ellis story.

'Who do I know other than Flo that has a Jake Ellis story?' Jen said sarcastically.

'Who do I know other than Flo that has a Jake Ellis story?' Shortly after the episode aired The Bachelor's Jen Hawke took to Instagram to remind fans that she had a fling with Jake

She then followed the question by posting a photo of herself with Jake, which was accompanied by a poll that asked users: 'Do you have a Jake Ellis story?'

Jen and Jake dated for around five months in 2016, but the pair split right before Jen joined The Bachelor. 

The 28-year-old also dated The Bachelorette's Blake Colman.

I do! It seems that the Dutch stunner was right to be concerned, as shortly after the episode aired The Bachelor's Jen Hawke took to Instagram to remind fans that she has her very own Jake Ellis story

item.title: 'Mommy and Daddy': Khloe Kardashian shares yet another naked bump photo with Tristan Thompson... only this time he's cradling her tummy
item.description: In this snap, the beauty is having her large baby bump - she is due in early April - held by her beau Tristan Thompson of the Cleveland Cavaliers as they stand in a kitchen.
item.content:encoded:
Khloe Kardashian has been sharing several sexy images from a pregnancy photo shoot done by her friend Sasha Samsonova.

And on Monday the 33-year-old uploaded a brand-new image to her Instagram account.

In this snap, the beauty is having her large baby bump - she is due in early April - held by her beau Tristan Thompson of the Cleveland Cavaliers as they stand in a kitchen with beautiful Spanish tiles.

Sharing even more: Khloe Kardashian posted this naked bump photo with beau Tristan Thompson on Monday that was taken by her friend Sasha Samsonova

The image looks like their pregnancy announcement photo

Khloe captioned the  eye-popping photo, 'Mommy and daddy.'

Like in previous photos from the same set, Khloe has on a black lace bra and matching undies and has put her very large bump on full display.

The TV sensation looked stunning with her long blonde locks worn down in Malibu waves and her makeup done to perfection.

In her first bump shot from the set, she flashed a leg as she wore a long black coat off her shoulders.

Stunning: The 33-year-old siren shared a very glamorous baby bump shot to Instagram on Wednesday

The Revenge Body star was outside on a patio with plants everywhere.

And in the second shot she was in bed with Tristan placing a hand on her thigh. 

This new post comes just days after the looker took to Snapchat to discuss food. The siren revealed what she's been feeding that bump.

The Good American designer gave fans a look at the fried chicken and biscuits she was digging into to fulfill her cravings. 'Popeyes Louisiana Chicken, I love you,' the star wrote over the image. 'Thank you.'

Two cute: The Revenge Body star was seen with beau Thompson in bed in this image shared on Thursday

She had a large box of 24 large biscuits and a box of friend chicken placed on her dining room table.

Her hand was also seen going into a bag that contained condiments.

'I am starving! I sort of want Popeyes,' she tweeted the night before. 'I’m not sure though LOL the struggle is real.'

But then she gave in. 'Ok that fulfilled every craving I’ve been having for Popeyes over the past couple days,' the star tweeted.

'Letting the food craving build up is actually better. I’m so satisfied now. Yum yum! I feel guilty but GREAT.'

No a salad: Khloe gave her health food a break to dig into friend chicken and biscuits on Thursday

 'Popeyes Louisiana Chicken, I love you,' the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star wrote over the image. 'Thank you'

Khloe is due very soon so it's no wonder she's letting herself enjoy her pregnancy to the fullest before she welcomes the child.

No doubt the looker will have to be on a diet as soon as her little girl is welcomed into the world due to the pressure that comes with being a representative of the Kardashian empire. 

Last week Khloe wrote about her pregnancy on her pay site Khloewithak.com. 

'Being pregnant has always been a dream of mine. Even though 9 months feels like a lifetime while I'm awaiting the arrival of my baby girl, it's really a blink in the grand scheme of life,' she began.

'I know I'm going to miss my belly so much once she's here, I had to capture the beautiful process that is pregnancy so I can always look back at this time. Thank you Sasha Samsonova for this special photo shoot! Also, shout-out to my glam team who helped me look and feel like a goddess: Hrush, Andrew and Jill.'  

Busy mama: Last week the LA native launched her Good Mama maternity line, which is an offshoot of Good American

The daughter of Kris Jenner - who has said she has not yet found a name for her baby girl - has been very active during her pregnancy.

She has not only launched her Good Mama maternity line, which is an offshoot of Good American, but she has also kept up with her social media posts.   

In mid March, Khloe's sisters and mother were all in attendance at her extravagant Los Angeles baby shower, which was held back-to-back with Tristan's birthday party.

item.title: 'You're sexy!' Bachelor In Paradise's Keira Maguire flirts up a storm with Jarrod Woodgate after he calls Ali Oetjen 'God's gift'... as bisexual Megan Marx makes a play for the girls
item.description: The plastic surgery fanatic, 31, is seen wrapping her arms around Jarrod and calling him 'sexy' - after the hunk admitted he thought newcomer Ali Oetjen was 'God's gift'.
item.content:encoded:
They've been happily dating for several months since meeting in Fiji last year while filming Bachelor In Paradise.

And the beginning of Keira Maguire and Jarrod Woodgate's romance has been revealed for the first time in a teaser for Tuesday's episode of the dating show.

The plastic surgery fanatic, 31, is seen wrapping her arms around Jarrod and calling him 'sexy' - after the hunk admitted he thought newcomer Ali Oetjen was 'God's gift.'

Scroll down for video 

'You're sexy!' Bachelor In Paradise's Keira Maguire flirts up a storm with Jarrod Woodgate in a teaser clip from Tuesday's episode 

When Ali, a former Miss Universe South Australia, walks into the resort, Jarrod admits he feels an instant attraction.

'Ali has just walked in and that's all we're really focusing on right now,' he gushes. 'Her smile is gods gift. Wow.'

But the vineyard manager soon gets distracted by Keira, who is seen flirting and packing on the PDA with him in the clip.

Hugging him and giggling into his neck, a giddy Keira whispers, 'you're sexy' as Jarrod laughs appreciatively.

Awkward: The plastic surgery fanatic, 31, is seen wrapping her arms around Jarrod and calling him 'sexy' - after the hunk admitted he thought newcomer Ali Oetjen (pictured) was 'God's gift'

'She's all we're focusing on': When Ali, a former Miss Universe South Australia, walks into the resort, Jarrod admits he feels an instant attraction

Jarrod, who was described as a stage 5 clinger on Sophie Monk's season of The Bachelorette, soon finds himself the object of two women's affections. 

'I think they call it a love triangle? Yeah I was in it,' he quips to the camera.

Another contestant who will enter the resort on Tuesday is Megan Marx, who previously dated Tiffany Scanlon.

The blonde beauty admits she's open to dating both sexes in the villa, revealing: 'I like girls and guys. I don't know if any of the girls are going to swing my way but if they do...'

She's found her target! But the vineyard manager soon gets distracted by Keira, who is seen flirting and packing on the PDA with him in the clip

Steamy: Hugging him and giggling into his neck, a giddy Keira whispers, 'you're sexy' as Jarrod laughs appreciatively

Elsewhere in the clip, Florence Alexandra admits she's having second thoughts about giving a rose to her ex-fling Jake Ellis.

The Dutch beauty, 27, confesses: 'To be honest I do regret giving Jake a rose - so what am I going to do? This is horrible.'

She's seen looking upset and storming off, before yelling in frustration: 'I'm never going to end up with that guy.'

Interesting... Elsewhere, newcomer Megan Marx reveals she's open to dating guys and girls

item.title: A secret location less than two hours from Sydney offering waterfall views and idyllic walks: Inside Rachael Finch's eco-friendly 'tiny house' vacation at just $274-a-night
item.description: An inside look at model and television personality Rachael Finch's 'tiny house' vacation, two hours south of Sydney.
item.content:encoded:
She's a model, television personality and budding entrepreneur.

But Rachael Finch is not all about glitz and glamour, having chosen to stay at a $274-a-night 'tiny house' in the Southern Highlands, just short of a two-hour drive from Sydney, over the weekend.

Joined by husband Michael Miziner and their two children, the 29-year-old enjoyed a stay at the 'Edmond' property, that takes up just 15 square metres. 

A secret location less than two hours from Sydney offering waterfall views and idyllic walks: Inside Rachael Finch's eco-friendly 'tiny house' vacation at just $274-a-night. Rachael is pictured with husband Michael Miziner 

Offering a private sanctuary for guests, the humble abode's exact location is only disclosed once a booking has been made.

Located just short of a two-hour drive from Sydney, the eco-friendly house offers stunning waterfall views and plenty of opportunity for idyllic walks.

Accommodating just two to four people with one queen bed and two single beds, the space contains one bathroom, a compact kitchen and lounge, and has a barbecue area outside.

Country retreat: Occupying just 15 square metres, the humble home is per fect for those wanting to unwind and 'switch off'

Rich hues: The facade takes on a charcoal colour palette and features a corrugated iron roof 

Decor: Meanwhile the interior takes on a much lighter note with white walls, pine wood and bold yellow cushions 

While the facade takes on a charcoal colour palette with a corrugated iron roof, the interior is much lighter with white walls, pine wood and canary yellow cushions.

Perfect for those wanting to 'switch off', the home and surrounding area only offers limited phone reception. 

Rachael took to Instagram after her trip on Sunday to document one of her intense outdoor workouts completed during her country getaway.

Details: The property contains one bathroom and a compact kitchen, with a timber stairwell leading up to a bedroom 

Sleeping arrangements: Two single beds also feature in the living area 

For the adults: A queen bed takes up space upstairs 

Sporting a blue crop top and black minuscule workout shorts, the fitness fantastic showed off her toned arms, washboard stomach and trim pins.

Breaking out into a sweat, Rachael had her signature brunette locks swept into an effortless topknot and appeared to go makeup-free.

The beauty went through a sequence consisting of jumping lunges, push-ups and reverse jumping jacks, all to strengthen the core.

Trim and terrific: Shortly after her trip, Rachael took to Instagram to share an intense workout, completed during her weekend getaway. The fitness fanatic showed off her toned arms, washboard stomach and trim pins in a blue crop top and black minuscule workout shorts

Rachael met her professional dancer husband on the 2010 season of the now-defunct show, Dancing With The Stars.

The couple wed in 2013, and are now proud parents to daughter Violet, four, and son Dominic, one. 

Rachael has launched a health and fitness program, aptly titled Body By Finch, where Michael makes a cameo in the form of online workouts.

item.title: Beach baby! Pregnant Eva Longoria covers her growing bump in chic floral dress during seaside outing with husband Jose Baston
item.description: She's expecting her first baby in May. And Eva Longoria looked happy and healthy as she was spotted enjoying a day at the beach in Miami on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She's expecting her first baby in May.

And Eva Longoria looked happy and healthy as she was spotted enjoying a day at the beach in Miami on Monday.

The 43-year-old stunner covered her growing baby bump in a breezy chic floral dress as she wrapped her arms around husband Jose Baston.

Oh baby! Eva Longoria, 42, was spotted enjoying a day at the beach in Miami on Monday

Daring to impress, the Desperate Housewives star showcased her delicate decolletage in the flower print number that had a plunging neckline.

Her toned and tanned arms were on full display as the sleeveless gown covered her enviable figure in a complimentary manner.

She kept her trademark brunette tresses long and loose under an exquisite fedora that featured a black strap.

Adding to the springtime casual look, Eva rocked large gold hoop earrings and a pair of retro sunglasses.

Chic stunner: The stunner covered her growing baby bump in a breezy chic floral dress

Impressive: Daring to impress, the Desperate Housewives star showcased her delicate decolletage in the flower print number that had a plunging neckline

Toned up: Her toned and tanned arms were on full display as the sleeveless gown covered her enviable figure in a complimentary manner

Throwing caution to the wind, the natural stunner went virtually makeup free with just a dab of pale pink lip.

After enjoying the sandy shoreline, Eva wrapped her arms around Jose as they found a place to lounge together on the crowded beach.

The TV mogul revealed his trim athletic build as he took off his black shirt to relax next to his expecting wife. 

Hair story: She kept her trademark brunette tresses long and loose under an exquisite fedora that featured a black strap

Additions: Adding to the springtime casual look, Eva rocked large gold hoop earrings and a pair of retro sunglasses

Windy city: She grabbed her hat as the wind picked up

Throwing caution to the wind, the natural stunner went virtually makeup free with just a dab of pale pink lip

They left the popular tourist location arm in arm as he carried most of the beach accessories they had brought.

With her first baby on the way in a matter of weeks, Eva doesn't appear to be slowing down any time soon as she attended the filming of her new ABC soap Grand Hotel earlier in the day.

While the multi-talented actress is busy with her thriving career, Eva recently spilled to Entertainment Tonight she was so busy she sometimes forgot she was pregnant.

Loved up: After enjoying the sandy shoreline, Eva wrapped her arms around Jose Baston as they found a place to lounge together on the crowded beach

Quitting time: They left the popular tourist location arm in arm as he carried most of the beach accessories they had brought

Toes in sand: They both carried their flip flops in their hands

Leggy stud: Jose showcased his muscular calves as he walked the beach

'I have been working, so sometimes I wake up and I forget I am pregnant. Like this morning, I was like, "Oh my god, I am late!" and then I was like, "Why can't I get out of bed?" and I was like, "Helppp!" 

'And then I was like, "Oh yeah, this thing." ... [I said] we should go skiing next weekend and [Jose] said no. I didn't know why. 

'I was like, "Why can't we go? What is the problem?" And I was like, "Oh god, I forgot!"'

Eva and her media mogul husband confirmed her pregnancy in January after rumours began circling at the end of last year, when she posted a photo of her growing baby bump on her Instagram account.

The couple tied the knot in Mexico in May 2016. 

Take it off: The TV mogul revealed his trim athletic build as he took off his black shirt to relax next to his expecting wife

Treasure chest: Jose revealed his hirsute chest to gawking onlookers

Hats off! Eva took off her hat as she found shade underneath the umbrella

Phone check: Eva had to check in on her phone as she is a busy actress, director, and producer

The 43-year-old stunner covered her grwoing baby bump in a breezy chic floral dress as she wrapped her arms around husband Jose Baston.

item.title: Consciously uncoupled Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin look every inch the modern family as they enjoy dinner with son Moses in London
item.description: Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin remained every inch the modern family as they headed out for dinner, along with their son Moses, in London on Sunday night.
item.content:encoded:
They have had one of the most amicable splits in Hollywood history. 

And, exactly four years after their 'conscious uncoupling', Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin remained every inch the modern family as they headed out for dinner, along with their son Moses, in London on Sunday night. 

The exes - who have both found love in different relationships - still looked the best of friends as they dined in the British capital, along with Chris' Coldplay bandmate Will Champion. 

Amicable exes: Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin remained every inch the modern family as they headed out for dinner, along with their son Moses, in London on Sunday night

Chris and Gwyneth even looked to complement their styles, with both opting for off-duty, all-black outfits for the occasion.

Goop founder Gwyneth, 45, sported combat trousers and white trainers, though wrapped up in a smart, double-breasted coat.

Fix You hitmaker Chris stayed true to his rocker roots in jeans and a leather jacket, finished with a beanie hat and the offbeat choice of walking shoes. 

On good terms: The former spouses still looked the best of friends as they dined in the British capital, along with Chris' Coldplay bandmate Will Champion

His style was loosely mimicked by trendy youngster Moses, 11, who sported a beanie like his dad, paired with a simple tee, padded bomber jacket and jeans. 

Earlier this year Gwyneth said that Chris has become 'like a brother', adding that their cordial divorce was to ensure their children Moses and Apple, 13, remained as 'unscathed as possible'.

Appearing on The Late Show With Stephen Colbert, the host noted that she remained close with her ex-husband, prompting Gwyneth to respond: 'Very much so. He's like my brother. Very familial. It's nice. Great. 

Matching! Chris and Gwyneth even looked to complement their styles, with both opting for off-duty, all-black outfits for the occasion

Smart meets casual! Goop founder Gwyneth, 45, sported combat trousers and white trainers, though wrapped up in a double-breasted coat

Signature style: Fix You hitmaker Chris stayed true to his rocker roots in jeans and a leather jacket, finished with a beanie hat and the offbeat choice of walking shoes

Colbert quipped that it was kind of weird saying someone you had children with is like a brother.

'Which would explain the divorce,' Paltrow joked. 'Just kidding,' she added. 

Her comments came shortly after she announced her engagement to Glee co-creator Brad Falchuk in early January, just weeks after she was spotted enjoying a family holiday with her ex-husband and their children in Antigua. 

Meanwhile, Chris, 41, is in a relationship with Fifty Shades of Grey star Dakota Johnson, 28,  

Just like dad! Chris' style was loosely mimicked by trendy youngster Moses, 11, who sported a beanie like his dad, paired with a simple tee, padded bomber jacket and jeans

Parenting role models: Earlier this year Gwyneth said that Chris has become 'like a brother', adding that their amicable split was to ensure their kids remained as 'unscathed as possible'
item.dc:abstract: They have had one of the most amicable splits in Hollywood history. And, exactly four years after their 'conscious uncoupling', Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin remained every inch the modern family as they headed out for dinner, along with their son Moses, in London on Sunday night. The exes - who have both found love in different relationships - still looked the best of friends as they dined in the British capital, along with Chris' Coldplay bandmate Will Champion.
item.dc:creator: Kayleigh Giles
item.mi:shortTitle: Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin enjoy family dinner with son Moses

item.title: The Script's Danny O'Donoghue, 38, looks smitten with stunning girlfriend Anne de Paula, 22... as model sizzles in VERY racy swimsuit during romantic Caribbean getaway
item.description: Danny O'Donoghue and his model girlfriend Anne de Paula still looked very much in the throes of love as they packed on the PDA while lounging on the idyllic beaches of the Caribbean on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
They found love back in 2014, when she played his gorgeous love interest in the music video for track No Good in Goodbye.

And Danny O'Donoghue and his model girlfriend Anne de Paula still looked very much in the throes of love as they packed on the PDA while lounging on the idyllic beaches of the Caribbean on Sunday.  

Anne, 22, was bound to turn heads as she soaked up the sun in a sexy, burgundy swimsuit which left little to the imagination.

Scroll down for video 

Sight for shore eyes! Danny O'Donoghue's model girlfriend Anne de Paula was bound to turn more than a few heads as the pair continued to enjoy their Caribbean getaway on Sunday

The Sports Illustrated stunner flashed her phenomenal physique in the racy one-piece, which boasted a plunging neckline as well as a thong-style fit at the rear. 

It was no surprise The Script rocker struggled to keep his hands off of her as they canoodled in the sea, with Danny wrapping his arms around her as they cooled off in the ocean together. 

The pair also looked to share a Dirty Dancing inspired moment as Danny made like Patrick Swayze and lifted the Brazilian beauty into the air during their swim. 

Smitten kitten: The Script star looked besotted as they larked around in the ocean together

Beach babe: Anne, 22, soaked up the sun in a sexy, burgundy swimsuit which left little to the imagination

When they weren't enjoying lustful moments in the water, Anne appeared in the mood for some more high-octane activity as she was snapped hopping for a ride on a jet ski, before abandoning her own vessel to share with Danny. 

After packing up their fun-filled time afternoon in the ocean, Danny and Anne locked hands and went for a stroll along the island's white sands. 

While the pair have been dating for over three years, the Hall of Fame hitmaker has remained relatively tight-lipped on his romance. 

Sizzling! The Sports Illustrated stunner flashed her phenomenal physique in the racy one-piece, which boasted a plunging neckline as well as a thong-style fit at the rear

Lucky guy! It was no surprise The Script rocker struggled to keep his hands off of her as they canoodled in the sea

Having the time of his life! The pair also looked to share a Dirty Dancing inspired moment as Danny made like Patrick Swayze and lifted the Brazilian beauty into the air during their swim

Stunner: Anna let her natural beauty shine through by going make-up free for their day at the beach

Coy: While the pair have been dating for over three years, the Hall of Fame hitmaker has remained relatively tight-lipped on his romance

In fact, the long-time lovers only made their red carpet debut back in December, when they attended the London premiere of Star Wars: The Last Jedi together.

Anne is believed to be Danny's first relationship since his split from Irish-Lithuanian model Irma Mali back in 2013.

While Anne, who hails from Rio de Janeiro, resides in New York, while Danny spends most of his time in London, when not touring the globe with his band The Script, the pair have clearly made their romance go the distance.

Play time! When they weren't enjoying lustful moments in the water, Anne appeared in the mood for some more high-octane activity on a jet-ski

No time to waste! Anne hastily hopped on to her jet ski to join boyfriend Danny on the waves

Rear view! Anna flashed a playful peace sign - and her incredibly sculpted bottom - before hopping on to the vessel

Genetically-blessed! The Brazilian beauty made for a stunning sight as she emerged from the water

Chuffed: Danny looked in his element as the couple cruised the ocean on their jet skis 

Look at her go! The model oozed cool as she rode the waves on her jet ski 

Better together! Though she eventually ditched her own in favour of a ride on the back of Danny's 

Speaking to EVOKE.ie about their relationship in November, he admitted his girlfriend is a big fan of Dublin.

He dished: ‘She’s been here loads. She has a lot of mates here as well.

‘There’s a big Brazilian contingency here in college and working, I never even realised that.

‘It’s probably one of the biggest destinations for Brazilians because the people are lovely. She loves it here.’

Head over heels! After packing up their fun-filled time afternoon in the ocean, Danny and Anne locked hands and went for a stroll along the island's white sands

It's no surprise! The Brazilian looker has modelled for the likes of Sports Illustrated and fashion house Michael Kors

Where have you been all my life? The pair playfully ran into each other's arms when Anne joined him in the ocean

Besotted: The couple looked genuinely enamored during their PDA-filled afternoon

Fuss-free: Danny kept his beach style cool in black board shorts and a white T-shirt 

Moving on: Anne is believed to be Danny's first relationship since his split from Irish-Lithuanian model Irma Mali back in 2013

Making it work: While Anne resides in New York and Danny spends most of his time in London, when not touring the globe with his band The Script, the pair have made their romance go the distance

Non-stop fun! The couple laughed incessantly during their day at the beach

item.title: Move over Chris! Daredevil Elsa Pataky executes incredible 10 metre freefall plunge from a diving platform for Australian-made Netflix series Tidelands
item.description: Her husband Chris Hemsworth may play one of the world's most famous superheros. But this week his wife Elsa Pataky proved she is quite the daredevil too.
item.content:encoded:
Her husband Chris Hemsworth may play one of the world's most famous superheros. 

But this week his wife Elsa Pataky proved she is quite the daredevil too.

The Spanish actress, 41, shared a video of herself executing a 10 metre freefall plunge from a diving platform into a swimming pool on Monday, as she undergoes aquatic training for her upcoming supernatural TV series Tidelands.

'Training for an amazing project coming soon! 10 meters jump,' the mother-of-three wrote alongside the exhilarating video.

In the clip the Fast and the Furious star is seen slightly trembling on the diving platform before she launches into a forward-facing dive.

As the Byron Bay resident free falls through the air with her arms crossed against her chest, she nervously performs an egg-beater kick with her lean legs. 

Move over Chris! Daredevil Elsa Pataky executes incredible 10 metre freefall plunge from a diving platform for Australian-made Netflix series Tidelands 

Take the plunge! The clip ends with the Spanish beauty successfully completing the dive by entering the swimming pool feet-first

The clip ends with the Spanish beauty successfully completing the dive by entering the swimming pool feet-first.  

On Tuesday Elsa shared more details about her Tidelands training session.

The stunner took to Instagram to share a snap of her Netflix series cast members, Aaron Jakubenko, Charlotte Best and Mattias Inwood.

'Water training with a great team': Elsa lined-up alongside her Netflix series cast members, Aaron Jakubenko, Charlotte Best and Mattias Inwood

In the snap, the Tidelands stars flaunted their namesake t-shirts as they lined-up in front of the aquatic centre's swimming pool.

'Water training with a great team,' Elsa wrote alongside the comical snap.  

Earlier this week the blonde beauty gushed about her starring role in the first-ever Netflix drama series to be produced in Australia. 

'It came at the perfect moment': Elsa Pataky is set to star in Netflix's upcoming series Tidelands, the first drama from the streaming service to be produced in Australia

'It came at the perfect moment,' Elsa revealed during an interview with The Daily Telegraph on Monday. 

Elsa will play the role of Adrielle Cuthbert in the ten-part series, which centres around a group of dangerous half-humans half-water sirens. 

The series begins filming this week, which is serendipitous timing for the star.

Working parents: Elsa and her husband Chris Hemsworth will juggle parenting duties as Elsa commences work on her new series

'My kids have started school and I'm ready to get back to work. I'm excited to be working in this market and to be able to work in what I now call home,' she further told The Telegraph. 

Whilst shooting the series it's believed Elsa will juggle parenting duties with her husband Chris Hemsworth.

The couple reside in Byron Bay and share three children, five-year-old daughter India, and three-year-old twin sons, Tristan and Sasha.

item.title: 'I made a mistake': Davey Lloyd reveals he nearly walked out of Bachelor In Paradise and says he regrets the love triangle with Jake Ellis and Florence Alexandra
item.description: He went up against Jake Ellis during Monday night's first-ever rose ceremony and was left to pack his bags after being rejected by Florence Alexandra.
item.content:encoded:
He went up against Jake Ellis during Monday night's first-ever rose ceremony and was left to pack his bags after being rejected by Florence Alexandra.

And Davey Lloyd, 26, has admitted that going up against his pal Jake was a mistake.

Speaking to The Daily Telegraph on Tuesday, the reality star said 'I was considering leaving. I knew it would be a hard decision for [Florence].'

Scroll down for video  

'I did make a mistake': Davey Lloyd has admitted that going up against his friend Jake Ellis was a mistake in Bachelor in Paradise rose ceremony and says he almost left as to avoid awkwardness

The Sydney-based construction worker added: 'I did make a mistake. I didn't want to go up against my mate.'

The dramatic episode featured Florence being torn between offering a rose to former fling Jake Ellis and new crush Davey Lloyd.

Having picked Jake, after rekindling their broken relationship over a romantic waterfall date, Davey was left to depart the Fijian island without a rose.

On reflection: Speaking to The Daily Telegraph , the reality star said 'I was considering leaving. I knew it would be a hard decision for [Florence]'

On going up against his friend Jake, Davey admitted: 'It was really hard for me to do.'

The controversial reality star from Sam Frost's season of The Bachelorette went on to inform the publication that he is very much single.

On this, he further shared that he is ready to focus on himself and make himself a priority.

Not his best move! On going up against his friend Jake, Davey admitted: 'It was really hard for me to do'

'I've put other people first for a long time and maybe it's time for me to put myself first,' he further shared. 

Since being eliminated on Monday evening, rumours have began to spiral that the star may be set to return to Paradise as an intruder.

Bachelor in Paradise is set to return to screens for more drama on Tuesday at 7:30 pm on Channel 10.  

More drama to come! Bachelor in Paradise is set to return to screens for more drama on Tuesday at 7:30 pm on Channel 10

I knew it would be a hard decision for [Florence].'

item.title: 'Feeling fresh': Married At First Sight's Telv Williams gets a break up haircut after his mother revealed explosive details about the reality TV star's split from Sarah Roza
item.description: Telv Williams' mother revealed on Tuesday explosive details about his relationship with Sarah Roza.
item.content:encoded:
Telv Williams' mother detailed on Tuesday explosive details about his relationship with Sarah Roza.

And also that Telv revealed he was 'feeling fresh', getting a makeover after his long-speculated split with Sarah was finally confirmed.

Sharing a photo of his new haircut to Instagram, Telv did not address the claims made by his mum Tracey Bamblett Onus, including that he and Sarah actually split before the vow renewal ceremony in November. 

'Feeling fresh': Married At First Sight's Telv Williams gets a break up haircut after his mother revealed explosive details about the reality TV star's split from Sarah Roza

The picture showed Telv beaming from ear to ear as he got his hair cut at a Melbourne barber shop.

'Thanks for the clean up,' the 33-year-old captioned the photo, also tellingly adding the hashtag '#feelingfresh'. 

Telv's post comes after his mother Tracey made a series of allegations about his relationship with Sarah.

Defended her son: Telv's post comes as his mother Tracey made a series of allegations about his relationship with Sarah 

Bombshell claims: Alleging their elaborate vow renewal may have been staged, Tracey claimed Telv had been encouraged by producers to take part in the ceremony

Describing her son as a 'gentleman', Tracey told Daily Mail Australia Telv and Sarah had split in November 2017. 

Alleging their elaborate vow renewal may have been staged, Tracey claimed Telv had been encouraged by producers to take part in the ceremony.

'They (producers) were coercing him into doing something which he basically didn't want and that was to do the re-commitment ceremony,' she said. 

Claims: Describing her son as a 'gentleman', Tracey told Daily Mail Australia Telv and Sarah had split in November 2017 

'He didn't even want to re-commit': Tracey claimed her son hadn't wanted to continue with their relationship 

'He didn't even want to re-commit.' 

On Saturday, Sarah finally confirmed weeks of speculation that she and Telv had indeed split up.

In a lengthy Instagram post, the red head wrote cryptically that she couldn't allow her 'innate standards to be compromised'. 

 'On the back of what has been such an extraordinary experience it is with great heartache, regret & sadness that Telv & I are no longer together,' Sarah wrote.  

'Telv & I are no longer together': On Saturday, Sarah finally confirmed weeks of speculation that she and Telv had indeed split up

And also that Telv revealed he was 'feeling fresh', getting a makeover after his long-speculated split with Sarah was finally confirmed. Sharing a photo of his new haircut to Instagram, Telv did not address the claims made by his mum Tracey Bamblett Onus, including that he and Sarah actually split before the vow renewal ceremony in November.

item.title: Happy in Hawaii! Ben Affleck beams at Lindsay Shookus during break from new movie… one week after cozy meet up with ex Jennifer Garner at church
item.description: Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck looked cozy together when they met up at church a week ago. But it looks as if the Oscar-winning Argo star is still going strong with the SNL producer Lindsay.
item.content:encoded:
Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck looked cozy together when they met up at church a week ago in Los Angeles.

But it looks as if the Oscar-winning Argo star - who recently showed off his large dragon tattoo on his back -  is still going strong with his New York-based love Lindsay Shookus.

On Sunday the lovebirds looked to be happier than ever as they held hands in Honolulu, Hawaii, after a breakfast date.

Still happy: Ben Affleck holds hands with his girlfriend Lindsay Shookus after a breakfast date in Honolulu, Hawaii on Sunday

Ben has been working on the Netflix show Triple Frontier with Charlie Hunnam and Oscar Isaac in Hawaii and it appears Lindsay was there to support him.

The Batman v Superman star, who wore a green shirt and grey shorts, was seen beaming at his blonde love interest who was clad in black-and-blue workout clothes.

They held hands and laughed as they made their way out of the casual restaurant.

There was no sign of the three kids he has with Garner: Violet, 12, Seraphina, nine, and Samuel, six.

In step: The Batman star, who wore a green shirt and grey shorts, was seen beaming at his blonde lady love who clad in black-and-blue workout clothes

UsWeekly recently claimed that the Massachusetts native 'loves and adores'  Shookus. 

But their relationship could ultimately be unrealistic as she lives in New York City, where she works as a producer at Saturday Night Live and raises a daughter (the father is ex Kevin Miller), and Ben  lives in Los Angeles, where he raises three kids with Garner.

Ben and Lindsay have been flying across the country regularly to keep their love alive. 

As far as his time with Garner a week ago, the exes looked like they were getting along well as they seemingly touched heads while tending to son Samuel.

She loves to support her man: Ben has been working on a Netflix show in Hawaii and it appears Lindsay was there to visit him. In his hand was takeout from the diner

The exes, who split nearly three years ago, mingled easily while holding red cups and looking at each other face to face.

If there was any animosity over past mistakes, it didn't seem to show. They also seemed to be happy talking to their friends and the three children.

Earlier, she looked like the ideal wife as she walked into church.

Not only did the 45-year-old appear incredibly fit in her chic outfit, but she also carried a basket of baked goods for her church friends.   

The photo that had everyone confused: Garner and Affleck looked cozy together when they met up at church a week ago in Los Angeles. They are looking down at son Samuel

Later Ben, 45, was seen walking to the church alone. Affleck wore a red shirt with blue New England Patriots Starter jacket and blue jeans and grey shoes for his casual Sunday attire.

This sighting comes days after an UsWeekly source claimed she and Ben may still be dragging their feet on finalizing their divorce because the Good Will Hunting actor has told friends that he would like to get back together with the beautiful brunette.

'He had at one point been telling friends he wanted his ex back,' a source told the magazine, even though he has been dating Shookus, 37. 

Doing what she loves: The mother of three has been sharing her recipes on Instagram

The Alias vet often shoots her photos inside her Pacific Palisades mansion

But then another source told UsWeekly he has not been looking back: 'When they filed and decided they were moving on, that was it.'

Also in the new article it was claimed that there was a chance they could have gotten back together in 2017.

'When Ben was in rehab, Jennifer was there every day, visiting,' said the insider. 

'They did family counseling to work on their relationship. Things looked positive. Jennifer was very caring, very present. They both wanted it to work.' 

There is also the issue of Ben and Jen's divorce. They have been working with a private mediator for years.

She  sure has a sense of humor: The Catch And Release star put on her band uniform to perform Happy Birthday as her pal Reese Witherspoon turned 42 last week

But they have still not sorted it all out, which suggests they are stalling in case they could reconcile.  

Two-time Academy Award winner Ben married 13 Going On 30 star Jennifer in 2005. 

He has also dated Gwyneth Paltrow and Jennifer Lopez. 

Triple Frontier also stars Pedro Pascal, Garrett Hedlund and Adria Arjona. Filming began on Monday.

On Monday the lovebirds looked to be happier than ever as they held hands in Honolulu, Hawaii, after a breakfast date.
