item.title: 'I don't trust him': Bachelor In Paradise's Florence Alexandra shares a VERY steamy kiss with ex Jake Ellis during waterfall date... despite being worried about his playboy past
item.description: The 27-year-old Dutch beauty wrapped her arms around the hunk as they locked lips in the lagoon - before admitting their previous failed fling before the show was still playing on her mind.
item.content:encoded:
She admitted she didn't 'fully trust' her ex Jake Ellis after hearing tales about his notorious playboy antics on the Gold Coast.

But Bachelor In Paradise's Florence Alexandra couldn't resist sharing a steamy kiss with the 31-year-old during their romantic waterfall date on Monday's episode.

The 27-year-old Dutch beauty wrapped her arms around the hunk as they locked lips in the lagoon - before admitting their failed fling before the show was still playing on her mind.

'I don't trust him': Bachelor In Paradise's Florence Alexander shared a very steamy kiss with her ex Jake Ellis during waterfall date... despite being worried about his playboy past

'I have history with Jake and to be honest I'm dreading this date. I cant help it - I don't fully trust him,' she said before their date.

'According to Tara (Pavlovic) and the other girls, apparently Jake has quite the rep on the Gold Coast,' she added warily.

Despite her reservations, the pair went on to have a chemistry-filled picnic overlooking a waterfall and drank champagne.

Jake put his feelings on the line, telling Florence: 'I'm not here just for s**ts and giggles. I don't want to spend time with you for the fun of it. I'm trying to show you everything I can.'

Hmm: She admitted to not trusting her ex Jake Ellis after hearing tales about his notorious playboy antics with girls on the Gold Coast

Saucy: The 27-year-old Dutch beauty wrapped her arms around the hunk as they locked lips in the lagoon - before admitting their failed fling before the show was still playing on her mind

Packing on the PDA: It wasn't long before they were kissing passionately under the waterfall, with Jake later revealing he was desperate to get a rose from her

And it seems the ladies' man's smooth chat delivered as the pair soon stripped down to their swimwear and waded into the lagoon for a dip. 

It wasn't long before they were kissing passionately under the waterfall, with Jake later revealing he was desperate to get a rose from her. 

Florence remained uncertain despite the PDA, confessing: 'One date is not going to solve everything. My gut feeling is telling me whatever you do, don't give Jake a rose.

Not impressed? Florence remained uncertain despite the PDA, confessing: 'One date is not going to solve everything. My gut feeling is telling me whatever you do, don't give Jake a rose

Cute: Despite her reservations, the pair went on to have a chemistry-filled picnic overlooking a waterfall and drank champagne

'It's easy to forget what he did to me and just be normal again but I don't really want to let that happen.'

Stuck between Jake and Davey Lloyd, the blonde beauty pushed her concerns aside however, and decided to give Jake the rose.

It comes after she was told not to trust Jake by Tara, who told her that he has a reputation on theGold Coast as a ladies man.

'I live on the Gold Coast and everyone has been there,' Tara told a stunned Florence.

'I live on the Gold Coast and everyone has been there!' Tara  had warned Florence about Jake on Sunday's Bachelor In Paradise premiere

She then said that so many people ask 'Have you got a Jake Ellis story?', implying that the handsome marketing manager had been around the block.

Speaking privately to the camera, Tara said: 'A lot of people I know, know Jake.'

She continued: 'He's a nice guy, happy to have a conversation with him. Would I date him? Absolutely not.' 

'Have you got a Jake Ellis story?' Tara said that many people on the Gold Coast have a 'story' about being with Jake, causing Florence to become concerned 

Oh no! Florence was shocked as she heard the information about Jake, who she had already hooked up with before in the outside world 

Florence later expressed her fears that the whispers were true, which caused her to get into a huge fight with Jake after she confronted him about it.

It seems that the Dutch stunner was right to be concerned, as shortly after the episode aired The Bachelor's Jen Hawke took to Instagram to remind fans that she has her very own Jake Ellis story.

'Who do I know other than Flo that has a Jake Ellis story?' Jen said sarcastically.

'Who do I know other than Flo that has a Jake Ellis story?' Shortly after the episode aired The Bachelor's Jen Hawke took to Instagram to remind fans that she had a fling with Jake

She then followed the question by posting a photo of herself with Jake, which was accompanied by a poll that asked users: 'Do you have a Jake Ellis story?'

Jen and Jake dated for around five months in 2016, but the pair split right before Jen joined The Bachelor. 

The 28-year-old also dated The Bachelorette's Blake Colman.

Jen then followed the question by posting a photo of herself with Jake, which was accompanied by a poll that asked users: 'Do you have a Jake Ellis story?'

item.title: Top dog! Bradley Cooper dresses as a pooch as girlfriend Irina Shayk sports cat whiskers for daughter's animal themed first birthday party
item.description: Showing his playful side Bradley, 43, also wore a headband adorned with a mini balloon animal. The couple welcomed Lea De Seine on March 21 2017.
item.content:encoded:
They welcomed daughter Lea De Seine on March 21 2017.

And marking their little girl's first birthday on Saturday Bradley Cooper and Irina Shayk pulled out all the stops to celebrate with an animal-themed bash at their home in Los Angeles.

Getting in the spirit of things Bradley donned a furry dog costume while his rumored fiancee kept it low-key with cat whiskers painted on her face. 

Ruff life: Bradley Cooper dressed as a dog as he and Irina Shayk threw a first birthday party for their daughter Lea De Seine at their home in Los Angeles

Meow! The Russian model sported cat whiskers and a cat-print mini dress 

The 32-year-old Russian model flaunted her slender legs in a colorful cat-print mini dress and white sneakers and sipped on a drink while chatting with pals. 

Showing his playful side Bradley, 43, also wore a headband adorned with a mini balloon animal.

Guests joined in on the theme wearing face paint and tucked into frozen treats.

The couple have been dating since 2015 and Irina, who was born in Yemanzhelinsk, Russia, has been sporting a large emerald ring on her engagement ring for over a year.

Festive spirit: The 43-year-old actor added a headband with a balloon animal on it 

Exotic beauty: Irina shared a sultry selfie last week during an LA downpour

The duo are notoriously private and even kept their daughter's birth under wraps with news of the birth making headlines nearly a month after her arrival.

Prior to getting together, The Hangover actor was dating British model Suki Waterhouse and Irina was in a relationship with soccer star Cristiano Ronaldo. 

Meanwhile Irina sizzled in a sexy selfie last week wearing sheer white lingerie.

The busy mom is currently the face of Intimissimi's latest lingerie campaign. 

Private duo: The couple - who are rumored to be engaged - started dating in 2015 and welcomed daughter Lea De Seine on March 21. They are pictured on March 8 2016
item.dc:abstract: They welcomed daughter Lea De Seine on March 21 2017. And marking their little girl's first birthday on Saturday Bradley Cooper and Irina Shayk pulled out all the stops to celebrate with an animal-themed bash at their home in Los Angeles. Getting in the spirit of things Bradley donned a furry dog costume while his rumored fiancee kept it low-key with cat whiskers painted on her face.

item.title: 'He is far more replaceable than Karl': Claims the Ubergate scandal could cost Peter Stefanovic his CAREER...as he reportedly complains about 'dying on the inside' in explosive new revelations
item.description: The Uber scandal featuring brothers Karl and Peter Stefanovic has sent shock waves through the television industry.
item.content:encoded:
The Uber scandal involving brothers Karl and Peter Stefanovic has sent shock waves through the television industry.

And according to Woman's Day magazine, the incident could cost Peter his career.

It comes as New Idea claims that Peter complained about his job so much during his explosive loudspeaker chat with Karl in the Uber, that he said he was 'dying on the inside'.

Scroll down for video 

 'He is far more replaceable than Karl': Claims the Ubergate scandal could cost Peter Stefanovic (seen) his CAREER...as he reportedly complains about 'dying on the inside' in explosive new revelations

Woman's Day say Karl is worried for his brother's future in the industry after the fallout from Ubergate. 

'The reality is Pete is far more replaceable than Karl is,' a source told the publication.  

'Karl's biggest concern is Pete, who said to Karl that night in the Uber he "hated his job" on Weekend Today and as news reporter,' a source told the magazine. 

'Nine will likely throw Peter under the bus': Woman's Day say Karl (seen) is worried for his brother's future in the industry, after the fallout from Ubergate

They added: 'Karl's telling everyone Pete has taken it hard - and now he fears Nine will likely throw Pete under the bus.'

New Idea - who revealed the Uber chat in a rumoured $50,000 deal with the driver - claim Peter told Karl how unhappy he is with his job.

'I hate working news, I'm dying on the inside and it makes me feel horrible,' Peter said to Karl, the driver told the magazine. 

'The life is draining out of me. I'm so much better than this and can do so much more, it's the worst four days each week and I should be doing more.' 

Awkward: New Idea claim Peter told Karl how unhappy he is with his job

Complaining: 'The life is draining out of me. I'm so much better than this and can do so much more, it's the worst four days each week and I should be doing more,' Peter reportedly said

Peter and Karl's 'b**chy' Uber conversation made headlines this month after they reportedly spoke about their careers, colleagues and bosses at Channel Nine.

Peter had Karl on speakerphone in the Uber, and was joined by wife Sylvia Jeffreys.   

Peter told The Daily Telegraph that he was ashamed of the humiliation he brought upon himself, his big brother, the Nine Network and on his colleagues.

'I have spoken directly to the people involved and have offered my sincerest apologies as I have been raised to do: Do something wrong, apologise and try to move on,' he said. 

In the know: Peter had Karl on speakerphone in the Uber, and was joined by wife Sylvia Jeffreys (seen)

Apologising: Peter told The Daily Telegraph that he was ashamed of the humiliation he brought upon himself, his big brother, the Nine Network and on his colleagues

item.title: PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Move over Barbarella! Blac Chyna shows off her bombshell curves in cut-out bikini and sparkly boots for futuristic photoshoot
item.description: Looking like a comic-book heroine Chyna, 29, also added a personal touch by rocking a sleek pink bobbed wig as she posed near some boulders in Topanga Canyon.
item.content:encoded:
She's been keeping her figure in check with grueling workouts after a little nip and tuck in 2017.

And clearly proud of the fruits of her labor Blac Chyna posed for a futuristic photo shoot outside of Los Angeles on Monday in just a two-piece and thigh-high boots.

Looking like comic-book heroine Barbarella Chyna, 29, it was a sexy look for the former E! star and she also added a personal touch in a sleek pink bobbed wig.

Babe-arella! Blac Chyna showed off her figure during a sexy photo shoot just outside of Los Angeles on Monday 

Chyna's white bikini featured a halterneck style top with cut-out detail under the bust and high-cut briefs.

Some sparkly silver slouchy boots added extra space age chic. 

The mother-of-two flaunted her flat tummy and generous booty in the outfit while posing in front of some boulders in Topanga Canyon. 

Before facing cameras the former Rob & Chyna star wore a black Versace robe and fluffy slippers. 

Curves on show: Chyna's white bikini featured a halterneck style top with cut-out detail under the bust and high-cut briefs

Sitting pretty: The mother-of-two showed off her toned tummy in the sexy two piece

Hands on: Chyna, 29, had an assistant help to oil her up for the shoot

Last year Chyna - born Angela Renée White - revealed in court documents that she had cosmetic procedures 'including a breast and butt reduction as well as liposuction around her belly button'. 

During their very public breakup in July 2017 Rob had angrily outed his ex on social media claiming he paid $100,000 so Chyna could get her post-baby body worked on. 

But in her lawsuit against her ex, Chyna labeled it 'minor surgery' and claimed that Rob had jeopardized her sponsorship deals by revealing details about her post-baby surgery.

Nailed it! The reality star threw on an oversize graphic-print T-shirt and platform heels as she walked with her team

Pretty in pastels: Chyna channeled Kim Kardashian with her pale pink locks

Sky-high: Chyna strutted her stuff in towering platform heels

The legal documents stated: 'Accordingly, the manner in which Rob Kardashian revealed Ms White’s personal medical information jeopardized Ms White’s endorsement deals with several weight loss, fitness and diet companies – that all pay Ms White to promote their products on social media.

'Ms White underwent minor cosmetic procedures including a breast and butt reduction as well as a small amount of liposuction around her belly button.' 

The former video vixen is now dating 18-year-old rapper YBN Almighty Jay. 

Designer darling: Before facing cameras Chyna wrapped up in a black Versace robe

Ready for her close-up: Chyna kept comfortable in some furry slides before the shoot

Boots on! The former Rob & Chyna star slipped on some slouchy glittery boots

And she seems to be on better terms with Rob who she continues to co-parent Dream, one, with.

The buxom beauty wished the youngest Kardashian a happy birthday as he turned 31 earlier this month. 

Chyna is also the mother of five-year-old king Cairo, her son with ex Tyga. 

New romance: The former video vixen is now dating 18-year-old rapper YBN Almighty Jay

These boots were made for walking: The ex fiancee of Rob Kardashian was ready for action once her snazzy footwear was in place

On a budget? The star rifled through a suitcase of garments on the side of the road

item.title: Dad-to-be Declan Donnelly flashes a huge smile as his pregnant wife Ali Astall shows a hint of bump in first outing since confirming they are expecting a baby
item.description: Declan Donnelly's wife Ali Astal was seen on Monday morning near her Chiswick home, hours after the couple confirmed they're expecting their first baby.
item.content:encoded:
Declan Donnelly's wife Ali Astal was seen on Monday morning near her Chiswick home, hours after the couple confirmed they're expecting their first baby. 

The morning after her husband, 42, responded to pregnancy reports, Ali, 40, was seen at her local train station while a short time later a beaming Dec was spotted leaving the couple's house.

Dressed in a pale pink coat over a smart navy sweater and shirt, Ali showed a hint of bump as she waited for her train.

Expecting: Declan Donnelly's wife Ali Astal was seen on Monday morning near her Chiswick home, hours after the couple confirmed they're expecting their first baby

Ali kept comfortable in white trainers and added skinny jeans to her ensemble as she kept busy on her phone.

It's been reported she is keen to wind down her work commitments in the coming weeks to 'look after herself' and to enjoy an 'easy' pregnancy.

Dec's wife, who works as her husband and Ant's talent manager, looked in good spirits as she chatted to a friend on her walk to the station.

Dad-to-be! A short time later a beaming Dec was spotted leaving the couple's house

Mum-to-be: Dressed in a pale pink coat over a smart navy sweater and shirt, Ali showed a hint of bump as she waited for her train

Exciting time: Dec's wife looked in good spirits as she happily chatted to a friend on her walk to the station for her Monday morning commute

Commuting: Ali added comfy white trainers and skinny fit jeans to her Monday morning look

Working: Ali, who works as her husband's talent manager, was busy checking her phone as she arrived at her local station

The ITV star couldn't contain his joy as he grinned at photographers while leaving his house a short time after his wife.

After what has been the most turbulent week of Dec's career, the star was smiling again as he headed off to work, prepping for the final two shows of his hit show Saturday Night Takeaway, which he'll present solo following Ant's return to rehab. 

The proud dad-to-be confirmed the baby news in a brief statement published on social media platform Instagram on Sunday evening.

Beaming: The Saturday Night Takeaway star couldn't contain his joy as he beamed at photographers while leaving his house a short time after his wife

Happier news: Dec looked on cloud nine after what has been the most turbulent week of his career, following his best friend and presenting partner's arrest a week ago 

Family man: It's been reported the couple have been trying for some time to start a family

Off to work: The star was dressed smartly in a blazer as he jumped in his car to head to work, prepping for the final episodes of hit show Saturday Night Takeaway which he'll present solo

Sharing a black and white image from his 2015 wedding to Ali, 40, he wrote: 'Just wanted to say thank you for all the lovely messages. 

'The news has sneaked out a little earlier than we had hoped but Ali and I are delighted to be expecting our first child. Thanks for all the love, we really appreciate it.' 

Earlier that day Declan was seen out and about in London, hours after it was reported that Ali is pregnant. 

Support: Dec has spent the last few days in talks with Ant and ITV, before confirming last week that this series of Saturday Night Takeaway will end with the planned US finale 

Busy man: Dec will jet to Orlando for the April 7 final before heading home to work on his other hit show Britain's Got Talent

So happy: Dec confirmed  that he is expecting his first child with wife Ali in a post shared with Instagram followers on Sunday evening

Reports of their growing family comes hot on the heels of Dec preparing to host Saturday Night Takeaway solo next weekend, in light of presenting partner Ant McPartlin heading to rehab following his recent drink-drive arrest.  

Just hours before the confirmation The Sun reported that the couple, who wed in 2015, are 'delighted to be expecting - especially since they have been trying for some time.'

It is alleged that the couple first learnt they were pregnant soon after Dec left the Australian jungle after the last series of I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Oh Here! finished in December. 

'They have been keeping the pregnancy a closely guarded secret, but now that Ali is safely over 12 weeks, they are starting to let people know,' it is claimed of the happy news, with the source quickly adding that they have told 'key people at ITV'.

Exciting news: Earlier that day Declan was seen out and about in London, hours after it was reported that Ali is pregnant 

What a week: The TV star was seen returning to his West London home, dressed casually in jeans and a baseball cap during what has been the most turbulent weeks of his career

Rollercoaster few days: Dec, 42 , failed to raise a smile on Sunday as he headed to the house he shares with Ali

Ali has reportedly told her close colleagues and will be stepping away from work commitments to 'look after herself' and to enjoy an 'easy' pregnancy.

'They have both always wanted a family but worried that it might not happen for them.'

A representative for Dec and Ali refused to comment on the claims when approached by MailOnline.

'They are delighted': Dec Donnelly, 42, and his wife Ali Astall are reportedly expecting their first child 

Growing family: According to The Sun, the pair, who wed in 2015, are 'delighted to be expecting - especially since they have been trying for some time'

Woes: Reports of their growing family comes hot on the heels of Dec preparing to host Saturday Night Takeaway himself, in light of Ant McPartlin heading to rehab following his recent drink-drive arrest

It has also been inevitable to ignore the fact that his happy news comes hot on the heels of his best friend Ant's woes. 

'This has come at a difficult time for them both, given everything that Ant is now going through and the pressure that has put on Dec in the past week,' it was said, before adding that 'their priority now is their baby and an experience that they see as the best of their lives.' 

Dec and Ali - who has acted as the presenting duo's manager for over a decade - married in Elswick, Tyne and Wear in August 2015 after two years of dating.

Happy news: It is alleged that the couple first learnt they were pregnant soon after the last series of I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Oh Here! finished in December

It is claimed of their delight: 'They have been keeping the pregnancy a closely guarded secret, but now that Ali is safely over 12 weeks, they are starting to let people know'

In an interview with Fabulous magazine in February last year, Ant and Dec both said that the focus in their lives has always been on their families as they bared all about marriage and hopefully having children in the near future.

Ant - who had previously spoken about his struggles with having children and of course has since split from his wife - revealed he would be 'over the moon' to become a dad, while Dec echoed similar wishes.

Dec said: 'Absolutely at some point, when the time is right! We’ll have to put some time in the diary. Things are pretty busy!' 

In April of last year, while recording the finale of the 2017 season of Saturday Night Takeaway at Walt Disney World in Florida, both men admitted that being there made them feel a little ‘broody’.

Mum to be: Ali has reportedly told her close colleagues and will be stepping away from work commitments to 'look after herself' and to enjoy an 'easy' pregnancy

As reported in OK!, Dec said: ‘It is almost like a prescription – everyone should come and spend a couple of days in Disney once in their life. Would we come back with a little Ant and Dec? Oh, definitely! 

'We saw it on the show, what it means for young ones to come out here. It would be one of those things to do with children, definitely.’ 

This comes after Ant - who split from wife Lisa Armstrong earlier this year after 11 years of marriage - was arrested for a drink drive incident over the weekend and has since made the quick decision to return to rehab earlier this week. 

One onlooker, Jake Spencer, said the Britain's Got Talent star was argumentative towards cops when they tried to put him in a police car after he failed a breath test.

A source added: 'They have both always wanted a family but worried that it might not happen for them'

Love: Dec and Ali - who has acted as the presenting duo's manager for over a decade - married in Elswick, Tyne and Wear in August 2015 after two years of dating

'This has come at a difficult time for them both': It has also been inevitable to ignore the fact that his happy news comes hot on the heels of his best friend Ant's woes

He told The Sun newspaper: 'Ant looked in a right state and was acting argumentatively toward a policewoman. I couldn't believe it when I saw who it was.

'The woman was trying to arrest him and get him in the police car but he clearly wasn't having it. He was not making it easy for her and he seemed to be trying to wriggle out of her clutches. He was not in a good way.

'Eventually she got him in the police car. There were about six or seven police cars in total.'

Candid: In an interview last year, Ant and Dec both said that the focus in their lives has always been on their families and hopefully having children in the near future

'It's tougher than you think': Ant has previously spoken about his struggles with having children

Marital breakdown: Ant split from his wife of 11 years, Lisa Armstrong, earlier this year 

It is thought Ant veered into the wrong lane after coming round a sharp bend, hitting a green Mini before crashing into a BMW X5. A three-year-old girl was taken to hospital to be checked over as a precautionary measure. 

In 2013, Ant also discussed he and his estranged make-up artist wife were finding it difficult to conceive.

At the time he confessed to Radio Times: 'Lisa and I would love to have kids. We’re trying. It’s tougher than you think when you get a bit older.'

Explaining the issue in terms of his friendship with Dec, Ant revealed: 'There’s a rumour that we do everything together and I’m holding off having kids till Dec finds himself Mrs Right. I love that idea, but I’m afraid it’s not true.' 

Troubles: This comes after Ant was arrested for a drink drive incident over the weekend and has since made the quick decision to return to rehab earlier this week

Dec confirmed the baby news in a brief statement published on social media platform Instagram on Sunday evening. Sharing a black and white image from his 2015 wedding to Ali, 40, he wrote: 'Just wanted to say thank you for all the lovely messages.

item.title: Bonding with her parents! Kaia Gerber takes time off from her supermodel career to catch up with Cindy Crawford and Rande Gerber in Malibu
item.description: On Saturday she joined thousands of others in downtown Los Angeles at the March For Our Lives protest against gun violence. On Sunday, the 16-year-old was much more relaxed in Malibu.
item.content:encoded:
On Saturday she joined thousands of others in downtown Los Angeles at the March For Our Lives protest against gun violence.

And on Sunday, Kaia Gerber looked far more relaxed as she left Starbucks in Malibu with her mom, former model Cindy Crawford, her entrepreneur dad Rande Gerber and a group of gal pals.

An internationally famous model at just 16, Kaia was casually dressed in a black sweatshirt and black cargo pants that she tucked into a pair of heavy black Doc Martens boots.

Teen model and activist: Kaia Gerber was spotted out in an all-black outfit in Malibu on Sunday, the day after taking part in the March For Our Lives rally against gun violence in Los Angeles

She smoothed her brunette tresses back into a high pony tail showing off her peachy, make-up free complexion.

Kaia completed her outfit with a black bag on a chain that she threw over her shoulder.

The genetically blessed teen owes her beauty to former supermodel Cindy and her father Rande, also once a model. 

Following her parents: The 16-year-old left Starbucks with her mom Cindy Crawford, 52, and dad Rande Gerber, 55

Musical moment: The beautiful brunette's eye - and ear- was caught by a small band playing outside Starbucks

Cindy, 52, showed off her fashionista creds in a light brown suede jacket that she wore over a white T-shirt and skinny jeans that she tucked into over-the- knee black boots. 

She added more color to her ensemble with a long green, grey and white scarf she looped around her neck.

The celebrity smiled at a band playing outside Starbucks and stopped for a bit to dance along. 

Showing off her paces: The leggy lovely grooved to the music as Rande smiled at her

Not embarrassing at all: Kaia and her gal pals didn't seem to mind Cindy's performance

The Versace star walked next to her husband with her chestnut tresses tumbling over her shoulders.

Rande, who was the only one holding a Starbucks beverage, was as casually dressed as his wife of 20 years and daughter.

He donned a black zip-up jacket over a black shirt, grey pants and black sneakers.

Genetically blessed: Kaia is the image of her former supermodel mom Cindy

There was no sign of the couple's 19-year-old son Presley, who is also a model, on Sunday.

Kaia is still at high school so she was keen to support the March For Our Lives Movement.

She joined friend and fellow model Charlotte Lawrence, 17, at the rally aimed at protecting the lives of children and teachers through gun reform.

Activist pals: She joined friend and fellow model Charlotte Lawrence, 17, at Saturday's downtown L.A. rally aimed at protecting the lives of children and teachers through gun reform

item.title: 'He said if they didn't pay up he would leak the photos': MAFS' Ryan Gallagher and Dean Wells 'threatened with blackmail' after photographer took pictures of them with girls in a Melbourne nightclub
item.description: They've been making the most of their 15 minutes fame with a series of public appearances.
item.content:encoded:
They've been making the most of their 15 minutes fame with a series of public appearances.

But according to Woman's Day not all the notoriety that comes with Married At First Sight has been ideal for Dean Wells and Ryan Gallagher.

The magazine claims that a Melbourne photographer 'threatened to blackmail the pair' after taking photos of them with girls in a nightclub. 

'He said if they didn't pay up he would leak the photos': MAFS' Ryan Gallagher and Dean Wells 'threatened with blackmail' after photographer took pictures of them with girls in a Melbourne nightclub

'They were posing for photos with girls in the club and he said if they didn't pay up he would leak the photos,' a source allegedly told Woman's Day. 

'They laughed it off and told him to ''get stuffed!'' 

It is not known when the alleged incident occurred and Daily Mail Australia has contacted both Ryan and Dean for comment. 

Report: It is not known when the alleged incident occurred and Daily Mail Australia has contacted both Ryan and Dean for comment

Popular! Earlier this month, Dean and Ryan were swarmed by women as they made an appearance at Empire nightclub in Narre Warren, Melbourne 

Earlier this month, Dean and Ryan were swarmed by women as they made an appearance at Empire nightclub in Narre Warren, Melbourne.

Photos from the event shows the two former love rivals being hugged by female fans and taking selfies with them.

During the night out aspiring rapper Dean, 40, got the chance to get his burgeoning hip hop career on the front foot, hitting the decks for a DJ session.

Giving it a whirl! During the night out aspiring rapper Dean, 40, got the chance to get his burgeoning hip hop career on the front foot, hitting the decks for a DJ session 

Is he taken? Meanwhile a source from the evening out told Daily Mail Australia that Ryan was seen getting affectionate with a blonde women he both arrived with and left the venue with 

Meanwhile a source from the evening out told Daily Mail Australia that Ryan was  seen getting affectionate with a blonde women he both arrived with and left the venue with.

 According to the insider, the tradie and his female companion were seen 'kissing and cuddling up in the VIP booth'. 

 They later left together alongside Dean, the insider also claimed. 

Another eyewitness alleged Dean had been trying to score with the many ladies attending the Playboy party.

 'Dean was asking staff and girls in the venue if they had boyfriends,' the source alleged, before continuing, 'And if they could take him home.' 

'Dean was asking staff and girls in the venue if they had boyfriends': Another eyewitness alleged Dean had been trying to score with the many ladies attending the Playboy party

item.title: A booty-full job! Emily Ratajkowski has new husband Sebastian Bear-McClard apply finishing touches to her posterior before a photoshoot
item.description: The comfort between Emily Ratajkowski and her new husband Sebastian Bear McClard was evident in a racy Instagram post on Sunday in which the producer applied makeup to Emily's pert posterior.
item.content:encoded:
They've been married for only one month.

But the comfort between model Emily Ratajkowski and her new husband Sebastian Bear McClard was evident  in the Gone Girl actress' Instagram post on Sunday, in which Sebastian applied makeup to his wife's perky posterior.

The 26-year-old model and her 30-year-old producer husband were poolside for the racy swimwear shoot.

Someone's gotta do it: The comfort between model Emity Ratajkowski and her new husband Sebastian Bear McClard was evident in the Gone Girl actress' Instagram post on Sunday

In the saucy snap, the star of the forthcoming film I Feel Pretty wears only a skimpy pair of green bikini bottoms.

Her assets are only covered by a couple of tactfully placed hands. 

She pokes her pert buns out and looks over her shoulder as the Good Time producer applies makeup to his 5ft7 wife's backside.

Ratajkowski has captioned the post: 'Mr. Last Looks'.

Loved-up: The 26-year-old model and her 30-year-old producer husband have been married for a little over a month. They're seen here in early March 2018

On Wednesday, the star of the Blurred Lines video wore only a hat in another pulse racing photoshoot, again shared to her Instagram account.

The nude model once more covered her chest with her hand as she pouted at the camera, evidently held by her husband.

She had captioned the post: 'Posing for my husband like'. 

Sun's out buns out: On Wednesday, the star of the Blurred Lines video wore only a hat in another pulse racing photoshoot, shared to her Instagram account

The 26-year-old model and her 30-year-old producer husband were poolside for the racy swimwear shoot.

item.title: Meet your new Today hosts? Georgie Gardner and Ben Fordham arrive at a fundraiser in Sydney amid claims 'Karl Stefanovic is being replaced next year'
item.description: On Monday, it was reported that Ben Fordham could be permanently replacing Karl Stefanovic as host of the Today show next year.
item.content:encoded:
On Monday, it was reported that Ben Fordham could be permanently replacing Karl Stefanovic as host of the Today show next year.

And guests at the Public House Group Charity Luncheon were offered a glimpse of Channel Nine's rumoured 2019 breakfast show line-up on Friday afternoon.

Ben looked in particularly happy spirits while arriving with co-host Georgie Gardner at the fundraiser event for SISTER2sister at Bistro Moncur in Mosman, Sydney.

Waking up with Georgie and Ben? Guests at the Public House Group Charity Luncheon were offered a glimpse of Channel Nine's rumoured 2019 breakfast show line-up on Friday afternoon

Georgie, 46, cut a stylish figure in a pink dress and beige studded heels as she posed next to Channel Nine's new golden boy.

Meanwhile, Ben looked delightfully dapper in a white jacket over a pale blue shirt, finishing off his ensemble with smart brown shoes.

The pair couldn't wipe the smiles off their faces as they enjoyed a welcome break from the drama that has engulfed the network following the Ubergate scandal.

The new Karl? Ben Fordham looked in particularly happy spirits while arriving with Today co-host Georgie Gardner at the fundraiser for SISTER2sister at Bistro Moncur in Mosman, Sydney

Woman's Day reported on Monday that Karl could be leaving the Today show in the coming months, allowing Ben to rise from fill-in presenter to official co-host.

A source claimed Nine has an 'exit strategy' in place that will see Ben - who is already the host of popular game show Australian Ninja Warrior - take over early next year.

'They plan to wheel Karl out as much as possible for 60 Minutes assignments, which will justify his absence from Today,' said the insider.

'Ben Fordham will fill in while he's gone, prepping him to take over in January 2019.' 

Industry whispers: On Monday, it was reported that Ben could be permanently replacing Karl Stefanovic as host of the Today show next year

In October, a network insider told The Saturday Telegraph that Karl had been 'begging' to leave Today and felt 'like a hostage' in the role.

The source also alleged that Channel Nine was tipping Karl as a possible replacement for Tracy Grimshaw as host of A Current Affair.

Daily Mail Australia has previously contacted Channel Nine for comment on Karl's alleged 'exit strategy'. 

Veteran journalist: Georgie, 46, cut a stylish figure in a pink dress and beige studded heels

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: 'My son is a gentleman': Telv Williams' mother defends the Married At First Sight star after claims he was only interested in a 'bachelor lifestyle' once filming stopped
item.description: Married At First Sight groom Telv Williams' mother has slammed reports he was only interested in the "single boy's lifestyle."
item.content:encoded:
Telv Williams' mother has hit back at claims her son was only interested in a 'single boy's lifestyle' once the cameras stopped rolling on Married At First Sight.   

On Monday, Telv's mother Tracey Bamblett Onus took aim at Sarah Roza's friend, celebrity medium Harry T, and insisted her son is a committed family man.

Speaking exclusively to Daily Mail Australia, she said that Telv is a kind-hearted, respectful person - and not at all like Harry T portrayed him to be.

Scroll down for video 

'My son is a gentleman': Telv Williams' mother Tracey has hit back at claims her son was only interested in a 'single boy's lifestyle' once the cameras stopped rolling on Married At First Sight

'My son is a gentleman,' she said resolutely, adding that he is committed to his children.    

On Sunday, Harry T took a swipe at Telv, claiming that his friend Sarah was upset by his allegedly 'inappropriate behaviour'. 

'She just couldn't tolerate such unacceptable and inappropriate behaviour from him when they were supposed to be in a committed and loving relationship,' he said. 

Defending her son: On Sunday, Harry T took a swipe at Telv, claiming that his friend Sarah was upset by his 'inappropriate behaviour' - however Tracey insists that her son is a 'gentleman'

In the past few weeks, Telv, 33, has been embroiled in several scandals.

A video surfaced of him snorting an unidentified white powder off a stripper's behind.

It also emerged Telv had pleaded guilty to one count of assault, with no conviction recorded, stemming from an incident when he was 18.

'He was 18 then he's now a 33-year-old man,' Tracey said, emphasising that he has long since moved past that incident. 

'He's a 33-year-old man now': Telv's mother also hit back at critics of her son who condemned him for a violent incident he was involved in as a teenager

Speaking of the fallout from Married At First Sight, Tracey said she believes Telv needs to be single for a while.

However she insisted that Telv went into the experiment genuinely looking for love.

'Leading up to the show, he said, "I hope I find the love of my life", Tracey recalled.

'Doesn't like to dwell': While Telv has remained tight-lipped about MAFS and the negative publicity he has attracted, Tracey said he was coping well despite feeling 'used' by producers

While Telv has remained tight-lipped about MAFS and the negative publicity he has attracted, his mother said he was coping well despite feeling 'used' by producers.

'I suppose his feeling... what's the word, when you feel pushed into things?' she said, before adding that the show has been a difficult experience for him.

'He's not very happy about the way it all happened (but) he takes things in his stride and doesn't like to dwell on them too much.' 

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Channel Nine for comment.

item.title: Who's the mystery guy? Married At First Sight's Blair Rachael teases new romance as she goes on a 'date night'...after 'ex-husband' Sean Thomsen prepares to move in with Tracey Jewel
item.description: She failed to find love with 'husband' Sean Thomsen on Married At First Sight, with Sean now moving on with fellow MAFS star Tracey Jewel.
item.content:encoded:
She failed to find love with 'husband' Sean Thomsen on Married At First Sight, with Sean now moving on with fellow MAFS star Tracey Jewel.

And this week, Blair Rachael hinted she might have a new man. 

The blonde revealed on her Instagram storythat she went on a 'date night' with a mystery man. 

Scroll down for video 

Who's the mystery guy? Married At First Sight's Blair Rachael teases new romance as she goes on a 'date night'...as 'ex-husband' Sean Thomsen (seen with her) prepares to move in with Tracey Jewel

Keeping his identity under wraps, her date's hands can be seen as they were about to tuck into some soup.  

It comes after she joked online about her relationship status. 

Sharing a meme, it read: 'Relationship status. Avocado.'

New romance? Keeping his identity under wraps, her date's hands can be seen as they were about to tuck into some soup

'Avocado': It comes after she joked online about her relationship status

Her ex Sean is now in a relationship with Tracey Jewel, who was 'married' to Dean Wells on MAFS. 

Tracey confirmed this week that she's moving to Melbourne to live with Sean. 

Speaking to New Idea, the 35-year-old revealed her eight-year-old daughter will visit her on 'school holidays.'  

'We are moving to Melbourne! When we move there, I want to focus on my writing and Sean's almost qualified as a personal trainer,' Tracey said.  

Moving on: Her ex Sean is now in a relationship with Tracey Jewel (seen), who was 'married' to Dean Wells on MAFS

Speaking about Grace, her child from a previous relationship, Tracey added: 'I'll travel to Perth regularly to see my daughter and she'll come here on school holidays.'

Tracey emphasised that her new romance 'isn't a rebound relationship'. Meanwhile, Sean described his girlfriend as 'the love of (his) life'. 

Despite Tracey revealing her daughter will not live with them full-time in Melbourne, she told Daily Mail Australia on Thursday that Grace and Sean have already bonded.

Tracey said that the pair get along 'like great mates' and enjoy playing board games.

She added: '(Grace) has been fine with this whole thing. I've been open and honest with her. It was my decision for her not to be filmed or part of it, but I certainly kept her in the loop about everything that's been happening.' 

It's serious! Tracey confirmed this week that she's moving to Melbourne to live with Sean

item.title: From Sam Cochrane's uncanny resemblance to David Spade to Michael Turnbull's 'tea towel' shirt: Bachelor In Paradise fans share hilarious memes after the show's debut
item.description: Hilarious Bachelor In Paradise memes emerge, including Sam Cochrane's resemblance to comedian David Spade, and Michael Turnbull's 'tea towel' T-shirt.
item.content:encoded:
It may have debuted to disappointing ratings, but Bachelor In Paradise has certainly delivered when it comes to top quality memes.

Following the show's debut on Sunday, viewers wasted no time in taking to Twitter to share their hilarious (and creative) observations about the cast members.

Fans poked lighthearted fun of Sam Cochrane's resemblance to US comedian David Spade, as well as Michael Turnbull's singlet that looked more like a 'tea towel'.

Hilarious: A viewer draws attention to Sam Cochrane's [L] resemblance to actor David Spade [R] on Twitter, after the debut of Bachelor In Paradise 

One side-by-side photo shows Sam - who appeared on Sophie Monk's season of The Bachelorette - looking remarkably similar to David Spade, 53.

The hilarious tweet was captioned: 'Said it once, I'll say it again'.

Another viewer poked fun of Michael Turnbull's attire - or, rather, lack of attire. 

Can you see it? A side-by-side image of the pair is captioned: 'Said it once, I'll say it again' 

Daring to bare: Another viewer draws attention to Michael Turnbull's attire, or rather lack of attire, with his muscle tank barely covering his pecs and washboard abs 

A screen grab of Monday night's episode shows the well-groomed lad sitting alongside Tara Pavlovic and Nina Rolleston in a muscle tank, that barely covers his pecs and washboard abs.

The image is captioned: 'Everyone is watching Davey and Jake and Flo and Laurina and Blake and I'm just here wondering if Michael's shirt is actually a shirt or a tea towel draped over his shoulders'.

Drawing attention to a rather emotional Tara Pavlovic, one social media user compares the Channel Ten personality to Will Ferrell's Anchorman character Ron Burgundy.

Dramatic: One likens Tara Pavlovic's emotional breakdown to Will Ferrell's iconic Anchorman character Ron Burgundy 

Ironic? One also mocks Keira Maguire's declaration of being 'real' despite having had numerous cosmetic surgery procedures 

Return: Another prepares for the debut on Jarrod Woodgate on Tuesday's episode, with the hilarious post referencing his habit for gift giving: 'For those wondering where Jarrod is, he's trying to get his pot plant through quarantine'

An image of Ron in a powder blue suit jacket and a white turtleneck features the text 'I'm a glass case of emotion' and is captioned: 'I know Tara is basically Australia's Princess Diana but calm down love it's just #BachelorInParadiseAU'.

Fans were also quick to post hilarious one-liners, one of which details the irony of plastic surgery enthusiast Keira Maguire describing herself as real: 'Keira - funniest line 'I'm real' with her fake boobs, fake teeth, fake lips...'

Another also reflects on upcoming cast member Jarrod Woodgate's prior attempts at wooing the ladies, particularly with his gift giving: 'For those wondering where Jarrod is, he's trying to get his pot plant through quarantine'.  

Juicy: Tuesday night's episode sees Keira shamelessly flirting up a storm with Jarrod
item.dc:abstract: It may have debuted to disappointing ratings, but Bachelor In Paradise has certainly delivered when it comes to top quality memes. Following the show's debut on Sunday, viewers wasted no time in taking to Twitter to share their hilarious (and creative) observations about the cast members. Fans poked lighthearted fun of Sam Cochrane's resemblance to US comedian David Spade, as well as Michael Turnbull's singlet that looked more like a 'tea towel'.

item.title: Busty Lilly Becker puts on an eye-popping display as she slips into daring bandeau bikini during idyllic Miami trip
item.description: The 41-year-old Dutch model highlighted her enviable pins in the daring bandeau two-piece alongside her eight-year-old son Amadeus on Miami beach.
item.content:encoded:
She has been showcasing her sensational figure while holidaying in Miami.

And Lilly Becker continued to flaunt her incredible curves as she soaked up the Florida sun on Monday in a head-turning crochet two-piece.

The 41-year-old Dutch model highlighted her enviable pins and taut stomach in the daring bandeau two-piece alongside her eight-year-old son Amadeus on Miami beach. 

Bikini babe: Lilly Becker continued to flaunt her incredible curves as she soaked up the Florida sun on Monday in a head-turning crochet two-piece

The European beauty commanded attention along the shore in her strapless bikini top which accentuated her ample cleavage as she exited the sea following her cooling dip.

She exhibited her pert posterior in her swimwear while she walked along the sand, looking utterly relaxed. 

Make-up free Lilly donned a pair of oversized circular shades while she covered her waist-length braids with a backwards baseball cap.

Ever thew doting mother, she later playfully built sand castles with her little boy Amadeus, before they both went for a swim in the crystal clear sea.

Work it: The 41-year-old Dutch model highlighted her enviable pins and taut stomach in the daring bandeau two-piece

Seas the day: She exhibited her pert posterior in her swimwear while she walked along the sand, looking utterly relaxed

Her outing comes nine months after her husband Boris' financial woes hit the headlines in June when it was reported that he never paid back an undisclosed debt to a private bank.

In October, the 50-year-old insisted that his bankruptcy was a 'misunderstanding', explaining that he is 'in a position' to settle the bill.

Speaking to The Times, the former Tennis pro claimed that the situation arose because of a dispute over the interest he owes.

He said: 'I am in a position to settle to an amount that I owe. It's a bit like if you go to a restaurant and order a chicken sandwich and a cola and the bill is £10,000.

Fresh-faced: Lilly opted to go make-up free for the sun-soaked outing

Waist not: Lilly highlighted her narrow midriff and gym-honed figure

'I'd like to go over the bill with the restaurant owner and that chance hasn't been given to me. That's why I call this a big misunderstanding. I'm not running away. I live in the middle of London. I'm not hiding.'

There is a possibility Boris' bankruptcy could be annulled should he settle his dispute in the coming months.

In light of his woes, the German star has set his sights on reaching a resolution, which he deemed as 'important' to him.

He said: 'I would like to have an annulment. It's important to me. I could sit it out and say, "My doctor is telling me I need a holiday; my wife hasn't seen me much." Theoretically I could do that, but that is the last thing I want to do. To clarify, I want to settle the bill and move on with my life.'

No shade: Lilly donned a pair of oversized circular shades for the day

Plait's nice: She covered her waist-length braids with a backwards baseball cap

Shore thing: Her outing comes nine months after her husband Boris' financial woes hit the headlines in June when it was reported that he never paid back an undisclosed debt to a private bank

And the former Wimbledon champion explained that he takes 'full responsibility' for his financial situation but had the bank played theoretical tennis 'doubles' with him, he would have avoided his bankruptcy.

His frank interview comes after the sportsman reportedly earned in the region of £100million throughout his career, but was declared bankrupt in June over a £3.3million debt.

Speaking in an interview with Swiss newspaper, Neue Zürcher Zeitung, Mr Becker said: 'It's crazy to think I'm broke'.

'I have enough national and international deals to earn an income that will allow me to pay my staff on time and carry on my life as normal. It's true that I have been in bankruptcy since June 21, but it's wrong that I am broke.' 

Water about that: In October, the 50-year-old insisted that his bankruptcy was a 'misunderstanding', explaining that he is 'in a position' to settle the bill

Ray of light: Speaking to The Times, the former Tennis pro claimed that the situation arose because of a dispute over the interest he owes

Boris married his first wife Barbara in December 1993, with the couple going on to have Noah and Elias. 

However in the summer of 1999, while Barbara was seven months pregnant with Elias, Boris fathered his daughter Anna during a one-night-stand with Russian model Angela Ermakova at Nobu in London.

When Barbara found out about the one night stand she moved to Florida and filed for divorce.

Splish splash: Ever thew doting mother, she later playfully built sand castles with her little boy Amadeus, before they both went for a swim in the crystal clear sea

Bonding: Lilly's little boy donned a pair of red swimshorts which matched his goggles

She fought their pre-nuptial agreement and managed to win more than £14million and the custody of both sons in a divorce court.

Although Boris disputed paternity, a DNA test in February 2001 proved that he was the father and he agreed to support Anna, now a budding model, and obtained joint custody in November 2007.

After moving to Switzerland and enjoying a few years out of in the media spotlight, Becker remarried in 12 June 2009 in St Moritz, Switzerland to the Dutch model. 

Family time: She looked delighted as they spent time together
item.dc:abstract: She has been showcasing her sensational figure while holidaying in Miami. And Lilly Becker continued to flaunt her incredible curves as she soaked up the Florida sun on Monday in a head-turning crochet two-piece.

item.title: 'My mum's got the wine disease': Lisa Oldfield recalls how a comment from her young son and a family intervention made her quit drinking for good
item.description: During her stint on I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Outta Here, Lisa Oldfield revealed she quit drinking.
item.content:encoded:
During her stint on I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Outta Here, Lisa Oldfield revealed she quit drinking. 

And on Monday, the Real Housewives of Sydney star confessed it hasn't been an easy battle, and even entered rehab for her condition earlier this year.

Speaking to Celeb HQ's John Caldwell on Monday, the 43-year-old said she was sent to the Mosman Private clinic after an intervention by her parents.

Seeking help: On Monday, Lisa Oldfield opened up about her battle with alcoholism and her recent stint in rehab

'My parents said; 'Enough is enough, you've got a problem',' recalled Lisa. 

Adding that she did go kicking and screaming, it was the right thing for her. 

After experiencing a violent sexual assault past, Lisa's drinking was a way to mask the PTSD pain she was suffering. 

Motivation: 'Bert [her son] who's five would say: 'My mum's got the wine disease'. I'd have to stop at the pub on the way home and have two glasses of wine and then I'd have a bottle when I got home'

Too much: Adding that she'd wake up each morning hoping she didn't do or say anything that would've hurt someone, she now vows to never drink again

'I started to self medicate. I was taking painkillers and it was just easier to go home and drink a bottle of wine a night,' she said.

'Bert [her son] who's five would say: 'My mum's got the wine disease'. I'd have to stop at the pub on the way home and have two glasses of wine and then I'd have a bottle when I got home.' 

Adding that she'd wake up each morning hoping she didn't do or say anything that would've hurt someone, she now vows to never drink again. 

Look at her go: But rehab wasn't all bad for Lisa, revealing that she managed to turn it into quite the fitness driven experience

But rehab wasn't all bad for Lisa, revealing that she managed to turn it into quite the fitness driven experience. 

Entering the facility alongside a personal trainer, the pair spent their free time and newfound energy running up to 17km a day. 

And avoiding any interest from the paparazzi, the Real Housewives Of Sydney star added that she dodged photographers by wearing 'a fabulous blonde wig.' 

If you or anyone you know is struggling, contact Lifeline on 13 11 14.

New trim physique: Entering the facility alongside a personal trainer, the pair spent their free time and newfound energy running up to 17km a day

item.title: 'Clearly can't afford sunscreen on the island': Twitter mercilessly mocks 'red' Bachelor In Paradise contestants for appearing sunburned
item.description: During Monday night's episode of Bachelor In Paradise, viewers took to Twitter to mock the castmates for their sunburned complexions.
item.content:encoded:
NW recently reported that Bachelor In Paradise stars didn't use condoms whilst filming the series in Fiji.

And it now appears there was another form of protection that the castmates also chose to forgo.

During Monday night's episode of the show, viewers took to Twitter to mock the stars for their pinkish complexions which came about after they forgot to apply sunscreen.

Roses are red and so are the contestants! During Monday night's episode of Bachelor In Paradise, viewers took to Twitter to mock the castmates for their sunburned complexions

They're already red hot! One Twitter user remarked upon how burnt the castmates were after just two days in Fiji

Stars including Davey Lloyd and Florence Alexandra Sophia were seen looking a little sun-kissed during the episode, despite it being filmed very early on during their stay in Fiji.

'Loving how sunburnt everyone is already' one viewer wrote.

Another claimed that the cast's collective sunburn may have been an indicator of their intelligence levels. 

Pretty and pink! Stars including Florence Alexandra Sophia were seen looking a little sun-kissed during the episode

Sarcasm: Another claimed that the cast's collective sunburn may have been an indicator of their intelligence levels

Budget cuts? Another viewer thought that a lack of sunscreen was less about intelligence and more about Channel Ten's struggling budget

'Everyones (sic) sunburnt after one day. Smart people in there' they sarcastically remarked.

Another viewer thought that a lack of sunscreen was less about intelligence and more about Channel Ten's struggling budget.

'Clearly can't afford sunscreen on the island - talk about pink people' they quipped.  

Sizzling hot! It seems Florence chose to leave the sunscreen back in Australia as she strolled around in a bikini top 

Going without protection? A number of the castmates including Blake Colman were seen sporting pink complexions

Now thats an idea! A savvy fan shared a post to Twitter urging the program to get a strategic sponsor on board

A savvy fan shared a post to Twitter urging the program to get a strategic sponsor on board. 

'Can a sunscreen brand please sponsor AUS Bachelor In Paradise?' they asked, adding the hashtags 'burnt', 'red' and 'skin cells in trauma'.

But it appears there's little  chance that the cast will slip, slop and slap anytime soon.

A preview for Tuesday night's episode saw a red-faced Jarrod Woodgate intruding onto the island.

However, it's unclear whether he was sunburned or whether the pinkish tinge was a part of his natural complexion.  

Sun safety: While Tara chose to protect her famous face with a broad brimmed hat, she still looked a little red

Seeing red: Contestant Brett Moore was shed his shirt to show off sun-kissed skin

Sunburned? A preview for Tuesday night's episode saw a red-faced Jarrod Woodgate intruding onto the island
item.dc:abstract: NW recently reported that Bachelor In Paradise stars didn't use condoms whilst filming the series in Fiji. And it now appears there was another form of protection that the castmates also chose to forgo. During Monday night's episode of the show, viewers took to Twitter to mock the stars for their pinkish complexions which came about after they forgot to apply sunscreen.

item.title: 'They say oysters make a woman really horny... not the way I eat them!' MAFS' Ryan Gallagher mocks his failed 'marriage' to Davina Rankin during cringeworthy stand-up comedy debut
item.description: He's the Sydney tradesman who certainly wasn't laughing when he found out his Married At First Sight 'wife' Davina Rankin was cheating on him.
item.content:encoded:
He's the Sydney tradesman who certainly wasn't laughing when he found out his Married At First Sight 'wife' Davina Rankin was cheating on him.

And after revealing last month that his next career move was in stand-up comedy, over the weekend, Ryan Gallagher made his debut. 

Performing in front of a full crowd at The Yarraville Club in Melbourne, the 29-year-old grasped onto his recent reality appearance, using his divorce as material. 

Cringe! Ryan Gallagher made his stand-up comedy debut last week and wasted no time mocking his failed 'marriage' to Davina Rankin (R)

'I really tried in the marriage,' he said, adding: 'I even ate oysters.' 

Referring to his honeymoon with wife Davina Rankin, the reality star-turned-funnyman even cracked a joke about how she left him for another married man.   

'They say oysters make a woman really horny... not the way I eat them,' he said while the crowd roared into fits of laughter. 

Supportive mates: Ryan's MAFS co-stars were in the audience cheering him on

'They made Davina really horny though....for Dean.' 

And it seemed as though it was quite the turn-out for Ryan's first gig, with co-stars Dean Wells, Patrick Miller, Matty Lockett, John Robertson, Telv Williams, Charlene Perera and last year's Nick Furphy all coming out. 

Tickets for the show ranged from $35 to the way to $90 for VIP dinner and show access. 

Great turn out! Co-stars Dean Wells, Patrick Miller, Matty Lockett, John Robertson, Telv Williams, Charlene Perera and last year's Nick Furphy all showed up

Speaking to the Daily Telegraph last month, the hunky Sydney tradie revealed stand-up was his calling. 

'I've always liked comedy. I want to have a go at stand-up,' he said. 

'I don't want to go back to  what I did before,' he added, hinting that he wanted to capitalise on his newfound fame.
item.dc:abstract: He's the Sydney tradesman who certainly wasn't laughing when he found out his Married At First Sight 'wife' Davina Rankin was cheating on him. And after revealing last month that his next career move was in stand-up comedy, over the weekend, Ryan Gallagher made his debut. Performing in front of a full crowd at The Yarraville Club in Melbourne, the 29-year-old grasped onto his recent reality appearance, using his divorce as material.

item.title: 'Slow news day hey': Bachelor winner Laura Byrne refuses to confirm whether or not she's had Botox injections
item.description: Bachelor winner Laura Byrne has refused to admit if she's had botox, after appearing to joke about the cosmetic procedure.
item.content:encoded:
She's The Bachelor winner known for her flawless visage.  

And on Sunday, Laura Byrne, 32, joked that her perfect complexion might have had a little help along the way, with the common injectable Botox. 

Taking to Instagram, Laura uploaded a short clip of herself with Bachelor in Paradise star Florence Alexandra, with the pair having a mock interview at the Grand Prix. 

Sitting together at the Melbourne event, the clip shows the pair laughing and joking, only for Florence to say: 'Why does your face not move?' 

Brunette beauty Laura, then appearing to jokingly say: 'Botox.' 

Following the upload of the video, Daily Mail Australia contacted the former reality star, asking if she had undergone the procedure. 

'Slow news day hey': Laura Byrne, 32, has refused to confirm if she's undergone a Botox treatment, after appearing to joke about it in a mock interview with Bachelor in Paradise star, Florence Alexandra 

To which she replied: 'Slow news day hey,' adding two 'laughing crying,' emojis. 

The former reality star is known for her complexion, with Laura having a radiant glow in the selfies she posts to her Instagram account.  

It comes after she posted a close-up of herself last week, while appearing to be asleep, next to a glamours picture in a side-by-side.   

Perfect skin! The TV personality is known for her flawless complexion with the former reality star barely having a line on her face

The brunette beauty captioned the hilarious post: 'What I think I look like vs the goddess Matt gets to gaze at every single time we are on a plane.'

She joked, 'I know what you're thinking .... lucky guy.'

The statuesque beauty highlighted her 'what I think I look like' shot by sharing a rather fetching selfie. 

'What I think I look like vs the goddess Matt gets to gaze at every single time we are on a plane': Earlier this month, Laura shared a hilarious side-by-side of herself on a plane

In the snap, Laura's skin is positively glowing as she styles her mane in soft, beach waves.  

Whereas in the second snap, the jewellery designer draws attention to the rather funny face she is pulling as she dozes on an airplane.

In the seemingly makeup free snap, Lauren looks flushed as she rolls her tongue to one side of her mouth.  

It seems Matty J and Laura are still as smitten as ever, after they were snapped packing on the PDA at The Virgin Australia Melbourne Fashion Festival earlier that month. 

Date night! It seems Matty J and Laura are still as smitten as ever, after they were snapped packing on the PDA at The Virgin Australia Melbourne Fashion Festival earlier this month

One year later! Their date night comes after the Bondi beauty took to Instagram at the beginning of March, to pay tribute to her beau exactly 12 months after they first met at a cocktail party
item.dc:abstract: She's The Bachelor winner who is known for her flawless visage. And on Sunday, Laura Byrne, 32, might have let slip that her perfect complexion might have had a little help along the way - with the common injectable Botox. Taking to Instagram, Laura uploaded a short clip of herself with Bachelor in Paradise star Florence Alexandra, with the pair having a mock interview at the Grand Prix.

item.title: 'That’s who I got it from, it’s not my fault!' Roxy Jacenko blames her mother Doreen for her selfie obsession... after making the surprise admission that she 'doesn't like photo shoots'
item.description: Roxy Jacenko , 37, revealed she inherited her selfie-taking prowess from the Jacenko matriarch.
item.content:encoded:
She's the Sydney PR queen who's known for her 'lift outfit selfies'.

But this week, Roxy Jacenko, 37, revealed she inherited her selfie-taking prowess from the Jacenko matriarch.

In episode four of 'The REAL roxy' YouTube show, the 37-year-old publicist let slip her mother Doreen Jacenko is actually to blame for her selfie obsession.

Scroll down for video 

‘That’s who I got it from, it’s not my fault!’ Roxy Jacenko blames her MOTHER Doreen for her selfie obsession

In the clip, Roxy caught Doreen reclining on her Bentley convertible's bonnet in order to capture the perfect snap.

'Awww Mum!' Roxy shrieked as the pair burst into fits of laughter.

Roxy's smirk widened as her age-defying mother proceeded to snap more selfies with the black glossy car. 

Like mother like daughter: Roxy's smirk widened as her age-defying mother proceeded to snap more selfies with the black, glossy car

'See that's who I got it from, it's not my fault!' Roxy exclaimed emphatically to the camera.

Earlier in the YouTube show, the PR juggernaut spotted her mother working her angles in front of the luxury vehicle. 

Doreen! Earlier in the YouTube show, the PR juggernaut spotted her mother working her angles in front of the luxury vehicle

'What it takes to get the perfect selfie,' the Sydney-based stunner joked.  

Although Roxy's social media channels are littered with selfies, she revealed earlier this month she doesn't like 'interviews' or 'photo shoots.'

Talking to website The Beauty Directory on Friday, the mother of two said she prefers a more behind-the-scenes role as opposed to being the face of a brand 

She got it from her muma: Roxy is  known for her 'lift outfit selfies'

'I'm not really much of a fan of the interview thing,' Roxy, who acts as an ambassador for Skinny Tan, Toni and Guy and Stan Australia shared.

'And not that much if a fan of the photo shoot thing.'

'I'm not a fan of the photo shoot thing': Although Roxy's social media channels are littered with selfies, she revealed earlier this month she doesn't like 'interviews' or 'photo shoots.'

In the interview, the high-flying publicist admitted her recent shoot for Skinny Tan took it out of her, saying she has a newfound respect for working models. 

'I got back to the office after that Skinny Tan shoot and literally laid on the floor and said I think I'm going to die,' she said. 

'It was such hard work, it's much easier to be tapping away at the computer.'   

No fun in the sun?! In the interview, the high-flying publicist admitted her recent shoot for Skinny Tan took it out of her, saying she has a newfound respect for working models
item.dc:abstract: She's the Sydney PR queen who's known equally for her marketing prowess as she is for her 'lift outfit selfies'. But this week, Roxy Jacenko, 37, revealed she inherited her selfie-taking prowess from the Jacenko matriarch. In episode four of 'The REAL roxy' YouTube show, the 37-year-old publicists let slip her mother Doreen Jacenko is actually to blame for her selfie obsession.
item.dc:creator: Jade Watkins
item.mi:shortTitle: Roxy Jacenko blames her MOTHER Doreen for her selfie obsession

item.title: 'I want a good girl that does some freaky s**t!' Davey Lloyd reveals he's hoping to 'find The One and have children in the next two years'... after failing to get a rose from Florence on Bachelor In Paradise
item.description: He failed to find love on Bachelor In Paradise, despite having his sights set on Florence Alexandra.
item.content:encoded:
He failed to find love on Bachelor In Paradise, despite having his sights set on Florence Alexandra. 

And on Tuesday, Davey Lloyd revealed the 'pressure' is on because he wants to 'find The One' and have children in the next two years.

The 28-year-old told Kyle and Jackie O he wants a 'good girl' - before agreeing with Kyle when the KIIS FM host joked, 'A good girl that does some freaky s**t!'

Scroll down for video 

'I want a good girl that does some freaky s**t!' Davey Lloyd revealed on Tuesday he's hoping to 'find The One and have children in the next two years' after leaving Bachelor In Paradise

'Absolutely,' Davey said, adding that he didn't know if he could say that live on-air. 

Davey was asked about why he 'can't find love', after being booted off Bachelor In Paradise on Monday night.   

'It's not the fact I can't find love. It's just that I haven't found the right one yet,' Davey replied.

Failed romance: He failed to find love on Bachelor In Paradise, despite having his sights set on Florence Alexandra (pictured)

He added: 'I'm at the age now, if I think something isn't going somewhere, I need to pull it.

'Because I essentially want to find The One and settle down.'

Davey explained that he needs to make sure his next relationship is the right one.

'I need to make sure that this next one is the right decision... maybe I put too much pressure on myself,' he said.

'I don't want to waste any years. I'm 28. By the time I'm 30, I want to be settled down with kids.' 

Not playing games: 'I'm at the age now, if I think something isn't going somewhere, I need to pull it,' Davey said

Not the one for him? On Bachelor In Paradise on Monday, Davey was booted off the show. While in Fiji, he kissed villain Leah Costa (pictured), before regretting his decision

On Bachelor In Paradise on Monday, Davey was booted off the show. 

While in Fiji, he kissed villain Leah Costa, before regretting his decision and expressing a desire to pursue a romance with Florence Alexandra. 

But Davey failed to get a rose from either Leah or Florence at the end of the episode.   

Lucky: Davey failed to get a rose from either Leah or Florence. Florence ultimately chose to see if her already existing spark with Jake (seen) would turn into something more
item.dc:abstract: He failed to find love on Bachelor In Paradise, despite having his sights set on Florence Alexandra. item.title: Newly-single Alessandra Ambrosio flashes plenty of sideboob in dazzling velvet gown as she attends amfAR charity gala in Hong Kong
item.description: The 36-year-old Brazilian supermodel made sure to command attention as she flashed plenty of sideboob in her demure black full-length gown with sparkling gem-encrusted straps.
item.content:encoded:
She recently confirmed her split with fiance Jamie Mazur after 10 years together.

Following the news, Alessandra Ambrosio put her best fashion foot forward as she attended the fourth amfAR Charity Gala in Hong Kong on Monday night at Shaw Studios. 

The 36-year-old Brazilian supermodel made sure to command attention as she flashed plenty of sideboob in her demure black full-length gown with sparkling gem-encrusted straps.

Scroll down for video 

Head-turning: Alessandra Ambrosio put her best fashion foot forward as she attended the fourth amfAR Charity Gala in Hong Kong on Monday night at Shaw Studios

The fashion star's velvet gown perilously plunged down her back in dramatic style, highlighting her incredible figure and narrow torso.

Proudly flaunting her gym-honed figure, the former VS Angel paired her head-turning look with a pair of statement drop diamond earrings and dazzling diamond rings.

She kept to her glamorous display by working her long brunette locks into a sleek style slicked back of her face while sporting a vibrant red lip to tie the formal attire together. 

Eye-popping: The 36-year-old Brazilian supermodel made sure to command attention as she flashed plenty of sideboob in her demure black full-length gown with sparkling gem-encrusted straps

Mane attraction: She kept to her glamorous display by working her long brunette locks into a sleek style slicked back of her face while sporting a vibrant red lip to tie the formal attire together

Her dazzling red carpet arrival comes after news broke earlier this month that the catwalk queen split with her fiance of 10 years, Jamie Mazur.

The shocking split has yet to be confirmed by the Brazilian beauty who shares two children - daughter Anja, nine, and son Noah, five - with the businessman.

'They [have] been trying to keep their split on the down low,' an insider told Us Weekly.

Striking: The fashion star's velvet gown perilously plunged down her back in dramatic style, highlighting her incredible figure and narrow torso

Model behaviour: Proudly flaunting her gym-honed figure, the former VS Angel paired her head-turning look with a pair of statement drop diamond earrings and dazzling diamond rings alongside fellow model Shanina Shaik

'But Alessandra has been out and about ready to mingle and hasn't been taking Jamie to anything.'

Alessandra retired from walking the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show catwalk in 2017 after nearly two decades on the famous runway.

She explained to Entertainment Tonight why she was ending her nearly 20-year career with the lingerie powerhouse, saying: 'Victoria’s Secret is my family, but you know it’s time to move on. Momma is tired.'

Moving on: Her dazzling red carpet arrival comes after news broke earlier this month that the catwalk queen split with her fiance of 10 years, Jamie Mazur
item.dc:abstract: She recently confirmed her split with fiance Jamie Mazur after 10 years together. Following the news, Alessandra Ambrosio put her best fashion foot forward as she attended the fourth amfAR Charity Gala in Hong Kong on Monday night at Shaw Studios.

item.title: Precious! Lindy Klim captures newborn daughter Goldie's 'first giggle' in heartwarming video
item.description: The adorable post saw the 39-year-old capturing her newborn's 'first giggle'.
item.content:encoded:
She gave birth to daughter Goldie just over three months ago.

And proud mother Lindy Klim shared a heartwarming clip pf her baby girl to her Instagram Story on Monday.

The adorable post saw the 39-year-old capturing her newborn's 'first giggle'. 

Scroll down for video 

Precious! Lindy Klim captures newborn daughter Goldie's 'first giggle' in heartwarming video 

Wearing a fluffy robe, Lindy is seen doting on her precious daughter, who lays on a plush bed.

Tickling Goldie's stomach, the little one is heard giggling and letting out a wide grin.

Proud father and Lindy's fiance Adam Ellis is heard in the background letting out an appreciative sigh.

Lindy captioned the sweet moment: 'Goldie's first giggle!!! I can't believe we managed to capture it!' 

Adorable: Little Goldie looked cute in a white onesie with a pastel print 

Addition: Lindy welcomed Goldie, her first child with fiancé Adam Ellis, just over three months ago 

Goldie is the fourth child for Lindy, who is already a proud parent to daughters Stella, 11, Frankie, 6, and son Rocco, 9, with ex-husband Michael Klim. 

The model called time on their high-profile marriage in February 2016.

She then became engaged to British property developer Adam in October of that year after a whirlwind romance.

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia back in 2016, Lindy said she didn't predict falling back in love so soon after her split from former Olympian Michael.

Family: Goldie is the fourth child for Lindy, already a proud parent to daughters Stella, 11, Frankie, 6, and son Rocco, 9, with ex-husband Michael Klim 

'[It's] completely not what I expected, to fall back into another relationship, but he's so lovely,' she said cheerfully.

'It's about time I got on with my life,' Lindy continued.

The brand ambassador also said it was 'difficult' juggling single parenthood and wished Michael and his new flame Desiree Deravi 'all the best.' 

New flame: Lindy's ex-husband Michael Klim [pictured] has moved on with Desiree Deravi [also pictured] following the breakdown of their marriage in February 2016
item.dc:abstract: She gave birth to daughter Goldie just over three months ago. And proud mother Lindy Klim shared a heartwarming clip pf her baby girl to her Instagram Story on Monday. The adorable post saw the 39-year-old capturing her newborn's 'first giggle'.
item.dc:creator: Kristy Johnson
item.mi:shortTitle: Lindy Klim's newborn Goldie giggles for the first time

item.title: Chilling out! Selena Gomez dons all-white tracksuit to take her pal's young son ice skating in Los Angeles
item.description: The star took her friend's son for a day of ice skating. Despite being a skating aficionado, her on/off boyfriend Justin Bieber was not present, as the couple are currently 'off' mode.
item.content:encoded:
Selena Gomez was spotted on the arm of a handsome young man on Monday.

The 25-year-old was in Los Angeles to take her friend's son ice-skating.

The singer rocked an all-white tracksuit for her date, pairing the loose fitting hoodie and sweat pants with white socks and trainers.

Date: Selena Gomez was spotted on the arm of a handsome young man on Monday

With silver hoops in her ears, her only other accessory was a solitary silver crucifix pendant, which she wore on the outside.

Not wanting to besmirch her sweater, she wore her skating admission sticker on her thigh.

Besides her phone, the Bad Liar hitmaker also carried an enormous hard copy of The Bible to read. 

Smooth: The 25-year-old was in Los Angeles to take her friend's son ice-skating

Chill: The singer rocked an all-white tracksuit for her date, pairing the loose fitting hoodie and sweat pants with white socks and trainers

Despite being a skating aficionado, her on/off boyfriend Justin Bieber was not present, as the couple are currently 'off' mode.

Reports surfaced earlier this month that Selena and Justin had ended their relationship once again.

The pair - who dated on and off from 2011 to 2015 - got back together in November and were inseparable until March.

Christian: With silver hoops in her ears, her only other accessory was a solitary silver crucifix pendant, which she wore on the outside

Light reading: Besides her phone, the Bad Liar hitmaker also carried an enormous hard copy of The Bible to read

It has been claimed the Hands To Myself hitmaker is 'taking time to herself' away from the spotlight in a bid to come to terms with the split and reconcile her relationship with her mother, who was blamed for the break-up.

'She is taking time to herself,' a source told ET. 'This is not the first time she has done this.' 

Justin meanwhile has been since romantically linked to Abby Champion's little sister, Baskin. 

Absent: Despite being a skating aficionado, her on/off boyfriend Justin Bieber was not present, as the couple are currently 'off' mode
