item.title: Caroline Flack and Andrew Brady split: Love Island host DUMPS CBB star beau amid fresh cheating claims... days after introducing him to her family
item.description: Sources revealed: 'Caroline ended things with Andrew after realising that he hadn’t been entirely honest with her. She felt like she couldn’t trust him. Things started to unravel'
item.content:encoded:
Caroline Flack has split from her boyfriend Andrew Brady amid fresh claims he cheated on her a second time, three weeks after it was alleged he cheated during a nightclub appearance.

Insiders revealed she parted ways with the Celebrity Big Brother favourite just days after introducing him to her entire family at her father's 70th birthday, amid claims she discovered he was 'being dishonest with her'.

A source told MailOnline: 'First of all there was the first girl who came forward and then there was a second girl and while it wasn't proven but its broken down the trust. She's obviously very upset.'  

Tough times: Caroline Flack has reportedly split from her boyfriend Andrew Brady amid claims he cheated on her during a nightclub appearance

MailOnline has contacted Andrew's representatives for comment. Caroline's team declined to comment when approached. 

Meanwhile sources told The Sun: 'Caroline ended things with Andrew after realising that he hadn’t been entirely honest with her. She felt like she couldn’t trust him. Things started to unravel after the first cheating claim.' 

Undoubtedly red-faced over recent events, Caroline removed all traces of the reality star from her social media having littered her Instagram stories with posts of her dad's 70th birthday - where Andrew was buddying up with her family.  

Just hours after the couple went public with their blossoming romance earlier this month, it was claimed Andrew smooched a club-goer on a night out beforehand.  

Happy days: Sources revealed: 'Caroline ended things with Andrew after realising that he hadn’t been entirely honest with her. She felt like she couldn’t trust him. Things started to unravel after the first cheating claim'

The so-called other woman laid bare the details as she said Andrew had been 'extremely drunk' on the night and she added Caroline wasn't angry with her. 

'Yeah, we spoke, she wasn't angry with me at all,' she told The Sun of her alleged kiss with the star. 'I got up in the morning and left.' 

The teacher insisted she only stole a smooch from the Apprentice star and she did not sleep with him, despite spending the night together. 

Andrew hit back at claims he cheated on the star a day after confirming their relationship - following the claims that plagued the start of their romance.

Defiant: Following the release of the news, Andrew told MailOnline: 'I have never seen this woman in my life', despite claims his appearance in Chester ended in a kiss'

The Sun reported that The Apprentice contestant 'shared a passionate kiss' with a dance teacher he met in a Chester night club a fortnight ago while he was still involved with the TV personality.

Following the release of the news, Andrew told MailOnline: 'I have never seen this woman in my life', despite claims his appearance in Chester ended in a kiss. 

The timing is devastating, as Caroline introduced the star to her family over the weekend when he attended her dad's 70th birthday bash.   

Before the cheating claims, Caroline went Instagram official with the reality star, posting a cute photo and adding: 'Having tried to get rid of him for a while he’s kinda just sticking around now.'
item.dc:abstract: Caroline Flack has reportedly split from her boyfriend Andrew Brady amid claims he cheated on her during a nightclub appearance. Insiders tell The Sun she parted ways with the Celebrity Big Brother favourite after discovering he was 'being dishonest with her'. Sources revealed: 'Caroline ended things with Andrew after realising that he hadn’t been entirely honest with her. She felt like she couldn’t trust him. Things started to unravel after the first cheating claim.'
item.dc:creator: Ciara Farmer
item.mi:shortTitle: Caroline Flack and Andrew Brady split: Host 'breaks up with CBB star'

item.title: Home And Away's Ray Meagher reveals he'd initially signed up to play Alf Stewart for just six months... as he celebrates 30 YEARS in popular role
item.description: Speaking on Monday's instalment of This Morning, the actor, 73, admitted he had reservations about being tied down when he was cast as one of the 18 original characters.
item.content:encoded:
He's beloved by generations of Home And Away fans, thanks to spending a staggering 30 years in his role as popular character Alf Stewart.

But Ray Meagher, 73, has admitted that when he initially signed up for the role in the late 1980s, it was only intended to be for six months, but kept getting extended.

Speaking on Monday's instalment of ITV show This Morning, the Australian actor admitted that he had reservations about being tied down when he was cast as one of the 18 original residents of the fictional Summer Bay.

Scroll down for video 

Here to stay: Home And Away star Ray Meagher has revealed that he'd initially signed up for his role as Alf Stewart on the soap for just six months

He told co-hosts Phillip Schofield and Holly Willoughby: 'I was a jobbing actor, lucky to be in regular work. It seemed like a life sentence to be on a show for two years.

'I agreed to do six months, that flew, another six months, a year, and after that the contracts have been three and five years since.

'The seduction was that as a jobbing actor, you fly all over the country. To go home to your own bed each night is pretty seductive. In 1988 we were all so confident I was convinced we’d get three months out of it.'

Longevity: The actor - seen in character with Piper Morrisey, left, and Pippa Kate Ritchie as Sally - has now marked a staggering 30 years on the long-running show

Special visit from Down Under: The 73-year-old actor spoke about his role during an appearance on ITV's This Morning on Monday

The veteran screen star, whose character first hit screens in January 1988, is the sole remaining original castmember - and holds the Guinness World Record for being the longest-serving actor in an Australian series.

To mark Queensland-born Ray's 30th anniversary on the show, his character his set to be involved in dramatic storyline, which will see him involved in a harrowing car crash on a construction site.

During the episode, which is set to air on March 26, fans will be left fearing for Alf's survival as he's shown collapsing through a sinkhole next to a gas main. 

Doubts: He revealed that he had reservations about committing to the show for even two years

What's in store? His milestone anniversary comes amid speculation he could retire this year

Of shooting the gripping scenes, Ray admitted: 'It wasn’t easy. The set was so real. There were shafts of light and a stone foundation. It was pretty incredible. There was also a lump of concrete on my chest.'

'There is somebody else in that sinkhole, who has no escape. I can’t tell you any more than that,' he cryptically concluded. 

He also spoke about the many success stories who have come out of the soap, including Liam Hemsworth and Isla Fisher, both of whom have gone on to become big stars in Hollywood.

Shock: Fans of the show are set to see Alf's life hang in the balance as he falls into a sinkhole

Record breaker: The Queensland-born screen star now holds the Guinness World Record for being the longest-serving actor in an Australian series

In the navy: The actor looked casually cool in a navy sweater and trousers, with a checked shirt

'Chris is the runaway success,' said Ray, before jokingly adding: 'I’d swap careers with Isla, but I'd never fit in her shoes.'

As for questions over whether his beloved character will survive his crash, Ray has refused to confirm or deny rumours that he is set to retire later this year. 

'Look, I play that by ear,' the award-winning actor told Daily Mail Australia: 'I'm happy where I am - what happens in the future is anybody's guess to be honest.'

Still standing: The actor plays the sole remaining character from the original 18 who appeared on Home And Away back in 1988

Upbeat: The star was in a jovial mood as he posed for shots backstage following his interview
item.dc:abstract: He's beloved by generations of Home And Away fans, thanks to spending a staggering 30 years in his role as popular character Alf Stewart. But Ray Meagher, 73, has admitted that when he initially signed up for the role in the late 1980s, it was only intended to be for six months, but kept getting extended. Speaking on Monday's instalment of ITV show This Morning, the Australian actor admitted that he had reservations about being tied down when he was cast as one of the 18 original residents of the fictional Summer Bay.
item.dc:creator: Smith Ryan
item.mi:shortTitle: Home And Away's Ray Meagher signed up to play Alf for just six months

item.title: Hugh Grant, 57, makes his first public appearance since welcoming fifth child at LGBTQ film festival
item.description: The esteemed actor, who plays Clive Durham in the groundbreaking 1987 period drama, looked incredibly handsome while beaming at the bash just three weeks
item.content:encoded:
He welcomed his fifth child earlier this month, at the age of 57. 

And Hugh Grant certainly looked to be enjoying new parenthood as he made his first public appearance since the arrival on Monday evening at the BFI Flare: London LGBTQ+ Film Festival screening of Maurice at BFI Southbank in London. 

The esteemed actor, who plays Clive Durham in the groundbreaking 1987 period drama, looked incredibly handsome while beaming at the bash just three weeks after his ex-girlfriend Elizabeth Hurley broke his baby news on Andy Cohen's show. 

Happy days! Hugh Grant certainly looked to be enjoying new parenthood as he made his first public appearance since the arrival on Monday evening at the BFI Flare: London LGBTQ+ Film Festival screening of Maurice at BFI Southbank in London

During his appearance at the event, Hugh certainly seemed in his element following the delightful news that his girlfriend Anna Eberstein, 35, was said to have welcomed their baby late last month - according to Elizabeth. 

Looking typically dashing, Hugh went for smart-casual look as he wore jeans with a white shirt tucked in, a battered brown belt and a sharp velvet blazer over the top.

Within the event, he posed alongside Tricia Tuttle, the director of BFI Flare, and his Maurice co-star James Wilby, who plays the titular character and Hugh's love interest in the three-decade old movie.

While he was certainly chipper, Hugh showed no signs of being a weary new dad as he joyously beamed at the event following the news broken by his ex.   

Happy days: Hugh became a father for the fifth time, his ex-girlfriend Elizabeth Hurley claimed on US TV

Overjoyed! The esteemed actor, who plays Clive Durham in the groundbreaking 1987 period drama, looked incredibly handsome while beaming at the bash just three weeks after his ex-girlfriend Elizabeth Hurley broke his baby news on Andy Cohen's show

The whole gang: Within the event, he posed alongside Tricia Tuttle, the director of BFI Flare, and his Maurice co-star James Wilby

Way back when: James (left) played the titular character and Hugh's love interest in the three-decade old movie

Appearing on Watch What Happens Live earlier this month, Elizabeth was asked if she was surprised by the amount of kids Hugh has - and responded: 'He had another one last week. He has five. He was over 50 when he spawned them all.' 

Andy asked Elizabeth if she was shocked by it and she delightfully responded: 'No, he’s an enchanting dad. Really, really sweet.' 

The actress then cheekily cracked up her fellow guest on the chat show, David Oyelowo when she spoke of Hugh's forray into fatherhood.

She said: 'Having these kids has transformed him from a very miserable person into a fairly miserable person. It’s improved him. He’s gone up the scale.' 

MailOnline has contacted Hugh and Elizabeth's representatives for comment.  

Happy days! While he was certainly chipper, Hugh showed no signs of being a weary new dad as he joyously beamed at the event following the news broken by his ex

Father again: Andy asked Elizabeth if she was shocked by it and she delightfully responded: 'No, he’s an enchanting dad. Really, really sweet'

Hugh's children  

1987-2000 - Hugh enjoyed an extremely high-profile romance with Elizabeth before splitting following his infidelities. While they never had children, he is Godfather to her son Damian, 15

September 2011 - Hugh became a father for the first time, to a daughter Tabitha with receptionist Tinglan Hong, after 'a fleeting affair' 

September 2012 -  The actor later became a father for a second time to John Mungo, his first baby with Anna

December 2012- After a brief reunion, Hugh and Tinglan had another child, as she gave birth to a boy called Felix although this only became publicly known when a birth certificate leaked when he was 16-months-old 

December 2015 - Anna and Hugh became parents once more to a second child, although they have never announced the child's name 

In January, Anna's mother Susanne is said to have spoken to Swedish tabloid Aftonbladet, to confirm the news as she said: 'I'm very happy to be getting another grandchild. She's due rather soon.' 

Hugh and Anna have two young children together - a son John, born in 2012, and a second child, born in December 2015.

Clearly delighted at the prospect of becoming a grandmother once again, Susanne reportedly spilled the beans to the magazine. 

The name of the couple's second child still remains a mystery, but back in 2015 the birth was confirmed by Anna's mother to a Swedish newspaper.

In the statement released at the time, she said: ‘Anna Eberstein from Sundsvall has had her second child with film star Hugh Grant. The newest member of the family saw the light of day for the first time last Wednesday.’

Her mother, a judge and prominent left-wing politician, confirmed to Swedish newspaper Örnsköldsviks Allehanda the baby, her second grandchild, was born.

She went on: 'I can confirm that I have another grandchild. It is wonderful that we now have grandchildren (more than one grandchild).'

Happy days: Hugh and Anna have two young children together - a son John, born in 2012, and a second child, born in December 2015

A close friend of the family told MailOnline at the time: ‘I heard from Anna’s parents that she had given birth last Wednesday. It was a little girl. Everything seemed to have gone okay.’

Hugh also has two other children - a daughter Tabitha, six, and son Felix, four, with Chinese beauty Tinglan Hong.

The Notting Hill star went from having no children to being a father of four in just four years.

At the time of Tabitha's birth, Hugh's spokesman said: 'He and the mother had a fleeting affair and while this was not planned, Hugh could not be happier or more supportive. He and the mother have discussed ­everything and are on friendly terms.'

When Ms Hong gave birth to Felix, Mr Grant wrote on Twitter: 'In answer to some journos. Am thrilled my daughter now has a brother. Adore them both to an uncool degree. They have a fab mum.' 

Happy days: The actress then cheekily cracked up her fellow guest on the chat show, David Oyelowo when she spoke of Hugh's forray into fatherhood

In 2014, he spoke for the first time about his son. Speaking to Swedish newspaper Nöjesbladet, he said of Anna: ‘We are very good friends and she’s a very good mother.’

The actor said he had plenty of contact with his son. He said: 'I see him all the time, all the time - most days'. His relationship with the boy was ‘excellent’, he said, adding: ‘I love him very much.’ He also spoke warmly about the charms of Sweden, which he has visited several times. 

Elizabeth and Hugh's close friendship will come as a surprise to many, given that he famously solicited the services of Divine Brown in Hollywood's notorious Sunset Strip in 1995, when he and Elizabeth were still very much in a relationship.

Both the Four Weddings actor and the prostitute were pulled over by the police and detained - leading to Hugh's famous sheepish mugshot. 

The big reveal: Elizabeth revealed the news on Andy Cohen's show 

Liz and Hugh, who began dating in 1987, were plagued with troubles after his cheating was exposed.

The couple worked through their issues, but eventually split amicably in 2000 after 13 years of dating, with Liz previously telling MailOnline that Hugh is 'family' to her.

The pair met in 1987 when Hugh played Lord Byron in a Spanish production called Remando Al Viento, and Elizabeth was cast in a supporting role as Byron's former lover Claire Clairmont. Liz and Hugh, who began dating in 1987, were plagued with troubles after his cheating was exposed.

The couple worked through their issues, but eventually split amicably in 2000 after 13 years of dating, with Liz previously telling MailOnline that Hugh is 'family' to her.

And Hugh Grant certainly looked to be enjoying new parenthood as he made his first public appearance since the arrival on Monday evening at the BFI Flare: London LGBTQ+ Film Festival screening of Maurice at BFI Southbank in London. The esteemed actor, who plays Clive Durham in the groundbreaking 1987 period drama, looked incredibly handsome while beaming at the bash just three weeks after his ex-girlfriend Elizabeth Hurley broke his baby news on Andy Cohen's show.

item.title: Who bit Beyonce's face? Online frenzy follows Tiffany Haddish's shock revelation... as Chrissy Teigen tweets 'You'd NEVER guess who it is!'
item.description: While Girl's Trip star Tiffany deliberately didn't name the woman, the Bey Hive immediately began debating her identity.
item.content:encoded:
Twitter has been sent into meltdown by Tiffany Haddish's revelation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party.

The Girl's Trip star told the April edition of GQ that the incident happened in December, at a private afterparty following Jay Z's  performance at The Forum in Los Angeles.

And while Girl's Trip star Tiffany deliberately didn't name the woman who bit Beyonce, the Bey Hive immediately began debating her identity.

Chrissy Teigen was one of the first, tweeting: 'I cannot leave this planet without knowing who bit Beyonce in the face.'

Who bit Beyonce's face? Online frenzy follows Tiffany Haddish's shock revelation... as Chrissy Teigen tweets 'You'd NEVER guess who it is!'

She then followed this up with: 'I can only think of one person who would do this. but I cannot say. but she....is the worst.'

However after finding out who the actress with vampire-like tendencies actually was, Chrissy expressed her shock.

'My initial guess was wrong. The real person? I *never* would have guessed. I’VE SAID TOO MUCH.'

But while Chrissy wasn't able to name the alleged biter, Twitter wasn't so reticent, with fans all jumping to name actresses they thought could be to blame.

Warning! Tiffany was previously called out by Beyonce in new song Top Off after the comedian spilled party drama; the two are seen in a selfie that night

The debate was started when Tiffany opened up to GQ about the memorable December party, saying the actress appeared high on drugs.

Tiffany explained: 'There was this actress there that's just, like, doing the mostest. She bit Beyonce in the face.'

As might be imagined, Beyonce wasn't happy about this. 

Continued Tiffany: 'So Beyonce stormed away, went up to Jay-Z, and was like, "Jay! Come here! This b****..." and snatched him. They went to the back of the room. I was like, "What just happened?" And Beyoncé's friend walked up and was like, "Can you believe this b**** just bit Beyonce?"'

Tiffany says that the mystery actress then crossed her path - telling her to stop dancing.

In DJ Khaled's new song Top Off, Queen Bey seemed to address her interaction with Haddish when she rapped, 'If they’re tryna party with the queen, they gon' have to sign a non-disclosure'; she is pictured with Jay Z at the bash

Tiffany then approached Beyonce, who she had met for the first time that evening.

The irrepressible 38-year-old said she told her: 'I'm going to beat somebody ass at your party. I just want to let you know that.'

Beyonce told her not to, and said of the actress: 'That b**** is on drugs. She not even drunk. The b**** is on drugs. She not like that all the time. Just chill.'

The interview updates Tiffany's previous description of meeting the superstar, in which she went into less detail.

In it Tiffany said she had witnessed the singer act possessively when the unidentified actress placed her hand on Jay Z's chest. 

In response on DJ Khaled's recent song Top Off, Queen Bey called out Tiffany, saying her name and rapping, 'If they’re tryna party with the queen, they gon' have to sign a non-disclosure.' 

But the Girls Trip star doesn't seem to be too worried that she has burned the friendship bridge with her idol. 

'Everything she said rang so real to me,' she said in a tweet after the song was released. 'Just know I will sign an NDA any day for Beyoncé. But also know this I will fight for Beyoncé. I love that woman she is a gift from God,'

Opening up: Tiffany's interview appears in the new edition of GQ, out now
item.dc:abstract: Tiffany Haddish's revelation that an actress bit Beyonce's face at a party has sent Twitter into meltdown. And while Girl's Trip star Tiffany deliberately didn't name the woman, the Bey Hive immediately began debating her identity. Chrissy Teigen was one of the first, tweeting: 'I cannot leave this planet without knowing who bit Beyonce in the face.'
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith
item.mi:shortTitle: Chrissy Teigen leads online frenzy to find out who bit Beyonce

item.title: 'Hollywood Week here I come!' Former Hi-5 star Fely Irvine wows American Idol judges as she makes it through to the next round of the singing show
item.description: Former Hi-5 star Fely Irvine has wowed American Idol judges, making it through to the next round of the cutthroat singing competition.
item.content:encoded:
Former Hi-5 star Fely Irvine is making waves in the United States.

The 29-year-old has made it through to the coveted 'Hollywood Week' round in the new season of American Idol.

Taking to Instagram, the singing sensation posed with her 'golden ticket' - the precious piece of paper that hopefuls secure after wowing the superstar judges.

She's got a golden ticket! Former Hi-5 star Fely Irvine has wowed American Idol judges, making it through to the next round of the cutthroat singing competition 

'Hollywood Week here I come,' Fely captioned the selfie, in which she appeared over the moon.

The brunette also made sure to acknowledge the show's new judges in her caption writing: 'Thank you Lionel Richie, Katy Perry and Luke Bryan! I'm glad I didn't vomit on you all'.

The iconic reality show has just been rebooted in the US, and garners around 7 million viewers per episode. 

 From Hi-5 to Hollywood! The brunette stunner is currently in the running to take home the title of American Idol 

All new look! The iconic reality show has just been rebooted in the US with Lionel Richie, Katy Perry and Luke Bryan as judges

It's not the first time Fely has appeared on a reality singing show.

In 2014, the talent was selected to compete in Ricky Martin's team on The Voice Australia.

She was eliminated during 'sing-offs', a process early on in the season which takes place prior to the live episodes.

The Voice! In 2014, Fely was selected to compete in Ricky Martin's team on The Voice Australia

High flyer! Fely performed for Hi-5 from 2009 to 2011, before being replaced by Dayen Zheng

Fely performed for Hi-5 from 2009 to 2011, before being replaced by Dayen Zheng.

The beauty married her partner Tai Hara in Bali last year, and the couple currently both live and work in Los Angeles.

Tai has been a vocal supporter of his wife's American Idol journey, recently taking to his own Instagram account claiming Fely would 'blow away' US audiences.

Her biggest fan! The beauty married her partner Tai Hara in Bali last year, and the couple currently both live and work in Los Angeles

Taking to Instagram, the singing sensation posed with her 'golden ticket', the precious piece of paper that hopefuls secure when they wow the superstar judges.

item.title: Tallulah Willis sets pulses racing with her toned figure as she sunbathes completely NAKED in sizzling Instagram snap
item.description: The 24-year-old certainly caught the attention of her followers by posing posed completely naked - with nothing but her arms and legs concealing her modesty - as she relaxed in the garden.
item.content:encoded:
She is known for showing off her impressive figure in an array of swimwear to her 184,000 followers. 

But Tallulah Willis went one step further on Monday, as she stripped herself of all clothing for another sizzling snap on Instagram.

The 24-year-old certainly caught the attention of her followers by posing posed completely naked - with nothing but her arms and legs concealing her modesty - as she relaxed with a pet pooch in the garden.

In the nude: Tallulah Willis posed completely naked for her Instagram followers on Monday

The star was the picture of confidence as she posed - with only her arm covering her bare chest, to show off her enviably toned figure to all. 

While she ensured to achieve an all-over tan by going naked in the sunshine, the brunette did protect herself from the heat in a beige cap and oversized sunglasses, tipped sexily to the edge of her nose. 

Posing on a sun lounger beside her dog in the garden, Tallulah shared the snap without a caption, to let her figure and bold display do the talking.  

Girls' getaway: Tallulah appeared to be chilling at home in the snap - following a sun-soaked getaway to Turks & Caicos with her sister Scout

Tallulah appeared to be chilling at home in the photo - following a sun-soaked getaway to Turks & Caicos with her sister Scout.

The daughter of Hollywood actors Bruce Willis and Demi Moore looked sensational in a pastel blue bikini as she showcased her rippling abs in another Instagram snap. 

The model worked her best angles for the camera as her tanned skin glowed against the idyllic location. 

Girls just want to have sun! The model, 24, looked to be having the time of her life as she soaked up the sun in a sizzling pink swimsuit on Sunday

Tallulah shielded her eyes from the dazzling sunlight in a pair of classic wide-brimmed shades as she tied back her orange-tinged locks up into a messy bun. 

Going fresh-faced for the beach day, the starlet left her quirky accessories at home and opted for just one shimmering ring.

Older sister Scout, 26, got in on the swimsuit action as she slipped into a hot pink two-piece.   

Leaving very little to the imagination, the Idaho-born beauty hitched up her racy bikini bottoms high on her waist to give the best view of her eye-popping derriere and washboard abs.

Scout's dark chestnut tresses fell past her shoulders in a tousled straight style as the artist posed up a storm for the tantalizing pic.   

Famous offspring: Tallulah is the youngest daughter of Demi Moore [pictured] and her ex-husband Bruce Willis

'Pls pretend to b annoyed by these' Tallulah jokingly captioned as the pair worked their best model pose. 

Scout and Tallulah escaped to the exotic destination for a balmy getaway with friends last week and made sure to share their enviable getaway on social media. 

On Sunday, Talullah looked to be having the time of her life as she shared yet another sizzling swimwear snap on Sunday, taken as the model enjoyed a day topping up her tan in the sun-soaked location.

The natural beauty looked incredible once again in a plunging pink swimsuit as she basked in the rays of the sunlight.

Flashing a hint of sideboob, the fashionista looked the picture of confidence as she pulled a playful pose and clutched on a can of coke.

Letting her natural beauty shine through, Tallulah kept her skin free of make-up and allowed her quirky orange locks to fall around her face in easy waves.  

Proud mama: Hollywood actress Demi Moore, 55, has an incredibly close relationship with all three of her daughters

Tallulah captioned the snap: 'Thank god she finally got over her shyness,'which saw her pulling a rather flamboyant pose.

The star has previously spoken candidly about her path to sobriety and the merciless bullying she was subjected to as a teenager. 

'I had people when I was 13 telling me how ugly I was, and how could two beautiful actors create such hideous troll children?' she told Katie Couric in 2014 after her stint in rehab.  

'So many people are telling me, "You inspired me,"' she said. 'I guess I didn’t understand that this is such a communal fault line, that is running through every individual on this planet that whether it’s hidden or not hidden, that we all feel this certain sense of insecurity.' 

Last July, the model shared an honest message about how far she has come.

Honest: Tallulah has admitted battling addiction and an eating disorder in the past and shared a candid message alongside this picture last July

Posting an old picture of herself looking dangerously thin and with a cigarette hanging from her mouth, she wrote: '3 years ago I was a malnourished string bean with aches that echoed throughout my soul. 

'However the internal cries to tend my most blistered and deep wounds repeatedly fell on deaf ears. I did not value myself, my life or my body and as such I was constantly punishing for not being enough. 

She continued: 'Self annihilation fueled with medicating left me a shell, and the world on mute. I was hoisted from my hole, (one so deep I was certain we were nearing the Earths magma core) on the backs of powerful human beings that I will forever be indebted too, and on that day my life was gifted back to me. 

'I love the girl in this picture, I cry for her and I mourn her lost years. She is inside of me always and I must never let her slip too far.

'I don't push any agenda, I can only speak for my path and staying sober has been far and beyond the most important thing I've done in my wee 23 years.' 

 Tight knit: Tallulah (L)  Demi Moore and Scout LaRue (R) remain tight knit along with other sister Rumer

item.title: 'I’m inspired every day to call this incredible country home': PR queen Roxy Jacenko congratulates new Australians at citizenship ceremony as she reflects on successfully creating a 'prosperous life' for her family
item.description: The PR queen speaks at sold-out In Conversation With seminars across the country. And Roxy Jacenko presented a touching speech to new Australian citizens in Sydney this month.
item.content:encoded:
Roxy Jacenko recently presented a touching speech as a guest speaker at a Wollahra Council's citizenship ceremony in Sydney.

The savvy businesswoman, 37, shared footage of her speech congratulating and offering advice to new Australian citizens as part of YouTube series: The Real Roxy.

Scroll down for video 

'I’m inspired every day to call this incredible country home': PR queen Roxy Jacenko congratulates new Australians at citizenship ceremony as she reflects on successfully creating a 'prosperous life' for her family

'To each and every one of you who is here this evening celebrating their Australian citizenship I offer my sincere congratulations and welcome!' she began her address.

Roxy, the founder of Sweaty Betty PR, shook hands with new citizens and posed for photos and selfies with the proud recipients, who held their certificates.

Professional Boxer and NSW State Heavyweight Champion Matt Davoren was presented citizenship on the evening and posed alongside Roxy for a photo.

'There is nowhere else I’d rather work or live, I’m inspired every day to call this incredible country my home and to make the most of all opportunities being Australian had afforded me,' the mother-of-two continued, advising her audience to do the same.

Roxy, the founder of Sweaty Betty PR, shook hands with new citizens and posed for photos and selfies with the proud recipients, who held their certificates (PICTURED with Professional Boxer and NSW State Heavyweight Champion, Matt Davoren)

'Taking every chance to create a happy, healthy and prosperous life for my family': The mother-of-two advised the audience to maximising opportunities available to them as Australians, as she has done with her working life

'To me being an Australian means maximising these opportunities and taking every chance to create a happy, healthy and prosperous life for my family,' Roxy added.

Roxy is the wife to Oliver Curtis, who she shares two young children with - six-year-old daughter Pixie and three-year-old son Hunter.

The blonde stunner was reunited with her husband last June after he was released from prison following being found guilty of conspiring to commit insider trade.

While Roxy's networth is unknown, News Limited previously claimed Roxy's Sweaty Betty and Ministry Of Talent businesses had a rumoured turnover of $13 million in 2015.

Flashy! While Roxy's networth is unknown, News Limited previously claimed Roxy's Sweaty Betty and Ministry Of Talent businesses had a rumoured turnover of $13 million in 2015

She previously shared a clip of the ceremony to Instagram last week, noting what 'an incredible evening and opportunity' it was to be a part of. 

Fans commented with praise at her kind words, claiming she should be proud to have been afforded such 'an honour'.

'Your words of welcome to our newest citizens were just beautiful', and 'Nice that you contributed! I’m sure you have some good inspiration to new citizens!' were also comments left in the thread.  

'Your words of welcome to our newest citizens were just beautiful': She previously shared a clip of the ceremony to Instagram last week, noting what 'an incredible evening and opportunity' it was to be a part of
item.dc:abstract: The PR queen is known for taking her sold-out In Conversation With seminars across the country to speak to large captivated audiences. And Roxy Jacenko recently presented a touching speech as a guest speaker at a Wollahra Council's citizenship ceremony in Sydney. The savvy businesswoman, 37, shared footage of her speech congratulating and offering advice to new Australian citizens as part of YouTube series: The Real Roxy.
item.dc:creator: Candice Jackson
item.mi:shortTitle: Roxy Jacenko congratulates new Australians at citizenship ceremony

item.title: Khloe Kardashian reveals she wants her baby girl to inherit Tristan Thompson's IQ... but her 'street smarts'
item.description: The 33-year-old reality star took to her premium subscription-based website to write about which traits her child she would like from either herself or Tristan Thompson.
item.content:encoded:
Khloe Kardashian has some high hopes for her soon-to-be-born baby girl.

The 33-year-old reality star took to her premium subscription-based website to write about which traits her child she would like from either herself or Tristan Thompson.

She explained that she often thinks about what her daughter with the 27-year-old basketball star will look like and what type of personality she will have.

Khloe wrote: 'She'll be the perfect mix of me and Tristan—which is such a crazy thought, LOL.'

Scroll down for video 

Tough choice: Khloe Kardashian took to her premium subscription-based website to write about which traits her child she would like from either herself or Tristan Thompson, as they are pictured together in Hollywood back in June

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star said that she hopes the bouncing baby girl will get her style and work ethic from her.

Khloe insisted that she would like their future child to have Tristan's good looks and even athleticism from the Cleveland Cavaliers power forward though she insists that they are both 'beasts'.

One thing that the youngest Kardashian sister hopes her future daughter gets from both parents is IQ.

Khloe explained: 'But I want maybe TT's [Tristan's]  IQ and my street smarts.'

Sharing even more: Earlier in the day Khloe posted this naked bump photo with beau Tristan on Monday that was taken by her friend Sasha Samsonova

This comes after Khloe uploaded yet another sexy image from  a pregnancy photo shoot done by her friend Sasha Samsonova on Instagram Monday. 

In this snap, the beauty is having her large baby bump - she is due in early April - held by her beau Tristan Thompson of the Cleveland Cavaliers as they stand in a kitchen with beautiful Spanish tiles.

The image looks like their pregnancy announcement photo

Khloe captioned the  eye-popping photo, 'Mommy and daddy.'

Like in previous photos from the same set, Khloe has on a black lace bra and matching undies and has put her very large bump on full display.

The TV sensation looked stunning with her long blonde locks worn down in Malibu waves and her makeup done to perfection.

In her first bump shot from the set, she flashed a leg as she wore a long black coat off her shoulders.

Stunning: The 33-year-old siren shared a very glamorous baby bump shot to Instagram on Wednesday

The Revenge Body star was outside on a patio with plants everywhere.

And in the second shot she was in bed with Tristan placing a hand on her thigh. 

This new post comes just days after the looker took to Snapchat to discuss food. The siren revealed what she's been feeding that bump.

The Good American designer gave fans a look at the fried chicken and biscuits she was digging into to fulfill her cravings. 'Popeyes Louisiana Chicken, I love you,' the star wrote over the image. 'Thank you.'

Two cute: The Revenge Body star was seen with beau Thompson in bed in this image shared on Thursday

She had a large box of 24 large biscuits and a box of friend chicken placed on her dining room table.

Her hand was also seen going into a bag that contained condiments.

'I am starving! I sort of want Popeyes,' she tweeted the night before. 'I’m not sure though LOL the struggle is real.'

But then she gave in. 'Ok that fulfilled every craving I’ve been having for Popeyes over the past couple days,' the star tweeted.

'Letting the food craving build up is actually better. I’m so satisfied now. Yum yum! I feel guilty but GREAT.'

No a salad: Khloe gave her health food a break to dig into friend chicken and biscuits on Thursday

 'Popeyes Louisiana Chicken, I love you,' the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star wrote over the image. 'Thank you'

Khloe is due very soon so it's no wonder she's letting herself enjoy her pregnancy to the fullest before she welcomes the child.

No doubt the looker will have to be on a diet as soon as her little girl is welcomed into the world due to the pressure that comes with being a representative of the Kardashian empire. 

Last week Khloe wrote about her pregnancy on her pay site Khloewithak.com. 

'Being pregnant has always been a dream of mine. Even though 9 months feels like a lifetime while I'm awaiting the arrival of my baby girl, it's really a blink in the grand scheme of life,' she began.

'I know I'm going to miss my belly so much once she's here, I had to capture the beautiful process that is pregnancy so I can always look back at this time. Thank you Sasha Samsonova for this special photo shoot! Also, shout-out to my glam team who helped me look and feel like a goddess: Hrush, Andrew and Jill.'  

Busy mama: Last week the LA native launched her Good Mama maternity line, which is an offshoot of Good American

The daughter of Kris Jenner - who has said she has not yet found a name for her baby girl - has been very active during her pregnancy.

She has not only launched her Good Mama maternity line, which is an offshoot of Good American, but she has also kept up with her social media posts.   

In mid March, Khloe's sisters and mother were all in attendance at her extravagant Los Angeles baby shower, which was held back-to-back with Tristan's birthday party.
item.dc:abstract: Khloe Kardashian has some high hopes for her soon-to-be-born baby girl. The 33-year-old reality star took to her premium subscription-based website to write about which traits her child she would like from either herself or Tristan Thompson. She explained that she often thinks about what her daughter with the 27-year-old basketball star will look like and what type of personality she will have. Khloe wrote: 'She'll be the perfect mix of me and Tristan—which is such a crazy thought, LOL.'
item.dc:creator: Justin Enriquez
item.mi:shortTitle: Khloe Kardashian lists what traits she hopes her baby inherits

item.title: 'This is painful': Florence bursts into tears as she's forced to choose between 'old fling' Jake Ellis and new crush Davey Lloyd in dramatic rose ceremony on Bachelor In Paradise
item.description: It was the first-ever rose ceremony on Bachelor in Paradise.
item.content:encoded:
It was the first-ever rose ceremony on Bachelor in Paradise.

And on Monday, the male contestants' fate was left in the hands of the female contenders.

While for many the rose-offering decision was a no-brainer, the tough and final decision of the evening wasn't made so easy for Florence Alexandra.

Scroll down for video  

Wrong pick? While for many the rose-offering decision during the Bachelor in Paradise rose ceremony was a no-brainer, the tough and final decision of the evening wasn't made so easy for Florence Alexandra

'This is painful,' she said under her breath as she faced with a predicament. 

Feeling torn, Florence was left to pick between mending a past relationship with Jake Ellis and entertaining a potential new romance with Davey Lloyd.

'At this point in the rose ceremony, I have absolutely no idea who I am going to pick,' Florence said moments before the ceremony kicked off.

'Davey is standing there and Jake is standing there and I still don't know what I should do,' she finished.

Feeling torn, Florence was left to pick between mending a past relationship with Jake Ellis and entertaining a potential new romance with Davey Lloyd

Osher Gunsberg introduced the first rose ceremony, explaining that the ladies held the power by being able to offer a rose to any gentleman a potential romantic connection could be seen with.

With seven roses to hand out and nine hopeful men, the two men not offered roses would be sent home from paradise.

Nina Rolleston was up first, offering her rose to Eden Schwencke, to which he responded saying he would be 'so, so happy' to receive the rose.

Will they come back as intruders? Osher Gunsberg introduced the first rose ceremony, explaining that the ladies held the power, being given a rose to offer any gentleman they could see a potential romantic connection with

Leah Costa went next, offering her rose to Mackane Reid.

Keira Maguire was up third, offering her rose to friend Uncle Sam (also known as man-bun Sam).

Lisa Hyde followed, handing over her rose to Luke McLeod.

Not so rosy! With the suspense ever-dramatic, Florence tears up and she picks Jake over Davey

Following her date offer to Blake Coleman within minutes of her arrival in Paradise on Monday, Laurina Fleure was quick to offer him her rose.

Tara Pavlovic offered her rose to villain Michael Turnbull, who quickly and graciously accepted.

With the suspense ever-dramatic, Florence teared up and she made the last minute decision to pick Jake over Davey.

The final two men standing without roses saw Davey and Brett Moore depart Paradise on the second episode.

No luck here! Brett Moore was sent packing, following rumours that the fame-hungry star had a girlfriend, Stephanie Boulton from Matty J's season of The Bachelor, back in Australia 

Packing bags! The final two men standing without roses saw Davey and Brett Moore depart Paradise on the second episode
item.dc:abstract: It was the first-ever rose ceremony on Bachelor in Paradise. And on Monday, the male contestants' fate was left in the hands of the female contenders. While for many the rose-offering decision was a no-brainer, the tough and final decision of the evening wasn't made so easy for Florence Alexandra.

item.title: Rh-eye-no! I’m A Celebrity’s Jackie Gillies reveals she got pink eye from eating Rhinoceros anus in the jungle... in VERY explicit chat with husband Ben on KIIS radio
item.description: Jackie Gillies ended up sharing way too much information on KIIS 106.5 in Sydney on The Kyle And Jackie O Show.
item.content:encoded:
She's been upfront about about her time in the I'm A Celebrity jungle, saying that it has changed her.

But Jackie Gillies ended up sharing way too much information on KIIS 106.5 in Sydney on The Kyle And Jackie O Show.

Coaxed into taking part in a quiz about their personal lives with her husband - Silverchair drummer Ben - Jackie revealed certain facts that can't ever be unheard.

Rh-eye-no! I’m A Celebrity’s Jackie Gillies revealed she got pink eye from eating Rhinoceros anus in the jungle... in a VERY explicit chat with husband Ben on KIIS radio

When asked what Ben's worst habit was, she guessed incorrectly, saying he had bad OCD.

He had in fact pre-recorded answers - 'picking my butt' being his alleged worst bad habit.

A disgusted Jackie was heard saying 'he's so full of it, why would you say that?' to her husband before adding: 'Listen, I got pink eye in the jungle from Rhino butt that I had to eat! I swear to God!'

The questions continued to come as the hosts of the show, Kyle Sandilands and Jackie O, probed the married pair about what The Real Housewives Of Melbourne star feels when her husband is on tour.

Tastes like...? 'Listen, I got pink eye in the jungle from Rhino butt that I had to eat! I swear to God!' Jackie declared

Happy times: Jackie and Ben were teenagers when they first met each other but they didn't embark on a romance together until a decade and a half later

'Missing out on hugging and kissing him,' was Jackie's reply. This was, again, wrong, the answer being that she gets FOMO [fear of missing out].

The questions got explicit after that, with Kyle asking the pair what the most adventurous thing  was that they've done in the bedroom.

Trying to brush this question aside quickly, Jackie answered: 'Singing and dancing!'

Her husband, however, was far less coy, revealing the answer to be 'up the butt'.

Going strong: The lovebirds have gone from strength to strength ever since they pledged to spend the rest of their lives together in 2010

This left Jackie mortified and cringing through her awkward giggling.

She was then asked what the most illegal thing her husband had ever done was, and the reply she gave was: 'Drugs, alcohol, alcohol, sex, hookers - all of it.'

Ben didn't disagree - perhaps unwisely after his recent charge for drink-driving.

The pair have been married since 2010, having known each others as teenagers but not getting together until over a decade later.

Jackie works as a professional psychic. On 6 March she was evicted from I'm A Celeb... after 39 days in the jungle coming in 7th place.

Slimmed down: Jackie works as a professional psychic. On 6 March she was evicted from I'm A Celeb... after 39 days in the jungle coming in 7th place 

Whilst on the show, she lost an astounding 6.8kg, thanks to her gruelling diet and she was subjected to eating the most vile food in a series of Tucker Trials.

But it wasn't just the diet and living conditions that were hard as the camp mate clashed with boxing champion Danny Green during their time on the show.

During an interview on The Project following her elimination, Jackie explained that there were numerous occasions where she and Danny did not get along.

'I did feel that there were times that he did dismiss me in certain occasions and maybe not all of that was aired on the program,' she said. 

'As I tried to try and resolve whatever issue he may have had, he wouldn't want to talk about it, or he just ignored me a lot.' 

Slumming it: Jackie recently lost one stone in weight after her stint on Channel Ten's reality series, I'm A Celebrity...Get Me Out Of Here!
item.dc:abstract: Coaxed into taking part in a quiz about their personal lives with her husband - Silverchair drummer Ben - Jackie revealed certain facts that can't ever be unheard.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Bullock
item.mi:shortTitle: Jackie Gillies got pink eye from eating Rhino butt in the jungle

item.title: 'Now I check everything a million times!': Ruth Langsford recalls her horror after accidentally sharing THAT explicit photo on Mother's Day last year
item.description: Speaking on the show, the 58-year-old admitted she now checks her social media posts 'a million times' to avoid further mishap - but assured fans the photo had nothing to do with her husband.
item.content:encoded:
She left her followers in stitches last year when she accidentally shared a very explicit penis photo beside her Mother's Day tribute on Twitter.

But a giggly Ruth Langsford revealed she was left 'horrified' by the hilarious incident on Monday's Loose Women.

Speaking on the ITV show, the 58-year-old admitted she now checks her social media posts 'a million times' to avoid further mishap - but assured fans the saucy photo had nothing to do with her husband Eamonn Holmes. 

Looking back: Ruth Langsford revealed she was 'horrified' after sharing a very explicit photo to Twitter by accident last year

Ruth had been paying tribute to her mum Joan and sister Julia in the Twitter post last year, when the unfortunate incident occurred.

She shared a heartwarming family photo of the three of them beside the caption: 'My wonderful Mum & big Sis. Thinking of those who no longer have their Mum's..... you'll always have memories x' 

Unfortunately, the presenter failed to crop out her photo stream underneath - meaning a few extra snaps appeared below the image, including one very explicit meme of a woman with a man's genitalia. 

Oops: Ruth had been paying tribute to her mum Joan and sister Julia on Mother's Day (above) when the unfortunate incident occurred

Saucy: Ruth failed to crop out her photo roll underneath - meaning a few extra snaps appeared below the image, including one very explicit meme of a woman with a man's genitalia

Looking back on the blunder, Ruth explained that she did not realise her error until a friend told her she had hit headlines the following day.

She recalled: 'Someone had sent me a cheeky photo of a man’s appendage in a shoe, but it wasn’t immediately noticeable. So I took a photo of me and my mum and didn’t realise that the photo gallery was below...

'I remember coming in and someone saying 'You’re the front page!' and I reacted in horror!'

However, as the studio audience laughed and teased her, she was quick to affirm the content of the saucy photos had not belonged to her on and off-screen husband. 

Horror: An embarrassed Ruth explained that she did not realise her error until a friend told her she had hit headlines

Nightmare: She said: 'I remember coming in and someone saying 'You’re the front page!' and I reacted in horror!'

Awkward: She said a friend had sent her the racy photo but she did not realised it automatically saved into the photo stream on her phone

She said: 'Oh it wasn’t Eamonn,' before adding with a laugh: 'Now I immediately check everything a million times!' 

The mishap sent fans wild at the time - who responded on Twitter with a selection of memes to express their hilarity at Ruth's racy photos. 

Speaking soon after, the Strictly star explained she had been sent the funny snap on a group chat, but did not realise photos from WhatsApp automatically saved to her camera roll. 

She said last year: 'Eamonn was worried that people would think its him. I thought my son would be embarrassed but apparently I'm on a very trendy cool website now, that ladbible!' 

'Oh it wasn't Eamonn!': However, as the studio audience laughed and teased her, she was quick to affirm the content of the saucy photos had not belonged to her on and off-screen husband
item.dc:abstract: She left her followers in stitches last year when she accidentally shared a very explicit penis photo beside her Mother's Day tribute on Twitter. But a giggly Ruth Langsford revealed she was left 'horrified' by the hilarious incident on Monday's Loose Women. Speaking on the show, the 58-year-old admitted she now checks her social media posts 'a million times' to avoid further mishap - but assured fans the saucy photo had nothing to do with her husband Eamonn Holmes.

item.title: 'Everything still works, it just doesn't have the key ingredient:' Radio host Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald speaks candidly about undergoing a vasectomy after having two sons with wife BJ
item.description: He's the breakfast radio host who is the proud father of two young boys with his wife Billie.
item.content:encoded:
He's the proud father of two beautiful young boys with his wife BJ.

But Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald, 41, underwent a vasectomy back in 2015, and candidly spoke about the procedure during his breakfast show on Tuesday. 

The conversation came up when his co-host Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli said his wife Lisa thought getting the small operation meant getting the testicles removed.

'Everything still works, it just doesn't have the key ingredient:' Radio host Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald candidly speaks about undergoing a vasectomy after having two sons with wife BJ

In the spirit of doing a public service for their legions of listeners, Fitzy took it upon himself to explain what actually happens during the operation.

'Everything still works, but it just...' Fitzy explained, before Wippa finished 'doesn't have the key ingredient.'

'No it's not tied, because... the pipes still needs to be used you know what I mean?' Fitzy told their producer Sarah.

Confused: The conversation came up when his co-host Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli said his wife Lisa thought getting the small operation meant getting the testicles removed

Family man: In the spirit of doing a public service for their legions of listeners, Fitzy took it upon himself to explain what actually happens during the operation

He continued praising the advanced technology used on him for the operation, revealing that he was left with just a tiny scar in his nether region.

The former Big Brother reality star turned radio host then went on to urge men to consider 'getting the snip' instead of putting their wives or partner through a hysterectomy. 

'It's not that bad, you don't have to go under, I didn't go under,' he said.

'It's not that bad': The former Big Brother reality star turned radio host then went on to urge men to consider 'getting the snip' instead of putting their wives or partner through a hysterectomy

'The guy (referring to the surgeon) was playing punk music, he was playing Radio Birdman, we're having a great conversation I knew what was going on, I couldn't feel anything,' he added.

In 2015, Fitzy shared a snap of his hospital admission form which read in large bold letters 'getting the snip'.

His cheeky down to earth statement was circled in red by the medical staff, who later wrote alongside it 'vasectomy'.

'Not a good start. I've got a question incorrect already with my admission exam,' Fitzy wrote alongside the image.
item.dc:abstract: He's the proud father of two young boys with his wife Billie. But Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald, 41, underwent a vasectomy back in 2015, and candidly spoke about the procedure during his breakfast show on Tuesday. The conversation came up when his co-host Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli said his wife Lisa thought getting the small operation meant getting the testicles removed.
item.dc:creator: Jade Watkins
item.mi:shortTitle: Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald talks about getting a vasectomy

item.title: Amber Turner shows ex Dan Edgar what he's missing in sizzling bikini snaps from Dubai getaway... following showdown with new girl and love rival Clelia Theodorou on TOWIE
item.description: The 24-year-old showed off her enviable figure in an array of skimpy swimwear as she relaxed at a swanky beach club and enjoyed a boat ride during her sun-soaked trip in Dubai.
item.content:encoded:
She was seen confronting new girl Clelia Theodorou on Sunday night's TOWIE, after discovering Dan Edgar had been dating them at the same time. 

And Amber Turner certainly showed the lothario what he was missing on Monday, as shared a number of sizzling bikini snaps from her holiday in Dubai. 

The 24-year-old showed off her enviable figure in an array of skimpy swimwear as she relaxed at a swanky beach club and enjoyed a boat ride during her sun-soaked trip.

Bikini babe: Amber Turner showed her ex Dan Edgar what he was missing on Monday, as shared a number of sizzling bikini snaps from her holiday in Dubai

The blonde first displayed her enviably slim and toned figure in a skimpy blue two-piece, as she posed with her feet in the pool at Nikki Beach.

With the swimwear rising high at her waist and pulling into a gold body chain across her stomach, Amber let her impressive physique take centre stage as she sultrily looked over her shoulder in the snap.

Not stopping there, the reality star then slipped into an equally saucy white bikini as she posed at the wheel of a yacht for another snap. 

Here she is: She first posed sultrily at Nikki Beach Dubai, before she slipped into an equally saucy white bikini to pose at the wheel of a yacht

The TOWIE beauty gave a glimpse of her womanly curves in the swimwear, which plunged into a deep V neckline at the chest to tease at her cleavage.

Styling her hair into loose waves and sporting a heavy, contoured make-up look despite Dubai's thirty degree heat, Amber looked as glamorous as ever as she posed for the snap, captioned: 'Just Call Me Captain!' 

Amber's sizzling snaps followed TOWIE's return on Sunday, which saw her become embroiled in a showdown with new girl Clelia Theodorou - who is dating her ex Dan Edgar. 

Not happy: Amber's sizzling snaps followed TOWIE's return on Sunday, which saw her become embroiled in a showdown with new girl Clelia Theodorou (R)

Drama: Amber discovered Dan Edgar (above) had been dating the girls at the same time, and immediately called Clelia to let her know before the cast trip to Barcelona

However, Amber discovered the hunk had been two-timing them both, and immediately informed his new squeeze.

After confronting Dan during a workout, Clelia rang Amber to settling the matter, stating: 'I spoke to him and he told me he did see you a couple of days ago and that he did lie to you about the fact that he has been seeing me.

'And he did tell me that you guys did sleep with each other a month ago which was obviously when I've been seeing him.'

Furious: Amber said: 'The other day we spoke for two hours and he said there's only been three girls that have ever affected him, his first girlfriend, his ex and me'

Opposite: Only making matters worse, Clelia replied: 'What he said to me was completely different, he said you guys had been on and off and that he didn't want to be with you'

Not happy, Amber replied: 'When I was with him a few days ago, he did lie and denied numerous times over the past few months that anything's gone on with you. He's denied it, denied it and said 'I've not even kissed her'.

'The other day we spoke for two hours and he said there's only been three girls that have ever affected him, his first girlfriend, his ex and me.'

Only making matters worse however, Clelia then revealed: 'What he said to me was completely different, he said you guys had been on and off for a while and that he didn't want to be with you.' 

Girl power: Amber branded Dan a coward, while the newbie declared she was not going to 'wait around' for him to decide what he wants

Amber branded Dan a coward, while the newbie declared she was not going to 'wait around' for him to decide what he wants. 

Despite parting ways with the TOWIE lothario, Amber recently admitted she still had feelings for Dan during a recent interview on This Morning.

Speaking ahead of the new series' debut, she said: 'It's been over a year with us but I'm not going to say there aren't feelings there, but I can't do it anymore.'  

Struggling: Despite parting ways with the TOWIE lothario, Amber recently admitted she still had feelings for Dan during a recent interview on This Morning

Tension between the pair became so heated that she even threw a drink in his face while filming the ITVBe show in Barcelona earlier this year.  

When asked about an alleged row between them at popular Essex haunt Sugar Hute, she said: 'I was having a conversation with one of the new girls and he came into the conversation and it just didn't go down well. 

'Things have just got so toxic between us and I'm just so done with the situation,' before joking: 'A cup fell out of my hand and it may have had liquid in it.

'You think a lot of it is played for dramatics but everything I've talked about is real life.' 

At war: Speaking of her ex (pictured together in September), she said: 'Things have just got so toxic between us and I'm just so done with the situation'

The 24-year-old showed off her enviable figure in an array of skimpy swimwear as she relaxed at a swanky beach club and even enjoyed a boat ride during her sun-soaked trip.

item.title: Makeup-free Dua Lipa keeps her head down as she leaves a dentist office in Australia... nearly two weeks after getting her wisdom teeth pulled
item.description: Singer Dua Lipa, 22, was spotted leaving a dentist's office in Bondi, Australia on Sunday afternoon looking comfortable and relaxed.
item.content:encoded:
Dua Lipa was spotted leaving a dentist's office in Bondi, Australia on Sunday afternoon looking comfortable.

The singer wore a green button-down top styled as a crop top, khaki army pants and a pair of colorful 'dad' sneakers—a huge trend among stars at the moment.

The 22-year-old New Rules hit-maker recently revealed she underwent a wisdom teeth removal that had caused her to cancel scheduled performances.

Healing just fine: Singer Dua Lipa was spotted leaving a dentist's office in Australia on Sunday afternoon

The singer had been down under for the month of March as the opening act for the Australian and New Zealand leg of Bruno Mars' 24K Magic World Tour. 

On March 14 she announced on Twitter that she had to cancel some of her shows due to emergency oral surgery and awful pain in her wisdom teeth. 

She dropped out of two Brisbane shows that were originally scheduled for March 14 and 15. 

Back on the road: The singer wears army pants and the dad sneaker trend while checking up on her healing teeth

'Im so sorry to have to cancel some of my support shows with @brunomars. I’ve been performing with an awful pain due to my wisdom teeth and as advised by my dentist and oral surgeon I have had to have them imminently removed," she tweeted. 

'I have been enjoying this tour so much and i’m so upset that life has gotten in the way but hopefully i’ll have a speedy recovery and make it back as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding xx,' she added. 

Dua quickly reemerged and performed in Melbourne the following Monday post-surgery, despite being in the early stages of recovery. 

Global success: Her hit single New Rules continues to break records despite being released last summer

Her biggest single to date, New Rules, just garnered over 1.1 billion views on YouTube over the weekend. 

It is the seventh video released in 2017 to achieve this record of success on the video streaming network. 

She will be among the list of performers at some of this summer's biggest music festivals including Bonnaroo, Lollapalooza and Panorama NYC. 

Looking good: The brunette beauty was wearing red when she hit Jimmy Kimmel in this performance that aired on Valentine's Day
item.dc:abstract: She seems to be healing just fine and getting back to her day-to-day activities. Dua Lipa was spotted leaving a dentist's office in Bondi, Australia on Sunday afternoon looking comfortable and relaxed. She wore a green button-down top styled as a crop top, khaki army pants and a pair of colorful 'dad' sneakers—a huge trend among stars at the moment. The 22-year-old 'New Rules' hit-maker recently revealed she underwent a wisdom teeth removal that had caused her to cancel scheduled performances.
item.dc:creator: Heidi Parker

item.title: She's all heart! Mila Kunis sports love-themed sweater and skinny jeans as she runs errands in LA
item.description: The former That 70s Show starlet, who is married to her former co-star Ashton Kutcher, wore her shoulder-length dark hair loose and tucked behind her ears.
item.content:encoded:
Mila Kunis showed off her slender figure Monday as she ran errands in Los Angeles.

The actress and mom-of-two paired a dark blue sweater decorated with pink hearts with skinny blue jeans.

Keeping it casual, she went sock-less in a pair of white trainers.

On the go: Mila Kunis showed off her slender figure Monday as she ran errands in Los Angeles

The former That 70s Show starlet, who is married to her former co-star Ashton Kutcher, wore her shoulder-length dark hair loose and tucked behind her ears.

She was made up with foundation and blush and sported black mascara on her lashes.

She completed her look with dark pink lip color. 

Looking good: The actress and mom-of-two paired a dark blue sweater decorated with pink hearts with skinny blue jeans

Running errands: She was made up with foundation and blush and sported black mascara on her lashes. She completed her look with dark pink lip color

 Working mom: Keeping it casual, Mila went sock-less in a pair of white trainers

Busy day: The former That 70s Show starlet, who is married to her former co-star Ashton Kutcher, wore her shoulder-length dark hair loose and tucked behind her ears

The 34-year-old is a doting mother to daughter Wyatt, three, and son Dimitri, one.

But, she revealed during a recent appearance on The Ellen DeGeneres Show, the pair are very different.  

'My boy’s like a sloth. He’s wonderful, and I love him — ’cause one day he’ll probably watch this and be like, 'Why did you say that?' - but the truth is, women are smarter than men,' she said.  'And I have this evidence from my two different humans that I created.'

Mila explained: 'Girls are just like, on it and boys are like, dum dum dum. They’re just like a little bit more like little linebackers going through life and like Neanderthal-ish.'

Mila and Ashton have been married for nearly three years after tying the knot in July 2015.

The actor, 40, was previously married for eight years to actress Demi Moore. 

Sharing news: Mila Kunis, left, dished about the differences between her one-year-old son Dimitri and daughter Wyatt, three, on The Ellen DeGeneres Show last week, pictured with Kate McKinnon

item.title: Real Housewives Of Orange County star Brooks Ayers gets married in Indiana... after split from Vicki Gunvalson following FAKE cancer scandal
item.description: Brooks Ayers a married man. The former Real Housewives Of Orange County star has wed Christy Lindeman and the two live in Indianapolis, Indiana.
item.content:encoded:
Brooks Ayers a married man.

The former Real Housewives Of Orange County star has wed Christy Lindeman and the two are living happily with their dogs in Indianapolis, Indiana.

While on the Bravo TV series he dated series regular Vicki Gunvalson, 55, who he had a rocky romance with for nearly five years, and got into trouble for lying about his health.

Cute couple: Brooks Ayers a married man. The former Real Housewives Of Orange County star has wed Christy Lindeman of Indianapolis, Indiana

A good catch: Ayers' wife looked lovely in a plunging lace dress with a satin belt

Brooks and Vicki split in August 2015 after years of quarreling. 

On Sunday Tamara Tattles reported that Brooks and Christy had wed, though they did not give an exact date for their ceremony.

They shared a photo from the church with Brooks in a dark suit and his wife in a white sleeveless V-neck lace dress holding a bouquet of pink-and-white roses. 

They have been together since January, it was claimed.

She has two children and both love dogs and football, according to his Facebook page. 

They love the same things: Here the couple is seen at a basketball game in a snap shared by Brooks on Twitter 

The way they were: Brooks and Vicki split in August 2015. Seen here in 2012 in Hollywood

Uh-oh: Ayers was accused of lying about his health condition while on the Bravo show

He works as a medical sales representative and she is a sales director for a tire company.  

Ayers was accused of lying about his health condition while on the Bravo show.

After being confronted about falsifying information about his cancer, he admitted to fabricating medical documents about a non-Hodgkin lymphoma diagnosis to Us Weekly in March 2016. 

They just could not make it work: Brooks and Vicki were together for almost five years

Gunvalson denied involvement in his claims he had cancer.

It seemed that Ayers having cancer helped ratings for the show and made viewers more interested in him and Vicki. There were even accusations that Brooks knew lying about his health would give him more time on the show.

Now Gunvalson is dating Steve Lodge, who is a retired homicide detective. They have been together since April 2016. 

And it looks like the insurance salesperson may marry him. 

“I’m so ready for marriage, I’m a marriage girl,' she told Us Weekly in December.  

Their TV show: Vicki with her co-stars of Real Housewives Of Orange County
item.dc:abstract: Brooks Ayers a married man. The former Real Housewives Of Orange County star has wed Christy Lindeman and the two are living happily with their dogs in Indianapolis, Indiana. While on the Bravo TV series he dated series regular Vicki Gunvalson, 55, who he had a rocky romance with for nearly five years.

item.title: 'Thanks for your support': Married At First Sight bride Carly Bowyer thanks her former TV 'husband' Justin Fischer for how supportive his been of her new relationship with co-star Troy Delmege
item.description: Married At First Sight bride Carly Bowyer has gushed over her TV husband, Justin Fischer, over how supportive he's been of her new relationship with Troy Delmege.
item.content:encoded:
Married At First Sight co-star Ashley Irvin might be feuding with her.    

But it appears there's no bad blood between Carly Bowyer, 32, and her former groom Justin Fischer, 41.

Taking to Instagram, the Melbourne-based marketing manager has thanked her TV husband for his support of her relationship with co-star, Troy Delmege.

'Thanks for your support': Married At First Sight bride Carly Bowyer thanks her former TV 'husband' Justin Fischer for how supportive his been of her new relationship with co-star Troy Delmege 

In the snap, which was taken be at her going away party in Bondi at the weekend, Carly is seen nestling in closely to her former beau.

'Though everything that's happened I'm so glad that we were able to make some amazing friendships that we will have for life,' the brunette former reality star wrote in the caption.

Amazing friendships! The Married At First Sight star was candid in her post

'Special shoutout to @justin_MAFS for being so supportive and happy for me...You've handled this situation like a champ! Love my #mafs family,' she added. 

It comes after Carly and Troy, whose relationship was revealed at the show's explosive season finale, told 9Now that watching the reunion has 'opened old wounds' for them.        

The reunion saw an uncomfortable confrontation between the couple and Troy's ex Ashley.

'Though everything that's happened I'm so glad that we were able to make some amazing friendships that we will have for life,' the brunette former reality star wrote in the caption

Slap in the face! Carly and her new partner, co-star Troy, admitted the season finale had 're-opened old wounds' with fellow co-star Ashley Irvin

During the episode, the newly announced couple explained to Ashley that they had been dating for six weeks, having ignited their relationship following Troy and Ashley's split at the renewal ceremony.   

Last week, the blonde flight attendant took to Instagram to upload a picture of the female cast, chopping Carly's face from the group snap.

Fans were quick to inquire about Carly's absence, to which Ashley passively-aggressively responded: 'Who?'  

Didn't see that coming! Ashley was upset after finding out about the relationship between Troy and Carly, lashing out at the couple. Ashley was originally paired with Troy 

Speaking with 9Now, Carly said: 'I think [watching the reunion episode back] reopened old wounds.'

The marketing guru added: 'I did reach out to Ashley after the reunion, and she did forgive us and she sort of said that she was happy for us, but then I think watching the show back she's kind of backtracked again.' 

Troy - who unexpectedly turned his back on his relationship with Ashley during the tension-filled vow renewal ceremony - admitted tension was currently present between them. 

Who's missing? Last week, the blonde flight attendant took to Instagram to upload a picture of the female cast, chopping Carly's face from the group snap

Onward and upward! Going on to wish his best toward his former 'ex-wife', Troy expressed his hope for Ashley to soon find happiness in a relationship like he has since found with Carly
item.dc:abstract: Married At First Sight co-star Ashley Irvin might be feuding with them. But it appears there's no bad blood between Carly Bowyer, 32, and her former groom Justin Fischer, 41. Taking to Instagram, the Melbourne-based marketing manager was quick to thank her TV husband, even if the pair failed to ignite their union.
item.dc:creator: Jade Watkins

item.title: Pamela Anderson shows off her bombshell curves in a glamorous LBD as she joins son Brandon for dinner amid Tommy Lee drama
item.description: The Baywatch star, 50, oozed old Hollywood glamour in a black bodycon dress as she headed for dinner with her son Brandon in Los Angeles on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
She has stood by her son Brandon after he punched her ex Tommy Lee during a furious family brawl.

And Pamela Anderson and the 21-year-old put on a united display as they headed for dinner at celeb hotspot Craig's in Los Angeles on Monday.

The Baywatch star, 50, oozed old Hollywood glamour as she slipped her curves into a black bodycon dress.

Sticking together: Pamela Anderson and her son Brandon put on a united display as they headed for dinner at celeb hotspot Craig's in Los Angeles on Monday

Pamela drew attention to her ample assets with the dress' sweetheart neckline, while showcasing her lithe limbs.

The screen siren complemented the all-black ensemble with a pair of elegant gloves and added a boost to her 5ft 5ins frame with patent court shoes. 

She styled her platinum blonde hair in a sleek straight look and accentuated her striking features with fluttery eyelashes, bronzed cheeks and a slick of mauve lipstick.

Striking: The Baywatch star, 50, oozed old Hollywood glamour as she slipped her curves into a black bodycon dress

Dapper: Brandon showed off his sartorial flair in a silky red shirt, which he left partially undone to display his chest inkings and donned a pair of black jeans and baseball cap

Killer curves: Pamela drew attention to her ample assets with its sweetheart neckline, while showcasing her lithe limbs in the thigh-grazing dress

Meanwhile, Brandon showed off his sartorial flair in a silky red shirt, which he left partially undone to display his chest inkings and donned a pair of black jeans and baseball cap. 

The pair appeared in high spirits as they left the eatery, with Pamela linking arms with her eldest son.

Their outing comes after Brandon's fight with his father Tommy Lee earlier this month, which left the Motley Crue drummer with a busted, bloody lip.

Hollywood glamour: The screen siren complemented the all-black ensemble with a pair of elegant gloves and added a boost to her 5ft 5ins frame with patent court shoes

Sweet: The pair appeared in high spirits as they left the eatery, with Pamela linking arms with her eldest son

Family brawl: Their outing comes after Brandon's fight with his father Tommy Lee earlier this month, which left the Motley Crue drummer sharing a selfie of a busted, bloody lip

The Motley Crue drummer took to social media to tell his fans his son had left him 'unconscious' amid an argument spurred by a social media post in which he spoke out against the Hollywood pin-up.

 'My heart is broken,' wrote Lee.

'You can give your kids everything they could ever want in their entire lives and they can still turn against you. Good job Brandon! Great son!'

Punched: The Motley Crue drummer told fans his son had left him 'unconscious' amid an argument spurred by a social media post in which he spoke out against the Hollywood pin-up

Brandon went on to claim that he gave a drunken Lee the fat lip in self-defense, telling People, 'I'm devastated at the events of the last several days that have been a result of my father's alcoholism.'

Pamela posted a blog on her website in which she said that her son hit Lee 'in the nose for all of us who he has hurt.' 

In the post titled 'Alcoholism is the devil', she wrote: 'He [Brandon] punched him in the nose for all of us who he has hurt. Now Tommy feels humiliated - and is attempting to destroy his own son. This is the Devil - This is the disease of alcoholism.' 

Hitting back: Brandon went on to claim that he gave a drunken Lee the fat lip in self-defense

She added that the Dr. Feelgood drummer positions himself 'consistently [as] the center of sadness, drama and confusion,' has been 'jealous of his [sons'] talent and beauty from the day they were born,' and is the walking 'definition of narcissist/sociopath.'  

Tommy, who is also father to Dylan Jagger Lee, 20, said that he would follow through with authorities to prosecute his son over the assault, according to TMZ.

A source close to Lee told the publication: 'You encourage what you tolerate, and he's not going to tolerate what Brandon did and that's why he wants the criminal case to keep moving along ... at least for now.'

Family squabble: Lee took to social media to show off his wounds after his run-in with his son Brandon
item.dc:abstract: She has stood by her son Brandon after he punched her ex Tommy Lee during a furious family brawl. And Pamela Anderson and the 21-year-old put on a united display as they headed for dinner at celeb hotspot Craig's in Los Angeles on Monday. The Baywatch star, 50, oozed old Hollywood glamour as she slipped her curves into a black bodycon dress.
