item.title: Pregnant Eva Longoria puts her baby bump on display in a classic black T-shirt and leggings as she enjoys a brunch date in Miami
item.description: The actress, 43, showed off her beautiful bump as she indulged her pregnancy cravings with a hearty brunch at Yardbird Southern Table in Miami, Florida, on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
She's expecting her first child with husband José 'Pepe' Bastón in May. 

And Eva Longoria showed off her beautiful bump as she indulged her pregnancy cravings with a hearty brunch at Yardbird Southern Table in Miami, Florida, on Sunday.

The actress, 43, opted for a comfortable ensemble for her low-key day out, choosing a classic black T-shirt which hugged her blossoming shape.   

Bumping along: Eva Longoria showed off her beautiful bump as she indulged her pregnancy cravings with a hearty brunch at Yardbird Southern Table in Miami, Florida, on Sunday

The former Desperate Housewives star paired her simple tee with black cropped leggings and matching sneakers.

The brunette lightened her ensemble with a chic grey cross-body bag with a coordinated baseball cap that tucked back her glossy chestnut tresses.

Eva shielded her eyes from the bright Florida sunshine in a pair of reflective aviator shades.

Off-duty beauty: The actress, 43, opted for a comfortable ensemble for her low-key day out, choosing a classic black T-shirt which hugged her blossoming shape

The Telenovela showcased her natural pregnancy glow without any hint of make-up, but did include some sparkle with diamond earrings.

With her first baby on the way in a matter of weeks, Eva doesn't appear to be slowing down any time soon as she attended the filming of her new ABC soap Grand Hotel in Miami last week. 

While the multi-talented actress is busy with her thriving career, Eva recently spilled to Entertainment Tonight she was so busy she sometimes forgot she was pregnant.

'I have been working, so sometimes I wake up and I forget I am pregnant. Like this morning, I was like, "Oh my god, I am late!" and then I was like, "Why can't I get out of bed?" and I was like, "Helppp!" 

Busy mum-to-be: While the multi-talented actress is busy with her thriving career, Eva recently said she is so busy she sometimes forgets she is pregnant

'And then I was like, "Oh yeah, this thing." ... [I said] we should go skiing next weekend and [Jose] said no. I didn't know why. 

'I was like, "Why can't we go? What is the problem?" And I was like, "Oh god, I forgot!"'

Eva and her media mogul husband confirmed her pregnancy in January after rumours began circling at the end of last year, when she posted a photo of her growing baby bump on her Instagram account.

The couple tied the knot in Mexico in May 2016. 

Expecting! Eva confirmed her pregnancy in January after rumours began circling at the end of last year, when she posted a photo of her growing baby bump on her Instagram account

item.title: Tom Hardy cuts a surly figure as he transforms into notorious gangster Al Capone in first photo from forthcoming biopic Fonzo
item.description: The actor unveiled the first look of him portraying the notorious Chicago gangster via Instagram on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
He has taken on the role as Al Capone in the biopic Fonzo. 

And Tom Hardy unveiled the first look of him portraying the notorious Chicago gangster via Instagram on Sunday.

The actor, 40, bore a striking resemblance to the American mobster in the snap, sporting a shaven head and deep-set scars. 

Surly: Tom Hardy unveiled the first look of him portraying the notorious Chicago gangster via Instagram on Sunday

In the moody shot, the hunk cut a surly figure as he sat in a cell in unkempt clothes with his inmate.

Holding Al Capone's signature white hat, his character looked anguished, which is no doubt in reference to the criminal's mind deteriorating during his 10-year imprisonment. 

He simply captioned the snap: 'Chasing Fonzo'.

Notorious: The actor, 40, bore a striking resemblance to the American mobster (pictured above in 1930), sporting a shaven head and deep-set scars

Once the most feared gangster in America, the Josh Trunk movie will follow Al Capone at the age of 47, as he battles dementia. 

According to production notes, the story will show how 'his past becomes present as harrowing memories of his violent and brutal origins melt into his waking life'.

The Dark Knight Rises star, who beefed up considerably to play Bane in the Batman film and MMA fight Tommy Conlon in Warrior, previously spoke about his fears for his health now he's 40.

For the project, Tom had to once again alter his appearance, however, he claimed it wouldn't be as drastic as his muscular roles.

Muscle man: The Dark Knight Rises star, who beefed up considerably to play MMA fight Tommy Conlon in Warrior, previously spoke about his fears for his health now he's 40

 The Taboo star previously told the Daily Beast: 'It's not the classic Al Capone that you necessarily envision with the silhouette. I don't want to give too much away about it, but there's definitely a transformation with that role. 

'I don't know if it's as drastic as Bane. I've probably damaged my body too much. I'm only little!

'If I keep putting on weight I'll collapse like a house of cards under too much pressure.'

 The star added that he has aches and pains in places that he shouldn't and admitted he now struggles lifting his children Louis, nine, and the two-year-old he shares with wife Charlotte Riley. 

Meanwhile, Tom has confirmed that he wants to be the next 007 - by refusing to talk about the part in fear it will get him blacklisted.

He claimed that in the industry speaking about the role could be a kiss of death and so chose his words carefully.

The star was happy to throw his support behind Inception director Christopher Nolan, however, who has revealed he would be keen take over the franchise.

Striking: For the project Fonzo, Tom had to once again alter his appearance, however, he claimed it wouldn't be as drastic as his muscular roles

item.title: Bumping along nicely! Heavily pregnant Big Brother star Krystal Forscutt flaunts her burgeoning baby bump in an unbuttoned T-shirt as she prepares to welcome her second child
item.description: The former Big Brother star is expecting her second child in May. And on Monday, Krystal Hipwell proudly flaunted her burgeoning baby bump in an unbuttoned denim shirt on Instagram.
item.content:encoded:
She is expecting her second child to husband Neil in May.

And on Monday, Big Brother star Krystal Hipwell (née Forscutt) proudly flaunted her burgeoning baby bump in an unbuttoned denim shirt on Instagram.

Sharing the side-on shot of her pregnant frame, Krystal wrote: '30 weeks of growing you baby girl! I guess I should probably start getting my act together soon.' 

Bumping along nicely! Heavily pregnant Big Brother star Krystal Forscutt flaunts her burgeoning baby bump in an unbuttoned T-shirt as she prepares to welcome her second child 

The fitness trainer's stomach was exposed in the shot, as she wore white underwear and no bra for the upload.

Krystal used the post to seek reassurance from her 29.7k followers, joking: 'Surely there are other Mums out there who also failed miserably at setting up the nursery before their Bub arrived?? If not then please just say yes to make me feel better.' 

Krystal also shares two-year-old son, Sunny, with her builder husband Neil.

Not long to go! Krystal is expecting her second child to husband Neil in May

Last week she joked about her belly button popping around '14 weeks', referring to it resembling a 'third nipple'.  

Krystal was no stranger to wearing revealing clothing to flaunt her figure during her days on Big Brother and as a swimwear model. 

And she also posted another photo in an open kimono, showcasing her growing belly as she looked down towards the ground.

She's glowing! Krystal also posted another photo in an open kimono, showcasing her growing belly

Poking fun! Last week she joked about her belly button popping around '14 weeks', referring to it resembling a 'third nipple'

Only two weeks ago, she announced she had reached the final stage of her pregnancy by posing in a bra and pink robe as she entered her third trimester.  

'Hello 3rd trimester!' Krystal captioned the gorgeous selfie, which was taken in what appeared to be her bedroom.

Krystal explained that the robe's hue marked a change from the stereotypically male colours she's used to.

'After 3 and a bit years of playing trucks and trains with my boy I can’t believe we are actually having a girl,' she wrote.

'I am normally what you call the opposite of a "PINK" person but pretty soon I don’t think I am going to have much of a choice! This is the first pink clothing item to make it into our house, probably the first of many.' 

Mum's the word! Krystal already has a two-year-old boy named Sunny

The former Zoo cover favourite's Instagram feed is filled with moments from her pregnancy journey as she awaits the arrival of her daughter with husband Neil.

Earlier this month, the brunette bombshell uploaded a before and after shot of her pregnancy body transformation.

'A lot can change in six months,' she captioned the image.

'I have officially now said goodbye to being able to see my toes when I look down, I’ve gained almost as much weight as I did with my first over my whole pregnancy!  

Body transformation: Last week, Krystal shared a before and after snap of her pre- and post-pregnancy figure

Krystal, who appeared on Big Brother alongside her mother Karen in 2006, has also shared photos depicting her as a doting mum to Sonny.

In a throwback snap posted to Krystal's social media in November was a intimate nude photo of her newborn son resting on her body.

The caption read: '6 weeks new. #tbt This pic was taken not long before Sunny moved from our bedroom into his nursery, which at the time was a HUGE event.'   

Reality TV beginnings: Krystal (right) found fame starring on Big Brother in 2006 alongside her mother Karen (left)

item.title: 'There are days I feel fat': Ashley Graham says women will always be self-conscious about their bodies... as she rocks out on Instagram
item.description: Ashley Graham is 'not convinced' there will ever be a time when women aren't self-conscious about their bodies.
item.content:encoded:
She posted an Instagram video of herself twerking on Monday.

But despite her incredible figure and obvious body confidence, Ashley Graham is 'not convinced' there will ever be a time when women aren't self-conscious about their bodies.

The 29-year-old model admits that she has days where she 'feels fat', and doesn't believe there will be a time when 'every woman' wakes up and 'feels like a million dollars'.

Scroll down for video 

Looking good: Ashley Graham posted an Instagram video of herself twerking on Monday

Working it: She captioned the video, which promoted her tie-in with Revlon, 'Revlon’s Kiss Plumping Lip Crème, Lemon Dance Challenge, Live Boldly'

Doubts: Despite her incredible figure and obvious body confidence, Ashley is 'not convinced' there will ever be a time when women aren't self-conscious about their bodies

She said: 'There are some days I feel fat. I'm not convinced there's going to be a moment where every woman in the world wakes up and feels like a million dollars. So, what I want to do is give women the tools that will help when those moments come up. Sometimes it can be as easy as telling yourself that you are beautiful.'

But the Sports Illustrated model refuses to 'let a little cellulite' hinder her happiness, and says she is largely inspired by the 'positive' outlook that her mother always has.

She added: 'My mom is the most positive person. She has always had a smile on her face no matter what came her way. After seeing that, I'm not going to let a little cellulite get in the way of my happiness!'

And Ashley is determined to help other women 'be happy and thrive' in their own skin, and has urged women everywhere to 'support each other'.

At her best: The Sports Illustrated model says she refuses to 'let a little cellulite' hinder her happiness, and says she is largely inspired by the 'positive' outlook that her mother always has

Speaking out: Ashley is determined to help other women 'be happy and thrive' in their own skin, and has urged women everywhere to 'support each other'

Message: She told the June/July issue of StyleWatch magazine: 'Support each other'

She told the June/July issue of StyleWatch magazine: 'Support each other. In the modelling industry, one woman is great, but in order to make a major change, you need a group of models supporting each other. At the end of the day, I just want to help other women be happy and thrive. And that's what I want for myself too.'

Meanwhile, Ashley previously admitted she was 'disgusted' by her curvaceous figure when she was a teenager.

Asked when she became accepting of her figure, Ashley explained: 'It would be so much easier to be like, 'This is the date, time, and experience I had,' but there really isn't one. It was more about experiences in my life of devaluing the fact that I was an average, normal girl living in the city.

Confident: The model is the face of Revlon; pictured at a party for the brand in January

'But being told, 'You're fat,' 'You're ugly' or 'You're just not good enough,' and trying to live in these model standards, that was my normal.

'I think I hit bottom around 18. I was disgusted with myself and told my mom I was coming home. And she told me, 'No, you're not, because you told me that this was what you wanted and I know you're supposed to do this. It doesn't matter what you think about your body, because your body is supposed to change somebody's life.'
item.dc:abstract: Ashley Graham is 'not convinced' there will ever be a time when women aren't self-conscious about their bodies. The 29-year-old model is known for speaking out about body positivity and flaunting her own stunning curves, but has admitted even she has days where she 'feels fat', and doesn't believe there will be a time when 'every woman' wakes up and 'feels like a million dollars'. She said: 'There are some days I feel fat. I'm not convinced there's going to be a moment where every woman in the world wakes up and feels like a million dollars. So, what I want to do is give women the tools that will help when those moments come up. Sometimes it can be as easy as telling yourself that you are beautiful.'
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith
item.mi:shortTitle: Ashley Graham rocks out on Instagram

item.title: Antonio Banderas is joined by stunning daughter Stella for Holy Week celebrations in his hometown of Malaga
item.description: The actor, 57, showcased his freshly-shaved head as he and the stunning 21-year-old watched the lavish affair from the balcony of a boutique hotel.
item.content:encoded:
He returns to his Spanish hometown of Malaga every year for the city's annual Holy Week.

And Antonio Banderas ensured the celebrations were a family affair on Monday, as he was joined by his daughter Stella for the famous Semana Santa.

The actor, 57, showcased his freshly-shaved head as he and his 21-year-old watched the religious affair from the balcony of a boutique hotel.

Family affair: Antonio Banderas was joined by his daughter Stella for the famous Semana Santa in Malaga on Monday

The actor, who had participated in the Palm Sunday service the previous evening, cut a more casual figure in an Aviation-style bomber jacket as he watched proceedings from the Larios hotel. 

While he layered a shirt and tie underneath, it was his freshly-shaven head that caught the most attention - having undergone a dramatic makeover for his upcoming role as Pablo Picasso.

Clearly relaxed during the annual celebrations, Antonio was joined by his daughter Stella - who was casually chic in high-rise jeans and an embroidered floral cardigan.

Casual: The actor cut a low-key figure in an Aviation-style bomber jacket as he watched proceedings from the Larios hotel

Catching up: Clearly relaxed during the annual celebrations, Antonio was joined by his daughter Stella, 21, and one of her friends

Stunning: Stella was casually chic in high-rise jeans and an embroidered floral cardigan, and opted to forgo make-up 

Having a ball: The trio were seen happily chatting together as they watched the famous service from their hotel room

Leaving her hair in loose, tousled waves and sporting minimal make-up, the beauty proved her naturally clear and glowing complexion as she chatted to her father during the exciting event. 

The actor returns to his hometown of Málaga each year for the religious Easter Weekend. 

Twenty-four hours earlier he was seen participating in the Palm Sunday service,as part of his role as a penitent in the Lagrimas y Favores (Tears and Favours) brotherhood.

Capturing the moment: The group were later seen snapping photos as the service proceeded

Iconic: Numerous guests were spotted on the hotel balcony, with the Semana Santa the city's most famous annual celebration

The Mask of Zorro actor donned white robes, a black hood and an ornate necklace as he rang a large silver bell and called out to the congregation inside a church. 

Antonio has been joined for the celebrations by his daughter and girlfriend Nicole Kimpel, 37.

The pair have been dating since 2014, following the end of his 19-year marriage to Melanie Griffith.   

Doing his bit: He has already been seen participating in the Palm Sunday service, as part of his role as a penitent in the Lagrimas y Favores (Tears and Favours) brotherhood

Antonio was worlds away from his usual self with his freshly-shaved head and eyebrows, which mark part of his metamorphosis into Pablo Picasso for the second series of Genius.

The artist's story follows the first hit season, which starred Geoffrey Rush as Nobel Prize winning scientist Albert Einstein.

The show earned National Geographic its best ratings ever, with 45million viewers tuning in globally, and the second series is set to premiere on April 24. 

Main man: Antonio was worlds away from his usual self with his freshly-shaved head and eyebrows, which mark part of his metamorphosis into Pablo Picasso for TV series Genius
item.dc:abstract: He returns to his Spanish hometown of Malaga every year for the city's annual Semana Santa. And Antonio Banderas ensured the celebrations were a family affair on Monday, as he was joined by his daughter Stella for the famous Holy Week. The actor, 57, showcased his freshly-shaved head as he and the stunning 21-year-old watched the lavish affair from the balcony of a boutique hotel.

item.mi:shortTitle: Antonio Banderas is joined by daughter Stella for Easter in Malaga

item.title: Aaron Carter says he wants to settle down and have kids with a woman and claims his coming out as bisexual last year was 'misconstrued'
item.description: The St. Petersburg, Florida native said on a podcast for Hollywood Life that things were 'misconstrued' when he came out as bisexual last year.
item.content:encoded:
Aaron Carter says he ultimately sees himself settling down with a wife and kids, about seven months after going public with the revelation that he's bisexual.

'I see myself being with a woman and having kids,' the 30-year-old musical artist said. 'I want to have a family.'

The St. Petersburg, Florida native said on a podcast for Hollywood Life that things were 'misconstrued' when he came out as bisexual last year, as he said he envisions his future in a relationship with a member of the opposite sex after he was asked if he would date a man publicly.

Scroll below for video 

Future plans: Aaron Carter, 30, said that despite his revelation last summer that he's bisexual, he envisions his future as being married with a wife and kids

'It was more so just a story that happened when I was like 17 with somebody, and I can find men and women attractive,' said the Saturday Night artist, 'but when it comes down to it, I think it was a little misconstrued.'

But Carter stressed that he's always aspired to find love with a woman.

'I keep telling people that,' he said. 'I don't want it to be misconstrued too much just because I was open about a story.'

Aaron's life spiraled out of control on 2017 following the death of his father.

Opening up: Carter said that his remarks were 'misconstrued' about his sexuality

Lothario: The pop singer has past dated stars such as Hilary Duff and Lindsay Lohan

Carter, who was arrested for DUI and marijuana possession in July, checked into rehab in a bid to tackle his demons, recently admitting he needed to remove himself from the spotlight.

'Life, it was pretty tough,' said the Crazy Little Party Girl artist, whose brother is Backstreet Boys singer Nick Carter.

'I dealt with a lot of trauma, a lot of loss, a lot of loneliness. I just felt like I needed to get away.'

Carter on August 5 revealed via social media that he 'started to find boys and girls attractive' at the age of 13, and had his first sexual encounter with a male four years later 'after a few relationships with girls.'

The Sooner or Later singer said that when he was 17, he had a sexual 'experience with a male that [he] had an attraction to who [he] also worked with and grew up with.'

In a follow-up interview on Elvis Duran and the Morning Show later that month, Carter - who had recently parted with girlfriend Madison Parker at the time - said he opened up about his sexuality because he 'just can’t live a lie.

'I came out about my history and that I’m attracted to men and women, equally, and whatever that may mean now, and the last five relationships, I’ve been with girls,' he told Duran.
item.dc:abstract: Aaron Carter says he ultimately sees himself settling down with a wife and kids, about seven months after going public with the revelation that he's bisexual. 'I see myself being with a woman and having kids,' the 30-year-old musical artist said. 'I want to have a family.' The St. Petersburg, Florida native said on a podcast for Hollywood Life that things were 'misconstrued' when he came out as bisexual last year, as he said he envisions his future in a relationship with a member of the opposite sex after he was asked if he would date a man publicly.

item.title: 'I hear crazy things!' Khloe Kardashian reveals she's 'nervous' about breastfeeding as her April due date looms ever-closer
item.description: After one fan commented about the not-so-sexy reality of breastfeeding under a steamy Instagram of her and beau Tristan Thompson, Khlo said: 'Oh my gosh lol I'm nervous... I hear crazy things.'
item.content:encoded:
She's excited for the arrival of her first daughter in April.

But Khloe Kardashian explained that there's one upcoming pregnancy task she's 'nervous' about: breastfeeding.

After one fan commented about the not-so-sexy reality of breastfeeding under a steamy Instagram of her with beau Tristan Thompson, Khlo responded, saying: 'Oh my gosh lol I'm nervous... I hear crazy things but I'll fight through it and love it.'

Anxious about that! Khloe Kardashian explained she's 'nervous' about breastfeeding while having a conversation with one of her Instagram followers in the comments section of a sexy photo, above

As Khloe happily flaunted her full chest in an alluring set of lingerie, one Instagram follower told the starlet to be thankful for her current breasts.

'When you start breastfeeding [it's] going to be major leakage and then [you're] not going to want to see those boobs anymore,' wrote the fan.

'Breastfeeding is no joke but it is a beautiful thing and a great bonding experience with your baby.'

The Good American Jeans took things in stride, but admitted: 'Oh my gosh lol I'm nervous about breastfeeding. I hear crazy things but I'll fight through it and love it.'

Flaunt 'em while you got 'em! As Khloe showed off her full chest in an alluring set of lingerie, one Instagram follower told the starlet to be thankful for her current breasts, explaining 'When you start breastfeeding... [you're] not going to want to see those boobs anymore'

Nervous, but ready: The Good American Jeans co-founder (above in an Instagram last week) took things in stride, but admitted: 'Oh my gosh lol I'm nervous about breastfeeding. I hear crazy things but I'll fight through it and love it'

Earlier in the day the Revenge Body hostess mused about what her little girl was going to be like on her premium subscription-based website, saying: 'She'll be the perfect mix of me and Tristan—which is such a crazy thought, LOL.'

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star said that she hoped the bouncing baby girl will get her style and work ethic from her.

Khloe insisted that she would like their future child to have Tristan's good looks and even athleticism from the Cleveland Cavaliers power forward though she insists that they are both 'beasts'.

One thing that the youngest Kardashian sister hopes her future daughter gets from both parents is IQ. 

Busy bee! The daughter of Kris Jenner, above at her baby shower co-hosted by Amazon, has been very active during her pregnancy, launching her Good Mama maternity line and keeping everyone up-to-date on social media

Khloe explained: 'But I want maybe TT's [Tristan's]  IQ and my street smarts.'

The daughter of Kris Jenner - who has said she has not yet found a name for her baby girl - has been very active during her pregnancy.

She has not only launched her Good Mama maternity line, which is an offshoot of Good American, but she has also kept up with her social media posts.   

In mid March, Khloe's sisters and mother were all in attendance at her extravagant Los Angeles baby shower, which was held back-to-back with Tristan's birthday party.

Mom on the go! In mid March, Khloe's sisters and mother were all in attendance at her extravagant Los Angeles baby shower, which was held back-to-back with Tristan's birthday party, above

I hear crazy things but I'll fight through it and love it.'

item.title: The colour of love! TOWIE's Gemma Collins steps out in pink and red as she FINALLY makes relationship with James Argent official after seven years
item.description: The reality star, 37, stepped out without her love Arg, 30, during the casual trip but looked happy and relaxed while catching up with friends in Essex.
item.content:encoded:
She finally confessed her love for James 'Arg' Argent on Sunday's episode of The Only Way Is Essex after seven years of on-off dating. 

And Gemma Collins looked cheerful as she caught up with friends in Essex as TOWIE fans rejoiced over the union.

The reality star, 37, stepped out without her love Arg, 30, during the casual trip but looked happy and relaxed in her striking pink and red striped jumper.

Loved up: Gemma Collins, 37, looked worlds away from her usual TOWIE glamour during a casual outing with friends in Essex on Saturday... after confessing her love for James Argent

Opting for an unusually low-key look, the TV personality kept it comfortable in a pair of black joggers and monochrome trainers.

The Celebs Go Dating star wrapped up in a stylish faux-fur gilet, while her blonde locks were swept up into a messy half-up do.

Flanked by her friends, Gemma went without her trademark jewellery and show-stopping make-up, instead going fresh-faced. 

New chapter: Gemma and Arg confirmed their relationship on Sunday night's TOWIE - revealing they had bought a house together in Spain

Off-duty beauty: The reality star, 37, stepped out without her love Arg, 30, during the casual trip but looked happy and relaxed in her striking pink and red striped jumper

Wrapping up: Slipping into her warm jumper, Gemma joined her friends for the chilled out day

The bubbly blonde looked utterly smitten with Arg during their loved-up moment on Sunday's episode of TOWIE.

On the season premiere, Gemma and Arg finally confirmed their relationship - revealing they had bought a house together in Spain and were already thinking of having children.  

The reality stars left TOWIE viewers stunned by the unexpected baby news when they visited a financial adviser and exchanged 'I love you' to each other.

Loved up: Hours after her trip with friends, Gemma finally confirmed her relationship with Arg on the season premiere of TOWIE after seven years of on-off dating 

Sealed with a kiss: Visiting a financial advisor to discuss opening a joint bank account, the pair looked happier than ever as they joked about Gemma having 'more staff than Mariah Carey'

Visiting the financial advisor to discuss opening a joint bank account, the pair looked happier than ever as they joked about Gemma having 'more staff than Mariah Carey'.  

Gemma said: 'We got matching watches and we've bought a holiday home in Spain and now we're setting up a joint bank account.  

'We've known each other for so long, we know other so well...I love you so much, I'll give you anything I've got. Every week we want to put a thousand into the account...  

Simple style: Opting for an unusually low-key look, Gemma kept it comfortable in a pair of black joggers and monochrome trainers

'What it is, I'm a big roller, I earn well, I spend well. If Arg is watching the football, I'll have a massage girl come round.' 

Arg then interrupted: 'She has more staff than Mariah Carey. She has a cleaner come round five times a week to clean her two bedroom apartment.'  

In the midst of the banter, the Meme Queen then dropped the bombshell that their new property was in part to 'relax her body for a baby' when the adviser asked if they would consider setting up an account for their future offsprings - a question which James nervously laughing.

Smiles: The Celebs Go Dating beauty wrapped up in a stylish faux-fur gilet while her blonde locks were swept up into a messy half-up do

She confessed: 'Part of going to Spain is to relax my body to prepare for a baby.' 

Speaking to OK! hours after they confirmed their coupling , Gemma gushed that Arg was now 'fully committed' to her after weeks of indecision, and revealed the pair have spent every night together since taking their relationship to the next level.  

After enduring weeks of unrequited love, Gemma gushed: 'To hear that he was ready to commit was a dream come true after so many years of not knowing where we both stand.’

Keeping it casual: Flanked by her friends, Gemma went without her trademark jewelry and show-stopping make-up

‘James is like a different man since we made things official. I can tell he’s completely committed to me now.'  

Clearly more besotted than ever, Gemma also admitted the pair are inseparable, and have barely spent time apart since declaring their love.

She added: 'Every morning he puts on a love song for me and before we go to bed he cuddles me and tells me how beautiful I am. I feel so secure with him.

‘We haven’t spent a night apart since we made things official – James has basically moved into my flat.’

Strong: Gemma gushed that Arg was now 'fully committed' to her, and revealed the pair have spent every night together since making it official (pictured in November)
item.dc:abstract: She finally confessed her love for James 'Arg' Argent on Sunday's episode of The Only Way Is Essex after seven years of on-off dating. And Gemma Collins looked cheerful as she caught up with friends in Essex as TOWIE fans rejoiced over the union. The reality star, 37, stepped out without her love Arg, 30, during the casual trip but looked happy and relaxed in her striking pink and red striped jumper.

item.title: That's not very ladylike! Bachelorette star Sophie Monk passes wind during a date following her split with Stu Laundy
item.description: She's newly-single after her Bachelorette romance with millionaire Stu Laundy, 44, ended in January.
item.content:encoded:
She's newly-single after her Bachelorette romance with millionaire Stu Laundy, 44, ended in January.

And on Monday, Sophie Monk showed fans 'how not to date' as she acted out a series of 'awkward' trysts with KIIS FM drive-time hosts Will & Woody.

The former Bardot star, 38, took to Instagram to share a series of videos of the trio demonstrating the worst dating fails. 

'Awkward dates. Which one are you? I'm pretty much all of them. I'm shit at dating... clearly' she captioned one of the videos.

The first clip she shared with her 484,000 Instagram followers was titled 'The Most Awkward Dates'.

The first 'awkward date' explores the unsavory subject of farting during courtship.

Dating fails: The Bachelorette Sophie Monk showed fans 'how NOT to date' on Monday while acting out a series of 'awkward' scenes with KIIS FM drive time hosts Will & Woody

The clip begins with Sophie sitting in the front seat of a vehicle waiting for her 'date' (played by Woody) to hop into the car.  

Before Sophie's male suitor gets into the driver's seat, Sophie decides to lift up a cheek and loudly relieve herself.

Seconds later, Woody jumps into the car.

'Do you smell that?' The first 'awkward date' explores the unsavory subject of farting during courtship 

The radio presenter begins to suspiciously sniff the air before asking Sophie: 'Do you smell that?'

She responds: 'Yeah, it smells like an old banana or something!'

The second scene is titled 'The Tinder Date', and centres around Sophie meeting a man from the dating app who looks absolutely nothing like his profile picture.

Tinder fail: The second scene is titled 'The Tinder Date', and centres around Sophie meeting a man from the dating app who looks absolutely nothing like his profile picture

Meanwhile, the last scene explores the dangers of dating a man who still lives at home with his parents.

In the scene, Sophie and Woody are lying on a bed gazing into each other's eyes.

The romantic moment is interrupted when Woody asks Sophie is she'd like anything to eat.  

He then awkwardly shouts: 'Mum! Mum! Can we get some spring-rolls?'

'Mum! Mum! Can we get some spring-rolls? Another scene explores the dangers of dating a man who still lives at home with his parents 

'The Too Close For Comfort Date' is the next 'awkward' date on the agenda for Sophie, Will and Woody.

In the video, Sophie and Will's cuddly date is cut short when they discover they are in fact 'cousins'. 

Following on from this, 'The Netflix And Chill Date' begins with Woody inviting  Sophie into his home.

Netflix and Chill? In another scene, Sophie looks excited by the prospect of some 'Netflix and Chill' - only to discover her date actually wants to watch films and relax

In the scene, Sophie looks excited by the prospect of some 'Netflix and Chill'.

However she is disappointed when she discovers Woody genuinely wanted to watch films and relax.

The last clip is titled 'The Wrong Message Date' and centres around Sophie being 'friend zoned' by her date.

In the scene, Sophie goes in for a passionate kiss but Will pulls away, kisses her on the cheek politely and runs off. 

Whoops! The last clip is titled 'The Wrong Message Date' and centres around Sophie being 'friend zoned' by her date

item.title: Look no hands! Kourtney Kardashian shares video of toyboy Younes Bendjima steering SUV with his legs on Easter road trip
item.description: Kourtney shared video to Instagram Monday showing Younes with his arms folded and looking at her as the vehicle whizzes along the highway. 'Keeping me safe.'
item.content:encoded:
Kourtney Kardashian and her younger lover Younes Bendjima have headed off on a road trip for spring break.

The reality star and mom-of-three, 38, didn't seem fazed, however, when the 24-year-old Algerian model decided to drive their SUV with his knees instead of his hands.

Kourtney shared video to Instagram Monday showing Younes with his arms folded and looking at her as the vehicle whizzes along the highway.

And as he sits in the driver's seat with his shoe-less feet up on the dash, the Keeping Up With The Kardashian's star added the caption: 'Keeping me safe.'

Scroll down for video 

Road trip: Kourtney Kardashian shared Instagram video Monday showing her toyboy Younes Bendjima sitting with his hands off the wheel while driving their SUV on the highway

'Keeping me safe': Mother-of-three Kourtne, 38, seemed unfazed by the 24-year-old Algerian model's laid back attitude as he placed his shoe-less feet on the dash

The pair look to be taking time away from Kourtney's Calabasas home as the video also showed images of a silver Airstream trailer.

It's not known where they are heading.

The couple, who started dating in December 2016 after meeting in Paris, unfollowed each other on Instagram earlier this month sparking rumors of a split.

But the romance seems to be going stronger than ever. 

Getaway: The couple, who started dating in December 2016 after meeting in Paris, are headed off on a spring break road trip together

Road trip: The video also showed a silver Airstream trailer under the blue California sky

Snacking: On Sunday, Kourtney had shared a picture of herself in a racy black ensemble eating pizza

Not to be outdone by his ex, Scott Disick, 34, also left town Monday with his teen girlfriend Sofia Richie. 

Sofia, 19, shared a snap to Instagram showing them hugging on the steps of a private jet with the pilot in the cockpit. 

She also shared a photo of her new mottled Dachshund puppy gifted to her by Scott along with the caption: 'First time flyer.'

The two have been an item since May last year. 

They'r eoff: Not to be outdone by his ex, Scott Disick, 34, also left town Monday with his teen girlfriend Sofia Richie. Sofia, 19, shared a snap to Instagram showing them hugging on the steps of a private jet with the pilot in the cockpit

She also shared a photo of her new mottled Dachshund puppy gifted to her by Scott along with the caption: 'First time flyer'

Scott and Kourtney share three young children together - Mason, eight, Penelope, five, and Reign, three.

The kids have been introduced to their parents' new partners.

The reality TV exes split in July 2015 after Kourtney grew tired of Scott's partying and cheating.

They had been together since 2006.

Exes: Scott and Kourtney, who split in July 2015, share three young children together - Mason, eight, Penelope, five, and Reign, three.  They're pictured in Las Vegas in May 2015
item.dc:abstract: Kourtney Kardashian and her younger lover Younes Bendjima have headed off on a road trip for spring break. The reality star and mom-of-three, 38, didn't seem fazed, however, when the 24-year-old Algerian model decided to drive their SUV with his knees instead of his hands. Kourtney shared video to Instagram Monday showing Younes with his arms folded and looking at her as the vehicle whizzes along the highway. And as he sits in the driver's seat with his shoe-less feet up on the dash, the Keeping Up With The Kardashian's star added the caption: 'Keeping me safe.'

item.title: 'I worry she'll reject my version of Mary Poppins': Emily Blunt admits she's nervous her daughter Hazel, four, won't enjoy remake
item.description: She's admitted to being nervous about how her children - Hazel, four, and 21-month-old Violet - will react when they watch her performance.
item.content:encoded:
Tough critic: Emily Blunt with her daughter Hazel last year

Emily Blunt worries her daughters won't enjoy her portrayal of Mary Poppins.

The London-born actress is playing the iconic English nanny in an upcoming Disney film, but she's admitted to being nervous about how her children - Hazel, four, and 21-month-old Violet - will react when they watch her performance.

Emily - who is married to American actor John Krasinski - shared: 'Hazel loves Julie [Andrews] so much that I worry she's just gonna reject my version of Mary Poppins. 

'I think it's strange for the kids of actors to see their parents in stuff... I think it's weird for Hazel 'cause she's also young - they're really young, my kids, and so it's disconcerting for them to see you as someone else behaving in a way that's not natural.'

The upcoming 'Mary Poppins Returns' also features an appearance from Academy Award-winning actress Meryl Streep.

The duo both previously starred alongside each other in 2006's 'The Devil Wears Prada', and Emily has joked that the acclaimed actress is now stalking her.

Teasing Meryl's role in the new film, Emily told Entertainment Tonight: 'We have really set a tone that we never play characters that like each other very much. And so we are continuing with that tradition in this.

Remake: Emily Blunt stars as the magical nanny in the upcoming Mary Poppins returns

'I don't know if we could ever play like best pals in something. It's just not what works for Meryl and I.'

'The Devil Wears Prada' remains one of the highlights of Emily's career.

But the 35-year-old beauty has revealed she's never really spoken about the film - which also features Anne Hathaway - with her co-stars, even though fans have been calling for a sequel for more than a decade.

She said: 'It's so funny because, you know, we don't tend to talk about work that much. You know, actors don't end up talking about work that much.'

Original: Julie Andrews with  Dick Van Dyke, Karen Dotrice and Matthew Garber

Emily - who is married to American actor John Krasinski - shared: 'Hazel loves Julie [Andrews] so much that I worry she's just gonna reject my version of Mary Poppins.

item.title: Pregnant Kirsten Dunst drapes baby bump in plaid shirt as she lunches with fiancé Jesse Plemons in LA
item.description: Kirsten, 35, who's expecting her first child, made sure to keep hydrated as she exited the eatery carrying a bottle of water.
item.content:encoded:
She's expecting her first child with her fiance Jesse Plemons. 

And on Monday, pregnant Kirsten Dunst, 35, was positively blooming as she stepped out with her beau.

The couple, who met on the set of the FX series Fargo, were spotted enjoying lunch together in the Toluca Lake neighborhood of LA.

Baby on board: Pregnant Kirsten Dunst, 35, was positively blooming as she stepped out in the Toluca Lake neighborhood of Los Angeles on Monday

Kirsten made sure to keep hydrated as she exited the eatery carrying a bottle of water.

She wore skintight black leggings and black flip flops and draped her baby bump in a loose-fitting plaid shirt.

The actress added a black cardigan and a pair of gold-rimmed sunglasses and carried a white shoulder purse.

Growing belly: The actress, who is expecting her first child, draped her baby bump in a loose-fitting plaid shirt

Low key: She and fiance Jesse Plemons, whom she met on the set of the FX series Fargo, enjoyed a casual lunch out at a local eatery

Dressed for comfort: Kirsten wore skintight black leggings and black flip flops and sported a pair of gold-rimmed sunglasses

Jesse, 29, who has appeared in TV shows Friday Night Lights and Breaking Bad, sported a polka dot shirt and blue jeans with white trainers.

He wore a baseball cap and sunglasses and carried a bottle of water and a beverage in a cup with a straw.   

Kirsten, whose credits include the movies Bring It On, Spider-Man, Hidden Figures and The Beguiled, revealed last year that she was finally ready to be a mother. 

'I wasn’t one of those 'I need a baby!"' people until my goddaughter was born,' she explained in an interview for the July 2017 issue of Marie Claire UK.

'I love her so much. That love is just like… you can’t experience that unless you have a kid,' she said. 'I put her to bed last night and she woke up this morning and said to her mom, 'Where’s Kiki?' I just love that love. That’s what I want.'

Laid back style: Jesse, 29, who has appeared in TV shows Friday Night Lights and Breaking Bad, sported a polka dot shirt and blue jeans with white trainers and a baseball cap

First time mom: The Spider-Man and Hidden Figures star made sure to stay hydrated, carrying a bottle of water with her

Parenthood: Kirsten revealed last year that she was ready to be a mother, after doting on her young goddaughter

item.title: 'Make it official!' Fans continue to speculate over Hailee Steinfeld's developing friendship with Niall Horan as she poses in One Direction star's tour T-shirt
item.description: The Pitch Perfect star, 21, sent her keen Twitter followers wild with relationship questions as she shared a typically stunning snap in Niall Horan's tour merchandise on Sunday evening.
item.content:encoded:
They recently sparked romance rumours after they put on a cosy display during a concert in Las Vegas just a few weeks ago.

And Hailee Steinfeld sent her keen Twitter followers wild as she shared a typically stunning snap in Niall Horan's tour merchandise on Sunday evening.  

The Pitch Perfect star, 21, gave the camera a smoldering gaze as she showcased her support for the One Director star, 24.

A blossoming romance? Hailee Steinfeld sent her keen Twitter followers wild with relationship questions as she shared a stunning snap in Niall Horan's tour merchandise on Sunday evening

The Love Myself hitmaker teamed the promotional tee with edgy ripped jeans, tied in with a pair of on-trend brogues.

As her brunette tresses cascaded down one side of her face, the Term Life actress gave a slight peek at her glamorous makeup, which included a smokey eye look.

Flooding Hailee's page with assumptions on her relationship with Niall, one fan wrote: 'I love a supportive girlfriend.'

Close pals: The Pitch Perfect star, 21, recently sparked romance rumours after she put on a cosy display with the former One Director star during a concert in Las Vegas last month

Another insisted that the stars should confirm their status: 'Make it official already!'

Gushing in admiration over Hailee's appearance, a follower wrote: 'Hailee in a Naill t-shirt? I've never seen a more perfect sight!' 

Focusing on their musical talents instead of their personal connection, one penned: 'Where's the collab we all want?' while another keen fan shared a hilarious meme of Ed Sheeran holding a dictionary definition of collaboration.  

'I love a supportive girlfriend': Eager fans flooded the actress' page with assumptions on their relationship

MailOnline has contacted Niall and Hailee's representatives for comment.

These tweets come after the pair enjoyed a lively Backstreet Boys gig last month.

The singers proved to be close as they attended the concert together - chatting and laughing together as they sipped on drinks in the VIP area. 

In video footage posted to Twitter, Hailee and Niall were seen singing and dancing to the band's big hits - I Want It That Way and Everybody - before they erupted into laughter when Niall was approached by a group of fans for selfies. 

The Slow Hands hitmaker had already set the rumour mill whirring in December last year, when he shared a sweet birthday tribute to the award-winning actress on Instagram.

Niall wrote: 'Happy birthday to the loveliest person on the planet and one of my best friends @haileesteinfeld. Have no idea what the hell is going on in this photo. Love ya hails.'

The Los Angeles native gave a glimpse of her relationship with Niall in an interview with Us Weekly: 'I feel so lucky that [my fans] care enough about me to know what I’m doing every second of every day, but I think that sometimes it’s hard for people in general to realise that there are boundaries to a person’s life and personal life.'

Sweet: The Slow Hands hitmaker had already set the rumour mill whirring in December last year, when he shared a birthday tribute to the award-winning actress on Instagram

Before adding: 'I do love that I have the opportunity to share with them what I’m comfortable with and they’re there to listen and support me.' 

She also admitted she has a 'guard up' when it comes to dating, in an interview with Marie Claire.

She said: 'I’m trying to protect myself and have a bit of a guard up, but I also want to fall in love and know why love hurts.'  

The Irish belter confirmed he was single back in October, when he last discussed his love life in public.

Appearing on KIIS FM Breakfast in Australia, he said: 'I'm a very single man. You know, I'm 24 and travelling the world and that's the way it is.'

'I'm trying to protect myself!' The award-winning star recently admitted she has a 'guard up' when it comes to dating, in an interview with Marie Claire

item.title: Beyonce bite drama: Sara Foster and actress Sanaa Lathan hit back at the beehive and deny speculation they are the culprits
item.description: Tiffany Haddish sparked a Twitter frenzy this week after her relevation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party.
item.content:encoded:
Tiffany Haddish sparked a Twitter frenzy this week after her revelation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party.

And Beyonce's notoriously dedicated Beyhive have been quick to place blame, prompting Love & Basketball actress Sanaa Lathan and model Sara Foster, ex step-sister of Bella and Gigi Hadid, to deny rumours that they are the culprits.

Girls' Trip actress Tiffany started the drama when she told the April edition of GQ that music icon Beyonce was bit by a fellow reveller at a private afterparty following Jay Z's performance at The Forum in Los Angeles in December.

Detective work: Tiffany Haddish sparked a Twitter frenzy this week after her revelation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party, prompting her fans to accuse two actresses

Tiffany has refused to name the culprit, meaning Bey's loyal fanbase have turned detective. 

Fans found the guest list from the event and concluded that it could have been The Best Man actress Sanaa, 46, commenting with bumblebee emojis on Lathan's social media.

Sanna broke her silence on Monday night, tweeting: 'Y'all are funny. Under no circumstances did I bite Beyoncé and if I did it would've been a love bite.'

Accused: Beyonce's notoriously dedicated Beyhive have been quick to place blame, prompting Love & Basketball actress Sanaa Lathan to deny rumours she is the culprit

Not me! Sanna broke her silence on Monday night, tweeting: 'Y'all are funny. Under no circumstances did I bite Beyoncé and if I did it would've been a love bite.'

Not convinced: The declaration of love for Beyonce only prompting still-suspicious fans to respond with a string of hilarious memes

The declaration of love for Beyonce only prompted still-suspicious fans to respond with a string of hilarious memes, including OJ Simpson gifs from those who took note of Sanaa's 'if I did it' line.

Model and 90210 actress Sara Foster also denied she played any part in the incident on Instagram, writing:

'Flattering that anyone thinks I could get this close to Beyoncé,' alongside a screen shot of an email she had received from a journalist. 

Under suspicion: Model and 90210 actress Sara Foster also denied she played any part in the incident after fans found out she was on the party guestlist 

Denial: 'Flattering that anyone thinks I could get this close to Beyoncé,' alongside a screen shot of an email she had received from a journalist

While Girl's Trip star Tiffany deliberately didn't name the woman who bit Beyonce, the Bey Hive immediately began debating her identity.

Chrissy Teigen was one of the first, tweeting: 'I cannot leave this planet without knowing who bit Beyonce in the face.'

She then followed this up with: 'I can only think of one person who would do this. but I cannot say. but she....is the worst.'

Who bit Beyonce's face? Online frenzy followed Tiffany Haddish's shock revelation... as Chrissy Teigen tweeted 'You'd NEVER guess who it is!'

However after finding out who the actress with vampire-like tendencies actually was, Chrissy expressed her shock.

'My initial guess was wrong. The real person? I *never* would have guessed. I'VE SAID TOO MUCH.'

But while Chrissy wasn't able to name the alleged biter, Twitter wasn't so reticent, with fans all jumping to name actresses they thought could be to blame.

Warning! Tiffany was previously called out by Beyonce in new song Top Off after the comedian spilled party drama; the two are seen in a selfie that night

The debate was started when Tiffany opened up to GQ about the memorable December party, saying the actress appeared high on drugs.

Tiffany explained: 'There was this actress there that's just, like, doing the mostest. She bit Beyonce in the face.'

As might be imagined, Beyonce wasn't happy about this. 

Continued Tiffany: 'So Beyonce stormed away, went up to Jay-Z, and was like, 'Jay! Come here! This b****...' and snatched him. They went to the back of the room. I was like, 'What just happened?' And Beyoncé's friend walked up and was like, 'Can you believe this b**** just bit Beyonce?''

Tiffany says that the mystery actress then crossed her path - telling her to stop dancing.

Tiffany then approached Beyonce, who she had met for the first time that evening.

The irrepressible 38-year-old said she told her: 'I'm going to beat somebody a** at your party. I just want to let you know that.'

Beyonce told her not to, and said of the actress: 'That b**** is on drugs. She not even drunk. The b**** is on drugs. She not like that all the time. Just chill.'

The interview updates Tiffany's previous description of meeting the superstar, in which she went into less detail.

In it Tiffany said she had witnessed the singer act possessively when the unidentified actress placed her hand on Jay Z's chest. 

In response on DJ Khaled's recent song Top Off, Queen Bey called out Tiffany, saying her name and rapping, 'If they're tryna party with the queen, they gon' have to sign a non-disclosure.' 

But the Girls Trip star doesn't seem to be too worried that she has burned the friendship bridge with her idol. 

'Everything she said rang so real to me,' she said in a tweet after the song was released. 'Just know I will sign an NDA any day for Beyoncé. But also know this I will fight for Beyoncé. I love that woman she is a gift from God,'

Opening up: Tiffany's interview appears in the new edition of GQ, out now
item.dc:abstract: Tiffany Haddish sparked a Twitter frenzy this week after her relevation that a mystery actress bit Beyonce's face at a party. And Beyonce's notoriously dedicated Beyhive have been quick to place blame, prompting Love & Basketball actress Sanaa Lathan and Sara Foster, the sister of top models Bella and Gigi, to deny rumours that they were the culprits. Girls' Trip actress Tiffany started the drama when she told the April edition of GQ that music icon Beyonce was bit by a fellow reveller at a private afterparty following Jay Z's performance at The Forum in Los Angeles in December.
item.dc:creator: Joanna Crawley

item.title: 'I'm not going to shy away from confrontation!' Bachelor In Paradise's Keira Maguire hints at an explosive exchange... but who will be in her line of fire?
item.description: Bachelor In Paradise's Keira Maguire, 31, speaks about a confrontation on the show, and revealing more of her vulnerable side, in an interview with Popsugar Australia.
item.content:encoded:
She was dubbed the 'villain' on Richie Strahan's season of The Bachelor.

And now Keira Maguire has hinted there will be trouble in paradise, in upcoming scenes of the spin-off.

Speaking to Popsugar Australia on Monday, the 31-year-old stated: 'I'm not the person who would shy away from confrontations.' 

Scroll down for video  

'I'm not going to shy away from confrontation!' Bachelor In Paradise's Keira Maguire, 31, hinted at an explosive exchange in an interview with Popsugar Australia on Monday...but who will be in her line of fire?

'You'll see throughout the show that it's not that I don't necessarily get along with someone... I might not agree with what someone says, and I'm not the person who would shy away from confrontations,' Keira said of upcoming drama on the show.

'Not that I love it [confrontation], but I'm also someone who's not gonna stand for someone doing things that I don't agree with,' the reality star continued.

Despite taking a stand, Keira admitted that viewers will get to see a softer side to her.

Vocal: 'You'll see throughout the show that it's not that I don't necessarily get along with someone...I might not agree with what someone says, and I'm not the person who would shy away from confrontations,' the blonde said of upcoming drama on the show 

'You'll also see a more vulnerable side to me,' the cosmetic surgery enthusiast revealed, going on to say that she has her 'walls down a bit.' 

Meanwhile, it appears Keira is certainly willing to let down her walls when it comes to wooing co-star Jarrod Woodgate.

In a trailer for Tuesday night's episode, the blonde is seen wrapping her arms around the vineyard manager and calling him 'sexy'. 

'You'll also see a more vulnerable side to me': Keira also admitted that she has her 'walls down a bit' throughout the course of the show 

However Keira looks to have some competition, with Jarrod admitting to having an instant attraction to Ali Oetjen.

'Ali has just walked in and that's all we're really focusing on right now,' he gushes on camera, adding: 'Her smile is gods gift. Wow.'

Jarrod, who was described as a stage 5 clinger on Sophie Monk's season of The Bachelorette, soon realises he's the object of two women's affections.

'I think they call it a love triangle? Yeah I was in it,' he quips.  

She's smitten: Meanwhile it appears Keira is certainly willing to let down her walls, when it comes to wooing co-star Jarrod Woodgate [pictured]. In a trailer for Tuesday night's episode, the socialite calls the vineyard manager 'sexy'

item.title: 'Everyone has been there!' Florence Alexandra is WARNED that every girl 'has a Jake Ellis story' on Bachelor In Paradise... as Jen Hawke reminds fans of HER fling with the notorious playboy
item.description: Florence Alexandra received a shock on Sunday night's Bachelor In Paradise premiere when she was warned to stay away from Jake Ellis.
item.content:encoded:
Florence Alexandra received a shock on Sunday night's Bachelor In Paradise premiere when she was warned to stay away from Jake Ellis.

The blonde beauty was told not to trust Jake by Tara Pavlovic, who told her that he has a reputation on the Gold Coast as a ladies man.

'I live on the Gold Coast and everyone has been there,' Tara told a stunned Florence.

'I live on the Gold Coast and everyone has been there!' Tara Pavlovic warned Florence Alexandra about Jake Ellis on Sunday's Bachelor In Paradise premiere

She then said that so many people ask 'Have you got a Jake Ellis story?', implying that the handsome marketing manager had been around the block.

Speaking privately to the camera, Tara said: 'A lot of people I know, know Jake.'

She continued: 'He's a nice guy, happy to have a conversation with him. Would I date him? Absolutely not.' 

'Have you got a Jake Ellis story?' Tara said that many people on the Gold Coast have a 'story' about being with Jake, causing Florence to become concerned 

Oh no! Florence was shocked as she heard the information about Jake, who she had already hooked up with before in the outside world 

Florence later expressed her fears that the whispers were true, which caused her to get into a huge fight with Jake after she confronted him about it.

It seems that the Dutch stunner was right to be concerned, as shortly after the episode aired The Bachelor's Jen Hawke took to Instagram to remind fans that she has her very own Jake Ellis story.

'Who do I know other than Flo that has a Jake Ellis story?' Jen said sarcastically.

'Who do I know other than Flo that has a Jake Ellis story?' Shortly after the episode aired The Bachelor's Jen Hawke took to Instagram to remind fans that she had a fling with Jake

She then followed the question by posting a photo of herself with Jake, which was accompanied by a poll that asked users: 'Do you have a Jake Ellis story?'

Jen and Jake dated for around five months in 2016, but the pair split right before Jen joined The Bachelor. 

The 28-year-old also dated The Bachelorette's Blake Colman.

Jen then followed the question by posting a photo of herself with Jake, which was accompanied by a poll that asked users: 'Do you have a Jake Ellis story?'

item.title: Made in Chelsea's Jamie Laing, 29, enjoys a romantic evening at the theatre alongside girlfriend Heloise Agostinelli, 19... after she makes her MIC debut
item.description: The reality star, 29, and the 19-year-old coyly left London's Jermyn Street Theatre together after watching Cressida Bonas in stage show The Dog Beneath the Skin.
item.content:encoded:
Last month, he revealed he had found love again with the daughter of an Italian American self made billionaire financier.

And now Jamie Laing has stepped out with his new squeeze Heloise Agostinelli, who is 10 years his junior, following her debut on Monday night's Made In Chelsea.

The reality star, 29, and the 19-year-old coyly left London's Jermyn Street Theatre together after watching Cressida Bonas in stage show The Dog Beneath the Skin.

Date night: Jamie Laing has stepped out with his new squeeze Heloise Agostinelli, who is 10 years his junior, following her debut on Monday night's Made In Chelsea

Appearing in jovial spirits, Jamie looked smart in a pair of grey fitted suit trousers with a grey T-shirt underneath a stylish wool coat.

The E4 star teamed the ensemble with a pair of brown-coloured loafers while accessorising the look with a long chain, statement watch and a sprinkling of rings across his hands.

Attempting to remain incognito, Jamie's other half Heloise, who was introduced on Monday's MIC affectionately as Ell, showcased her slender pins in a black corduroy mini skirt.

She teamed the garment with an oversized grey jumper and nineties-inspired black bomber jacket while her brunette tresses fell down her shoulders in a sleek straight style.

Stepping out: The reality star, 29, and the 19-year-old coyly left London's Jermyn Street Theatre together after watching Cressida Bonas in stage show The Dog Beneath the Skin

United: Jamie and Heloise made their outing together just over a month after reports circulated about their romance

Jovial: Appearing in jovial spirits, Jamie looked smart in a pair of grey fitted suit trousers with a grey T-shirt underneath a stylish wool coat

All in the details: The E4 star teamed the ensemble with a pair of brown-coloured loafers while accessorising the look with a long chain, statement watch and a sprinkling of rings across his hands

The Made In Chelsea star has been keeping coy on his relationship with Heloise until now and she was introduced on the much-loved series following his fling with South African Melody.

In February MailOnline revealed that her father is Robert Agostinelli, is the 416th richest American, according to Forbes. 

While Heloise's mother is Mathilde Favier-Meyer, a Public Relations Manager at Dior Couture, so the teen is a well-known face on the social circuit.  

Jamie previously confirmed his new relationship - and that they're a decade apart in age. 

Shy: Attempting to remain incognito, Jamie's other half Heloise, who was introduced on Monday's MIC affectionately as Ell, showcased her slender pins in a black corduroy mini skirt

Then: In February MailOnline revealed that her father is Robert Agostinelli, is the 416th richest American, according to Forbes

Happy: While Heloise's mother is Mathilde Favier-Meyer, a Public Relations Manager at Dior Couture, so the teen is a well-known face on the social circuit. Jamie previously confirmed his new relationship - and that they're a decade apart in age

Nothing to see here! Heloise attempted to exit the stage show unnoticed, covering her face with her clutch bag

Loved-up: The couple made enjoyed their outing together just as Heloise made her debut on Made in Chelsea on Monday night

'I have been having a lot of date nights with this new mon amis [my friend] and it is actually making me slightly excited and giddy for life,' he told The Sun. 'She’s 19! So what? It doesn’t make a difference.

'I will never ever be in the same decade as her. When I turn 30, she turns 20.'

His female companion was first seen on Jamie's arm as they left Spencer Matthews and Vogue Williams' engagement drinks last month.

The new romance comes following his split from Frankie Gaff last summer. 

Debut: Heloise made her debut on MIC on Monday night, joining Jamie at cast mate Mimi Bouchard's pyjama party

Sealed with a kiss: They pair shared a passionate kiss on the show

Shinning star: Actress Cressida Bonas was pictured leaving the venue after her performance

Low-key: The stage star wore a casual look, sporting a simple leather biker jacket and paperbag trousers as she made her way out of the theatre after the performance

Relaxed: Cressida styled her brown bobbed tresses into simple flicked waves, with barely-there makeup highlighting her flawless complexion

Stylish: After another triumphant performance, the ex-girlfriend of Prince Harry made her way out of the theatre, carrying her essentials in a blue croc-skin bag

item.title: 'Here's to many more adventures together!' Reese Witherspoon sends 'wonderful husband' Jim Toth her love on their seventh wedding anniversary
item.description: They tied the knot in a private ceremony at her Libbey Ranch in Ojai, California, on March 26, 2011. The actress has since sold the property but her love for her husband is still going strong.
item.content:encoded:
They tied the knot in a private ceremony at her Libbey Ranch in Ojai, California, on March 26, 2011.

Reese Witherspoon has since sold the property but her love for husband Jim Toth is still going strong.

On Monday the couple celebrated their seventh wedding anniversary and the 42-year-old Big Little Lies star posted a snap of them standing on a runway in the heart of the country with a light aircraft and rolling hills in the background.

Out in the wild: Reese Witherspoon posted this snap on Monday captioned, 'Happy Anniversary to my wonderful husband who keeps me smiling everyday! Here’s to many more adventures together! I love you, JT' referring to Jim Toth

She captioned it: 'Happy Anniversary to my wonderful husband who keeps me smiling everyday! Here’s to many more adventures together! I love you, JT.'

Jim, 47, towered over Reese who went for a country and western look in a taupe cowboy hat, a blue blouse, skinny jeans and cowboy boots.

He is co-head of motion picture talent at the Creative Artists Agency, where Reese is a client.

Jim sported a red and blue plaid shirt, black pants, brown shoes and a big smile.

Dressy couple: The 42-year-old Big Little Lies star and her Creative Artists Agency husband, 47, looked smart as they headed to an event in February

The couple didn't give any indication of where they were, but it seemed very remote, suggesting they wanted some alone time on their anniversary.

There was no sign of their five-year-old son, Tennessee, or Reese's daughter Ava, 18, and Deacon, 14, whom she shares with ex-husband, actor Ryan Phillippe, 43.

The break may be just what Reese needs as she has a busy year ahead of her.

 The Draper James clothing and lifestyle entrepreneur has just released magical mystery A Wrinkle In Time, co-starring Oprah Winfrey and Mindy Kaling,

He wants a slice: Reese and Jim's five-year-old son, Tennessee, was very interested in his mom's birthday cake. The actress turned 42 on Thursday

The whole family: Reese with Ava, Deacon, little Tennessee and husband Jim at the Sing premiere in Decmeber 2016

She also has comedy drama, Wish list, in the works along with Tinker Bell, a live-action take on Peter Pan's fairy friend. Both have yet to set release dates.

Reese is working on the second series of her HBO show Big Little Lies with Nicole Kiman and Shailene Woodley.

Plus she has TV series Little Fires Everywhere and an untitled TV project with Jennifer Anison in pre-production that gives a behind-the-scenes look at a morning TV show broadcast from New York.

Fairy tale fun: Reese and Storm Reid in family friendly A Wrinkle In Time

item.title: 'It's a dream come true': TOWIE's Gemma Collins and James Argent say marriage and babies are ALREADY on the cards in first shoot as an 'official' couple
item.description: Speaking to OK! , the 36-year-old gushed that Arg was now 'fully committed' to her after weeks of indecision, and revealed the pair have spent every night together since making things official.
item.content:encoded:
They finally revealed they were a couple on Sunday night's TOWIE, after months of to and fro.

And Gemma Collins has now admitted her romance with on/off beau and long-term pal James 'Arg' Argent is a 'dream come true', and says marriage and babies are already on the cards after seven years of being off and on.

Speaking to OK!, the reality star, 36, gushed that Arg was now 'fully committed' to her after weeks of indecision, and revealed the pair have spent every night together since taking their relationship to the next level.

'I feel so secure with him': Gemma Collins admitted her new romance with on/off beau and long-term pal James 'Arg' Argent is a 'dream come true', during their joint photo shoot for OK! 

Posing in a red side-split gown, Gemma looked typically glamorous but happier than ever as she clasped tightly onto James' hand, for their first joint shoot as a couple.

With Arg beaming with glee behind her, the bubbly blonde revealed to the magazine he was a 'changed man' because of their romance, and that they are fully committed to making life work as a couple. 

After enduring weeks of unrequited love, Gemma gushed: 'To hear that he was ready to commit was a dream come true after so many years of not knowing where we both stand.’

‘James is like a different man since we made things official. I can tell he’s completely committed to me now.' 

Strong: The 36-year-old gushed that Arg was now 'fully committed' to her, and revealed the pair have spent every night together since making it official (pictured in November)

Read more: Read the full story in this week's OK! - out on Monday

Clearly more besotted than ever, Gemma also admitted the pair are inseparable, and have barely spent time apart since declaring their love.

She added: 'Every morning he puts on a love song for me and before we go to bed he cuddles me and tells me how beautiful I am. I feel so secure with him.

‘We haven’t spent a night apart since we made things official – James has basically moved into my flat.’ 

And it won't be long before the besotted pair take their romance to the next level by the sounds of things. 

Gemma said of marriage and babies: 'It’s something we really want in the future. 

'We’ve seen some beautiful places we’d like to get married in Spain and Essex, but we’re trying not to get ahead of ourselves. 

'I’ve made no secret of the fact I really want kids so I don’t think we’ll wait too long before trying for a family.' 

New chapter: Gemma and Arg confirmed their relationship on Sunday night's TOWIE - revealing they had bought a house together in Spain

Meanwhile Arg explained Gemma had been an incredible support to him, ever sinve he returned from his ten-week stint in a Thai rehabilitation centre last year.

Discussing his newfound healthy lifestyle after beating his 'demons', he explained: 'I can never get too complacent, it’s something I’ll always have to be careful of, but I’m a much stronger person now.

'Gemma knows the warning signs too – if I’m not being myself she’ll sit me down. Gemma been a constant source of strength for me. She’s never once judged me or turned her back on me.’

Gemma and Arg confirmed their relationship on Sunday night's TOWIE - revealing they had bought a house together in Spain and were already thinking of having children.

'Love': The reality stars left The Only Way Is Essex viewers stunned by the unexpected baby news on the season 22 premiere when they visited a financial adviser and exchanged 'I love you' to each other

The reality stars left The Only Way Is Essex viewers stunned by the unexpected baby news on the season 22 premiere when they visited a financial adviser and exchanged 'I love you' to each other.

Visiting the financial advisor to discuss opening a joint bank account, the pair looked happier than ever as they joked about Gemma having 'more staff than Mariah Carey'.  

Gemma said: 'We got matching watches and we've bought a holiday home in Spain and now we're setting up a joint bank account.  

'We've known each other for so long, we know other so well...I love you so much, I'll give you anything I've got. Every week we want to put a thousand into the account...  

'What it is, I'm a big roller, I earn well, I spend well. If Arg is watching the football, I'll have a massage girl come round.'

Sealed with a kiss: Visiting the financial advisor to discuss opening a joint bank account, the pair looked happier than ever as they joked about Gemma having 'more staff than Mariah Carey'

Making bank: Gemma said: 'We got matching watches and we've bought a holiday home in Spain and now we're setting up a joint bank account'

Arg then interrupted: 'She has more staff than Mariah Carey. She has a cleaner come round five times a week to clean her two bedroom apartment.'  

In the midst of the banter, the Meme Queen, 37, then dropped the bombshell that their new property was in part to 'relax her body for a baby' when the adviser asked if they would consider setting up an account for their future offsprings - a question which had 30-year-old James nervously laughing.

She confessed: 'Part of going to Spain is to relax my body to prepare for a baby.' 

Future: The pair chatted to a financial adviser during the show

'Big roller': She added: 'We've known each other for so long, we know other so well...I love you so much, I'll give you anything I've got. Every week we want to put a thousand into the account... What it is, I'm a big roller, I earn well, I spend well. If Arg is watching the football, I'll have a massage girl come round'

Diva: Arg then interrupted: 'She has more staff than Mariah Carey. She has a cleaner come round five times a week to clean her two bedroom apartment'

Children: In the midst of the banter, the Meme Queen, 37, then dropped the bombshell that their new property was in part to 'relax her body for a baby' when the advisor asked if they would consider setting up an account for their future offsprings

Nervous: The question which had 30-year-old James nervously laughing

'Baby': She confessed: 'Part of going to Spain is to relax my body to prepare for a baby'

Later in the episode, Gemma opened up to best friend Chloe Sims and discussed how serious their relationship was getting, although they're not officially together. 

She said: 'I can't think about nothing but James morning, noon and night. Thank you the big man up there for finally giving me James.

'It's not about the candy any more; when he wakes up he holds me and embraces me and says 'I'm just so in love with you'.I don't even call him Arg any more, I call him James.

Adding: 'He's finally the man I always want him to be. We've bought a place in Spain, we're going to get a joint bank account, like husband and wife would do.' 

Open: Later in the episode, Gemma opened up to best friend Chloe Sims and discussed how serious their relationship was getting, although they're not officially together

On her mind: She said: 'I can't think about nothing but James morning, noon and night. Thank you the big man up there for finally giving me James'

Serious: Chloe was taken aback about how serious they were

'I'm potentially setting up a life in Spain, any day now, he's going to ask me [to be his girlfriend].' 

The bombshell announcement left fans in a frenzy online as they revelled in the pair getting back together. 

A fan echoed many's sentiments with: 'Arg needs to put a ring on it #TOWIE'.

'Just want arg & the gc to get married n have babies n live happily ever after honestly (sic.),' another shared. 'Just hope arg gives Gemma the happiness she deserves'.

Frenzy: The bombshell announcement left fans in a frenzy online as they revelled in the pair getting back together

Another viewer wrote: 'Omg, the GC and Arg n the L word hope it last longer this time around. They look cute together doe' (sic). 

'Well who would of thought @missgemcollins & @RealJamesArgent together .. b***dy love it'. 

While many marvelled in their romance, other's worried for Gemma getting so serious despite not being official with the Essex crooner and other's were left confused that they were an item again.

 

Support: While many marvelled in their romance, other's worried for Gemma getting so serious despite not being official with the Essex crooner and other's were left confused that they were an item again

A concerned fan shared: 'Hold on, Gemma and Arg are not even officially together and the girl is talking about a joint bank account?? I just can’t'. 

'Gem babes, you’ve bought a house in Spain, but he’s not your boyfriend,' a viewer wrote online. 'How are arg and Gemma getting a joint bank account and have bought a property in Spain, but still aren’t officially a couple?'

Before another echoed: 'Wait. What. They’ve bought a house abroad, and have a joint bank account but aren’t even a couple ohhhhhh Gemma'.

Joyous: TOWIE viewers are thrilled over the latest developments

item.title: Eenie, meenie, minie...Lambo! Justin Bieber cruises the streets in his bright blue Lamborghini... days after crashing his G-Wagon
item.description: He escaped injury as his Mercedes G-Wagon was rear-ended on Friday. But Justin Bieber didn't let the accident keep him from driving luxury automobiles as he was spotted in his Lamborghini on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
He escaped injury as his Mercedes G-Wagon was rear-ended on Friday.

But Justin Bieber didn't let the accident keep him from his love of driving luxury automobiles as he was spotted out with his Lamborghini on Monday.

The 24-year-old rocked a casual ensemble of a black Zoe hoodie and neon green joggers as he emerged from the bright blue Italian sports racer.

Back at it: Justin Bieber was spotted in his Lamborghini on Monday

Daring to impress, the Upside Down Hearts singer rocked the hoodie with a orange, pink, and white loge on the chest.

His muscular gams were swathed in the green track pants as they cascaded over a pair of white high tops.

He kept his trademark sandy blonde tresses in a signature styled mess camp as she bounded down the suburban street.

It all comes after Justin's precious Mercedes-Benz G-Wagon was rear-ended by a white Range Rover on a mid-evening drive. 

Impressive: He rocked a casual ensemble of a black Zoe hoodie and neon green joggers as he emerged from the bright blue Italian sports racer

The aftermath was captured on social media by Twitter user Maisey Mcginnis. 

Shortly after the collision police were seen on the scene to make sure everything was going smoothly between the two involved parties.

According to TMZ late Friday night, Bieber was on Sunset Boulevard just before 9 p.m. in West Hollywood when he was rear-ended.

Legs for days! His muscular gams were swathed in the green track pants as they cascaded over a pair of white high tops

Their sources say that an OnStar system for one of the two SUVs alerted law enforcement to the crash. 

The publication claims that the officers stayed around as Bieber and the other party exchanged information but the police did not file a report.

TMZ's insiders report that there were no injuries from the collision. 

Hair story: He kept his trademark sandy blonde tresses in a signature styled mess camp as she bounded down the suburban street
