item.title: 'I need to figure out what the purpose is': Anna Faris reveals she isn't sure if she still believes in marriage after Chris Pratt split
item.description: Anna Faris isn't sure whether she still believes in marriage. The 41-year-old actress has already tied the knot two times, to actors Ben Indra and Chris Pratt.
item.content:encoded:
Anna Faris isn't sure whether she still believes in marriage.

The 41-year-old actress has already tied the knot two times, to actors Ben Indra and Chris Pratt, and she's admitted she isn't certain if she still believes in the institution.

Anna has son Jack, five, with her estranged husband Chris.

No wedding bells?: Actress Anna Faris, pictured hand-in-hand with boyfriend Michael Barret admitted that she's unsure if she still believes in marriage

 She is currently dating cinematographer Michael Barrett.

'I need to figure out what the purpose is,' Faris, 41, said on Monday's episode of Dax Shepard's Armchair Expert podcast.

'Is it safety for your children? Is it convention? Is it so other people respect your relationship more?' she questioned.

Happier times: The 'Scary Movie' actress and ex-husband Chris Pratt have a 5-year-old son together, Jack.

'For me, I'm just not quite sure where it fits, especially when it feels so easy to get married, and then the untangling — when the state gets involved,' the actress added.

'There is the importance of how other people then treat you as a married man than as a man with a girlfriend,' she conceded of marriage.

'I do think it is important how other people respect a relationship… I'm not saying it's a good reason, but it is a small benefit of having that label of being married.'

Young and in love: The 41-year-old actress and her first husband, Ben Indra, seemed smitten in 2006

 'I am a romantic. I believe in a partnership, I believe in companionship. I just don't know if I believe in a ceremony of a wedding.'

Faris was married to Indra from 2004 to 2007. Anna and Chris, 38, were together from 2009 to August last year. 

The House Bunny star has been seeing her current boyfriend, Michael, since October of last year.

Mommy duties: Anna cradled her son Jack, 5, who she has from her second marriage to ex-husband Chris Pratt

item.title: Spring fever! Sofia Vergara stuns in floral midi dress as she stares adoringly at Joe Manganiello at Ready Player One premiere in LA
item.description: The 45-year-old actress and hunky 41-year-old actor could not keep their eyes off of one another at the Ready Player One premiere in Los Angeles on Monday.
item.content:encoded:
They have been married for two years.

But Sofia Vergara and Joe Manganiello still look to be in the honeymoon phase.

The 45-year-old actress and hunky 41-year-old actor could not keep their eyes off of one another at the Ready Player One premiere in Los Angeles on Monday. 

Scroll down for video 

Just the two of us: Sofia Vergara and Joe Manganiello attended the Ready Player One premiere in Los Angeles on Monday

Aww: The 45-year-old actress and hunky 41-year-old actor could not keep their eyes off of one another at the gala

The two put on quite the display as they stared adoringly at one another on the purple carpet of the gala held at the famous Dolby Theatre in Hollywood. 

Sofia looked spring chic in a strapless midi dress featuring a floral pattern.

She teamed the fashionable dress with a pair of beige heels while accessorizing with a blinged out clutch and matching bracelet.

Loved up: The two put on quite the display as they stared adoringly at one another on the purple carpet of the gala held at the famous Dolby Theatre in Hollywood

Cool guy: Joe posed with a point 

Flower power: Sofia looked spring chic in the midi dress

Look of love: The two put on quite the adorable display

Handsome couple: They looked fantastic as always

Her brunette tresses were worn down flowing over her shoulder as she accentuated her natural looks with complimentary make-up.

 Joe looked handsome in a navy blue suit over a light blue dress shirt with several of the top buttons undone to show off his muscular chest.

He also sported black dress shoes as his dark locks were disheveled and sported a salt and pepper goatee.

Sheer daring: They were not the only stars at the gala as they were joined by Jaime King

Pretty: She looked gorgeous in a flowy sheer powder blue dress

Showy display: The 38-year-old actress looked quite proud of her look as she shook the long billowy skirt around to show it off even more on the red carpet

Just the two of us: Jaime and husband Kyle Newman posed for snaps on the purple carpet 

They were not the only stars at the gala as they were joined by Jaime King who looked gorgeous in a flowy sheer powder blue dress.

The 38-year-old actress looked quite proud of her look as she shook the long billowy skirt around to show it off even more on the red carpet.

Leading man in the flick Tye Sheridan ' looked dapper in a navy blue suit over a striped dress shirt and argyle patterned black and blue tie.

Handsome:Leading man in the flick Tye Sheridan ' looked dapper in a navy blue suit over a striped dress shirt and argyle patterned black and blue tie

Gorgeous: Olivia Cooke is the top billed actress in the sci-fi adventure film as she looked ravishing in a red leather number featuring a very intricate tie-up design near the top

Starlet: The 24-year-old British actress teamed the interesting piece of couture with matching strappy stilettos

Talented: Lena Waithe looked cool in white cement Air Jordan III sneakers

Tremendous trio: Tye, Olvia, and Lena looked great at the gala

 Olivia Cooke is the top billed actress in the sci-fi adventure film as she looked ravishing in a red leather number featuring a very intricate tie-up design near the top.

The 24-year-old British actress teamed the interesting piece of couture with matching strappy stilettos.

Her brunette tresses were put up in an elegant updo as she accentuated her natural looks with complimentary make-up topped off with pink lip. 

Legend: Director Steven Spielberg looked cool as always

Tremendous trio: The 71-year-old actor was joined by his two leading stars

Back in black: Hannah John-Kamen stunned in a sheer black look with jumpsuit

Intelligent: Author Ernest Cline rocked a navy suit with white dress shirt

Dapper dudes: Simon Pegg (left) and Ben Mendelsohn (right) looked handsome

No doubt many are excited about the new Steven Spielberg film as it has received generally positive reviews.

According to a press release, 'the film is set in 2045, with the real world on the brink of chaos and collapse. But people have found salvation in the OASIS, an immersive virtual universe where you can go anywhere, do anything, be anyone.'

The creator of OASIS, James Halliday, dies, leaving behind his fortune and a contest to find keys that will lead to the winner taking control of the virtual world.

Stunning: Kat Graham looked good in a red leather blazer

Stylish: Aisha Tyler looked fashionable in black leather pants

Just us: Seth Green and wife Clare Grant Mandatory looked happy on the purple carpet

Family affair: Christopher Lloyd brought his son to the gala

Wade manages to find the first key, but immediately becomes a target for nefarious forces bent on claiming OASIS and Halliday's immense fortune for themselves.

The unlikely young hero then joins forces with a group of friends who call themselves the High Five to save OASIS and defeat the forces of evil threatening it.

The High Five is composed of Sheridan, along with characters played by Olivia Cooke, Lena Waithe, Philip Zhao and Win Morisaki. 

Ready Player One is based off the fantastically popular novel of the same name by Ernest Cline, and was written by Cline and Zak Penn. 

The Steven Spielberg directed flick hits cinemas around the world on Thursday,

Support: The director's wife Kate Capshaw was front and center

Family affair: She was accompanied by their daughter, Jessica

Great Scott! There was a DeLorean at the gala which was made famous by Eighties adventure film franchise Back To The Future

Highly-anticipated: The Steven Spielberg directed flick hits cinemas around the world on Thursday
item.dc:abstract: They have been married for two years. But Sofia Vergara and Joe Manganiello still look to be in the honeymoon phase. The 45-year-old actress and hunky 41-year-old actor could not keep their eyes off of one another at the Ready Player One premiere in Los Angeles on Monday. The two put on quite the display as they stared adoringly at one another on the purple carpet of the gala held at the famous Dolby Theatre in Hollywood.

item.title: Winnie Harlow flaunts her incredible figure in two tiny bikinis as she poses up a storm for sizzling sunset shoot on Dubai beach
item.description: She has been a catwalk queen for four years, since her London Fashion Week debut in 2014.
item.content:encoded:
She has been a catwalk queen for four years, since her London Fashion Week debut in 2014.

And Winnie Harlow took her skills to the beach over the weekend as she posed in skimpy swimwear in the stunning surroundings of Dubai.

The Brit model - real name Chantelle Brown-Young - flaunted her incredible figure in monochrome bikinis for an Instagram shoot.

Beach life: Winnie Harlow took her catwalk skills to the beach over the weekend as she posed in skimpy swimwear in the stunning surroundings of Dubai

Winnie slipped into a sporty Tommy Hilfiger two piece for some shots, proudly displaying her long legs and taut stomach.

With her hair left loose and in curls and natural makeup, her athletic figure took the spotlight.

Walking through the surf as the sun set, Winnie also teased a look at her pert posterior in the thong-cut of her bikini bottoms as she gazed out to sea.

Check out the view! The Brit model - real name Chantelle Brown-Young - flaunted her incredible figure in monochrome bikinis for an Instagram shoot

For her other Insta shots, the top model, who has a skin condition called vitiligo, changed into an even skimpier white halterneck bikini. 

She also posed in front of the famous Burj Al Arab hotel for some shots, adding a tight white t-shirt over her bikini, knotted at the waist.

Before the beach Winnie headed to an animal sanctuary for some more shots, tenderly bottle feeding a tiger cub and deer and posing with the giraffes, alongside the caption: 'real life Disney princess'.

Stunning: The top model, who has a skin condition called vitiligo, changed into an even skimpier white halterneck bikini

What a location! She also posed in front of the famous Burj Al Arab hotel for some frames, adding a tiny white crop top over her bikini

Despite beaming in some of the beautiful photos, she chose to caption the photos with a series of cryptic messages relating to heartbreak and the search for love.

One caption included the lyrics to Brandy's song Have You Ever, with Winnie writing: 'Have you finally found the one you’ve given your heart to Only to to find that one won’t give their heart to you Have you ever closed your eyes and dreamed that they were there And all you can do is wait For the day when they will care.' 

Winnie has previously been linked to Formula 1 ace Lewis Hamilton, enjoying a sizzling summer with the fellow Brit last year. 

Strike a pose: Winnie was in a world of her own as she posed for the stunning images

Feeling blue? The top model chose to caption the photos with a series of cryptic messages relating to heartbreak and the search for love

Leggy: The Brit beauty flaunted her incredibly long legs in the gorgeous images

The model has made waves since she made her catwalk debut in September 2014 during London Fashion Week.

The catwalk queen recently gave fans a glimmer into her non-stop party girl lifestyle in an interview with Harper's Bazaar.

Sharing her best skincare tips while on the road, she told the publication: 'I like to unwind at the end of a long day with music and a massage, always. As for bed time, there's no normal time.'

Moving location! Winnie also shared some photos from an animal sanctuary earlier in the day as she tenderly bottle fed a tiger cub

Photobomb: Winnie dressed in a tiny black crop top and chic head scarf for the shots

Winnie first secured fame on the 21st season of America's Next Top Model before she carved out a successful career for herself.

She has since appeared in a number of high-profile music videos, including Eminem's Guts Over Fear and Beyoncé's Lemonade.

The 5ft 9in stunner was diagnosed with vitiligo around the age of four, which made her among one per cent of the population who has the condition. 

In her element: As she cosied up to the wildlife, the animal lover captioned this photo: 'real life Disney princess'

item.title: 'I thought you worked in sales!' Bachelor In Paradise's Florence Alexandra failed to recognise Gold Logie nominee Peter Helliar when they met at the Grand Prix
item.description: He's the TV presenter who previously scored a Gold Logie nomination.
item.content:encoded:
He's the TV presenter who previously scored a Gold Logie nomination.

And although Peter Helliar is a household name for many Australians, it seems as though not everyone is familiar with his work.

Appearing on The Project to talk about her revived reality stardom on Bachelor In Paradise, on Monday, Florence Alexandra, 28, revealed she thought the 42-year-old worked in sales.

Scroll down for video  

Well that's awkward! On Monday, The Project's Peter Hellier revealed when he met The Bachelor In Paradise's Florence Alexandra the day before, she told him she thought he worked in sales

Retelling the story, Peter said he met the stunner on Sunday at the Formula One Grand Prix where he introduced himself to her.

'I thought you worked in sales,' she said. 

'You look like a sales guy.' 

Defending herself for the grand mix up, Florence added that she never watched TV. 

'There goes my Gold Logie hopes,' joked the comedian. 

Florence's appearance comes after New Idea reported earlier in the day that 'security were called in over her meltdown before she was forced to leave the show'. 

Is this true? Florence's appearance comes after New Idea reported earlier in the day that 'security were called in over her meltdown before she was forced to leave the show'

Who to choose? Florence is currently in a love triangle with Davey Lloyd (left) and Jake Ellis (right) 

'This is nothing like the Florence people have seen before,' the source revealed to the publication adding that the 'meltdown' stemmed from her fling with co-star Jake Ellis.

But taking to Instagram, the blonde beauty denied the rumours. 

'LOL fake news,' she captioned.  

Not true! After the publication reported she was acting 'nothing like the Florence people have seen before', the stunner took to social media to call the article 'fake news'

item.title: 'Feeling for him!' MAFS 'villain' bride Davina Rankin defends Bachelor In Paradise star Brett Moore after he claims producers were aware of his relationship before being embroiled in 'secret girlfriend' scandal on show
item.description: Bachelor In Paradise star Brett Moore was sent packing on Tuesday after becoming embroiled in a 'secret relationship' plot-line, which he claims producers created.
item.content:encoded:
Bachelor In Paradise star Brett Moore was sent packing on Tuesday after becoming embroiled in a 'secret relationship' plot-line, which he claims producers created.

And Married At First Sight's most controversial bride Davina Rankin has now empathized with the reality star's 'villain' portrayal. 

The busty Instagram model, 27, shared Brett's post surrounding his shock exit from the show, adding: 'Feeling for @suchislife.co(Brett).'

Scroll down for video

'Feeling for him!' MAFS 'villain' bride Davina Rankin defends Bachelor In Paradise star Brett Moore after he claims producers were aware of his relationship before being embroiled in 'secret girlfriend' scandal on show

Brett claimed in his lengthy upload that producers were aware he was dating former Bachelor star Stephanie Boulton and had implied she would join him on the show, before 'ripping up her contract' to make it seem like he went on a dating show without her. 

Davina, appearing to relate to his unique situation, wrote: 'But if the public is entertained, that's all that matters.' 

While on MAFS, Davina was labeled a 'villain' for pursuing what appeared-to-be a secret relationship with 'alpha male' Dean Wells, while they were both 'married' to different people.

'Portraying you as a sh** bloke and as always, forever putting production over humanity': Brett claimed in his lengthy upload that producers were aware he was dating former Bachelor star Stephanie Boulton and had implied she would join him on the show, before 'ripping up her contract' to make it seem like he went on a dating show without her

Shock plot! While on MAFS, Davina was labeled a 'villain' for pursuing what appeared-to-be a secret relationship with 'alpha male' Dean Wells, while they were both 'married' to different people

While Davina has remained tight-lipped about her portrayal on Married At First Sight, her TV bridesmaid slammed the show's producers last month over her friend's unflattering portrayal.

Gillian Godwin even blamed the 'strategically edited' episodes for a torrent of 'cyber bullying' against the busty Instagram model.

Gillian went on to accuse the producers of 'strategically editing and typecasting' Davina by going down 'a totally unoriginal stereotypical avenue'.

'But if the public is entertained, that's all that matters': Davina, appearing to relate to his unique situation

NOT happy! While Davina has remained tight-lipped about her portrayal on Married At First Sight, her TV bridesmaid slammed the show's producers last month over her friend's unflattering portrayal 

He was sent packing from Bachelor In Paradise after his not-so-secret relationship with Stephanie Boulton was exposed.

And taking to Instagram after Monday's episode, Brett Moore addressed the scandal.

In a lengthy post, Brett blamed the show's producers for making him look like a 's**t bloke' and insisted the original plan was for Stephanie to join him in Fiji.

Brett Moore was kicked off Bachelor In Paradise on Monday after his not-so-secret relationship with Stephanie Boulton was exposed - but he claims there is another side to the story

Brett explained that he and Stephanie were both approached to appear on Bachelor In Paradise in the 'early days' of their relationship.

The idea was that they would film the series and allow their romance - which had already started back in Australia - to 'blossom' in front of the cameras.

However, things apparently went pear-shaped when Brett 'arrived on the island first' and Stephanie's contract was summarily 'ripped up' - making it 'look like (he) went on a dating show without her'.

Was it all a set-up? In a lengthy post, Brett blamed the show's producers for making him look like a 's**t bloke' and insisted the original plan was for Stephanie to join him in Fiji

The ensuing controversy over Brett's 'secret' girlfriend and what he was doing on a dating show for singletons was one of the main storylines in the first two episodes.

Bachelor fan favourite Tara Pavlovic was even dragged into the embarrassing situation after she was accused of 'covering' for Brett.

Brett explained: 'Imagine then airing it to Australia, portraying you as a s**t bloke and, as always, (TV execs) forever putting production over humanity.'

Scandal: Brett explained that he and Stephanie were both approached to appear on Bachelor In Paradise in the 'early days' of their relationship - but, for some reason, only he made it to Fiji

Insisting that he and Stephanie 'never changed (their) story about seeing each other in the lead up', Brett added that they 'couldn't wait to be reunited in Fiji'.

Brett appeared to have support from his Bachelor In Paradise co-stars after Monday's episode aired, with Megan Marx commenting below his post: 'Love you guys.'

Mackane Reid also wrote on Instagram: 'Big love to my brother from another mother. Sorry it turned out the way it did... Go to this great man's last post for the full story.' 

A Warner Bros. spokesperson said: 'Once it was confirmed during filming that Brett and Stephanie were actually dating, Stephanie was no longer eligible for the show.'

Happily ever after! Despite the controversy, Brett shared an Instagram Story post on Monday night thanking fans for their support and confirming he and Stephanie are still together
item.dc:abstract: Bachelor In Paradise star Brett Moore was sent packing on Tuesday after becoming embroiled in a 'secret relationship' plot-line, which he claims producers created. And Married At First Sight's most controversial bride Davina Rankin has now empathized with the reality star's 'villain' portrayal. The busty Instagram model, 27, shared Brett's post surrounding his shock exit from the show, adding: 'Feeling for @suchislife.co(Brett).'
item.dc:creator: Candice Jackson

item.title: 'It just happened': Roseanne Barr reveals it took only three weeks to get a deal for her rebooted sitcom... after her controversial remarks in support of President Trump
item.description: The 90s comedy standout wore her brown locks wavy and parted, alternating between diamond earrings on the GMA appearance and hoop earrings at the Paley Center New York.
item.content:encoded:
With just a day left before the premiere, Roseanne Barr and the gang are promoting the Roseanne reboot everywhere.

They were in New York City on Monday to promote the revived sitcom - which is returning after a 20-year absence from TV - on Good Morning America, followed by a panel at the Paley Center New York.

The actress, 65, wore an olive green floral shirt over a lacy cream top with a matching scarf, dark blue jeans and a pearl necklace to the set of the ABC morning show, in which she was seated on the program's trademark plaid couch with a quilted cover alongside co-stars John Goodman and Laurie Metcalf.

Scroll below for video 

Happy day: Roseanne, 65, was flanked by co-stars Laurie Metcalf, 62, and John Goodman, 65, on Good Morning America Monday to promote the rebooted show, with Lecy Goranson, 43, and Sarah Chalke, 41, in the background 

At the Paley Center New York, she was clad in black dress with a black shawl and black gloves with grey sneakers.

In both appearances, the 90s comedy standout wore her brown locks wavy and parted, alternating between diamond earrings on the GMA appearance and hoop earrings at the Paley Center New York.

Co-stars Sara Gilbert, Michael Fishman, Lecy Goranson and Sarah Chalke were present for both appearances in the Big Apple to promote the rebooted program, which originally ran from 1989 thru 1997.

On the morning show Monday, Barr said that the reboot 'just happened' organically after Goodman appeared on Gilbert's The Talk last year.

Ready to go: The 90s superstar looked relaxed as she sat on the show's trademark couch that was brought to the GMA set

Playing games! The cast had some fun on the breakfast TV show

Together again: The cast posed with the show's Michael Strahan on Monday

Consistent: Metcalf has been busy with The Big Bang Theory since 2007

'Sara and John were on Sara's talk show and they did a little sketch,' Roseanne said. 'It got a lot of attention. Sara called me and said, "Would you want to do a reunion show?" and I said, "Yeah, definitely."

'I said, "What about John?" She goes, "Oh, John's in." I said, "Well of course then I'm in." Everybody was in, and so then it went from a special to a series and we had a deal in three weeks.'

The slate of appearances came days after Roseanne made headlines with a strong show of support for President Donald Trump as she appeared on the Thursday show of one of Trump's peskiest detractors, Jimmy Kimmel.

Leading lady: Roseanne wore a dark ensemble as she stood on the red carpet in NYC 

Say cheese: (L-R) Goranson, Fishman, Roseanne, Goodman and Chalke posed for a group shot on the red carpet

Kimmel told Roseanne he was 'shocked' over Roseanne's previously-stated support of the commander-in-chief, as he knew her as 'a very socially liberal person in general.'

Roseanne, who appeared alongside Goodman on the late night program, said that it wasn't her that changed, but the Democratic party and its supporters who'd gone off the deep end.

'I’m still the same: You all moved! You all went so f*****g far out you lost everybody! I mean, seriously,' she said. 'A lot of us, no matter who we voted for, we don’t want to see our president fail.'

She asked Kimmel if he would prefer if Trump's Vice President Mike Pence - controversial for many of his own views and actions - were to sit in the big chair. She said: 'We don’t want [Mike] Pence! Are you f*****g kidding me? You want Pence? You want Pence for the freaking president? Well then, zip that f*****g lip!'

Roseanne returns to the air Tuesday at 8/7c on ABC. 

Back from the dead: While Goodman's character Dan was killed off in the show's 1997 finale, he's brought back to life with a clever twist of writing in the reboot 

Together again: Zach Braff and Chalke had a bit of a Scrubs reunion on the red carpet of the Paley event in NYC

They were in New York City on Monday to promote the revived sitcom - which is returning after a 20-year absence from TV - on Good Morning America followed by a panel at the Paley Center New York. The actress, 65, wore an olive green floral shirt over a lacy cream top with a matching scarf and dark blue jeans to the set of the ABC morning show, in which she was seated on the program's trademark plaid couch with a quilted cover alongside co-stars John Goodman and Laurie Metcalf.

item.title: 'We'll see how many he wants!' Kate Hudson reveals she'd love to have a baby girl as she talks family plans with beau Danny Fujikawa
item.description: Kate Hudson, 38, has insisted she 'isn't done yet' when it comes to children, gushing she'd love to have a baby girl one day.
item.content:encoded:
She's a doting mum to two boys, Ryder, 14, and Bing, six.

But Kate Hudson, 38, has insisted she 'isn't done yet' when it comes to children, gushing she'd love to have a baby girl one day.

Talking to The Times the Almost Famous actress said it's ultimately down to her boyfriend Danny Fujikawa if and when she expands her brood.

Family plans: Kate Hudson, 38, has insisted she 'isn't done yet' when it comes to children, gushing she'd love to have a baby girl one day

The actress is already a proud mum to Ryder, with ex-husband Chris Robinson, and Bingham, with former fiance Matt Bellamy of the band Muse. 

'I'd like to [have more children]! I'm not done yet. A girl would be fun,' she gushes in the new interview, quickly adding though: 'We'll see. We'll see how many Danny wants.'

The How To Lose a Guy in 10 Day' actress was 24 when she had her first child and admits that makes her feel different to her friends as they're only just starting their families now, though she has no regrets.

Besotted: Talking to The Times the Almost Famous actress said it's ultimately down to her boyfriend Danny Fujikawa if and when she expands her brood

Mum of two: The actress is already a proud mum to Ryder, with ex-husband Chris Robinson, and Bingham, with former fiance Matt Bellamy of the band Muse

She explained: 'I've only ever been a mom! I never had an adult life without kids. My friends had their whole twenties -- they're all just getting pregnant now. But everything I've experienced has been great, albeit not conventional, including my childhood.'

With her own acting background and her sons' fathers being musicians, Kate, who is the daughter of Hollywood icon Goldie Hawn, is not surprised that both her sons seem destined to be performers when they grow up.

She said: 'Oh, yeah! I definitely believe it's in the DNA. It's just what you know, it's in your gut and you just pursue it.

With her boys: The actress was 24 when she had her first child and admits that makes her feel different to her friends as they're only just starting their families now

'[Ryder is] a great mimic. I wouldn't be surprised -- I'd be a little concerned, but in a good way -- if he went into stand-up. And Bing is abnormally musical. He's been drumming since he was a year and a half.'

Though her work sometimes keeps her apart from her children, the 'Fool's Gold' actress is thankful technology keeps them in touch - though it isn't always convenient.

She said: 'It's funny with FaceTime now -- you're always still with your kids all day, even when you're travelling. Last night I kept getting calls about homework. I was, like, 'Honey, I'm trying to get to sleep!' '

 Serious: Kate and Danny recently celebrated their one-year anniversary, and rumours had even began to circulate that they had got engaged following the romantic occasion

Kate and Danny recently celebrated their one-year anniversary, and rumours had even began to circulate that they had got engaged following the romantic occasion. 

Last year, on December 3, Kate marked the couple's anniversary with a gushing note on Instagram describing how they first met when she was 23 and pregnant. 

The Almost Famous star began: 'The first time I met Danny I was 23 and enormously pregnant with Ryder. His step sisters are my best friends @sarafoster @erinfoster and so it goes we have been in the same circle for over a decade!'

She added: 'A year ago today Danny took me on a hike and what I thought was just a hike with a family friend turned very quickly into an unexpected first date.

'No moves were made on this first date. In fact, it took months for him to make a first move! And as a kiss on this bridge would have been nice, the kiss a year later was so much sweeter.'

Hudson then remarked: 'So on our 15th year of knowing each other we were able to open our hearts to each other to feel so much pure love and it’s been truly incredible.! ❤️Happy first date anniversary baby. #LoveThisMan #WhatAYear.' 

Slow burner: Last year, on December 3, Kate marked the couple's anniversary with a gushing note on Instagram describing how they first met when she was 23 and pregnant

Talking to The Times, the Almost Famous actress said it's ultimately down to her boyfriend Danny Fujikawa if and when she expands her brood. The actress is already a proud mum to Ryder, with ex-husband Chris Robinson, and Bingham, with former fiance Matt Bellamy of the band Muse.

item.title: Angelina Jolie wears all-black ensemble to Los Angeles pet store as son Knox carries away snake bedding
item.description: The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress treated her nine-year-old son Knox on Sunday to a trip to a Los Angeles pet store.
item.content:encoded:
Angelina Jolie treated her son Knox on Sunday to a trip to a Los Angeles pet store.

The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress wore an all-black ensemble for the outing.

The mother-of-six wore a knee-length black coat over a black crew neck top and black trousers. 

Pet store: Angelina Jolie wore all-black on Sunday while taking her son Knox to a pet store in Los Angeles

She completed her look with matching footwear and accessorized with sunglasses.

Angelina had her dark brown hair pulled back into a bun.

Nine-year-old Knox kept it casual in a grey Tempest Trü Freedom T-shirt, khaki green cargo pants and black Nike sneakers.

The budding herpetologist carried a bag of snake bedding from the pet store. 

Mother and son: Nine-year-old Knox kept it casual while spending time with his mother

Knox and his twin sister Vivienne were born in July 2008 in Nice, France to Angelina and estranged husband Brad Pitt, 54.

Angelina also has children Maddox, 16; Pax, 14; Zahara, 13 and 11-year-old Shiloh.

She was spotted on Tuesday in a longer black coat grocery shopping with Zahara and Knox in Los Angeles.

Busy star: Angelina also was spotted with Knox recently grocery shopping in Los Angeles

Angelina and Brad separated in September 2016 and she filed for divorce seeking physical custody of their children.

The former couple last month received court approval to extend their ongoing private divorce negotiations.

Angelina agreed to a temporary custody agreement late last year that granted Brad visitation rights. 

Happier times: Brad Pitt and Angelina are shown in November 2015 in Hollywood

item.title: 'This is it': Joanna Krupa flashes her massive diamond ring on coffee run before sharing cute snap with new fiance Douglas Nunes
item.description: Joanna Krupa is ready for the whole world to know she's taken. The wedding news comes just eight months after splitting from her ex-husband Romain Zago, 45.
item.content:encoded:
Joanna Krupa is ready for the whole world to know she's taken.

The 38-year-old model flashed her massive diamond ring while out for coffee in Tampa on Monday. 

Krupa announced her engagement to boyfriend Douglas Nunes just a day ago.

Peace and love! Joanna Krupa is ready for the whole world to know she's taken. The 38-year-old model flashed her massive diamond ring while out for coffee in Tampa on Monday

Going to the chapel! Krupa announced her engagement to Douglas Nunes just a day ago

Later the same day Joanna posted a cute snap of the couple on Instagram, the first following her engagement news.

'This is it,' she captioned the photo of her kissing Nunes.

The silver-haired fox is the COO of 451 Media Group, but very little else is known about him.

The wedding news comes just eight months after her split from her ex-husband Romain Zago, 45.

If fans weren't already reeling over her speedy engagement, they certainly are now after Joanna posted a curious photo of her bloated belly on Instagram leading some to believe she also has baby news. 

'OMG someone ate too much,' she captioned the image. 

Her happy engagement news was revealed on Sunday when Joanna posted a snap of herself wearing the sparkler on her wedding finger while holding hands with Nunes.

On Monday afternoon, Joanna posted the first photo with her fiance on Instagram. 'This is it,' she said as she kissed on Nunes who keeps his social media accounts private 

Model status: Krupa stepped out in a pair of skin-tight jeans, black booties, and a tank top 

She captioned the image: 'Just another weekend in the Krupa-Nunes household.' 

Confirming the news to MailOnline, a spokesperson said: 'Yes they are engaged - that's all for now.' 

Last October, Joanna hinted that she was single when she spoke to US Weekly and admitted she was focusing on her work.

She said at the time: ‘Honestly, right now I’m trying to focus on work. I just feel like men in Hollywood are looking for a trophy wife.

Baby news? If fans weren't already reeling over her speedy engagement, they certainly are now after Joanna posted a curious photo of her bloated belly on Instagram

Moving on: The wedding news comes just eight months after splitting from her ex-husband Romain Zago, 45 

'It’s really hard to get to know somebody. If prince charming comes along, great, but I just feel like it’s really tough in LA.’ 

Just following her divorce from Romain, the Poland native decided to freeze her eggs. 

'You never know what life will bring,' she told Life & Style Magazine. 'What if that moment comes when you can’t have kids? Thank goodness I froze my eggs.' 

The playboy vet also told the magazine that ideally she'd like to have a boy and a girl. 

Just following her divorce from Romain, the Poland native decided to freeze her eggs. 'You never know what life will bring,' she told Life & Style Magazine . 'What if that moment comes when you can’t have kids?' She also admitted to wanting a boy and a girl...ideally
item.dc:abstract: Joanna Krupa is ready for the whole world to know she's taken. The 38-year-old model flashed her massive diamond ring while out for coffee in Tampa on Monday. Krupa announced her engagement to boyfriend Douglas Nunes just a day ago.

item.title: Like you've never seen her before! Unearthed video shows a brunette Florence Alexandra engaging in a steamy girl-on-girl pillow fight years before her Bachelor In Paradise debut
item.description: An unearthed video shows a brunette Florence Alexandra, 28, engaging in a steamy girl-on-girl pillow fight, years before her Bachelor In Paradise debut.
item.content:encoded:
She's one of the blonde beauties competing for a rose on spin-off Bachelor In Paradise.

But an unearthed video shows a brunette Florence Alexandra looking dramatically different from her TV persona.

A dance festival promo from 2012 sees the 28-year-old wearing sheer lingerie and engaging in a steamy girl-on-girl pillow fight. 

Scroll down for video 

Like you've never seen her before! Unearthed video shows a brunette Florence Alexandra engaging in a steamy girl-on-girl pillow fight years before her Bachelor In Paradise debut 

The promo for Dutch dance festival Festivaart, shows Florence revealing her toned figure in a white push-up bra, Brazilian-cut briefs and a sheer camisole.

A pair of feathered angel wings work as an accessory, and her makeup palette consists of a heavy coating of foundation, very defined brows, lashings of mascara and a glossy pink lip.

The beginning of the clip sees Florence, alongside a blonde bombshell, blowing away a feather on her shoulder before a hand clamps down tightly on a fluffy blanket.

Racy in lace: The clip sees the reality star, alongside a female companion, revealing her toned figure in a white push-up bra, Brazilian-cut briefs and a matching sheer lace camisole 

Florence and her pal then launch into a steamy pillow fight, hair whipping back and forth before eventually crashing down onto a plush bed.

The video marks Florence's dramatic transformation over the course of six years.

Her debut on Matty Johnson's season of The Bachelorette saw the Dutch beauty showing off her golden tan, luscious blonde locks and slimmed-down figure.

Wild! The girls engage in a steamy pillow fight, eventually crashing down together on a plush bed 

While she wasn't successful in winning over Matty J's heart, she's trying her luck at love again, in the spin-off Bachelor In Paradise.

Monday night's episode was certainly dramatic, with Florence having to choose between either giving Jake Ellis or Davey LLoyd a rose, saving only one from elimination.

The stunner chose Jake, sending Davey home. 

Blonde bombshell: The video is a far cry from Florence's current style, consisting of a golden tan and luscious blonde locks

item.title: 'Looking for surfing and dirt bike lessons!' The Bachelor's Jen Hawke joins Tinder in search of an action man... and uses VERY saucy shots on her profile
item.description: Failed Bachelor contestant Jen Hawke has taken matters into her own hands and put herself on popular dating app Tinder.
item.content:encoded:
She didn't have much luck on The Bachelor last year having stormed out midway through the season.

And so Jen Hawke has taken matters into her own hands and put herself on popular dating app Tinder.

The 28-year-old's profile sees her in a series of sultry snaps, one of which teases her pert behind in a thong bikini.

Scroll down for video 

'Looking for surfing and dirt bike lessons!' The Bachelor's Jen Hawke has joined Tinder in search of an action man... and uses VERY saucy shots on her profile

Others are taken from an angle that shows off her busty assets.

Her profile is lite, claiming simply that she is 'looking for surfing and dirt bike lessons!'

It lists her age and where she works, and features details of where she was educated [twice for some reason].

In the bikini picture, the brunette looks coyly over one shoulder as stands on a sun-drenched balcony. 

Peachy keen: In the bikini picture, the brunette looks coyly over one shoulder as stands on a sun-drenched balcony

Not laying it on thick: Her profile is lite, claiming simply that she is 'looking for surfing and dirt bike lessons'

Romeo, romeo? The 28-year-old's profile sees her in a series of sultry snaps, one of which teases her pert behind in a thong bikini

Jen was seen weighing on one of her past failed relationships on Sunday, as she took to social media to record a sarcastic dig at current Bachelor In Paradise star Jake Ellis.

After Florence Alexander received a shockwhen she was told not to trust Jake by Tara Pavlovic, who told her that he has a reputation on the Gold Coast as a ladies man.

'I live on the Gold Coast and everyone has been there,' Tara told a stunned Florence.

She then said that so many people ask 'Have you got a Jake Ellis story?', implying that the handsome marketing manager had been around the block.

'Have you got a Jake Ellis story?' Tara said that many people on the Gold Coast have a 'story' about being with Jake, causing Florence to become concerned 

Oh no! Florence was shocked as she heard the information about Jake, who she had already hooked up with before in the outside world 

'Who do I know other than Flo that has a Jake Ellis story?' Shortly after the episode aired The Bachelor's Jen Hawke took to Instagram to remind fans that she had a fling with Jake

Florence later expressed her fears that the whispers were true, which caused her to get into a huge fight with Jake after she confronted him about it.

Jen then took to Instagram to remind fans that she has her very own Jake Ellis story. 'Who do I know other than Flo that has a Jake Ellis story?' Jen said sarcastically.

She then followed the question by posting a photo of herself with Jake, which was accompanied by a poll that asked users: 'Do you have a Jake Ellis story?'

Jen and Jake dated for around five months in 2016, but the pair split right before Jen joined The Bachelor. 

The 28-year-old also dated The Bachelorette's Blake Colman.

Yes or no? Jen then followed the question by posting a photo of herself with Jake, which was accompanied by a poll that asked users 'Do you have a Jake Ellis story?'
